11.content: Which girl from the original version of Yu-Gi-Oh do you end up dating?
11.title: Original

choices: A food shop (saying restaurant is too limiting on story potential)
111.content:
Tap tap tap. Max paced in front of a bus station. It’s a sunny day and the street is busy with teenagers going to the local hot spots. Max’s highschool had let out early, freeing the the teens from the four walls. Pacing for too long hurt his feet, and decided to sit on a bench.

Max looked up at a nearby clock. 4:40pm. Max frown. He’s been waiting here for a while and had been being worrying if she would show up.

Max is 6’2 ft tall, with a muscular build. He has brown, cowlick hair with blue eyes. His face is serious but he has that classic sweet guy personality. While he isn’t perfect, he tries to do the right thing, even if he likes to indulge his darker side. But that isn’t what he is here for.

Max is wearing a green, plaid, shirt sleeve shirt, button up to the last two close to his neck and blue jeans for his pants.

Max, looking anxious, watch for a bus to come. A few days earlier, he had asked a girl out. She was always surrounded by a group of boys so Max never found the courage to speak to her. One day, Max hadn’t seen those boys around the girl for a week. Seeing no better time to get close to her, He approach her.

To be honest, Max was fully expecting a rejection. Sure, they’ve share some few moments together but they never really gotten to know each other. But Max thought she was beautiful. So when he asked her, he was surprised that she smiled and said “Yes, I would like to go out with you.” She didn’t say it right away. Understandably, she took a few moments before giving her answer. Max was definitely on cloud nine after that.

Max continue to twiddle his thumbs. He is so nervous. But his patience was rewarded. The bus drove up and stopped in front of him. Max got up from his chair as the door open.

The girl he was waiting for walked out down the steps of the bus with her long, slender legs. Her feet touched the ground and look up at the taller person in front of her. She smiled as soon as she recognized him. “Hey there, Max. Did I keep you waiting long?” Tea asked, her short, brown hair dangle at the sides of her face.
https://goo.gl/images/T4Dx29

Max blushed. “Nope. Nuh-uh. I just got here. So glad we happen to arrive at the same time.” Max said, playing it cool (Ha).

Tea smile. “I guess so.” She reach out her hand and grab his. “Come on. I’m so excited. Let’s see how much we can get done in one day.” Tea tug on Max’s hand, who is blushing and unable to get any words, and lead him off to where they are heading for.
111.title: Tea Gardner

They soon found a local food shop.
Both wre a bit hungry.
After choosing a booth, both soon had their orders, but, do they order the same thing to eat and drink?

123.content:
After taking the exam, you were assigned to Ra yellow. After the entrance ceremony, you went towards your dorm; thinking about the two friends you met, that went to slifer red. "Jaden and Syrus, huh?", you asked yourself.

"Oh, my card!", came a voice.

You turned and saw a girl, with black hair; chasing a card flying on a gust of wind. You grabbed the card as it flew near you, only to get knocked over as the girl slammed into you. You got a look at the card, rescue cat. It was a cute card, and had a decent ability; but its point values leave something to be desired.

It was a miracle you could see it, as the girls bust was covering most of your view. "Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry!", she said as she stood up. "Its fine, this yours?", you asked as you stood. "Thank you! This is my favorite card", she leaned down and hugged you. Yes, she leaned down; you only came up to under her chest.

"I'm Mindy, who're you?", She asked. "Constantine Buchanan Johannes, but you can call me Yo.", you said. "Well, Yo; that's a mouthful of a name. I like you, lets hang out later", She said. She gave you her contact info, before walking away. You couldn't help but watch her butt as she walked off.
123.title: Sweet Mindy, taller then you.

1233.content:
“Hmm. Maybe I should go find a duel. The day still seems to be young.” You thought.

You go around the island until you spotted a student that is wearing an Obelisk Blue uniform and has spiky black hair. He seems to have an arrogant look on his face as he beaten a Slifer Red student in a duel.

“Hm. That dork was a walk in a park.” The Obelisk said.

“That wasn’t very nice of you. Now is it?” You said as you walked over to the jerk.

“And who are you, loser?” The boy said.

“Call me Yo And who are you to talk down that kid just now?” You asked.

“The name’s Chazz Princeton. And that dork was just another weakling on this island.” Chazz said.

“Really now? Care to say that about me?” You challenged.

“You? Please. You haven’t done anything to get my attention.” Chazz said as he’s about to leave.

“So you’re just going to walk away? I didn’t know your mom raised a wimp.” You said that got under Chazz’s skin.

“Okay. That does it. If you want The Chazz to give you a beating, then I’m all in.” Chazz said activating his duel disk.

“Now that’s more like it.” You said activating yours.

“Game on!”

Yo: 4000
Chazz: 4000

“Ladies first.” You said.

“Funny. Here comes. I summon Chthonian Knight in attack mode.” Chazz said.

CK: 1200 ATK

“I’ll end with a face down.” Chazz said.

“Fine by me. I draw. I summon Beta The Magnet Warrior in attack mode.” You said.

BTMW: 1700 ATK

“Attack his knight, Beta!” You commanded.

Chazz: 3500

Yo: 3500

“What the? How come I took damage?” You wondered.

“That’s because since you destroyed my knight, you take the same damage as I do. That’s not all, I also play this. Chthonian Blast. Since you destroyed one of my monsters, your Beta will now be destroyed and you take damage equal to half of it’s attack points.” Chazz said.

“Crap.” You muttered.

Yo: 2650

“I’ll get you back for that. For now, I’ll end with two face downs. Now go.” You said.

“Nice duel going on here.” Someone said.

You turned to see
1233.title: Time for a dueling workout

12333.content:
Mindy was walking up, followed by two other girls. They were cute, but Mindy had your attention the most. "Hey there Yo! These are my friends, Jasmine and Alexis", Mindy said in that beautiful voice of hers. "So that's him huh? Wow, he is short; just like you said", Alexis laughed. "Great, just got to the island; somebody has already mocked my height", you mumble.

"Uh oh Mindy, your friend is dueling Chazz", Jasmine said. "Yep, glad you came Alexis; its my turn now. I draw!", Chazz said. "I play drop off! This forces you to discard the card you just drew", you said. "Fine, I'll use this card then. Monster reborn! I revive the monster I just discarded; Mefist the infernal general!", Chazz said.

MTIG: 1800 ATK

"That's a tough card", you said. "Its effect is even more so; that monster deals damage in battle, even when its attack target is in defense mode. And, when it inflicts damage; To will have to discard a card in his hand", Alexis said. "Attack!", Chazz said. "I activate, shrink! Now Mefist ATK is cut in half this turn", you said.

Mefist: 900 ATK

Yo: 1750

"Now of course, you lose a card in you hand; I pick the 1 on the left", Chazz said. He set a card, and ended his turn.

Mefist: 1800 ATK

You drew your card, and looked at it.
12333.title: Mefist the infernal general

123331.content:
“I play Card of Santity. Both of us must draw until we each have six cards in our hands. Now I normal summon my Gamma The Magent Warrior.” You said.

GTMW: 1500 ATK

“Next, I play my own Monster Reborn to bring back my Alpha The Magnet Warrior that you forced me to discard.” You said.

ATMW: 1400 ATK

“And now, I play Double Spell. Discarding a spell to activate Monster Reborn in your graveyard in order to bring Beta right back.” You said.

“Not bad, loser. Unfortunately, your trio of magnetic toys are no match for Mefist.” Chazz said.

“Separately, pretty much. But together, they can beat him.” You said.

“Huh?” Chazz and the girls wondered at the same time.

“First I play Card of Demise in order for me to draw until I’m holding five cards in my hand. Now I play Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy that face down. Finally, Alpha! Beta! Gamma! Combine!” You commanded as your magnetic warriors merged. “Come forth! Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!” You said.

VTMW: 3500 ATK

“What in the world?!” Alexis gasped.

“Yo! Where did you get that strong monster?” Mindy wondered.

“I think it’s best to wonder on how it’s going to kick this jackass’s butt. Valkyrion! Attack Mefist!” You commanded.

Chazz: 1800

“Big deal. You won’t be so lucky next time.” Chazz said.

“We’ll see. For now, Valkyrion! Separate!” You commanded.

ATMW: 1700 DEF

BTMW: 1600 DEF

GTMW: 1800 DEF

You then set your card down and ended your turn.
123331.title: Bring in the heavy metal

1233311.content:
"Draw! I activate my set card, mystical space typhoons to destroy your set card. I activate contingency fee, you draw until you have 6 cards in your hand. After that, I gain 1000 life points for each", Chazz said.

Chazz: 5800

"I activate my own double spell, discarding for monster reborn. Revive Chthonian soldier. I'll equip him with Chthonian alliance, raising his ATK to 2000! Next I'll sacrifice him, and discard my hand to summon infernal incinerator! He gains 200 ATK for each of your monsters!", Chazz said.

II: 2800 - 3400 ATK

"Attack Alpha!", Chazz said as Alpha gets destroyed.

"Oh my god, Yo can't possibly win now", Jasmine said. "Yeah, Chazz has to large an advantage", Alexis said. "No, I believe in him", Mindy said.

'You're just practice for the guy who beat Doctor Crowler. I'll see him later', Chazz thought as he watched you.

"I draw!"
1233311.title: Chazz burns you

12333111.content:
“I’m not out yet. I draw! I activate Magical Stone Excavation. Discarding two cards and get Card of Santity. That means more cards for us. I activate Monster Reincarnation to discard a card and get Valkyrion back in my hand. Now I play a second Double Spell. Discarding a spell to once again take your Monster Reborn card and get back Alpha. Magnet Warriors! Combine into Valkyrion once again!” You said.

VTMW: 3500 ATK

“Now I play Megamorph. Doubling my monster’s strength.” You said.

VTMW: 3500 - 7000 ATK

“That’s still not enough to beat me this turn.” Chazz said.

“Unless I so happen to have this.” You said as you revealed your card.

“A second Megamorph?!” Chazz gasped.

“Bingo.” You said.

VTMW: 7000 - 10500 ATK

“10500 attack points?!” Alexis gasped in awe.

“Now, finish this!” You commanded.

Chazz: 0

“No way. I lost to this shrimp?” Chazz said while on his knees in defeat.

“Yo! That was amazing!” Mindy said as she hugs you while your face is covered by her breasts.

“Thanks, Uh, Mindy.” You said while your face is red.

“Mindy. Take an easy on your boyfriend. Okay?” Jasmine teased a bit.

“He’s not my boyfriend!” Mindy denied.

“Could’ve fooled me.” Jasmine said.

“Well, we better get going.” Alexis said.

“Want to hang out, Yo?” Jasmine wondered.

“Sure.” You said as you walked with the girls with Mindy walking next to you.
12333111.title: Small boy with a big dueling spirit

you go find someone to duel
123331111.content:
“So what brings you to brings you to Duel Academy, Yo?” Mindy asked.

“Why else? To train and learn to be one of the best duelists of all time. This is just a good start.” You said.

“Seems like you have a goal all set in mind.” Alexis said.

“You bet. Although, that entrance exam was definitely no walk in the park.” You said.

“Just be glad you didn’t dueled Dr. Crowler. He maybe a dorm master, but he can be a real pain.” Jasmine said.

“I heard he had a bit of a fit after he lost to Jaden in his exam. Guess he can’t deal with the defeat.” You said.

“I just still can’t believe Jaden managed to beat Dr. Crowler in that duel.” Alexis said.

“He could be known as the miracle kid of Duel Academy if he keeps this up.” You said.

“The lucky kid is more like it. Although, I won’t know until I duel him myself.” Alexis said.

“When that happens, let me know. I don’t want to miss the show. Well, I’m going to see my dorm room. I’ll catch up with you later.” You said as you get up.

“Sure thing. Bye, Yo.” Mindy said with a smile as you left.

You made it to your dorm room and it looks very neat and clean. You took your time to set up everything from your luggage and until you’re all set. After that, you laid back and think about Mindy. She seems to be a very nice and cute girl. You might want to take her out sometime. You can wait for that moment to come. For now, you just want to focus on your work on becoming a great duelist. That’s when
123331111.title: Hanging out with the girls

1233311112.content:
Suddenly, you heard a knocking at your door. You went over to answer it, and saw s kind of man. "Hello, I am professor Sartyr; headmaster of the Ra Yellow dormitories, it's almost time for the welcoming dinner. Come on, everyone is waiting on us", he said.

You nodded and followed him, and you found yourself at a long table with amazing food. You found a spot next to Bastion Misawa, who was very intelligent.

"Welcome everyone, I hope we have a fantastic year together!", Sartyr said as everyone raised their glasses in a cheer.

"And now, a Ra Yellow tradition. After the welcome dinner, the Ra freshmen with the highest exam score chooses an opponent; then they both use a loaner deck from a collection of decks near and dear to the dorm!", Sartyr said. "Bastion, who do you pick?"

Much to your surprise, Bastion points to you. Sartyr led you to a room of about 20 decks, and said to choose one randomly. Bastion chose his immediately, and you chose yours.

Then you all gathered in the dining hall, where the tables were moved.

As you drew your hand, you noticed Sartyr hold a coin out. Bastion called heads, and it was flipped.
1233311112.title: The welcome dinner

The was then landed on tails, meaning you start this duel off.

“Guess I’m up first. Ready, Bastion?” You asked as you get ready to duel.

“I was born ready.” Bastion said.

“Game on!”

12333111122111.title: The best offense...

123331111221111.content:
“Okay. Here I go.” You said as you draw. “I play the spell, Pot of Greed. That’s two cards for me. Next, I play Monster Reborn to bring back my Juragedo. But he won’t be there for long because I’m sacrificing him in order to summon my Great Majiu Garzet.” You said.

GMG: 0 ATK

“A monster that has no attack or defense points?” Bastion asked again in confusion.

“It ain’t going to be that way for long. You see, thanks to his special ability, Garzet’s attack points are doubled of the original attack points of the monster I used to summon him.” You said.

“Well that’s not good.” Bastion said.

“I had a feeling you were going to do that. I play my trap card, Magic Cylinder. Now your attack is negated and all of it’s attack points are directed back to you as damage. Meaning I win.” Bastion said with a confident smile.

“That’s what you think. I play my trap card, Dark Illusion. This negates any card effect that targets a dark attribute monster and destroys it. And since your Magic Cylinder needs to target my Garzet for it to work, well, bye bye.” You said as Bastion’s card was destroyed before his monster was too.

“Looks like I’ve got the lead now.” You said.

“I’ll set this card face down and end my turn.” You said.
123331111221111.title: Fighting Back

"Then it's my move. I'll start with the spell card Pot of Greed, which lets me draw two cards. Next, I'll switch my Stone Soldier into defense mode."

GSoS: 2000 DEF

"Now I'll play a spell card called Stone Armor. Now I can select one Rock monster in my graveyard and equip it to another Rock monster on my field. Then, the equipped monster gains defense points equal to the defense of the equipped monster." He exclaims.

"So now I'll equip my Stone Soldier with my Stone Statue of the Aztecs." His destroyed monster reappears before shattering into fragments, with said fragments attaching themselves to his Stone Soldier, forming a suit of armor.

"Indeed, I look forward to seeing how you'll beat this. For now though, I'll play this card face down and end my turn.

“Impressive. However, I don’t think that’ll be enough considering he’s still weaker than my Stone Soldier.” Bastion said.

131.content: Choose how you want your story to go
131.title: Akiza

choices: A woman in a mask. (Black Rose/Akiza)
1311.content: Your name is Yuten Anjiou and you’re what the people would call a psychic duelist. For your entire life, you’ve been isolated and left alone by the society of New Domino City and your own parents because of the power you possessed. It hurts you that there wasn’t a single person in the world that would ever understand you or your burden and it just makes you angry. You would calm down about it because you know that there’s a lot of things in this world that we don’t understand and people fear what they don’t understand. This power may have caused you pain and hardships, but you always have hoped that you can show them that these powers can be used for good if they give it a chance. You just hoped that you can find the answer on how you can show them these gifts. Soon enough, you bumped into
1311.title: The Life Of A Psychic Duelist

13111.content:
You looked to see a woman in a black cloak while wearing a white faceless mask on her face. You looked confused until you felt something strange about this girl. You slowly walked over to talk to her and hoping you can talk to her until she spotted you.

“Who are you? What do you want from me?” The masked woman asked.

“Excuse me, ma’am. My name is Yuten. I just want to talk to you.” You said nicely.

“I have nothing to say to the likes of you!” The masked girl said angrily.

“Please. It’s nothing bad. I just want to have a word with you.” You said.

“Well, too bad. You’re not getting anything out of me. Now stand aside or else you’ll have to feel the wrath of The Black Rose.” The masked girl threatened.

“Wait. You’re The Black Rose?! I thought you were a myth.” You said in shock.

“Well this “myth” will make you ancient history if you don’t stand aside now.” The Black Rose threatened.

“That’s the thing. I’ve never backed down before and I’m not about to start now. If we can’t talk with our words, then maybe we can talk with our cards.” You said.

“So you wished to duel me, huh? You’ll regret that decision.” The Black Rose said before activating her duel disk.

“We’ll see about that.” You said before activating yours.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Black Rose: 4000
13111.title: Meeting The Black Rose Witch

131111.content:
"If you don't mind, I think I'll make the first move." You announce, making your draw.

"How chivalrous." She says in a sarcastic tone.

"I think I'll start by playing the spell card Ancient Rules. This card let's me special summon one level six or higher normal monster from my hand, and the monster I choose is the one, the only, the almighty Blue Eyes White Dragon." You call as your beast rises up from behind you.

"That's impossible, how do you have that card?!" Black Rose asks, stunned at your play.

"That's for me to know and you to find out. Next I'll activate a special equip spell, White Stream of Cosmic Power. With this card, I can deal damage equal to half the equipped monster's attack points so long as I don't conduct my battle phase this turn. So I'll equip it to my Blue Eyes at use it to blast you right away."

Your dragon glowed with shimmering white energy before said energy was fired right at the Black Rose, doing damage and shaking the earth around her. You can see that her mask is starting to crack.

Black Rose: 2500

"That hurt. But that can only mean... you're a psychic duelist too!" She questions. "Too"? Does that mean she's one, or at least knows one? Questions for later.

"Next I'll activate Wave Motion Cannon. Now every one of my standby phase this card is on the field, it gains a counter, and for every counter that's on this card when I release it, you take 1000 points of damage."

"But with your equip spell..." She starts.

"That's right, I can wipe out the rest of your life points on my next turn, so you've got one turn to stop me. I place one card face down and end my turn. Make this move count.
131111.title: You start

1311111.content:
“I will.” Black Rose said she draws. “First, I play Pot of Greed. Looks like it’s two free cards for me. Next, I summon Twilight Rose Knight.” Black Rose said.

TRK: 1000 ATK.

“Next, her ability also lets me summon a plant-type monster that’s level 4 or lower from my hand whenever I normal summoned her successfully. And I choose my Hedge Guard in defense mode.” Black Rose said as she summons another monster.

HG: 2100 DEF

“After that, I’m activating my Star Changer spell card. With this, I can decrease or increase a monster’s level by 1. And who better than my Twilight Rose Knight as I choose to increase her level.” Black Rose said as her knight’s level increases.

“What was the purpose of doing that?” You wondered before you figured something out. “Unless...”

“Unless my Twilight Rose Knight happens to be a tuner monster. Now watch as I tune my knight with my Hedge Guard. You summoned your powerful beast. Now here’s mine. I Synchro Summon Black Rose Dragon!” Black Rose said as her ace monster rises with a roar.

BRD: 2400 ATK

When Black Rose and Blue-Eyes meet face-to-face, they begin roaring at each other. It’s almost like they’re talking to each other as they get ready to do battle.

“My dragon maybe weaker than yours, but that all changes with her special ability. She can destroy all the cards on the field whenever she’s synchro summoned. So bid farewell to your legendary pet.” Black Rose said as her dragon self-destructed to destroy Blue-Eyes and your spells.

“Don’t think for one second that Black Rose will spare you any more pain, because I play Monster Reborn to bring her back.” Black Rose said as her ace returns to the field.

“Oh crap!” You said.

“You have every right to be afraid of what’s going to happen. Black Rose Dragon, attack Yuten directly!” Black Rose declared her attack.

You: 1600

You felt the stings of that attack as you have cuts on your body and your clothes ripped. This could mean only one thing.

“You’re a psychic too?” You asked as you struggle to get up.

“Indeed I am. And if you’re smart, you’ll stay down to avoid any more agony.” Black Rose said.

“Then I guess I’m not all that smart because I’m still in this.” You said with defiance.

“You won’t be for long. For now, I think I’ll end with this card face down. It’s your move, Yuten.” Black Rose said.
1311111.title: Akiza fights back

13111111.content:
Talk about a complete turn around. Now you were left without a field while she had a powerful dragon on her's ready to blast away the rest of your life points. You could bet good money that that face-down was something to protect her dragon if you attacked, so you would need something to get through both it and her monster. With only one card left in your hand after that big play on your first turn, this next draw would determine if you got to see the next round.

"Here we go. I... DRAW!" Perfect, this card is just what you needed. "I like the way you brought back your dragon, so I think I'll do the same with a Monster Reborn of my own. So come on back Blue Eyes." As your beast rose once again, she seemed rather unfazed by this, confirming that that face-down was trouble.

"Next I'll summon The White Stone of Legend from my hand in defense mode." A tiny white orb appeared on your field.

WSL: 0 DEF

"So what's that thing going to do that should make my dragon scared?" Akiza taunts.

"I'm glad you asked, because it's not him that your dragon should worry about. It's what he's going to make." You answer.

"What?!"

"I tune my level one White Stone of Legend to my level eight Blue Eyes White Dragon, in order to synchro summon my own beast. Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon, come forth." Your own ace rises with it's own mighty roar.

AESD: 2500 ATK

"Why would you summon a monster that's weaker than your previous one?" Akiza questions.

"You'll see. By the way, since White Stone of Legend was sent to the graveyard, I'm allowed to add one Blue Eyes White Dragon from my deck to my hand." You draw your card." Now, Azure-Eyes, attack Black Rose Dragon with Silver Stream of Annihilation." Your dragon fires it's attack right for Akiza's.

"Not so fast. I activate my face-down, Mirror Force. Now all monsters you control in attack mode are destroyed. You lose." A translucent wall appeared in front of Akiza's field, ready to block your attack. Only instead of stopping the blast, your dragon's attack pierced right through it as it destroyed Black Rose Dragon and damaged Akiza.

Akiza: 2400

"What just happened?! Your monster should've been destroyed and mine saved." She cringes as the bottom of her mask breaks off.

"That would be one of Azure-Eyes' special abilities. Until my next turn, dragon-type monsters I control can't be destroyed by card effects, and since he wasn't destroyed, he was allowed to continue his attack." You explain.

"That can't be. How is it so strong?"

"That's nothing, just wait until my next turn. I'll end my turn now."
13111111.title: Dragon vs. Dragon, Round 2

131111111.content:
“It’s my move.” Akiza said as she draws. “His monster is too powerful to destroy. Then I’m gonna need some better offense.” Akiza thought as she makes her move. “I activate Card of Santity.” Akiza said.

“Fine. That’s more cards for me as well.” You said as you draw your cards and Akiza drew hers.

“Well, you’re might going to need them. Because I now activate Magical Stone Excavation. By discarding two cards, I can add a spell from my graveyard. And I choose you know what. Monster Reborn.” Akiza said.

“Here we go again!” You said.

“And with this, Black Rose Dragon come back one more time. But I think I’ll make her even stronger with the Thorn of Malice card. This equip card will make my dragon much more deadlier than before. 600 attack points deadlier, to be clear.” Akiza said.

BRD: 3000 ATK

“Now, my mighty beast, slice down at his Azure-Eyes.” Akiza said as her dragon goes on the attack.

Your synchro dragon wasn’t destroyed, but it looks like he’s in bad shape. In fact, you took quite the beating too as you were knocked down when you felt a whip on your body.

You: 1100

“My equip spell may prevent my dragon from destroying yours, but I think it’s a good deal just to make your Azure-Eyes 600 attack and defense points weaker.” Akiza said.

ARSD: 1900 ATK 2400 DEF

“Man. Didn’t think she can dish out this kind of punishment.” You thought as you struggle to get back up.

“Still want to continue?” Akiza asked with a smirk on her face.

“You bet......your ass.......I do.” You panted as you made back on your feet dispite your injuries.

“I admire your courage, Yuten, but it’ll take more than courage to win this duel.” Akiza said as she sets two cards down to end her turn.

“That, we can agree on. So lets get this duel rollin.” You said as you draw.
131111111.title: The Black Rose makes her comeback again

choices: Take her back to your apartment
Get her to a hospital, those injuries could be bad
1311111111.content:
As you draw your card, Azure-Eyes stares back at you pleadingly, almost like it was begging you to not let it take another attack like that. "Don't worry buddy, I'll keep you safe. The cavalry is on it's way." You reaffirm.

"And you're going to help with that using your special ability. Remember how I said just wait until my next turn to see what Azure-Eyes can do? Well this is why. During my standby phase, his special ability let's me special summon one normal dragon-type monster from my graveyard, and the monster I choose is... Blue Eyes White Dragon!" Your second dragon returns to the field.

"Next, I summon Kaibaman to my field."

KBM: 300 ATK

"And with his special ability, I can release him to special summon one Blue Eyes White Dragon from my hand. So I'll summon another Blue Eyes White Dragon." A third dragon emerges to your field.

"Two of them?!" Akiza asks with notable worry in her voice.

"That's right, and both of them and their cousin Azure-Eyes are hungry for your life points. Next, from my hand, I'll activate the spell card Stamping Destruction. Now since I have a dragon-type monster on my field, I'm allowed to destroy one spell or trap card on the field, then deal 500 points of damage to the person that controls it. So I think I'll destroy the face down on the right."

A giant dragon foot stomps down on Akiza's face-down. In the remains, you can see that the card you destroyed was Call of the Haunted. At one of the dragon's claws, you see a stone emerge from the ground and nail Akiza in the forehead, breaking off the right side of her mask and letting you finally look her in the eye for the first time in this duel.

Akiza: 1900

"Now it's time to end this. Blue Eyes number one, attack Black Rose Dragon." Both of your dragons fired a blast at each other, resulting in a massive explosion. In the aftermath, only Blue Eyes remained.

"Thanks to your Thorn of Malice, my monster isn't destroyed. Now Blue Eyes number two, attack Akiza directly with White Lightning." Your second dragon fires right at Akiza.

"Not so fast. I activate my second face-down, Defense Draw. Now all battle damage I would've taken is reduced to zero and I get to draw a card." Blue Eyes' attack bounces off a barrier as Akiza draws her card.

"It's a shame then that I still have my Azure-Eyes. Now attack with Silver Stream of Annihilation!" With nothing left to protect her and your monster's attack points just high enough, this was over.

Azure-Eyes' attack hits Akiza dead-on, causing her to scream in agony as your powers cause real damage. Her mask is shattered completely and she is sent flying before she passes out.

Akiza: 0000

You walk over to her unconscious body to see if she's alright. She seems to still be breathing so at least she's alive. Now that you can see her face without that mask, you had to admit that she looked kind of cute. And with the robe opened you can see that she also has a nice body, now only covered by a red corset and skirt.

Even with all the pain she caused you, it wouldn't be right to just leave her here unconscious. You should take her somewhere, but where?
1311111111.title: The Black Rose Wilts

13111111111.content:
You don’t know where she, exactly, lives for you can’t asked her with the state she’s in and you highly doubt that a hospital would want to help her if they found out about the abilities she’d showed you in that duel. That leaves only one option. Your apartment.

So you picked her up and you started walking towards the direction where your home is. Once you made it there, you set her down on the couch with a towel on it and you get the equipment.

It took a while, but you managed to get both yourself and her all bandaged up and you wait for her to wake up. You then hear groaning from the couch and you looked to see the girl slowly getting up.

“Ugh. Uh. Where.....where am I?” She wondered feeling lightheaded.

“You’re in my place. I had to bring you in so that I can get you all fixed up.” You said sitting by the table.

“You healed me?” She wondered as she sees the bandages on her. She then grew red when she thought of something. “You didn’t do anything funny, did you?” She asked making sure that you’re not a pervert.

“Not at all. Although, I did have to move some of your clothes aside just to get those bandages and the ointment on you.” You said honestly.

“You seemed truthful.” She said.

“I’m a terrible liar. What can I say? Oh yeah. Sorry about your mask.” You said as you showed her the mask that was completely shattered.

“No worries.” She said.

“Anyway, you know that my name is Yuten. What’s yours?” You asked.

“Akiza.” She answered.

“Well, Akiza, I made us some dinner in case you felt hungry.” You said as you heard Akiza’s stomach grumbling.

“I guess a meal will do. Thank you.” Akiza said as you two begin eating.

After the meal, Akiza couldn’t help but noticed the hurt you had in your eyes and it wasn’t from the duel. They looked sad and she knows that very well.

“So, you’re a psychic too?” Akiza asked.

“Yeah.” You said feeling down when your heard that word.

“Let me guess, your parents threw you out too?” Akiza asked.

“Yeah.” You said feeling sadder.

“Do you......want to talk about it?” Akiza asked.

You have a feeling that she’ll continue asking if you don’t answer her now. You start off saying that you had this power since you were 7 years old. When your parents found out, they were so scared that they threw you away from them. Ever since, you were always on your own and you see the cold stares from anyone who found out that you’re a psychic. It hurts you more than you can think and you’ve been living in this place when you found it.

“Oh, Yuten. I’m so sorry.” Akiza said feeling bad.

“Don’t worry. I know it sucks, but that can be the way of the world.” You said as you finished cleaning up the dishes. “Anyhow, it’s getting late. You can take my bed and I’ll sleep here on the couch. Let me just get you some clean sheets.” You said as you go and get some.

When you got them, you put them on the bed and set up the blanket for her. You then set up the couch so that you can sleep there for tonight.

“Well, guess I’ll see you in the morning.” You said as you go to the couch.

“You too. Goodnight.” Akiza said before going to your bed to sleep.

“Goodnight.” You said before you head to sleep on the couch.
13111111111.title: Take Akiza to your home

choices: She wants to spend the day with you
She says something about "needing to go back"
Someone knocks on your door before she can answer
131111111111.content:
You awaken the next morning to the smell of bacon. Your vision fades in to see Akiza standing over your stove in her somewhat tattered clothes. "Akiza? You're making breakfast?" You question as you rub the sleep from your eyes.

"Oh, Yuten, you're up. Yeah, I figured this would be my way of saying sorry for the injuries I gave you and to say thanks for treating me and letting me stay in your bed even after what I did. I admit that I'm not the cook you are, but I'm sure it's at least edible." She responds as she sets the table and you take a seat.

"Well they smell better than just edible. I'm sure you did great." You say as you look over her torn attire. "By the way, sorry I don't have much in terms of a change of clothes for you."

She sets down the food and the two of you begin to make your plates. "It's fine. You've done more for me than I deserve after how I treated you. I can handle a few tears for a little while."

The two of you continue through breakfast just fine. You both complimented each other's dueling yesterday. You joked and laughed. To think, when you met this girl, it was looking like she was gonna be your mortal enemy. Now you think you might've met your first real friend since you discovered your powers.

Finally you wrap up breakfast and start putting the dishes away. "That was great Akiza. I could eat ten plates full and still ask for more." You comment, causing a light pink to firm on her cheeks. "So what now for you Akiza?" You ask, getting serious again.
131111111111.title: The next morning

1311111111112.content:
“I....I need to go back.” Akiza said softly.

“Back where? You have a home?” You guessed.

“Yes.” Akiza said before going to the window to show you something. “You see that building over there?” Akiza asked as you looked to see a very tall building in the city.

“Yeah?” You answered.

“That’s called the Arcadia Movement. It’s a home for psychic duelist like us.” Akiza explained.

“Get lost.” You said surprised to hear that.

“I’m serious. The owner of that place must be looking for me by now. I need to get back there soon.” Akiza said.

“I’ll take you back then.” You said to her.

You two then started walking to this Arcadia Movement place. While walking, you can’t help but blush whenever you take a look at her. Also, your heart do seemed to skip a beat too. This must be that you’re in love with her. The surprises never cease for you. You finally made it there and you see a man with red hair and a brown trench coat waiting outside.

“Akiza.” The man said coming towards her.

“Sayer.” Akiza said back.

“Thank goodness. I just send a search party to come get you. Are you alright?” The man named Sayer asked.

Akiza nodded and Sayer then looked over to see you.

“Who’s this?” Sayer asked.

“My name is Yuten, sir. I’ve been taking care of her last night.” You answered.

“Well, we appreciate for your help. Now you can leave.” Sayer said.

“Wait, Sayer. He’s also a psychic duelist too.” Akiza said.

“Is that right?” Sayer asked as you nodded.

Akiza give them the whole story. The duel, the treatment you gave her, everything. It seems to sparked Sayer’s interest.

“In that case, you’re more than welcome to stay here, Yuten.” Sayer said.

“Thank you, Say-.”

“If you do one little thing first.” Sayer said interrupting you.

“Like what?” You asked.

“Simple. One duel with me. You need to prove your worth if you wish to stay here. It’s a strict policy we have. But, if you can show that your powers are impressive, than I’ll let you remain here. Do we have a deal?” Sayer asked.

You looked over to Akiza and you can see in her eyes that she wants you to stay. So, you gave Sayer your answer.

“When do we start?” You answered with a question of your own.

Sometime later, Akiza changed into some fresh clean clothes and was watching the duel from above. You got your duel disk on your arm and you see Sayer on the other side of the dueling field preparing to get this underway.

“Hope you don’t disappoint me, Mr. Yuten.” Sayer said activating his duel disk.

“Trust me, you’ll be getting your money’s worth.” You said activating yours.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Sayer: 4000
1311111111112.title: The Arcadia Movement

13111111111121.content:
"So Sayer, before we start this. How am I getting judged by this test? Do I just have to win this duel, or do I have to show how far across the room my powers can throw you?" You ask.

"If you win you're let in automatically. But should you lose then it's left at my discretion. But so long as you win, then you don't have to worry about that, now do you?" He replies.

"Alright then, let's get this duel started then. Mind if I go first, Sayer?" You ask.

"Be my guest." He replies with more snark in his voice.

"That is what I'm hoping to get out of this. I draw." Not a great hand, especially compared to the one you started with against Akiza. But you wouldn't be who you were if you let something like one lousy hand get in your way.

"First I'll activate the spell card Trade-in. With this, by discarding one level eight or above monster, I can draw two cards." You send in the one Blue Eyes that you had in your hand. "Next, I'll summon Decoy Dragon to the field in defense mode." A tiny dragon that looked almost like a baby appeared on your field.

DeDr: 200 DEF

"Then I'll place two cards face down and end my turn." You conclude and pass off to Sayer.

"That's it? All that buildup and all you have to show for it is a weak lizard and a couple of face-downs? Maybe you aren't right for us after all." Sayer taunts.

"Just make your move already." You shout back.
13111111111121.title: You go first

131111111111211.content:
“Fine. Have it your way.” Sayer said as he draws his card. “I think I’ll start off by summoning Psychic Snail in attack mode.” He said.

PS: 1900 ATK

“And with that, I think I’ll have him attack your Decoy Dragon.” Sayer said as he calls on the attack.

“I play my trap.” You said before you were interrupted.

“Ah ah ah. You didn’t seriously think that I would let my snail fall for any measly trap you might pull, did you? Think again as I activate Anti-Magic Arrows.” Sayer said as arrows coming down on your set cards.

“Hey! What did you do?” You asked.

“The spell I just activated prevents you from activating any spells or traps for this turn. So, it looks like both you and your little lizard are out of luck.” Sayer said as the attack continues.

Sayer was about to see the pain on your face only to hear you chuckling.

“What’s so funny?” Sayer wondered.

“What’s funny is that I got you.” You said leaving Sayer confused. “You were right about making sure I don’t set off any traps for you, but that’s not the only thing I had up my sleeve.” You said.

“And what makes you say that?” Sayer wondered.

“Decoy Dragon’s special ability of course. When he’s targeted for an attack, I can special summon a dragon from my graveyard as long as it’s level is 7 or higher. So now, feast your eyes on this.” You said as strong winds was blowing around.

Sayer was covering up his face from the winds until he sees a bright white light. What he sees next will, likely, leave him speechless.

“Show yourself, Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” You said as your ace dragon makes his presence known with a strong roar.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“It....It can’t be!!” Sayer said not believing what he’s seeing.

“But it is and he’s here. And another thing, thanks to Decoy Dragon’s effect, Blue-Eyes becomes the new target for your snail’s attack. And with that thing being weaker and all, Blue-Eyes, launch a counterattack with your White Lightning.” You said as your dragon destroys Sayer’s monster.

Sayer: 2900

That attack knocked him down when it hit him. You then hear Sayer chuckling as well right when he got up.

“I must admit, I surely didn’t see that coming. I guess I underestimated you a little bit. But you still have a long way to go, I’m afraid.” Sayer said.

“We’ll see. Do you end your turn yet?” You asked.

“Right after I set these two cards down, I will. Go ahead, Yuten.” Sayer said.
131111111111211.title: Sayer’s in for a surprise

choices: Akiza takes you to your new room
Akiza shows you around the building first
You want to get your stuff from your apartment first
1311111111112111.content:
"It's my turn. I draw." Looks like you've won this already, but better safe than sorry. "I'll activate the spell card Cards of Consonance."

"And just what does that do?" Sayer asks.

"I'm glad you asked. This card lets me draw two cards as long as I discard a dragon-type tuner with 1000 or less attack points." You toss your card and draw two new ones. "By the way, the monster I sent was White Stone of Legend, so since it was sent to the graveyard, I get to add one Blue Eyes White Dragon to my hand." You add one more card.

"Next, I activate my face-down, Dust Tornado. So say goodbye to your face-down, Sayer. Then I'll activate Stamping Destruction, and use it to destroy your second face-down and deal 500 points of damage."

Sayer: 2400

"That's not good." Sayer comments.

"No, it isn't. Now your field is empty and my Blue Eyes is ready to go. Now attack with White Lightning!" Your dragon charges up it's attack before firing right at Sayer, sending him flying.

Sayer: 0000

Akiza sees that you won and rushes down to you. "Yuten, you won, that means you get to stay here." She says, hugging you. You blush a bit as her rather generous chest is now pressing into you.

Meanwhile, Sayer ponders to himself as he rises to his feet once more. That was incredible. I never expected him to be so strong. I have to add him to the movement, and it looks like he has strong feelings for little Akiza. I can use this to my advantage and keep both of them following my orders. With their powers under my control, nobody can stop me.

"Congratulations Yuten. You've certainly impressed me. Welcome to the Arcadia Movement." He says with an outstretched hand.

"Thanks Sayer. It feels nice to finally belong somewhere, you know?" You respond as you take his hand.

"Indeed. Now, we need to see about getting you a room. Akiza, isn't the room next to yours still vacant?" He asks, turning to her.

"Yeah, nobody's moved in there yet." She answers.

"Perfect. Then that will be your room Yuten. Now, I have matters to attend to. Akiza, I leave our newest member in your hands." He then leaves the room, leaving you and Akiza there alone.

What happens next?
1311111111112111.title: Absolute Power

13111111111121111.content:
With the duel done, Akiza shows you to your new room and opens the door for you.

“Here we are, Yuten.” Akiza said you looked around.

It looks like it has a bed fit for one, a window, two desks with lamps, a closet and fan on the roof with 4 lamps on it.

“Neat.” You complimented.

“I’m glad you like it.” Akiza said.

“So, I guess we’re neighbors now. Huh?” You said.

“Yeah. I guess we are.” Akiza said.

“I got a feeling that this going to be an interesting new approach.” You said as you sit down on the chair.

“Just make yourself at home.” Akiza said to you.

“Just did.” You joked a little and it made her giggled a little.

You then sniffed yourself and you can tell that you stink to high heaven.

“Is there a shower I can use?” You asked.

“Right over there. Oh! And someone will give you some new clothes when you’re done.” Akiza said.

“Sure thing. And, Akiza?” You said to get her attention again. “Thanks. I mean it.” You said with kindness.

Akiza nodded before she left and you go take your shower. When you were done, you got out and you see some new clothes and underwear all folded neatly. You put them on and you looked rather fashionable. You guessed that’s how they wear it here. Also, you can’t help but got strange feeling about Sayer. During the duel, he had some kind of dark look on his face. You don’t know why, but you have the gut feeling that he’s hiding something. But, there’s no use thinking about it now. You’ll just have to play along until something pops up. You took a walk down the building to see what else is here until you see _____ coming in your direction.
13111111111121111.title: Akiza takes you to your new room

choices: Go down to the duel arena
Go to your apartment and spend the day together
Go down to this beach of yours
131111111111211111.content:
"Hey, Yuten." Akiza calls out as she approaches you.

"Hey. What's up Akiza?" You ask.

"Not much, I'm afraid. There aren't too many things to do around here in headquarters. That's why I tend to leave here in my disguise and explore. But after yesterday..." She trails off.

"Riight. Sorry about that. I'm sure you can get a new mask made soon." You apologize again.

"It's fine. I'll make due." She gives you a look over. "By the way, you look nice in the robe." She says, referring to the uniform you've seen every other member of this movement wear, with one exception.

"Thanks. It feels a bit... odd, but I'll grow into it. By the way, why don't you wear one?" You ask.

"Sayer says I don't have to if I don't want to. I much prefer this look. Since you're not doing anything either, maybe we can head down to the test arena and watch some duels, maybe participate in one? It's one of the few things we're allowed to do here." She offers.

"Sounds nice, but how about we just head out? I'd like to grab a few things from my apartment before I commit to living here. We don't even have to get them right away, I know this great beach on the edge of the city that no one ever goes to. We can spend the day there, and grab my stuff on the way back." You counter-offer.

"As nice as that sounds, I don't have a swimsuit. Plus, I don't think Sayer will like us both leaving like that." She objects.

"We can get one for you on the way. As for Sayer, he knows that we'll look after each other, and if he has a problem with it, then I'll take the heat." After some internal deliberation, Akiza decides that you two should...
131111111111211111.title: Akiza

1311111111112111112.content:
“I guess we can just enjoy a regular day together while we head back to your apartment.” Akiza said as her answer.

“Great. Let’s get moving.” You said before heading out of the building.

You and Akiza start walking around the city while admiring the view all around. Birds are chirping, people are enjoying themselves. It just seems rather normal today and it’s nice to see that. Akiza really enjoys your company around her. In fact, she hasn’t felt this good around anyone since Sayer took her in. All she can do is smile at you as you made it back to your apartment.

“Well, here we are. I just need to get some little things in there.” You said.

“Okay.” Akiza said as she follows you inside.

You looked to see your belongings on the counter. Your wallet, key, and left over change are there to collect as well as your deck box just in case you need to keep your deck safe. As soon as you grabbed everything else, you and Akiza head back outside.

“Alright, Akiza, that’s about everything. Let’s go.” You said before you see her looking at a letter. “Akiza? What’s that you got there?” You said as you come closer.

“It’s an invitation. You’re invited to participate in the Fortune Cup.” Akiza said as she reads the letter.

“Say what?” You said as you looked as well and see that she is right. “Wow! No way.” You said as this is quite the surprise.

“This must be very exciting news.” Akiza said.

“I’ll say. This is awesome.” You said with a smile as Akiza noticed that you dropped your Blue-Eyes by accident.

“Oh, Yuten! You dropped your Blue-Eyes. I’ll get it.” Akiza said as she bends down to pick it up.

When she did, her arm starting to hurt for some strange reason and you grew very worried.

“Akiza! What is it?! Are you okay?!” You said as you checked on her.

You then noticed a red glow on her arm and it looks like a mark of a pair of claws and it got you quite suspicious.

“Akiza? What is that?” You asked her.

“It’s nothing.” Akiza said trying to cover it up.

“Come on, Akiza, that doesn’t look like nothing to me.” You said.

“Well, I don’t want to talk about it.” Akiza said with a little of fear in her voice as you got closer to comfort her.

“Akiza, it’s okay. I’ll listen. You know that you can trust me.” You said softly.

Akiza knows that by now. So, she decided to tell you in small words.

“All I can tell you is that this mark is the reason my life is so miserable.” Akiza said with sadness now.

“Really?” You wondered.

“Yes and all I ever wanted is to have it gone from my life. Because this thing gave me these powers when I was a little girl. Everywhere I go, I hurt other people with these stupid powers away. So, I had to push them away from me.” Akiza said.

“Wait a minute. Is that why you want me to scram when we first met?” You figured something out.

“I was so afraid of hurting, or worse, killing you, I just had to keep you at a very long distance. It was for your own good. I understand you don’t want to be around me after hearing that. After all, I’m just a mon-.”

Akiza stopped talking when she felt you hugging her, much to her surprise. Your hug really feels comforting and soothing to her soul as you hold on to her.

“No you’re not. And I know that you won’t hurt or kill me, or anyone in that matter. You have a pure heart. I just know it. And remember this, no matter what, I’ll always be with you.” You said softly.

Akiza let out a few tears before calming down. You then picked her up to bring her back on her feet as she smiles at you.

“Thank you, Yuten.” Akiza said softly.

“You got it, Akiza. Now then, I know you don’t want to talk about it, but I need to know why your mark appeared when you touched my Blue-Eyes?” You asked carefully.

“I’m not sure. I just picked it up and I just felt a very strong surge from it.” Akiza answered.

“I see now. That’s quite the mystery. Does Sayer know about it?” You wondered.

“Yeah. But not much of it. Which reminds me, you never told me about how you got this dragon anyway. Nobody saw it for years.” Akiza wondered.

You told her that it, suddenly, appeared in your life on the same day you received your powers. When your parents threw you out, you hold on to that deck for it’s the only thing you have to your name, even if you don’t know where it came from.

“And that’s about it.” You said.

“Wow. And I thought it was strange for me.” Akiza said.

“I know, right?” You said as you looked at the clock up ahead. “Looks like it’s almost time for lunch. Do you want to head back or check some other places? I don’t mind.” You asked.
1311111111112111112.title: Enjoying The Day Together And Comforting Akiza

choices: Clothing store (you did promise her a swimsuit)
13111111111121111121.content:
"You know what, let's have some fun today. Sayer doesn't usually care too much as long as I'm not gone until morning. Let's get something to eat." Akiza takes you by the hand and leads you away from your apartment to a nearby burger place (admittedly after you directed her there because she had no idea where she was going).

You both sat down and ordered your food. In the meantime, the two of you made small talk. "So Akiza, what happened between your mark and powers showing up and you joining the Arcadia Movement?" You ask, trying to break the ice.

"Well, I spent a bit of time in Duel Academy... before my powers went out of control and I was forced to run away. After that, I started wearing the mask and robe you met me in and took on the persona of the Black Rose. That was how Sayer found me. He took me in and gave me a home among my fellow psychics. Somewhere I could finally be accepted." She explains. "And what about you? How did a social outcast end up getting his own apartment and his own food and furniture?"

"It took a lot of time to learn to keep my powers under control. Even now I don't have complete mastery of them. But once I did, I made my own name in the street duel circuit, winning plenty of money to keep food on the table. The place belongs to a guy who owed me a favor and I've been living there ever since." You answer.

Finally, your food arrives and you dig in. When all's said and done, you leave the money for the check and leave. "Alright then miss Izinski, I think that since you picked where we ate, that I choose where we go next." You take her hand as you lead her off to...
13111111111121111121.title: Walking around with Akiza

131111111111211111211.content:
You took Akiza to what it looks like a clothing store. That got Akiza raising an eyebrow at you.

“Well, I did promise you a swimsuit when we got out. I’m just living up to my promise.” You said.

“Oh yeah. I forgot. In that case, let’s get shopping.” Akiza said as you two walked in.

You looked around the aisles and you two see a bunch of bikinis that would look good on Akiza. While she looks, you looked at the men’s side of aisle and you found a bunch of trunks for you too. After you got them, you took them to the fitting rooms to try them out. They were a perfect fit for you and you waited for Akiza. She comes back out and you go to her to see how the feel on her.

“Do they fit nice?” You asked.

“They really do. They felt really comfortable.” Akiza said.

“Glad you like them. Let’s go pay for them.” You said.

You went over to the clerk and you payed for them with some of the money you won.

“Thank you. Come again.” The clerk said to you two.

“You bet. See ya.” You said before you and Akiza left the store.

“Thank you for buying this for me.” Akiza said with a smile.

“No problem. Now, there’s just one more stop left for the day and that is the...”
131111111111211111211.title: Shopping For Swimsuits

choices: She wants to walk down the beach
She wants to play in the water
1311111111112111112111.content:
"Come on, if we're quick enough we can get a train across town to check out that private beach I was telling you about before it gets too late." You start heading for the metro rail.

"Right now?! I thought we were just buying these suits today, I wasn't expecting us to actually use them right away." Akiza speaks up.

"Why not? We still have enough daylight for an hour or two there, and it's better than just carrying these around for nothing." You say, defending yourself.

"Well... I was kinda hoping I'd have a little time to... slim down before I wore this in public." She admits with a blush.

"You'll be fine. I'm sure you look great in it." Her blush deepens a bit at your compliment as you start dragging her to the train station.

*****

After a rather uneventful train ride and a mile walk, you arrived on the outskirts of New Domino City. You didn't have long though, it looked like you had about an hour before sunset. "Alright Akiza, I'll go on ahead and get changed. You can change here and catch up."

You see her set down her bag and look over her shoulder to make sure you're gone before she even pulls out her purchase. You clear the next sand dune and finally see the beach. This place was great for you, nice and quiet from the people that called you freak, comletely private so you could practice controlling your powers in secret, and you were the only one who knew about it. Well... soon to be two. You take a break from memory lane to change out of your robes and into the trunks you bought.

"Umm... Yuten? I'm ready." You hear called out behind you. You turn around and you could feel the blood rush to your cheeks.

Akiza was standing there in a form-fitting two piece bikini that was the same shade of red as her normal attire, showing off every inch of her body . "Well... what do you think?" She asks. After about a minute of you just standing there stunned, you finally speak up.

"Y-you look beautiful Akiza." She shares your blush as you compliment her.

"Thank you. You were right about this place Yuten. It is beautiful." She walks down the dune to join you and sets the bag with her change of clothes next to yours.

"So what now Akiza? We have enough time to take a walk down the sand or play in the water. Your choice." What does she choose?
1311111111112111112111.title: Beach

13111111111121111121111.content:
“I think a nice walk on the beach would do. I want to enjoy the view of this place with my own eyes.” Akiza suggested what to do.

“That sounds like a good idea. Let’s go.” You said as you and Akiza start walking around on the beach.

As you two are walking, you were really liking how Akiza look in the bikini you bought. It fit so well on her, especially on her perfect size brea-.

“No no, Yuten. Don’t be a perv to her now. She’ll have Black Rose Dragon strangle you to death if she finds out.” You told yourself in your mind.

“Is something wrong, Yuten?” Akiza asked you.

“No. Not at all. So, what do you think of this place?” You asked her.

“It’s a breathtaking sight. I wished I known about this beach sooner. It feels relaxing.” Akiza said loving what she sees.

“I’m glad you like it. I come here whenever I need to ease the pain of those bastards that called me a freak or whenever I need to practice my powers.” You said.

“Sounds like you picked the right place to come.” Akiza said.

“Yep. It really helped me out a lot.” You said.

You then turned to see Akiza giving out a small smile before going into a sad frown.

“What’s wrong?” You wondered.

“You were so nice and caring to me when I didn’t deserve much when we first met. I wished other people are like you. Perhaps then New Domino City would be a better place.” Akiza said.

“I know what you mean. But, maybe there’s still hope.” You said making Akiza looking up at you. “Maybe one day psychics and regular people can get along as a whole.” You said.

“You really think so, Yuten?” Akiza wondered.

“It takes a little faith.” You said.

Akiza regained her smile as you two continue to admire the sunset that you see before you while you walked. After some time on the beach, with making sand art, scaring Akiza for a prank, and laying back to breath in the ocean scent, it was time to head back.

You and Akiza changed back into your regular clothes, took the train back, and walked back inside the building after a good time together.

“That was fun. I had a good time.” Akiza said.

“I’m glad you did.” You said with a smile.

“I would say the same too.”

You yelled in fright as you turned to see Sayer with a small smirk on his face.

“Oh. It’s just you, Sayer. You scared me.” You said.

“My apologies. I was about to get Akiza from her room until I saw you two coming in. Tell me, did you two enjoy your date?” Sayer asked.

“It wasn’t a date, Sayer! We were just hanging out together.” Akiza said while blushing.

“Be as it may, I want you two to hold any plan you have for this week because you are going to be training starting tomorrow.” Sayer said.

“Training? For what?” You wondered.

“This.” Sayer said as he handed Akiza a letter.

It turns out it’s the same invitation to the Fortune Cup that you have and it’s for Akiza to attend.

“I’m participating in the Fortune Cup?” Akiza wondered.

“That is correct.” Sayer said.

“Funny. I have the exact same invitation from my apartment.” You said showing Sayer your invitation.

“Well, this is an interesting development. Our star pupil and newest recruit attending in the tournament this year. Then it’s up to you two to represent the Arcadia Movement proudly. Now, go and get some rest. I’ll see you two after breakfast.” Sayer said.

After that, you followed Akiza back to her room until you made it there.

“Well, I guess we’ll be competitors in this tournament.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. But, if it comes to me and you, let’s try not to kill each other again.” You suggested.

“Agreed.” Akiza said before she jumps and hugs you. “Thank you for spending time with me. I really enjoyed it.” Akiza said nicely.

“Any time, Akiza.” You said with a smile.

That’s when, unexpectedly, Akiza kissed you on the cheek and it got you go bonkers. You then looked to see her walking into the room and closing the door.

“Did she just-?!” You thought as you walked back with a surprised smile on your face.

You changed into your pjs and you went off to sleep peacefully on your bed.
13111111111121111121111.title: Strolling Down The Beach With Akiza

131111111111211111211113.content:
The next week was spent with near constant training for you and Akiza. Between the two of you, it seemed like you had blown away every member of the Arcadia Movement, both figuratively and literally. Each day you would both return to your rooms with so little energy to even chat. Also, Sayer seemed hell-bent on keeping the two of you from interacting during this time. Whether this was to promote competition between you or just to make you focus, or if Sayer had some underlying goal from this, you couldn't tell and didn't have time to.

*****

Finally, the day of the Fortune Cup arrived. You were both brought to the Kaiba dome in a convoy of trucks from the Arcadia Movement, making you look more like a tailgating party than a psychic support group. Now, for the first time since you got invited here, you were able to talk with Akiza after you both disembarked your respective trucks.

"You ready for this 'rival'?" You ask her with a playful smirk.

"Always." With that, you both enter the stadium and the event staff lead you to a room with the other six competitors. To call this a colorful cast of characters would be an understatement. From an 8-foot-tall musclehead, to a knight, to a... child?

Before you could ask any questions, the floor beneath you begins to rise up and the ceiling opens above you. You were lifted up into the center of the arena, the crowd roaring around you. The MC then begins to call out your names. Shira, Greiger, yourself, "The Professor", Akiza, "Sir" Randsborg, Luna, and Yusei Fudo.

At the mention of that last one, the crowd entered an uproar, and even you knew why. He was from the Satellite Sector, and everyone from there is looked down upon by those in the city. Being a psychic and an outcast yourself, you knew the feeling at felt bad for the guy. Before the audience could start an all-out riot, the giant known as Greiger grabbed the Mc's mike and gave a rousing speech to shut them up. It's good to know that at least people outside the city have some respect for their fellow man.

After some final words from director Goodwin, the tournament began. Akiza was up against that phony knight in the second match, while you get this professor guy right after. You were all sent into a waiting room while they prepared the first duel. You took a seat at a table across from Akiza while Luna dueled off against Greiger.

"So, you nervous after seeing that crowd?" You ask.

"A little. We both know that they aren't going to accept us once they see the truth. This was a mistake." She admits

"It'll be okay. The world needs to see that we exist before they can begin to come around. Just keep calm and don't kill anyone and we'll be fine." You joke, making her chuckle a bit.

"Miss Akiza?" An attendant asks as he walks up. "You're up. Please come with me." Akiza stands up and begins to follow him.

"Good luck." You shout after her. Well, now you were all alone with nobody to talk to. Scanning the room, you see that Yusei guy watching the screen in preparation for the next match with Greiger joining him. Maybe this could be the chance to introduce yourself and express your sympathies.

Then again, maybe you should track down Sayer and ask what your next move should be here to try and improve the movement's image. What do you do?
131111111111211111211113.title: The Day of the Fortune Cup

1311111111112111112111131.content:
“Hey there.” You said as you walked up to Yusei and Greiger.

“Hello.” Yusei said to you.

“You’re Yusei, If I’m correct.” You figured.

“That’s me. And you must be that Yuten guy.” Yusei guessed.

“That I am. And you’re Greiger, right? Nice speech you put on out there.” You complimented the big guy.

“Glad to hear that from you.” Greiger said with a smile.

“Mind of I join you?” You asked them.

“Be my guest.” Yusei said nicely.

You took a seat next to Yusei and you waited for Akiza’s duel to begin. Right before it could start, you decided to make conversation with Yusei.

“Yusei?” You said to get his attention. “I know that you’re from the Satellite Sector and I know that people from there are mistreated by people here in the city. Sorry for having to go through that.” You said with sympathy.

“Thanks man. But don’t worry, I’m used to it.” Yusei said.

“Are you really? Are you really used to that kind of pain?” You asked that seemed to caught Yusei’s attention.

“Why do you ask? Are you from Satellite too?” Greiger wondered.

“No. But I am an outcast to a lot of people of this city. So I know what you’ve been through.” You said to Yusei.

“Do you?” Yusei wondered and you nodded.

And so, the duel has begun and that ridiculously high and mighty “Sir” Randsborg got the upper hand so far until Akiza makes a quick comeback. Especially, when she summoned the Black Rose Dragon. But when it showed up, you see Yusei grabbing his arm in pain. Before you could ask if he’s okay, you see a glow on his arm and it looks a mark.

“That mark. It’s almost like the one Akiza has. Why does he have one?” You wondered in your mind.

Time went on and the duel came to an end with Akiza pulling off the victory, you then told Yusei that you’ll see him later before you left. You stopped to see Akiza coming in and you went to congratulate her on her win.

“Nice one, Akiza.” You complimented her.

“Thank you, Yuten. I’m sure you’ll do great in your duel too.” Akiza said.

“Speaking of which, I should get going. I’ll see you around.” You said before you left for your duel.
1311111111112111112111131.title: Meeting Yusei Fudo

13111111111121111121111311.content:
You step onto your designated platform and begin to rise into the arena. All the while, you hear the MC introducing you and your opponent. "First, from the streets of New Domino, the Warrior with the Eyes of Blue, Yuten." You chuckle a bit to yourself at the reminder of your street nickname. "And his opponent, don't let his deck put you to sleep, or you'll wake up with a big L on your hands, it's the Professor."

Your opponent rose up opposite you. Something about this guy creeped you out big time. "Let's get this third match underway folks." The both of you started up your duel disks.

You: 4000
Professor: 4000

"I'll give you the first move creepy guy." You shout out.

"Why thank you. What a nice man." He says in a whispered monotone that sent a shiver down your spine. He draws his card and looks at his hand before putting it all back in his deck and raising his hand up. "I forfeit."

"Excuse me?!" You shout.

"I can see it in the cards. I am not meant to win this duel." How much more vaguely creepy can a guy get?

"Well uhhh... I suppose that, by forfeit, Yuten is the winner. The audience was hushed, unsure of what to make of this. You decide to just take what you can get and head back, where Akiza is waiting for you.

"So... that was a match." She says.

"Yeah, if you can call it that. There was something super off about that guy, and I just know that Goodwin knows why."

You debate scaling that tower of his to ask to his face about what's happening here. Then again, you owe it to Akiza to keep her in the loop about you finding out about Yusei's mark.

What do you do?
13111111111121111121111311.title: Duel?

131111111111211111211113111.content:
“Akiza, there’s something I need to do. I’ll be back. Okay?” You informed her.

“Sure. Just be careful, Yuten.” Akiza said as she hugs you.

“You got it.” You said before you left to go see Goodwin.

You scaled the tower upwards until reached your designation. You see two security guards blocking your way in and you won’t let that get in your way.

“I’m here to see Goodwin. Is he in there?” You asked the guards.

“He’s a very busy man. So why don’t you-.” The guard stopped taking when you interrupted.

“Don’t give me the “he’s a busy man” corporate crap. I know he’s watching this tournament right now. Now is he in there or not?” You asked again.

“Yes. But he’s not expected you. So please leave.” The guard told you.

You nodded and, what it looks like you’re about to leave, you turned and slugged one of the guards in the mouth. You then jumped the other one, beating the hell out of him, before you tossed him into the wall. You picked up the first guard and punched him in the gut and face before you JuDo throw him into the wall next to his partner.

“Consider yourselves on break.” You said to them before making your way inside.

You walked further in until you see Goodwin, along with his little right hand man, Lazar, and, of course, the Master of Faster himself, Jack Atlas, right there.

“Mr. Yuten. I wasn’t expecting you to come here.” Goodwin said seeing you.

“Well, here I am. You and I need to talk. I want to know what the hell is going on around here.” You said with a demanding tone in your voice.

“Why would you want to know?” Goodwin said calmly.

“What do you think? After what just transpired, that creep just surrendered the duel for no apparent reason.” You said.

“I’m not sure what he was thinking myself. But, it’s like he said, he was not meant to win that duel.” Goodwin said.

“My ass. He hardly saw what I’m capable of or what I can do. Yet he immediately gave up right before we could even throw down. I just want to know what’s the big deal here.” You said.

“I promise you, all will be answered in time.” Goodwin said.

“They better and if I find out that there’s something else that you’re not telling me, director or not, I will kick your ass.” You threatened Goodwin.

“I’ll take your word for it.” Goodwin said.

“Then have a nice day.” You said before you left.

You then start walking back to your quarters before you bumped into
131111111111211111211113111.title: Confront Goodwin

choices: You make it back in time for a special announcement
Sayer stops you on the wau
1311111111112111112111131111.content:
As you leave Goodwin's tower and return to the arena proper, you run into Akiza on the way. "Hey. What did I miss?" You ask.

"Not much. That Yusei guy just started his duel with Shira, only for Shira to reveal himself as ex-champ Hunter Pace." Ah, right, Yusei. You remember him clutching his arm during Akiza's duel and you start feeling uneasy again. "Did you do what you needed to?" She asks.

"Kinda. I get the feeling that there's more to this tournament than just some publicity stunt. I'm not sure what, but I feel like it has something to do with that mark of yours." Akiza clutches her arm at your words.

"What makes you say that?" She asks.

"During your duel with the knight in plastic armor, right as you summoned Black Rose Dragon, that Yusei guy grabbed his arm in pain like you did when you picked up Blue-Eyes. I don't think it's a coincidence. I think he might have a mark like yours, whether or not he's a psychic like us, I'm not sure yet." You rant.

Akiza just stands there, soaking up your words before finally speaking. "So what do we do?"

"Not sure yet. For now, let's just keep quiet about this until we have more to go off of. Now come on, if we're quick, we can see the end of the duel." The two of you head back to the waiting room
1311111111112111112111131111.title: The Truth Comes Out

13111111111121111121111311112.content:
As you two walked to the waiting room, you see Sayer coming towards you and you wondered what he could want.

“Sayer?” You said.

“Hello, Yuten. Good job on your win in the first round.” Sayer said.

“Yeah. If you count an out-of-nowhere surrender from my opponent counts as a “good job”.” You said.

“Yes. That’s exactly what I want to talk you about. Akiza, mind if I borrow Yuten for a moment?” Sayer wondered.

“Of course, Sayer. I’ll see you later, Yuten.” Akiza said and you nodded before she left.

“What is it?” You asked Sayer.

“I heard one of my men saying that he saw you went over to Goodwin’s tower. It wouldn’t be about your match, is it?” Sayer wondered and you just remained silent. “I understand that you want some answers, but you need to understand that we have a risk of coming here because they want info of our movement.” Sayer said.

“You’re right. It’s just something fishy is going on here and I think Akiza is in the center of it.” You said.

“I understand your concern for her and she appreciates that. But try to keep yourself together. Don’t worry, this is just one of Goodwin’s ways of stirring the pot.” Sayer said.

“But why me?” You wondered.

“Well, we’re not sure. Either he has no interest in you at all or you could have a role in one of his plans.” Sayer said.

You then think that could be the second choice. Why else would he allow The Professor to surrender without even trying?

“That could be it. Thanks, Sayer.” You said.

“My pleasure.” Sayer said before you left to see Akiza
13111111111121111121111311112.title: Sayer Has A Word With You

choices: Follow Yusei, he might know something
131111111111211111211113111122.content:
As you begin to walk back to the waiting room, you hear an announcement over the PA.

Listen up all you first round losers! Don't head for the exits just yet, because Director Goodwin, our Master of Ceremonies, has announced a losers bracket for the first round. The winner will be allowed back into the competition, while the loser goes home empty-handed. So grab your decks and cross your fingers, because here we go.

A losers' bracket? That was never mentioned in the tournament rules, meaning that this was made up on the fly by Goodwin himself. Now the question is, what does he gain from this? He clearly has some sort of agenda from this competition, but what could it be, and why would he need to throw this in so suddenly?

For our first competitor in this duel will be little miss Luna.

The kid?

And her opponent, The Professor.

That creep?! Well that puts some pieces together. If that professor guy really is working for Goodwin, then that means that this Luna girl was his target. He probably told the guy to throw the match just so he could set this up. But what did she have to do with this?

As you return to the waiting room, you don't see Akiza anywhere. Maybe Sayer is giving her a private briefing like he gave you.

"Luna's dueling?!" You hear Yusei's voice say. You turn to see him and Greiger standing together.

"I guess they got the right kid this time." Greiger replies. 'Right kid'? That warranted some nose sticking.

"Excuse me, what do you mean by 'the right kid'?" You ask as you approach them.

"She has a twin brother. The two decided to play slight of hand with us and switch the girl out for him. He wasn't all that bad when we dueled, so I can't wait to see how good his sister is." Greiger answers.

With that, the three of you take seats on the couches. You feel uncomfortable at the thought of a child going against that creep. Almost like you should call somebody. You aren't put at ease when the duel starts, either, as he starts talking in that whispered monotone he spoke to you with.

Luna then starts acting... odd. Odd enough that Yusei starts to get worried enough to rush out of the room.

What do you do next?
131111111111211111211113111122.title: The Plot Thickens

choices: You hear a voice in the background
1311111111112111112111131111221.content:
You decided to go with Yusei. He might have a clue on what’s going on here. You ran after him and followed him to the dueling stage where you two see Luna and The Professor dueling.

“Luna! Are you okay?! Luna!” Yusei called out, only for her not responding him at all. “Weird. She can’t hear me.” Yusei said.

“I’m afraid she’s not the only one.” You said said as you pointed to The Professor.

You see that his eyes are completely dull and empty of life. In fact, Luna seems to have the exact same look in her eyes too.

“Any idea what this means, Yusei?” You asked him.

“All I can say is that they appeared to be hypnotized or something.” Yusei guessed.

“Well that’s just great.” You said.

That was when you start to get a strong feeling from your core and it made you grunt in pain.

“What’s is it?! Are you okay?!” Yusei asked you with concern.

“It’s so strange. I feel a bad burning feeling in the pit in my stomach. This never happen before.” You said.

Before you know it, you felt yourself being separated from your body as your eyes went bright blue and you find yourself in another place unlike you seen before.

“Where am I? And where did Yusei go?” You thought.

You then heard a scream and you ran to see who it was. That’s when you see that Luna girl facing that creep Professor. He seems to have a sick smile on his face.

“Hey, kid! Are you alright?” You asked Luna.

“Who-who are you?!” Luna asked.

“Don’t worry. I’m a friend.” You said.

“You again? How did you get into the spirit world?” The Professor wondered.

Spirit world? Well, guess that explains why everything looks so spirit-like here.

“To be honest, I don’t know myself.” You said.

“Well, leave now. This is no concern of yours.” The Professor demanded.

“I will as soon you stop doing this craziness. Why are you both here anyway?” You wondered.

“Glad you asked. For years, I’ve discovered about this world we stand here and wished to come here personally. Now that I’m here, I can finally complete my goal.” The Professor said acting nuts.

“What goal is that?” You wondered.

“To conquer it, of course.” The Professor said with an evil laugh.

Okay, this guy gives out the new meaning of the word crazy. You then noticed that parts of the land is breaking apart which is not good.

“What’s happening?” You asked.

“It’s the Spirit World. It’s crumbling.” Luna said.

That was when lightning came knocking on you backwards and you slowly tried to get back up. You see Luna feeling scared while The Professor was still laughing evilly.

That was when
1311111111112111112111131111221.title: Enter The Spirit World

choices: Find Akiza to hear the second round matchups
Go talk to Luna about what just happened
