13111111111121111121111311112213.content:
You weren't sure what to do. This was the girl's duel, yes, but you felt that you couldn't just sit there and let this world die even faster. But what could you do? You don't even know where you were and how or why you were here.

Looking over the horizon, you see that the trees are deteriorating as time went on. There had to be something you could do. As if listening to your pleas, your deck began to glow, and from it emerged Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon. "Azure-Eyes? What are you doing?"

It does not answer with words. If simply nods to you before releasing a mighty roar into the sky. Answering the call, your three Blue-Eyes also appear from your deck, before they and Azure-Eyes began to encircle the arena. From their actions, you soon see a pure silver dome surrounding all of you, preventing the world inside from breaking down any further.

Realizing what was happening, you turn back to Luna. "You got this, kid. My guess is that my dragons are buying you time. Now take this creep out and end this."

She gives you a reaffirming nod before turning back to her duel. "Let's keep going then."

*****

In no time at all Luna had that guy on the ropes. Unfortunately, she had to cut the duel short in a draw before some stone dragon skeleton crushed the Professor. You feel yourself fade away again like you felt coming here. Soon, your vision goes to white.

When it returns, you see that Yusei was carrying Luna off the arena, while the Professor just stood there, almost comatose. You dust yourself off and make your own way out of the ring. As you leave, you hear the announcer inform the crowd that both duelists have lost and neither will get to advance.

Meanwhile, unknown to you, Sayer watched on from the shadows. "Interesting." He says before slinking away.

Where do you go now?
13111111111121111121111311112213.title: Guardians of the Spirits

choices: listened to the brackets of the next round
131111111111211111211113111122132.content:
You decided to go see the girl to understand the whole situation before. You go up into the crowd and you see Yusei and with Luna, along with who it could be her twin brother, a nerdy looking kid, an old man, and a muscular looking man.

“Hey, kid. Feeling okay?” You asked Luna.

“Yes. I’m fine now. Thank you.” Luna said nicely.

“Good to hear. By the way, we didn’t introduced ourselves. I’m Yuten.” You said.

“I’m Luna. And this is my brother, Leo.” Luna said.

“What’s up?” Leo said.

“I’m Dexter.” The nerdy kid said.

“Hello, sonny. I’m Tenzen.” The old man said.

“And I’m Tanner.” The big guy said last.

“Well, now that we’re all friends, how are you feeling, Yuten?” Yusei asked you.

“Good. In fact, I need to talk to you about that experience with the spirit world. Tell me exactly how you two ended up there.” You asked her.

“Okay. Well, The Professor was saying some weird things while we were dueling and then my mind seemed to fade away for a moment. The next thing I know, I was in the spirit world with him.” Luna explained.

“What about that dragon skeleton that tried to make him into its lunch?” You wondered.

“That was Ancient Fairy Dragon that was trapped in that stone. She came out that way because she got mad at The Professor for threatening the spirit world.” Luna said.

“Guess I can’t blame her then.” You said.

“What about you? Luna said that she saw you there too. How did you end up in there?” Yusei wondered.

“I’m not so sure. I just felt this strong feeling in the pit of my stomach, then the next thing you know, I’m in the spirit world with her. I didn’t even know if that was possible for me.” You said.

“Either way, thanks for helping me there a little.” Luna said with a smile.

“Don’t thank me. Thank my dragons.” You said with a chuckle before you realized something. “Oh yeah. I better get back. Guess I’ll see you the next round, Yusei.” You said.

“Sure thing.” Yusei said before you left.

You looked to see if you can find Akiza anywhere. Eventually, you
131111111111211111211113111122132.title: Chatting with Luna

choices: You spend time with Akiza before bed
Sayer calls you to his office
1311111111112111112111131111221321.content:
After a lot of hunting around, you finally found Akiza out by the Arcadia Movement trucks. "Akiza!" You shout out, getting her attention. "What happened to you? I've been looking all over for you, but you just disappeared."

"Oh, Yuten. Sorry about that, after I left you to talk to Sayer, some guys from the movement wanted to take me back here to recover my powers on orders from Sayer. Nothing serious, though, they just felt it better for me to rest in private." She explains.

"Well that's good to hear. I was starting to think you were avoiding me or something." You joke, causing her to giggle a bit. Before you can continue talking, one of the members of the movement approached you both with a screen displaying live footage from inside.

Ladies and gentlemen, the first round of the Fortune Cup is over. Now, let's take a look at who's dueling who in Round 2. Good luck to our competitors in the next match.

The matchups for the next round were displayed on screen. The first match tomorrow would be Yusei vs Greiger. But that would mean...

Sure enough, right under that was you vs Akiza. A hush fell between you two before you broke the silence. "Well, looks like we're facing off tomorrow. Good luck to you then."

You extend a hand to Akiza, who has little hesitation shaking it. "Right." Soon, Sayer returns and orders the truck convoy to return to headquarters.

What happens when you return?
1311111111112111112111131111221321.title: The End of the first day

choices: You have breakfast the next day
13111111111121111121111311112213211.content:
When you got back to headquarters, you decided to hangout with Akiza for a little while just to get your mind off of everything that happened today. You two are at the balcony just to take in the nice fresh nightly air.

“We did pretty good today.” You said taking in the sight.

“Yeah. We did.” Akiza said while feeling a bit down, which you noticed.

“Look, Akiza, If this is about tomorrow, don’t worry about it. Because, win or lose, we’re going to make the Arcadia Movement proud, as well as each other.” You said.

“That’s just it. I’m not worried about the end of the match, but what could happen during the match.” Akiza said.

You figured out what she means by that. Her powers. She’s afraid that she’ll hurt you like she did when you two first met. To be fair, you’re pretty scared of what will happen too. Still, you do your best to keep her calm.

“Look, I know you’re scared of your powers, but don’t let that bring you down. We just didn’t know each other the first time we dueled. Plus, it was hard to see that pretty face of yours underneath that mask.” You said as Akiza blushed when you called her face pretty. “I promise you, everything is going to be okay.” You said as you hugged her.

“Okay. I’ll believe you on this.” Akiza said as she hugged you back.

You both then said goodnight to each other before you went off to bed. While you sleep, you were twisting and turning unconditionally as you begin to dream.

*******************************************
(Your dream)

You opened your eyes and you see that you’re in what looks like a village of some sorts. You take a look around until you see a group of monsters come running down. That must mean that you’re in the spirit world again. They looked like they were running away from something. But from what?

“Woah! Hey now! What’s going on!?” You asked the monsters.

“The army of shadows has returned!”

“They’re destroying our worlds!”

“There’s no hope left!”

“Run for it!”

What do they mean by that? You had no time to think as you see a woman with white long hair, blue eyes, and a brown dress that looks like she needs help. In fact, she was begging for your help when she saw you.

“Yuten! Save us!” The woman pleaded before she vanished into a purple light.

You don’t know what to make of this as you hear roaring from above. You looked up and you see 5 dragons that you never seen before, except for one and that would be Akiza’s Black Rose Dragon. They appeared to be fighting against something and loosing. That’s when you see another dragon and it’s one that you know best.

“Blue-Eyes?” You said to the dragon.

You then turned to see a huge amount of purple flames and they were destroying the dragons, including, to your horror, Blue-Eyes.

“BLUE-EYES!! NOOO!!” You screamed before you see the flames coming towards you and you screamed when they hit you.

*******************************************

(End of dream)

You wake up with, unknown to you, your eyes flashing bright blue for a moment while you sit up, gasping and sweating after the dream, or rather a nightmare. You took a moment to breathe easily and you tried to figure out that dream, or is it even a dream? Either way, you laid back down to sleep, unaware that the Blue-Eyes in your deck was glowing
13111111111121111121111311112213211.title: Spending Time With Akiza And Nightmare

choices: Refuse the offer, use this time to plan your strategy
131111111111211111211113111122132112.content:
You've been under house arrest in your room before you went back to the arena. You were brought breakfast and told to eat in your room. After that, you were escorted back to your truck, once again not being able to see Akiza on your way out. The anticipation of what was about to happen was tense.

*****

Unlike yesterday, this time you were kept inside your truck after arriving, and from the sound of it, so was Akiza. Looks like Sayer tightened the leash on both of you after you storming up to Goodwin yesterday. You exited briefly to confirm with tournament officials that you were, in fact, here. Seeing nothing better to do, you try to relax and ease your nerves before the video phone in your truck goes off.

On screen was one of the many people here who's names you still need to learn. "Sir, the first match of the day between Yusei and Greiger is about to start. Would you like me to patch the duel broadcast feed to your video phone so you can watch the duel? It can help pass the time."
131111111111211111211113111122132112.title: Start of the Second Round

choices: Sayer gives you a quick call
1311111111112111112111131111221321121.content:
“You know what? Sure. Put it on.” You said.

You could use this duel to get your mind off of the things that are going through your head. Plus, you could use this to study those two just in case you win against Akiza today. The video for the duel come in live feed and you see introducing of Yusei and Greiger.

Now, you’ve seen some duel runners before, but the one Greiger’s driving, that’s not a runner, that’s a war machine and it looks like it could pack a serious punch.

The duel gets underway and Greiger starts off pretty good so far. Yusei makes his move, but Greiger uses his turn against him as he uses his cards to summon his strongest monster.

Flying Fortress SKY FIRE

“Oh shit!” You muttered as Yusei seems to be on the receiving end now.

That metal behemoth was blasting at Yusei’s life points left and right and you thought it was over for him. But Yusei managed to push the challenge back and destroyed SKY FIRE. You give him the benefit of a doubt for that. But it was far from over. The duel was going back and forth until Yusei manages to get the final blow on Greiger, winning this duel. You smiled at him for his victory, but your expression changed when Greiger grabbed the mic and he was talking.

You listened on to what he has to say. He said something about his village, his people, and Goodwin. He said that he was using his home as a testing ground for the Crimson Dragon.

Crimson Dragon? Wait a second. You may not know what this thing is, but you wide-eyed as you may have found your answer about Akiza’s mark. Now only one question remains.

What does this mean?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121.title: Watch the duel

13111111111121111121111311112213211212.content:
Well, with Yusei's duel over, that means that you're up next. You tap out of the duel feed and prepare to get up, only for the phone to ring once again. You answer, only this time you are greeted by Sayer's smug face. "Sayer, what's up?"

"I know that you watched the duel feed of the last match. I'm sure that you have a few questions about Greiger's story at the end there." He replies.

"That's an understatement. From the sound of it though, you seem to know a few things about whatever it is he's talking about. So what exactly is Goodwin after? And what does it have to do with Akiza?" You ask in a demanding tone.

"All will be revealed in time. I'll brief the both of you after the match. For now, you have a duel to get to." The screen closes and you're left with more questions than answers.

You knew Sayer knew more than he was letting on, even before you joined. But now a whole other set of questions about him rose up. Just how much did he know? Oh well, questions for later, you had a match to win.
13111111111121111121111311112213211212.title: Sayer gives you a quick call

131111111111211111211113111122132112121.content:
“Alright, ladies and gentlemen, we are now ready to get the last duel of the semi-finals underway! Remember, the winner of this duel will face Yusei Fudo in the finals! Now, introducing the first participant, she’s the magician with a masterful plan and a bloom of doom, The Black Rose!” The announcer said as Akiza was levitated to the dueling arena. “And now, her opponent, the Warrior with the Eyes of Blue, Yuten!” The announcer said as you showed up next.

You can hear the jeers from the crowd and you can guess that they’re directing towards Akiza. You can see the pain in her eyes and you know that look all too well. Still, you want to help her as you prepared yourself to duel.

“Well, may the best duelist win.” You said.

“Of course.” Akiza said.

“Get your decks ready because the last semi-finals match is about to begin!” The announcer said as your duel disks are set.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Akiza: 4000
131111111111211111211113111122132112121.title: The Rematch: You vs Akiza

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Ladies first, Akiza." You say, giving her the go ahead.

"Why thank you. I draw." She begins to look over her cards.Don't think I haven't been preparing for this, Yuten. I know that your whole game plan is centered on those dragons of yours flooding the field freely. So I just need to even the playing field. And I have just the combo to do it, too.

"I'll start by summoning Twilight Rose Kinght in attack mode."

TRK: 1000 ATK

"Next I'll use his special ability to special summon one level four or below plant-type monster from my hand, and the monster I choose is Hedge Guard in defense mode."

HG: 2100 DEF

Talk about deja vu. This was the exact same combo she used against you last time. Next she'll use Star Changer to bump her knight's level up by one, then synchro summon her dragon.

"And now I'll tune my level three Twilight Rose Kinght with my level three Hedge Guard, to synchro summon Queen of Thorns in attack mode." A large woman appeared before Akiza, with her entire lower half covered in red foliage and one hand being replaced by some form of crab claw.

QoT: 2200 ATK

"And don't think I'm stopping there, either. Next I activate my field spell, Black Garden." Vines covered in thorns and black flowers sprouted up around you both. "Then I'll throw down a face-down and end my turn."

Well this was a bit new. You knew what this field spell did thanks to her duel with Randsborg, but that monster was something new entirely. Guess you'll just have to roll with it for now.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Akiza starts

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“It’s my move now.” You said as you draw your card. “Now, I’ll start off by summoning-.”

“I would think about that if I were you.” Akiza interrupted you. “You see, if any of us wants to summon a monster from our hand, we must pay 1000 life points from now on thanks to my queens special ability.” Akiza said to you.

“Amazing idea! Now Yuten will have to think about summoning monsters very carefully! Could we see The Black Rose cornering the Warrior?” The announcer said.

“I’m not too worried. If that’s how you want to play, Akiza, then fine. I’ll pay 1000 points now to summon Kaibaman to the field.” You said.

You: 3000

Kaibaman: 200 ATK

“Thank you. Because you summoned a new monster, the effect of my field spell now activated. Not only are your monster’s attack points are halved, but I get a Rose token to my field.” Akiza explained as a token appeared.

Kaibaman: 200 - 100 ATK

“That’s okay. Because I’m not afraid to make some sacrifices. Speaking of sacrifices, I think I’ll give up another 1000 life points to make room for Kaibaman’s ability. Now I’ll trade him to summon this.” You said.

You: 2000

“Now, feast your eyes on my Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” You said as your best dragon appeared.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“I-I can’t believe what I’m seeing! This is incredible, folks! I don’t know if my eyes are playing dumb pranks on me or I’m actually seeing the legendary Blue-Eyes White Dragon in front of me!” The announcer said in shock with the rest of the crowd.

“It can’t be! It’s him!” Lazar said from the tower.

“That is correct, Lazar! The legendary Blue-Eyes White Dragon has returned to this world.” Goodwin said as a certain turbo dueling champion looked on in shock to see your ace out for him to see.

“That’s one of the dragons that was with Yuten when I was in the spirit world.” Luna said from the stands.

“You’re serious?!” Leo asked her sister who nodded yes.

“While I’m impressed to see you’ve got your dragon out, Yuten, I’m afraid that he’ll be getting very weak while I get another token.” Akiza said.

BEWD: 3000 - 1500 ATK

“Then I better defend myself with a face down. You’re up.” You said
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: You’re In A Pickle Now

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I'm up then." She says as she drew her card. "And I'll start by having my queen attack your precious dragon. Go Thorn Storm!" Her monster attacks with a barrage of thorns from her claw, destroying Blue-Eyes.

You: 1300

The thorns that didn't hit your dragon went right for you, cutting up your robes and causing small craters in the ground behind you. At the sight of her power, the crowd once again began to boo and jeer. Meanwhile, Akiza looked scared that she hurt you. You give her a silent look tell you're alright.

"This is looking bad for Yuten. Now Akiza's Rose Tokens have an open road straight to his life points. If he can't stop them, it's all over." The announcer yells out.

"He's right Yuten. It's time to end this. Rose Token number one, attack Yuten directly."

"Not so fast! I activate my face-down, Silver's Cry. With this, I'm allowed to special summon one normal dragon-type monster from my graveyard. So I think I'll special summon my Blue-Eyes back to my field in defense mode." Your dragon returns to the field.

BEWD: 2500 DEF

"By the way, since he was special summoned from my graveyard, I don't have to pay life points to your queen's effect." You explain.

"But my garden still gives me another rose, as well as cuts your monster's points in half."

"Ah ah ah, it cuts it's attack points in half. It's defense points are left untouched. And since your queen only has 2200 attack, you can't break through anytime soon."

BEWD: 3000-1500 ATK
2500 DEF

"Fine then. I'll throw one card face down and end my turn."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Thorns of the Black Rose

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Okay. Here I go.” You said as you draw your next card. “First, I play Cards of Consonance. By discarding a dragon-type tuner monster with 1000 or less attack points from my hand to the graveyard, I can draw two cards. Since the card I sent to the graveyard was The White Stone of Legend, it’s ability lets me get another Blue-Eyes to my hand. Following that, I play Trade-In. I discard my Blue-Eyes so that I can draw two cards one more time.” You said as you looked at your new hand. “Okay, Akiza, don't get too comfortable with your garden because I’m trimming it all down right now.” You said as you’re ready to make your move.

“Is that right? Go ahead and show it to me.” Akiza said.

“You want it? You got it. First, I play this. Burst Stream of Destruction. I can only activate this card whenever I have Blue-Eyes on my field. And since he is, he can now destroy all of your monsters. Get them, Blue-Eyes!” You said as your dragon obliterated all of Akiza’s monsters in one shot.

“What a comeback! Yuten just trimmed all of the Black Rose’s monsters just like he promised. But can he pick up the pace?” The announcer said.

“Just watch. Now, lucky for you, Blue-Eyes can’t attack on the same turn that this spell was activated. But, that’s okay. Because I now play the spell A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon. By returning a level 5 or higher dragon, like Blue-Eyes, from the field back into my hand, this spell can take down all spell and traps on the field.” You said as your dragon returns to your hand while a giant flaming dragon burned everything, including the Black Garden, to ash.

“Amazing! Now the Black Rose has nothing left to defend herself. I really hate to be her right now.” The announcer yelled.

“Very good, Yuten. But right before you destroyed my cards, I was able to activate Jar of Greed to draw a card from my deck.” Akiza said.

“No problem. But I’m not done because I now summon Lord of D. in attack mode.” You said.

LoD: 1200 ATK

“Now, attack her directly.” You said as your monster striked down at her.

Akiza: 2800

You then see that some of her clothes are torn, much to the shock of the crowd.

“Well, uh, this is unexpected. Apparently, Yuten was able to dish out the same real damage as the Black Rose.” The announcer said.

“Does that mean that he’s like her?”

“No way! That’s just impossible!”

“But we all saw it!”

“This is freaking me out!”

You ignore the fans thoughts on it as you were concerned for Akiza, who got up and gives you nod to show that she’s fine, much to your relief.

“I’ll end with this card face down.” You said
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Cutting The Weeds Down

choices: You two are stopped by Lazar
You pass out as you leave
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Then it's my move. I draw. First I'll play one card face down. Then I'll activate the spell Card of Sanctity. Which lets us both draw cards until we each have six in our hands." You both draw your cards and Akiza cracks a smile.

"It's over Yuten. First I activate Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy your face-down."

"What?!" A whirlwind envelopes the Mirror Force you placed face down. Well that isn't good.

"Next I'll summon Phoenixian Seed in defense mode."

PS: 0000 DEF

"Now I'll use my seed's special ability. I can release it to special summon Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis from my hand in attack mode."

PCA: 2200 ATK

Definitely not good.

"Now, Amaryllis, attack Lord of D." Her monster lets loose a stream of flames that blasts your monster and destroys it, while also singeing you.

You: 300

"Now for Amaryllis' special ability. When it attacks, it gets destroyed after the battle and burns you for 800 points of damge. Game over." Her monster explodes, resulting in you erupting in a pillar of flames and collapsing to the ground.

You: 0000

"And with that, we have our winner. Akiza will be moving on to the final round against Yusei Fudo." The announcer calls out while Akiza rushes to your side.

"Yuten! Are you okay?"

"Yeah, I'm good. I always prefer medium rare anyway." You joke through the pain as you climb back to your feet. Meanwhile, the crowd wastes no time in expressing their prejudice.

"Hey look, the witch has herself a little witch boyfriend just like her."

"They belong together. Freaks, the both of them."

The soon break out into a chant of "Freaks, Freaks, Freaks" as you two exit the arena. Even with your injuries, you can still see the tears coming down Akiza's face.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Akiza's Burning Passion

choices: something else was happening in the spirit world
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As you walked out of the arena, you start to feel a bit lightheaded. That duel must’ve really had you beaten as you passed out on the ground.

“Yuten! Yuten, wake up! Yuten!” Akiza screamed as she tries to wake you up with tears in her eyes.

*********
(Your dream)

You wake up and you see that you’re no longer at the duel arena. In fact, you don’t feel much of your body. This could mean one thing. You’re back at the spirit world.

You looked around the place until you see a woman standing in the middle of the forest. You then noticed that she looks familiar. That’s when it hit you. She’s the same woman from your last dream.

“Excuse me, ma’am? Are you alright?” You asked her.

“I am for now. It is good to see you, Yuten.” The woman said to you.

“How do you know my name?” You wondered.

“There is no time to explain. Our worlds are in grave danger and you and your friends are the only ones that can stop this catastrophe.” The woman said.

“Catastrophe? What do you mean? Like an apocalypse?” You wondered.

“Yes. Now listen, go back to your own world and help the Signers. They are our last hope.” The woman instructed you to do.

“Wait. Signers? What do you mean by that?” You asked.

“Like I said, there’s no time for explanations. Please go now. We’ll meet again soon.” The woman said before she left.

“Wait! Come back!” You shouted out to her as
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Back To The Spirit World Again

choices: There's a bright flash and the duel's over
There's a flash of light. Where are you now?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Wait!" You shout again as you open your eyes and lean forward, only to hit your head on something. "Huh?" From the looks of your surroundings, you were back in your truck in the healing tank that came with it.

It was full of some kind of fluid that you were too new to this place to identify, but it had to be something good for you to fill the tank with so much. You weren't awake for long before someone entered the truck. It wasn't Sayer or Akiza, it was another one of those grunts you still need to learn the name of. "Ah, good, you're awake." He says.

"How long was I out?" You ask groggily.

"Quite a bit. Most of the day has gone by already." He replies.

"What have I missed?"

"Akiza just finished dueling Yusei in the final round. Unfortunately, she lost. She was a bit shaken up, so Sayer requested that she recover in her own truck. Yusei is going to duel Jack Atlas in a few minutes." He explains.

"Well, that's unfortunate. So what's the word on my injuries?"

"A few scrapes and some minor burns. Nothing too serious, but when you collapsed on us, Sayer didn't want to take any chances." He checks his watch. "The championship match is about to start any second now. Would you like me to have the duel feed patched in here?"

"Sure. I'll need something to do while I heal." He nods and leaves the truck. Shortly after, your video screen pops up in front of you, showing the first draw of the duel.

The match itself was a constant back and forth between these two. Soon, both of them played what seemed to be their strongest monster. Yusei with Stardust Dragon, and Jack with Red Dragon Archfiend. It finally came time for the two dragons to clash. The two fire one blast at each other. Then...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Waking up

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As the dragons of both Yusei and Jack go toe-to-toe, you then felt that same gut feeling you had as a flash of light appeared and you felt yourself leaving again. Only this time, you appeared to be flying in space in a blue orb. You looked around as this is just playing freaky to you.

“Where the hell am I now?” You thought as you see something.

You looked to see that it’s Akiza and Luna flying in red orbs and you go to get close to them.

“Akiza! Luna!” You shouted to get their attention.

“Yuten! Are you alright?” Akiza asked you with much concern.

“I’m fine. But where are we?” You asked.

“I don’t know.” Luna said.

“Me neither. We were all just drawn in here when Yusei and Jack start battling out with their dragons.” Akiza explained.

Speaking of those two, you see them in their duel runners and you told the girls to stay behind you as you follow them. You then see what looks like a large stairway of some sorts.

“What’s that?” Luna asked.

“It looks like some sort of temple.” Akiza said.

“What is it doing here?” You wondered.

You all flew up the temple and you see strange looking people on top. You took a closer look at them and you see that they have marks like Akiza, Yusei, Luna, and Jack.

“Girls, check it out! They have marks like you do!” You said to them.

“Then these people must have these marks before we did. But why are we seeing this?” Akiza wondered.

You then looked to see other people bowing in pray at what looks like a stone tablet.

“Why are those people praying at that tablet?” Luna asked.

You took a closer look and you were surprised when you found out what the tablet is carved like.

“That tablet looks just like my Blue-Eyes.” You said.

“Amazing! But what does this mean?” Akiza wondered.

Before you could answer, you see two cities just up ahead.

“That looks like the Satellite and New Domino City. But why are we here?” You asked.

You got your answer as purple flames start bursting from the ground and destroying the city.

“Ahh! What’s happening?!” Luna asked in fear as the flames continued to form until it made a shape.

“Guys, look! Is that a giant spider destroying New Domino City?!” Akiza wondered as the devastation continues.

All of this reminds you of the dream you had last night and it got you all shaken up a bit. Then it hit you on the noggin. Perhaps, it wasn’t a dream, but rather a vision and this could be a vision too.

“Girls, I think this all a showing of the future. Maybe that’s why we’re all here.” You guessed.

“Then we better get out of here.” Akiza said.

“We will because we have our ticket home.” You said as you looked on at the duel between Yusei and Jack.

The duel was getting intense until Yusei manages to put the final nail on the coffin, ending Jack’s title reign.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Glimpse of the Future

choices: Straight to your room, Sayer's orders
Down to the medical office to further treat your injuries
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
With the final flash of Yusei's attack, another light, similar to the one that brought you here, enveloped you before you find yourself back in your tank. Your screen was still playing the duel feed. Just like you saw in that vision, Yusei had won by a narrow margin. Meanwhile, Jack and his runner seem to be in a wrecked heap.

"There you have it folks. Your new duel champion is... Yusei Fudo!" You can't hear what's going on in there, but you can imagine that the crowd is not happy at a Satellite being their new champion. Then, the man from before comes back into the truck.

"Sayer says it's time to return to headquarters. You still need to heal, so you'll be left in the tank until we return. The roads may make things a bit bumpy, just to warn you." He says.

"Thanks." He leaves and you can hear the truck start up and begin to pull out. On the drive back to headquarters, you begin to question everything that's happened to you today. And what this tournament has to do with it.

Who was that girl in your dreams? Who are these "signers" that you need to help? What was that vision you saw with Akiza and Luna? What are these marks you keep seeing?

When you arrive at headquarters...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The end of the duel

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You got back to headquarters and were told to go straight down to the medical room to get checked out even further. You made it there and the doctors come check you out. After some tests, they given you some results.

“Okay, Mr. Yuten, you should be back to full health when you wake up tomorrow morning.” The doctor said to you.

“Thank you, Doc.” You said as you get up and leave.

You took the time to walk around the building for a bit just to think. All of this craziness that’s happening so far, the marks, “signers”, the end of the world, it’s as if life is dumping unexpected things on you. You were then out of thought when you bumped into Akiza.

“Oh! Sorry about that, Akiza. I wasn’t paying attention to where I was going.” You apologized.

“That’s okay, Yuten. It’s been insane for all of us. How are you feeling?” Akiza asked.

“Great. I should be back to normal health first thing in the morning.” You said.

“That’s great. I’m sorry that I hurt you a lot in our match.” Akiza apologized too.

“Hey, you did what you had to do. Nothing to be ashamed of. I guess we’re even now.” You said.

“I guess we are.” Akiza said as she jumps up to hug you.

You give her a hug of your own and you noticed that she’s not letting you go. This is making you feel hot as you feel her chest pressing up against yours like this.

“Uh, Akiza? You can let me go now.” You said while you blush.

“Oh! Sorry!” Akiza said as she was blushing too.

“Well, anyhow, do you have any clue about what we just saw in that vision?” You wondered as you cool yourself down.

“Not really. All I know is that it has something to do with those mark.” Akiza said while holding her arm.

“Yeah. I was told that those people we saw are called signers. I’m guessing that’s what they’re called with that mark you have there.” You figured.

“I guess that’s what we’re called then. What about you? Why did we see your Blue-Eyes in that vision?” Akiza wondered.

“I’m not sure. But my guess is that he has something to do with this whole thing. We just need to figure out what.” You figured.

“I’m sure something will pop up. Until then, why don’t take an easy?” Akiza suggested.

“Sure. I’ll see you later.” You said before Akiza left.

You see how she’s walking and it made you feel warm again just by looking at her. She is definitely one hot psychic duelist. You then walked back to your room until you
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Check Up

choices: You bump into Akiza going into her room
Nothing happens so you just flop into bed
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Just as you were about to get to your room, you were stopped by two Arcadia Movement members blocking your path. "Is there something wrong gentlemen?"

"Sayer would like to speak to you in his office. It won't take too long." One of them says. You had the feeling that these guys weren't going to take no for an answer, so you chose to follow them up to Sayer's office, where they motion you inside and shut the door behind you.

"Alright Sayer, what's going on? You said you would give me answers about this Crimson Dragon thing, so I think it's time you told the truth."

"In time Yuten. For now, I have some bad news. Due to the damage caused at the Fortune Cup, anti-psychic sentiment has actually increased. I suspect that this is merely the initial shock of seeing our powers in action and will die down in time. But for now, you and Akiza are being confined to headquarters until further notice. I know this is upsetting to you, but I need you to understand that your faces are known and you will be remembered immediately. I'm doing this to protect you both. I trust you understand."

"*sigh I get it. I'll keep still for a while, just do what you need to to get us accepted again. If that's all you need, doc said I should be resting if I ever wanted these injuries to heal. So if I may?" You ask.

"Of course. Rest up." You leave his office and head back to your room.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: House Arrest

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As you were going into your room, you see Akiza going into her own room and you decided to give her the news Sayer gave you.

“Hey, Akiza. Listen, I’ve got some bad news to share with you.” You said with a sigh.

“What is it, Yuten?” Akiza asked you.

“I was just called into Sayer’s office and it turns out that showing our powers at the tournament has raised up quite a couple of red flags. So, until this whole thing blows over, we’re pretty much stuck in this building.” You explained to her.

“That is bad news.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. Not to mention that this whole mark thing is driving me crazy. First, there was the signs, then the spirit world..”

“Spirit World?” Akiza wondered.

“It’s a long story. Anyway, then there was the visions and I’m supposed to do something that I have no clue of. What kind of twisted reality are we living in?” You said with frustration as you laid back against the wall.

“I know that you’re frustrated, but you need to calm down. Complaining about this isn’t going to help you.” Akiza said.

“Easy for you to say.” You said with a sigh.

You then felt her hand on your shoulder and you turned to see that Akiza’s rubbing on you a little. You guessed that she was making you feel better.

“I know that you’ll find what you’re looking for, Yuten. You just need a little hope.” Akiza said.

“I guess you’re right. Thanks.” You said.

You then looked at her in the eyes and you can feel your heart beating faster than before. What it felt like minutes, it was really seconds before you snapped out of your trance.

“Well, I’ll, uh, see you in the morning.” You said feeling warm on the cheeks.

“You too, Yuten.” Akiza said before giving you another hug.

You give her one back before you two let go and went back to your respective rooms to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Bumping Into Akiza Again

choices: It's Akiza, looking for company today
It's Sayer, ready to tell the "truth"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You wake up with a stretch and a yawn. You didn't have a strange dream this time around. Maybe it was just nerves about the tournament. Your injuries have also healed nicely. Sayer may be a loon, but he's a loon that has some great healthcare perks.

Deciding that you have nothing to really do today, you figure that nobody would care if you lay in bed for a while. You take this time to check the news. With all that happened yesterday, between the psychic powers, Jack's loss and hospitalization, and a man from the Satellite becoming champion, the media must be buzzing today. Maybe you'll find something interesting.

"Let's see here. Headline is from some Angela chick saying that Yusei cheated his way to the championship, as I expected from these people. The Jack Atlas movie premiere is tonight, boring. Misty Tredwell would be making an appearance at the debut. She was certainly attractive, but not my type enough to make me care." You mutter to yourself.

"Hold on!" Near the bottom of the page, you see a small headline. "Chaos in parking garage?" You question. "Local parking garage was left in ruin upon the arrival of Sector Security. Two suspects apprehended. One claims to have no memory of the event, while the other says she witnessed the first having an illegal street duel with new duel champion Yusei Fudo. This can be neither confirmed or denied."

If this was true, then maybe Yusei is already taking the fight to who or whatever is planning to destroy the city. Meanwhile, you were stuck indoors like a child that broke the vase in the hall. You hear a knock at the door and close out. "Who's there?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A New Day

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see that it’s Sayer that entered your room. You got curious to see why he’s here now.

“Good morning, Yuten. Feeling better I presume?” Sayer asked you.

“Yeah. I feel like I’m back to my old self.” You said while stretching to show that you’re in good condition.

“Excellent. Now, I come here because I know that you want to know the whole truth about what happened yesterday. So, are you ready to listen?” Sayer asked you.

“I’ve been ready.” You said.

“Good. Now first, that professor duelist you saw was a member of The Order of Illiaster, an organization that is led by Goodwin with only one objective, to resurrect the Crimson Dragon.” Sayer started.

“Crimson Dragon? Wait a minute, Greiger mentioned something about that in his speech. What exactly is this thing anyhow?” You wondered.

“It’s an ancient force of unimaginable power that once existed 5,000 years ago. Now, Goodwin is planning to use that force to bring the world to its knees.” Sayer continued.

“Like world domination? But what about Akiza? What does this have to do with her?” You wondered.

“That mark on her arm which you likely saw is the mark of the Crimson Dragon, this making her what Goodwin call a signer.” Sayer stated.

Signer? That was what that woman you kept seeing in your dreams said. So Akiza’s a signer? Then Yusei, Luna, and Jack must be one too.

“You see, that’s where we come in. We are given these powers so that we can stop Goodwin’s ambition and lead the world down the path it should be.” Sayer finished up.

“That sounds noble.” You said.

“Agreed. Now, how about you go and freshen up. Breakfast will be ready soon.” Sayer said before he left.

You got up and left to take a shower. It was good that Sayer finally come clean. But there was something suspicious about his story. If the Crimson Dragon was going to be used as a means of dominating power, that why would it showed you the vision yesterday? Not to mention that the signers like Akiza was supposed to be somewhat protectors like that woman said. All of this has left you with one solution.

“Someone’s not telling the whole truth.”

You then got freshened up and went to
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Sayer’s “Truthful” Tale

choices: Akiza reveals a secret movie stash
Skip to the end of the day
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Well, if the two of you were going to be stuck here, might as well be stuck here together. You toss on your robe and head next door to Akiza's room and knock on the door. "Coming." You hear from inside.

Soon enough, Akiza opens the door slightly and pokes her head out. "Oh Yuten. Glad to see you're okay after yesterday. Come on in."

She opens the door the rest of the way... and you feel your face go red as all your blood starts to rush South. Akiza was standing in the doorway in nothing more than a towel, water still dripping off her. Come on man, keep it together. Don't seem creepy. "Make yourself comfortable while I get dressed."

She walks back into her room and retreats into the bathroom while you look around a bit. This was much nicer than what you got. This seems like something that wouldn't be out of place in a queen's palace. Maybe you should talk to Sayer about getting an interior decorator in your room.

"So, what's up Yuten? This is the first time you've ever stopped by." You hear Akiza ask as you take a seat. You can hear clothes rustling from the other side. You fight off the voice in your head telling you to just go in and see her beautiful body naked.

"Not much. Sayer just told me about Goodwin's plan to resurrect this Crimson Dragon thing and how we at the Arcadia Movement are going to stop him." You yell. You don't have the heart to tell her that you think her father figure might be keeping secrets about the truth on that.

"Yeah. He already told me about that before my duel with Yusei." Finally, she steps out in her usual attire. "So what else? There's gotta be more to your visit than that."

"I figured that since we were stuck here together, we could hang out as best we could for today. You in?"

"Of course. What should we do first?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Red as a Rose

choices: go see any duels that are happening
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I was thinking we should have breakfast first. After all, I could go for a nice plate after all that’s happening. We’ll plan something when we’re done.” You said.

“Sounds good. Let’s go eat before it gets cold.” Akiza said as you followed her.

You made it to the dining hall and you grabbed your plate. You choose to have some eggs with a side of bacon, a muffin, and a cup of orange juice. You two got to your table and you eat up with Akiza. While you were eating, you looked at her face and you can’t help but smile at the beauty she really is. But, at the same, you feel a little scared about this whole Crimson Dragon thing. If what you saw yesterday was true, then you’re afraid of what could happen to her during the whole thing.

“Can’t get your mind off it, can you?” Akiza asked you.

“Yeah. Pretty much.” You answered as you kept on eating.

“Look, just try to forget about it for today. I don’t feel comfortable not seeing your smile.” Akiza said as she tries to cheer you up a little.

“Okay, Akiza. If you insist.” You said to her.

You two finished your breakfast and you threw away your trash in the bin. You then used the bathroom to wash your hands and face before you went back to her.

“So, now that we ate, what do you want to do?” Akiza asked.

“Maybe we shou - WOAH!” You yelled as you slipped on a wet part of the floor and landed on your back.

“Yuten! Are you alright?!” Akiza asked looking down at you.

“That hurts.” You said in pain.

You opened your eyes only for you to close them quickly when you saw something that made you red in the face.

“Uh, Akiza?” You said while pointing at her.

Akiza looks at what you were pointing at and was blushing mad when it was her skirt that you were referring to as she covers herself by crossing her legs.

“Am I good to look now?” You asked her.

“Yes.” Akiza answered.

You sighed in relief as you opened your eyes and you slowly got up. You turned around and see the blushing look on her face.

“You didn’t see anything, did you?” Akiza asked nervously.

“Why do you think I was covering my eyes for? I’m trying not to be a creep around you. It’s not right.” You said.

“At least you’re a gentleman.” Akiza said.

“Thanks. Anyway, I think someone forgot to put up a wet floor sign here. The morons.” You sighed with a bit of frustration.

“Let’s not worry about it. How about we...”
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Having Breakfast With Akiza

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Look, don't tell Sayer, but I may have a little secret that is normally forbidden by the movement." She says as she slides open a secret panel next to her television.

Inside the panel was a small collection of movies. "Movies are forbidden by the movement?" You ask.

"When you're in a building full of psychics that can bring the place down if their emotions cause their powers to act up, emotional movies aren't exactly something you want around." She explains.

"Then why the t.v.?"

"So we can at least keep in touch with what's going on in the world."

"And you paid for these...?" You start.

"I had them before I joined. Let's just say that I at least had some money to my name before I left." You decide it best to just leave it at that. You kind of owe her after that incident out there, anyway.

"Alright then, so what's first in this little movie day of ours?" You ask
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Movie Marathon

choices: Skip to the end of the day
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see Akiza putting the movie in and it’s some cheesy romantic kind of film. You watched on and it looks okay by the looks of it. The moments were decent and the actors are doing quite well doing their roles. All you could do is watch while Akiza’s sitting next to you.

“This is actually a nice film.” You said.

“It’s good to watch, isn’t it?” Akiza wondered.

“Yeah. In fact, I think I know that one actress from another movie I saw as a little kid.” You said.

“Really?” Akiza wondered.

“Yeah.” You answered.

You sighed a little as you reminded yourself of your younger years before you got your powers. You wished that you’re still with your parents right now. But, on the bright side, if it wasn’t for those powers, you wouldn’t have met the beautiful rose known as Akiza. So, it’s like a blessing in disguise.

The film went on to the part where the couple went in for a kiss and it made your face go red for it gives you a thought of the girl sitting next to you. You can feel your heart getting warmed up as the film was just about ending.

“That was beautiful.” Akiza said.

“It sure was.” You said with a smile.

“Just not as beautiful as you are.” You said in your head.

“I’m glad you like it.” Akiza said as she gets up to take the movie out, only to find one of her cards dropped on the floor. “Oh nuts. I dropped a card. I’ll get it.” Akiza said as she bends down to get her card.

As she bends down, you blushed super red as you see Akiza’s butt just a few feet away from your face. You kept telling the little voice in your head that you’re not going to jump on Akiza like a pervy freak-show. You then relax yourself as Akiza stands back up.

“There we go. So, ready for another movie?” Akiza asked.

“Of course.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Is There Love In The Air?

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
The two of you went through movie after movie in Akiza's little collection. It was a random mish-mash of various genres, from action to comedy. The only real highlight was during a slasher film where Akiza got scared enough to clutch into your arm. When that happened, you had to fight to make it seem like you didn't notice that her breasts were pushing against your arm.

It suprised you that Sayer had no need for either of you all day. You guessed it was because he was focusing on putting psychics in a positive light. Without his interruption, the two of them only stopped for meals, otherwise you spent the whole day in Akiza's room watching movies. Finally, the last movie Akiza chose was over.

"Well, that was fun." You say as you stretch and check the time. It was almost midnight. "Well, it's getting late. I think I'll head back to my room then. Goodnight Akiza."

You give her a pat on the shoulder as you start to leave, only for her to hug you from behind. "Goodnight." She releases you and begins to put the movies away while you close the door behind you.

Back in your room, you change into your nightwear and climb into bed. You were torn between whether or not you were hoping for another one of those dreams to happen tonight. You didn't dwell on it too much, however, as you soon found yourself out cold. Meanwhile, unknown to you, your Blue-Eyes began to glow, and across the sea, over the Satellite, the glyph of a giant hung in the sky.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Dark Times Ahead

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Yuten! Yuten, wake up!” Akiza said while getting you to wake up, which you did.

“Akiza? Do you have any idea what time it is?” You asked before you saw the glowing mark on her arm. “Akiza! Your arm!” You said.

“Yes. It was glowing just a couple of seconds ago.” Akiza said.

Before you could say anything else, you saw another glow in the corner of your eye and you looked to see that it’s your Blue-Eyes that is glowing as well.

“My Blue-Eyes White Dragon. He’s glowing too.” You said while picking up the card.

“But why is this happening?” Akiza wondered.

“I don’t know. But, it feels like it’s coming from outside. Come on.” You said as you got up and you and Akiza went to the balcony.

When you two got there, you looked up and were shocked to see a glyph of a giant looming in the sky.

“What the hell is that?” You wondered.

“I don’t know. But it’s huge.” Akiza said.

“Wait a second. Judging from the direction we’re looking at, it looks like it’s coming from the Satellite.” You figured out.

“Then I was right, it must be Yusei.” Akiza said.

“How would you know?” You wondered.

“I can’t really explain it well, but our marks seems to be linking us together. So I can sense when he’s in danger. He must be dueling over there” Akiza said.

“Probably against whoever put up the light show over there.” You said.

You took another glance at your glowing Blue-Eyes until you felt the same surge going through your body.

“Yuten? What’s wrong?” Akiza wondered.

Then, to her surprise, your eyes began to glow blue and you began to see things. You looked over and you can see Yusei dueling against whoever he’s facing off against in the same ginormous flaming giant you saw just now.

“I can see the duel. But why am I seeing this? And who’s Yusei dueling?” You thought in your mind.

The ground then began to shake like an earthquake and you looked up and see glowing orbs going into what appears to be a a giant beating heart. When it was done, you looked on in horror as you see what could be the biggest monster you have ever seen. It was in the form of a giant with blue linings on it and it was causing damage with it’s presence.

“What.....the absolute hell.......is that?!” You wondered in awe of this behemoth before you hear the other duelist talking.

“Earthbound Immortal Ccapac Apu! Pound this pathetic signer into the darkness!”

To your horror, that thing was going after Yusei. He tried everything he could to stop it, but he couldn’t as that giant was close to crushing him. Before it could even touch him, you see Yusei’s runner giving out and he was tumbling back words hard.

“YUSEI!!” You cries out seeing him fall.

Before anything else could happen, you can feel yourself coming back to Akiza as you gasped.

“Yuten? Are you okay?” Akiza asked you.

“I think so. But, I saw the duel and I think Yusei’s hurt pretty bad.” You said.

“I’ve got that feeling too.” Akiza said as her mark and the glow on Blue-Eyes disappeared.

The duel maybe over, for what it seems, but you have a feeling that the worse is yet to come as you went back to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Beginning of the End

choices: Head down for breakfast now and hope Akiza will join you
Check out the front lobby, see if there's any visitors
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You wake up, still a little groggy. Your thoughts go back to what happened with Yusei. Whoever that guy he was dueling was, he was certainly strong, with a strong monster to boot. It's possible that he was working with whoever was planning to destroy the city. For now though, you're still confined to headquarters, so you couldn't go help.

You get up and leave your room. As you exit, you see Akiza leaving her own room. "Hey Akiza. Want to head down for breakfast again?" You offer.

"I would like to, but right now I have a training duel scheduled by Sayer. Maybe once I'm done I'll try to join you, but for now, I'm busy." With that, she leaves. Well, looks like you'll be spending the morning alone. You were hoping to talk a little more about what happened last night, but it looks like that wasn't happening anytime soon.

What could you do until Akiza gets done?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Morning Alone

choices: calmed down and let it be for now
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You decided to just head down to the dining hall to have breakfast hoping that Akiza will join you before you’re finished. You go down, grabbed a plate and sit down at the table by yourself to eat.

After you finished eating, you see that Akiza still hasn’t shown up yet. You guessed that Sayer must be keeping her busy with her training.

“Oh well. I do have some thinking to do, anyway.” You thought in your head as you thrown away your trash.

You decided to think by walking around in the building alone. A lot has happened. The strange energy that you felt, the unknown enemy with the ginormous monster, and your friend, Yusei, could’ve been easily squashed like a bug on a windshield. You have a feeling that he’s still alive, which is good news for you. Now all that’s left is-.

“Are you feeling okay, Akiza?”

You heard a voice down the hall and you decided to check it out. It’s not right to eavesdrop, but you can’t help it when you heard Akiza’s name. You hide in the corner and you take a peek to see Akiza coming out of the elevator, only to be stopped by Sayer.

“I’m fine, Sayer.” Akiza said.

“Really? Because you looked rather distracted during your training. You can tell me what’s on your mind.” Sayer said to her.

“It’s just my lost to Yusei in the finals. That’s all. I’m trying to get my mind off of it. Okay?” Akiza said as she go on to leave.

“Is it? Because I think Yuten has finally got into that pretty head of yours.” Sayer said with a smirk on his face.

Akiza stopped when she heard that and you listened in carefully when you heard your name in the conversation.

“I’ve noticed that you two have gone closer than you were when he first arrived. Sounds romantic. But, pretty sad too, if you ask me. What? You think you’ll just have a normal life by giving him your heart? I don’t think so. To be fair, I think he’s becoming a distraction for you and that’s jeopardizing everything you and I worked so hard for. Just remember who saved you and what you represent.” Sayer said as Akiza left without saying anything.

When you heard the whole thing, you begin shaking with anger. He said that you’ve become a distraction to Akiza and she can’t have a normal life because of you? That’s just so wrong and it got you boiling.

You then
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Eavesdropping

No. Calm down. The last thing you or Akiza needs right now is for you to get into a psychic shouting match with Sayer. Right now, you just need to control yourself. You'll probably have to start sleeping with one eye open around Sayer now, though.

As you finish calming yourself down, you hear Sayer leave the hall. You weren't sure what to do now. You already decided that throwing down with Sayer was off the table, and you couldn't just run after Akiza, hug her and say he's lying without her knowing that you were eavesdropping.

Well, you didn't have to tell her about this. Maybe you could just hang out like before. Then again, who knows how deep Sayer's words cut in her. Maybe she just needs a little space for now.

You decide to simply give her a little time to cool off before you go looking for her. Neither of these pursuits bote any fruit. As you leave your room, you hear two guys talking.

New recruits, huh? Might be something you would like to check out.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Deep Breaths and Unexpected Guests

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You decided to go see who is dueling Sayer as you make your way to the training room. You made you’re way to the suite room so that you can watch the duel from a distance and you see Akiza when walked inside.

“Hey, Akiza. Hey,...” You stopped talking when you saw someone familiar. “Luna?!” You said.

“Yuten!” Luna said when she saw you.

“What in the world are you doing here?” You asked her.

You looked to see Sayer is about to duel a boy that looks just like Luna and you recognized him from the tournament.

“But he doesn’t have anything like that. Please, just let him go.” Luna pleaded.

You got uncomfortable with what’s going on here as you watched the duel. They were talking while they’re dueling, but you can’t hear anything at all. Mostly, because of the glass that’s likely sound proof. You can see Leo trying to fight on, but Sayer has the edge on this duel. You can see the pain in Leo’s eyes and it got you worried.

“Uh, Akiza? Don’t you think Sayer’s getting carried away with this test?” You wondered.

“That’s how he does with his students sometimes.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. But this looks rather extreme to test on a kid. Don’t you think?” You asked again.

“Perhaps. But, he does run this place and what he say, goes.” Akiza said.

She does have a point. Still, you don’t have a good feeling about it.

When the duel was over, Leo was knocked out cold by Sayer’s last attack. This is getting a bit out of hand as you decided to
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Sayer’s “Extreme” Test

choices: Let Akiza finish then talk to Luna when she leaves
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After the duel, Leo was rushed to medical care and placed in a room with Luna right next door. "It's not right." You say as you both walk down to see them. "They're just kids. They shouldn't have to stay here if they don't want to."

"That's exactly why they should join us. Do you remember how young you said you were when your parents abandoned you? How long did you walk the streets of Domino alone because you were different? We can give them a place to call home before they come to know that pain." She responds.

"But the boy doesn't even have any powers. That duel proved it and his own sister says so."

"She's probably just afraid of us and thinks she's protecting him. Besides, it's not our place to separate the two." The two of you arrive at Luna's room.

"Akiza... Yuten." She says as you walk in. You take a seat on the bed while Akiza stands next to Luna and the two begin to talk.

"Your brother is going to be okay."

"What do you people want?" Luna asks.

"Sayer thought that your brother had the powers of a psychic duelist, so he wanted to test him out." Akiza answers.

"Leo doesn't have psychic anything. I'm the one with the crazy powers, let Leo go." Luna pleads.

"You and your brother don't need to be afraid of us, Luna. The movement helps people that have been more or less ditched by the rest of the world."

"What do you mean? We haven't been ditched by anyone."

"When did you last see your parents? They know there's something different about you and that scares them, so they don't come around much. Eventually the rest of the world will find out and treat you the same way, you know this. That's why you refuse to leave your house."

You couldn't believe Akiza was acting like she already knew everything about these kids. Sure, she had it rough, and so did you, but that didn't give either of you the right to project how you feel onto these innocent kids. Maybe you should do something.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Captive Twins

choices: spot a cleaning lady....sneaking into Sayer’s office?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Without the Movement, you’ll go through the same drama that me and Yuten went through. And trust me, you don’t want that.” Akiza finished before she goes on to leave the room.

You didn’t have the heart to go and confront her about this whole situation. Instead, you let her leave after she finishes talking to Luna so you can take your turn.

“Hey. I’m sorry about your brother. Like she said, he’s going to be fine.” You said trying to cheer Luna up, which was only little success. “Luna? You didn’t come all the way here just so you could find a home, did you?” You wondered.

“No.” Luna answered.

“Then why are you here?” You asked.

“We just want you and Akiza’s help to fight off against the Dark Signers. We didn’t ask for this.” Luna said.

Dark Signers? She must be referring to the ones like that one duelist who summoned that monstrosity in his duel with Yusei last night. So, they were only here for assistance? Then what was the purpose of that duel?

“If you come here for help, then the duel Leo had with Sayer wasn’t really in your agenda, was it?” You guessed.

“No. We were with him just a couple of hours ago having lunch with him. But then, we all passed out. When I woke up, I see Akiza standing next to the window where Leo was dueling Sayer before you came in.” Luna finished.

After what you just heard, you now have the thought that there might be a motive behind Sayer’s purpose of that duel, if not about the whole organization.

“Luna, I’m gonna go. I need you to stay here. Okay?” You said before leaving.

“Where are you going?” Luna asked you.

“To my “meeting” with Sayer.” You said before you left the room.

You looked around the building hoping that you can find Sayer and talk to him about what he’s going to do with the kids.

Eventually, you
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Alone Talk With Luna

choices: Luna and Leo couldn't have come alone. Try to find the others
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You walk down to Sayer's office, ready to give him a piece of your mind about what he's doing with Luna and Leo. When you reach his office, you find that the door is wide open, peeking inside, you see what seems to be a cleaning woman standing inside mumbling to herself. Something seemed odd about her... at least, as odd as things can get when Sayer is involved. She seems like she shouldn't be here.

Deciding to nip this in the bud, you decide to get her attention. "Hey!" You call out, making her jump. "Who are you? You don't seem like you belong here."

"N-no, I belong here. I'm the cleaning lady. I fill in for the fill-in when she's too..." She rambles on.

"Stop." You say, silencing her. "Look, I don't know who you are or why you're actually in Sayer's office, but right now, he's not exactly my favorite person. So, I'm not going to report you or try to stop you. But if you get caught, I'm not covering for you. Got it?" She nods in response.

"Good." You turn to leave. "By the way, if what you're doing hurts people besides Sayer, I will find you, and it will not be a pleasant time." With that, you leave and head for the elevator.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Give the Mouse Some Cheese

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You made it to the elevator and you go down near the lobby. You have a feeling that Akiza maybe down there and she could be with Sayer. You just hoped that what you’re going to talk about with him doesn’t upset her. Sayer maybe a jackass, but he’s the only one who gave Akiza a home when no one else would. But, you decided to take that risk as you’re going to have to take as you got off the elevator.

“Okay. Akiza has to be around here somewhere.” You thought in your mind as you go look for her.

But your search was halted when you felt an earthquake just happening as you went down on your knees.

“What the? What’s going on?!” You said out loud.

You then see the glow on your deck and you checked to see that it’s your Blue-Eyes that’s glowing. This could only mean one thing, something drastic is about to concur.

“Looks like Sayer’s going to have to wait.” You said to yourself before you get up.

You rushed down the halls hoping that Akiza’s okay. You looked and see that she’s indeed alright as you go up to her.

“Akiza!” You called out to her.

“Yuten?” Akiza said when she saw you.

“Are you alright?” You asked.

“I’m fine. But what are you doing here?” Akiza wondered.

“I need to talk to Sayer.” You answered.

“If this is about the kids...”

“I just need to know 100% of what he’s going to do with them. Where is he anyhow?” You wondered.

“He was with me before we got separated. He said that he needs to take care of a rodent problem.” Akiza said.

Rodent problem? Aw crap! He must’ve found out about that girl that’s sneaking in his office. It’s too late to help her now.

“Be as it may, this is getting dangerous. We better get out of here before things get worse.” You stated.

“I’m not just going to leave my home, Yuten!” Akiza argued.

“Good. Because you’re not going to be leaving at all.”

“Who’s there?” You said as you and Akiza looked to see who it was.

You both see a female with long black hair wearing a bright green dress with a small white jacket along with a necklace and a gem on her head.

“Wait! I know you. You’re that model.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. I know that face too. Misty right?” You guessed.

“I see that my reputation precedes me.” Misty said.

“Well, what are you doing here?” You wondered.

“I’ve come for some answers and you’re going to give them to me if you know what’s good for you. Now tell me where is my brother?” Misty demanded.

“Your brother?” You and Akiza said at the same time.

“Yes and I want you to tell me now, Black Rose.” Misty said.

“But I don’t know him. Why do you think I do?” Akiza said.

“Enough lies. I want answers and I want them now, Ms. Akiza. Your group the Arcadia Movement stole him from me. So, answer me this one last time. Where is my brother?” Misty asked starting to become more demanding.

“Look, Misty. We’re not sure what you’re deal here is, but I think this is a complete misunderstanding for we don’t know anything about this missing brother of yours.” You said.

“Is that so? Well then, if you won’t give me the answers willingly, then I’ll just have to duel them out of you.” Misty said.

“Fine. Let’s go.” Akiza said standing her ground.

“Are you sure you want to do this?” You asked Akiza.

“Well, it’s obvious that she won’t leave until she gets what she wants.” Akiza said.

“Your witch of a girlfriend is right, my friend. And, to tell you the truth, I was hoping it would come to this. This duel would be the perfect test of the new abilities I’ve been offered. Do not let my perfect face fool you for I am a Dark Signer that is ready to send you to the Netherworld!” Misty said.

“You’re a Dark Signer?!” You and Akiza gasped.

Misty was telling the truth as you see a purple mark of a lizard on her arm and she was going through some sort of transformation. While Akiza’s mark and your dragon was reacting to this, you see her now wearing a different dress only with black robes with green lines on it. You also see her have markings underneath her eyes and those same eyes are as black as the night.

“So that’s what a Dark Signer looks like.” You thought in your head.

“Prepare yourself, Black Rose, for my deck will force the truth right out of you.” Misty said with a little anger as another earthquake happened.

When it stopped, you wondered on what you should do about this.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Confronting A Dark Signer

choices: Go find Sayer like she asked
Screw Sayer, you need to evacuate the building
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Alright then Misty, if it's a duel you want, then it's a duel you'll get." You say as you activate your duel disk. Akiza puts her arm in front of you.

"No. She came into my home and challenged me and only me." She walks over to the wall and gets her own duel disk out. "So this is personal."

"Good thinking Akiza. Wouldn't want your boyfriend getting hurt because of you again, now would you?" Misty taunts, making Akiza wince at the thought of your injuries at her hand. "Besides, I'm only here for the signer, anyway. You are free to leave as you wish."

"Like hell I will. I'm not just going to leave her behind for my own good."

"Yuten, listen to me. I can handle her. Go find Sayer and tell him that the Dark Signers are attacking the Arcadia Movement. He'll know what to do." Akiza says.

"You sure Akiza?"

"Positive. Now go." Hearing that serious tone in her voice, you know she means it. You run off and leave Akiza to her duel.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: One on One

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You run around the building hoping to find Sayer before it’s too late. You may not like him as much as you used to, but you doubt that Akiza would ever forgive you if anything happens to him. Besides, in a situation like this, you’re going to need all the help you can get, including Sayer’s. So, you pushed those thoughts about him aside for the greater good. You made it to his office and tried to opened it, only to find the doors locked.

“Damn it! It’s locked! In that case,.” You said as you karate kicked the door open and you run inside. “Sayer! Are you in here?” You called out.

“Yuten? Is that you?” Sayer said.

“Sayer! The Dark Signers are here and..”

You stopped talking as you see someone else in the room too. You looked to see a girl with dark green hair while wearing the same black robe like Misty does, only with orange linings this time, as well to see her eyes are dark as well. You took a closer look and you see that she looks familiar.

“Ah. It’s you again.” The girl said evilly.

“You...you’re that girl from before.” You said.

“Do you know her?” Sayer wondered.

“I’ll explain later. As for you, I didn’t took a hint that you’re a Dark Signer.” You said to the girl.

“Then you should probably work on your instincts better, now would you?” The girl taunts you.

“Why are you here?” You asked.

“Payback. For it was him that send me to my doom and he sent me out that window.” The girl said pointing at the broken window.

“You did what?!” You said in shock to Sayer.

“It’s not what it looks like.” Sayer said.

“Well, nonetheless, I’m here to send you tumbling like you did to me. So let’s do this.” The Dark Signer said.

You have a feeling that Sayer was doing something drastic behind the scenes. Still, you can’t let him get pushed around by this Dark Signer. So, it’s best to work with the devil you know than the devil you don’t.

“Alright then, if that what you want, then..huh?”

Sayer then sees you coming up towards him only to turn around and facing this Dark Signer while activating your duel disk.

“I’m not sure what the big idea here is, but it’s obvious what your intentions are. So, you want him? You got to get through me first.” You challenged.

“If that’s what you want, then so be it.” The Dark Signer said ready to duel.

“Sayer, you need to go. I’ve got this.” You said as Sayer nodded before he left. “Before we begin, what’s your name?” You asked.

“You may call me Carly.” Carly introduced herself.

“Well, Carly, I told you that if you do anything that harms anyone, our next meeting won’t be a pleasant one.” You said.

“My thoughts exactly.” Carly said.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Carly: 4000
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: More Trouble Coming

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Before we start this little duel properly, are you sure you want to throw your life away for Sayer? You even said you couldn't care about him. Plus, you were nice enough to not blow the whistle on me. If you back down now, I'll let you go and maybe I can catch up with Sayer to get my revenge." Carly offers.

"Sorry Carly, but Akiza wants him safe, so I'm going to protect him. Besides, you Dark Signers are planning to destroy the world, so I need to stop you." You retort.

"Very well then. I tried to save you, but now prepare for the Netherworld. I'll start. I draw. I'll start by playing the field spell Future Visions. Next I'll summon Fortune Lady Light to the field in attack mode."

FLL: 200 ATK

"But don't get used to her, because my field spell, she's getting sent one turn into the future." Her monster pops away in a ball of light. “And with her gone, her ability also allows me to summon a Fortune Lady from my deck. I choose Fortune Lady Wind.”

FLW: 900 ATK

“Then I'll place one card face down and end my turn."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Carly goes first

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I draw now.” You drew your card.

“That field spell of hers is going to be a pain. From the looks of it, any monster that is normal summoned will be removed from play once they hit the field. Well then, let’s try this on for size.” You thought.

“I summon Kaiser Vorse Rader in attack mode.”

KVR: 1900

“A level 5 monster summoned like that?” Carly wondered.

“That’s right. He can be special summoned to the field when I have no monsters out. Which means your field spell won’t be sending him anywhere. Now attack her Fortune Lady Wind!” You commanded.

“I play the trap Shadow Spell. Now your monster can no longer attack me while he’s chained up. Not to mention that he loses 700 points.”

KVR: 1900 - 1200 ATK

“Damn. Alright, I’ll end with this face down.”
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Trying On A New Approach

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Then it's my turn. I draw." She looks at her hand and back to you. "Tell me Yuten, why are you doing this? You said that you're protecting Sayer because Akiza wants him safe, but isn't it selfish of her to tell you to throw your life on the line for another man?" She asks

"It would be if she actually told me to do that, but she never did. I'm doing this because I know how heartbroken she would be if he got sent to the Netherworld and could've stopped it. Now are you going to take your turn or not?" You retort.

"Very well then, since you insist. Since it's the standby phase, Fortune Lady Light returns to my field. Also, both of my Fortune Ladies gain one level, and Light gets two hundred attack and defense points for each level, while Wind gets three hundred."

FLL: 400 ATK
FLW: 1200 ATK

"Now, Fortune Lady Wind, attack that Kaiser Vorse Raider." In a whirlwind, her monster attacks yours, destroying both, as well as her trap. "Now Lady Light, attack Yuten directly." While you had a face-down, a four hundred attack monster isn't worth it. You let her beam of light hit you.

You: 3600

"Now I'll release Lady Light to summon Fortune Lady Dark from my hand."

FLD: 2000 ATK

"But due to Future Visions, she has to go one turn into the future. For now, I'll place two cards face down and end my turn."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Poor Fortune

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“It’s my move.” You draw your next card. “I play the spell Pot of Greed. Guess that’s two cards for me. But the drawing doesn’t end there. Next, I play Trade-In. I discard a level 8 monster that is in my hand so that I can draw two extra cards from my deck once again.” You said as you draw your cards.

“There is no amount of cards in your deck that can save you.” Carly said.

“Oh yeah? Well, can you back up your words after me playing this? The spell card, Ancient Rules. With this, I can special summon a level 5 or higher monster from my hand straight to the field as long as it’s a normal monster.” You said.

The air around you was blown over and Carly has to cover her face. She was also surprised to see your eyes going blue as you go on to summon your monster.

**********

Meanwhile, Akiza was having a little trouble with Misty in her duel until she sees her mark glowing brightly.

“Yuten.” Akiza said.

“Hey, Akiza. Pay attention!” Misty said sending Akiza back into the duel.

**********

“My arm. It feels like it’s Yuten.” Luna said as her mark was glowing while she sits next to her brother in the other room.

**********

“What in the world?” Jack said as his mark was glowing too.

**********

“My mark is reacting. It must be Yuten. But why?” Yusei said seeing his mark shining on his arm too.

**********

“And now, say hello to my Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” You said as your ace monster shows itself with his presence and let loose a roar.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“Ah. So this is the legendary Blue-Eyes White Dragon that you used at the tournament. I feel honored to face such a tremendous beast.” Carly said.

“Well, it’s too bad that he doesn’t feel the same way. But he’s the least of your problems. Because I now activate Monster Reborn. This allows me to bring back one monster from either graveyard to my side of the field. So tell me, if you think one Blue-Eyes is impressive, then how about two?” You said as you now have a second Blue-Eyes joining you.

“Two Blue-Eyes huh? Not bad.” Carly said smirking at your dragons.

“Yes and this will bring you down a peg or two. Blue-Eyes number one, direct attack with White Lightning!”
