So let's count it out, shall we? Three dragons, plus your field spell, plus your face-down equals...?" Ren rants.

"That's five cards, so multiply that by three hundred and that's... fifteen hundred points of damage!" Leo answers.

"We have a winner! Blood Mefist, show my brother the grand prize." A stream of dark energy shoots out from his monster's staff, scorching you slightly as you scream in pain.

You: 2500

"Shoot, are you okay? I thought you had a thing that damped our powers." Ren calls out.

"It's still in development. Right now it's keeping us from blasting this penthouse down into the Daimon area and will keep us both conscious, but we still feel the damage." You reveal.

"I'm ending this now then. I won't continue like this." Ren says as he reaches to turn off his duel disk.

"No! It's fine. Compared to the dark signers, that was nothing." You tell him as you get back up.

"The dark who?" He asks.

"Later. For now, it's still my turn." He knows his monster is weaker than mine, but he still put it in attack mode. That means those face-downs are something to stop me. I'll have to start there.

"I'll start by activating a spell card, Card of Consonance. Now I'll send White Stone of Legend to my graveyard to draw two more cards, plus I get to add another Blue-Eyes to my hand thanks to White Stone going to the graveyard." You draw your three cards.

"Next I'll play the spell Stamping Destruction. Now I can destroy one spell or trap card on the field, then deal five hundred points of damage to it's controller, and I think I'll choose the one on the left." The card is destroyed and the damage is done.

Ren: 3500

"Now Blue Eyes, destroy Blood Mefist."

"Not so fast. I activate my face-down, Negate Attack. Now your dragon's attack is stopped and your battle phase ends." Your monster's beam is stopped dead in its tracks.

"Fine then, since my Blue-Eyes' aren't able to attack this turn, I can activate this, Burst Stream of Destruction, and use it to destroy all monsters on your field." You announce. Ren's monster is destroyed. "That's it for me."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Dark Burning

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“And it all comes back to me.” Ren draws his card. “First I play Pot of Greed to draw two cards from my deck. But the drawing doesn’t end there because I’m activating Graceful Charity. This will allow to draw three cards this time only I have to discard two of them to the graveyard.” Ren got his cards and discarded two before he sees what he got in store for you. “Get ready, Yuten. Because you’re in for a real treat.” Ren said.

“Is that so? Well then, show me what you got.” You said.

“Be careful what you wished for because it just might come true. Now, I’m not sure that you’re familiar with this, but there are certain monsters that goes by the title of Dark Counterparts.” Ren said.

“Dark Counterparts?” You said with confusion.

“What are those?” Leo wondered.

“I’ve actually read about these monsters. They represent the dark side of any monster in existence of the game. They’re very rare to find.” Akiza said.

“She guessed it. Now allow me to show you one of them. I can only summon this monster when I have five or more dark monsters in my graveyard while I have no monsters on my field. Since I do have those requirements, I can now summon this. The Dark Creator in defense mode!” Ren said.

TDC: 3000 DEF

“That’s a Dark Counterpart huh? Not bad man.” You complimented.

“Well, wait to you see what it can do. Once a turn, I can remove a dark monster from my graveyard from play so that I can summon another dark monster from my graveyard straight to the field. You think your Blue-Eyes got me by surprise? Time for me to surprise you. I’ll remove my Dark General Freed in order to summon this! The Red-Eyes Black Dragon!” Ren said.

“Say what?!” You gasped in shock as his dragon came into play.

REBD: 2400 ATK

“Impossible!” Akiza said in shock.

“No way!” Luna said.

“You’ve got to be kidding me!” Leo said next.

“Where did you get that?!” You asked your older brother.

“You shouldn’t worry about that right now. Next, I’ll equip my Red-Eyes with Fighting Spirit. This will give him three hundred attack points for every monster on your field. Since you have three, that’s nine hundred points.” Ren said.

REBD: 3300 ATK

“Now destroy his Azure-Eyes with Inferno Fire Blast!” Your dragon got destroyed. But you didn’t loose points.

REBD: 3000 ATK

“Had enough yet?” Ren asks.

“Nope.” You said.

“Thought so. I’ll end with this card face down. Let’s see what else you got up your sleeve, little brother.” Ren said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren's Own Surprise

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I've got plenty." You say as you draw your card. "And I'll show you by activating the effect of the Rider of Storm Winds in my hand. I can equip this card from my hand right onto one normal monster on my field, and I choose Blue-Eyes number one."

A small man appears on your dragon's back. "With him equipped, any time Blue-Eyes attacks a monster in defense mode and it has fewer defense points than his attack points, you take the difference as damage. Now, Blue-Eyes number one, attack Red-Eyes Black Dragon with White Lightning!"

Your dragon fires his attack, only for his to do the same. The two collide into a massive explosion. "Sorry little brother, but since Red-Eyes was equipped with Fighting Spirit, I can protect him from being destroyed by battle as long as I destroy Fighting Spirit instead." You hear Ren say from through the smoke.

"Funny you should say that, because if a monster equipped with Rider of Storm Winds would be destroyed, the rider is destroyed instead." You shout back. The smoke clears, and sure enough, both dragons stood tall, with both equips being destroyed instead.

REBD: 2400 ATK

"And now, Blue-Eyes number two will destroy Red-Eyes. Attack!" Your second beast fires, destroying Ren's monster.

Ren: 2900

"I'll end my turn with that."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Just Like Old Times

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Bothersome dragons.” Ren sighed as he draws his card. “First off, I’ll use Dark Creator’s effect so that I can remove my Red-Eyes from my graveyard from play in order to summon my Fiend Megacyber back to the field.” Ren said.

TFM: 2200 ATK

“What the? Why would he get rid of a strong monster for a weaker one?” Leo wondered.

”I agree. Unless...” You thought with suspicion.

“After that, by placing one card from my hand back on top of my deck, I can summon my Plaguespreader Zombie back on to the field as well.” Ren said.

PZ: 400 ATK

“Only draw back is that the next time that this card leaves the field, it’ll be removed from play. But that’s okay. Because with these monsters, I can synchro summon again. This time, you’ll meet my ace in the hole.” Ren said.

“Your ace? Well, by all means, show him to me.” You said.

“You ask for this, Yuten. Now watch as I tune my Plaguespreader Zombie with my Fiend Megacyber in order to synchro summon my best monster. Beelze of the Diabolic Dragons!” Ren said as a big evil looking twin-headed dragon appeared before you.

BotDD: 3000 ATK

“What is that?” Leo said feeling afraid of the dragon before him.

“I’m scared.” Luna said.

“It’s okay, you two. Trust me.” Akiza said comforting the twins.

“Woah!” You said looking on at your brother’s best beast.

“Impressive, isn’t he? But I’m done just there. I activate Card of Santity. Now we each draw cards from our decks until we each have six cards in our hands.” Ren said as you both draw your cards. “Then I’ll play Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy your field spell.” Your field spell then got blown away.

“Well, that sucks.” You said.

“Now then, let’s begin, shall we? Beelze, take out one of his Blue-Eyes!” Ren commanded.

“He’s lost it!” You said as you noticed that both of your dragons have the same attack, meaning that they’ll both be destroyed.

That’s what you thought as Blue-Eyes is no more. But, when the smoke cleared up, you see Beelze still standing.

“What?! He’s still on the field?” You said in disbelief.

“That’s right. Thanks to his special ability, he’s indestructible. Meaning that he can’t be destroyed by battle or by card effects.” Ren said.

“Then how is Yuten going to take it down?” Leo asked.

“I don’t think he can.” Luna said.

”Come on, Yuten.” Akiza thought with worry.

“I think that’ll do for now. I end my turn.” Ren said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren's Boss Monster Shows Himself

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hahahahaha!" You laugh.

"What's so funny?" Ren asks.

"I'll admit bro, this dragon of yours would be tough to beat normally, but I have just the thing to do it." You call out.

"Oh yeah? Then let's see it."

"With pleasure. I draw. I'll start by activating the Silver's Cry spell card, letting me special summon one normal dragon-type monster from my graveyard. Come on back Blue-Eyes number two."

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Next I'll activate my own Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy your face-down." His card is destroyed, yet he seems unphased. Time to change that. "Now it's time for the big guns. I activate the spell card Polymerization to fuse the two Blue-Eyes on my field with the one in my hand to fusion summon Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon in attack mode."

BEUD: 4500 ATK

"No way!" Leo screams.

"It's huge!" Luna says with fear in her voice.

"You know the old saying two heads are better than one, well three are better than two. Now my mighty beast, attack Ren's Beezle!" You command. With all three heads opening their mouths and firing their own blasts, Ren's dragon stands strong, but not his life points.

Ren: 1400

"Nice shot brother, but my dragon still stands, and thanks to his second ability, since I took damage from a battle involving him, he gains attack points equal to the damage I took." Ren explains.

BotDD: 4500 ATK

"That may be. Too bad it doesn't matter because I'm ending this duel with one last attack this turn with my Fusion Ring trap card. Now since my monster couldn't destroy yours in battle, he's allowed to attack again with double the power." You reveal.

"Double?!?!?!"

BEUD: 9000 ATK

"One last time Blue-Eyes, attack. End this." With one final attack, the dragon still stands, but Ren takes a huge hit as he loses the duel.

Ren: 0000
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ultimate Attack

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Ren sits up after getting knocked down and he sees you coming up and extending your hand to help him up. He took it and you lifted him up back on to his feet.

“Well, I won. That means that I’m going with you.” You said.

“I supposed so. You did earned it. But, this will be dangerous. You sure you want to do this?” Ren asked.

“I ain’t going to let my bro go alone, am I?” You said with a smile.

“Then we better get started.” Ren said.

“Hold it. If he’s going, I’m coming too.” Akiza said.

“Look, I-.” You interrupted Ren.

“Trust me. She’s got skill. Plus, she won’t take no for an answer.” You whispered.

“Okay fine. Follow me.” Ren said.

He then shows you the picture of the place that the missing psychics could be held in on his phone.

“This is what the facility’s like.” Ren said.

“By the looks of it, it may have strong security measures to keep those kids from escaping and to make sure that no one gets in.” You said.

“This look difficult to get inside.” Akiza said.

“Not unless we have more help.” You said.

“More help?” Ren wondered.

“We know some people that can help. All we need is one phone call.” You said.

The twins was put to sleep as you walked outside with your phone on. Before you could call up, you see Ren standing outside with you.

“You sure they can help?” Ren asked.

“I’m definitely sure.” You said as you see Ren looking at Akiza sleeping on the couch.

“You really love that girl a lot, don’t you, bro?” Ren asked you.

“More than you know. She’s the most precious girl in the world and there is no way I would want to let her go.” You said.

“Touching. So, mom and dad, do you really believe that they want me back?” Ren asked again.

“I wouldn’t be here if I hadn’t.” You said.

“True. Listen, I’m sorry for not being there for you when you were younger. If I had known, maybe I would’ve protected you.” Ren apologized.

“Nothing like the present, right?” You said.

“Got that right.” Ren said as you two went for a brotherly hug. “One more thing, did you and her did it yet?” Ren asked slyly.

POW!!

That was the sound of you punching him in the gut for that remark.

“Okay. I deserved that.” Ren said in pain after that punch. “Got to say, you have one hell of a punch there.” Ren said.

“I had some physical training while working on my strategies.” You said.

“So I see. But seriously, you two go so well together. If she becomes my sister-in-law, I don’t mind at all.” Ren said.

“Let’s not jump the gun, Ren. But thanks.” You said.

“You bet bro.” Ren said.

“You know, we have room in the movement. We could really have you around.” You said.

“I’m not so sure about that.” Ren said.

“You don’t have to if you don’t want to. I’ll leave that decision to you.” You said.

“I’ll think about it. Later.” Ren said before leaving.

You then dialed up the phone to call
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Planning The Break-In and Brotherly Talk

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hey Mina, I need a favor." You say as you hear her pick up.

"Yuten? Is that you? Do you have any idea how late it is?" She asks.

"I know. But I've got something you might want to hear. I've found my brother." You tell her.

"That's great. Glad I could help and all, but couldn't this wait until morning?" She wonders.

"Not quite, because after we met him, he told us that he might have a lead on where the missing psychic children are being held." You explain.

"Really?! That's great news. But I thought Sayer said that not even he knew where they are?" She ponders.

"I'm not sure myself, but he seems cinfident that we can at least find one kid there. I called to ask for your help."

"Where are you right now?"

"Leo and Luna's home in the Tops." You tell her.

"I'll be there right away." She says as she hangs up, letting you go back inside.

"Well?" Ren asks.

"Backup is on it's way. You think this place has any staff? They might listen to me if I tell them what's happened since Sayer last called." You bring up.

"Doubtful. Even if Sayer put people here, they were likely his most trusted members. No way will they just hand over these kids." Ren answers. Finally, Mina shows up in a...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Mina to the Rescue

choices: duct system that you can use
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see Mina in her squad car and you wake Akiza up before all three of you went downstairs to her vehicle. When you all got in, you all made your way to the place that Ren told you where. It’s going to be a long journey to get there and a tough one too. You just don’t know what to expect.

“Thanks for coming, Mina.” You said.

“My pleasure. So you must be Ren.” Mina said turning to your brother.

“I am.” Ren said.

“So how did you find out about these places?” Mina wondered.

“I did some nightly work after my shifts as a bodyguard because I had a feeling that Sayer may have something to do with it. It took me a while, but I managed to find this one facility. That’s about it.” Ren said.

“I just hope we can Toby there too.” Akiza said.

“Me too.” You said.

“Who’s Toby?” Ren asked Akiza.

“He’s one of the missing children and he’s the brother of a friend of ours, Misty.” Akiza said.

“Ain’t she that supermodel chick?” Ren wondered.

“The very same.” You said.

“That’s why we’re going in and get him and everyone else home.” Akiza said as you all nodded.

“How come you know it where Sayer doesn’t?” Mina wondered.

“Either he lied or he had someone else working on it without revealing its location.” You figured it out.

“Either way, he’s got men guarding the place. So we need to be sharp.” Ren said.

“Guys. I think this is the place.” Mina said.

You all looked to see a regular sized building. You were expected to be more than that.

“Doesn’t look like much.” Akiza said.

“Let me try something.” You said.

You placed your hand on the ground and focused your powers to find the kids and you did.

“They’re underground. This place must served as a way down like an elevator.” You said.

“How did you do that?” Ren asked.

“Sensed their psychic power level. Took me a while to use it properly.” You said.

“I’ll have squadron coming in from a distance in case things might go south.” Mina said.

“Thanks. Also, can you have someone pick up our runners from the tops back to the movement for us?” You asked her.

“Of course. And guys, be careful.” Mina said before she gets to a safe distance.

“You two have runners?” Ren asked.

“How else did we got to the tops building?” You asked back.

“Oh.” Ren said.

“So how so we get inside?” Akiza wondered.

“We can’t bust in. That’ll raise the alarm.” Ren said.

You looked around and see a
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Rescue Operation On The Way

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You look around the entrance of the building to try and see any other way in. On one of the walls, you see an odd divot that seems out of place on the relatively smooth wall. You reach down and slide your fingers across it before pulling on it a little, and to your surprise, it began to go up like a garage door. "Hey, give me a hand with this." You whisper to the others.

They both run over to help,and with all three of you lifting together, you rose the door up. On the other side, you see a long flight of stairs heading down. "Let's go." Ren says as he leads the group down.

"So what's the plan here?" Akiza asks.

"Find the kids, get out with as many as possible, then call Mina and have Security swarm this place. Everything in-between we'll improvise." You answer. Your group reaches the bottom of the stairs. There you see a shocking sight.

Prison cells, one after another, in a hallway as long as headquarters is tall. Shaking off the thoughts of children being held here, you press on.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Hidden Holding Cells

choices: You found the control room with no problem
You found the control room and trouble!
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You three sneaked your way into the hall of cells while remaining hidden from any guard that is down here. As you guys make your way down, you can hear moaning just down the hall. You three make your way there and see a boy sitting in his cell.

“That’s Toby!” Akiza whispered.

“Huh? Who’s there?” Toby asked.

“Toby, it’s me.” Akiza said as you three approached his cell.

“Akiza? What are you doing here?” Toby wondered.

“To get you out. By the way, this is Yuten and Ren. They’re here to help.” Akiza introduced you two.

“We’ll have you out in a jiffy.” You said as Ren looks on at the code pad to his cell.

“Toby, your sister, Misty, really misses you. When we’re out of here, we’ll get you back to her.” Akiza said.

“Really?” Toby said.

“Yes. Also, I’m sorry that I was mean to you when you first came.” Akiza apologized to Toby.

“That’s okay. You coming to save me is the best apology I can get.” Toby said as Akiza nodded with a smile.

“Bad news guys. I can’t get this lock open. Too many codes.” Ren said.

“Is there another way to open these things?” You asked Toby.

“I heard one of the guards saying that there’s a control room somewhere in here. I think you can use it to open the cells.” Toby said.

“Where’s the control room?” Akiza asked.

“I’m not sure.” Toby said.

“If I had to take a guess, I’d say the center of the facility.” You figured it out.

“Good observation. Let’s get there and free these kids.” Ren said.

“We’ll be back for you. I promise.” Akiza said to Toby who nodded.

You three make your way into finding the control room hoping that can help you with opening the cells.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Finding Toby

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"This must be it." You whisper to the others as you approach a door. Ren peaks inside the tiny window on the door, trying hard to not be seen.

"Looks like there's only one guy in there. If we rush in quick we can grab him before he raises an alarm." He says.

"Wait, I've always wanted to try this." You say as you crouch walk up to the door. Peeking through the window to see what you're doing, you make a choking motion with your hand as you focus your powers on the guard. He clutches at his throat as he's lifted off the ground and pulled towards the door.

Once he was close enough, Ren quickly opened the door and knocked him out before turning back to you. "You got that from a movie didn't you?" He asks.

"Does that make it any less cool?" You ask, ignoring the context behind this moment for a second before getting serious once again. "Alright, look around. We need to find the way to free the captives, and I doubt they'll just have a big red "open cell doors" button."

"Uhh, Yuten..." You hear Akiza say. You turn to see that she's pointing to a button that says exactly that.

"Huh... well I'll be." You say as you hit the button. On the security feed, you see the door to Toby and ther others' cell open. "Alright, let's go."

The three of you run back to the kids' cell. Ren grabs Toby and leads the charge back up the stairway with you and Akiza bringing up the rear behind the kids.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Freedom!

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Mina! We got the kids! Bring your men in!” You said while running on out of there.

“Understood.” Mina said on the other side.

You all made it out and you see Security moving in to swarm the place. While that was going on, you bring the kids to some vans where they’ll have a safe ride home while anyone that was working down there as a guard was arrested. Also, you and the others were standing outside with Mina.

“Well done, guys. You just solved one of New Domino City’s biggest mysteries.” Mina complimented you three.

“That mostly goes to Ren here. We would’ve never found the place if it wasn’t for him.” You said patting your brother on the back.

“Ah. Come on now.” Ren said with a smile.

“Ma’am. You might want to see this.” An officer said to Mina as he shows him a list.

“I-I don’t believe this! It’s a list of the locations of the other facilities like this one!” Mina said in disbelief.

“That means you’re a giant step closer from shutting this case close.” You said.

“I’ll have this ready tomorrow. Ready for a ride home?” Mina offered.

You all nodded and you made it to the Arcadia Movement. Ren decided to stay for the night and you agreed. Morning came and you, Akiza, and Ren are standing out at the front with Toby as a limo came by. When it opened, you three see Misty walking out of the limo and was so emotional to see her little brother in front of her.

“Toby.” Misty said.

“Misty!” Toby said as he ran up to hug his sister, who is emotionally crying right now.

“I’ve miss you so much.” Misty said.

“Me too.” Toby said.

Misty then turned her attention to the three of you.

“Thank you. You saved my brother. I’m forever thankful.” Misty said.

“Glad we can help. Oh yeah. This is my brother, Ren. He’s the one that found the place Toby was held in.” You said.

“Pleasure to meet you.” Ren said.

“You too. Thank you so much.” Misty said as she goes to him and hugs him, which has him stunned while you smiled on.

You then see her giving out her card that has her number to Ren.

“Think of this as a thank you present. Call me if you want to hangout sometime.” Misty said.

“Uh, sure.” Ren said while blushing a bit.

“Well, I think we should get home now. Mom and dad will be surprised to see you.” Misty said.

“Let’s go then.” Toby said as he and Misty drove home.

“Wow! You got the number from the supermodel. Someone is getting lucky already.” You teased.

“Oh shut up.” Ren said still blushing while you and Akiza chuckled at him. “You know, after seeing that, I think I need to do some reuniting too.” Ren said.

“Are you thinking what I’m thinking?” You wondered as Ren nodded.

You three made it to the house your parents are living in and Ren took a deep breath before knocking on the door. You parents answered and were stunned with joy to see him as they hugged him. You smiled on with Akiza as this maybe the most happiest moment you have ever seen in your life. After the moment passed, you walked up over to Ren to say something.

“Ren, my offer to stay at the movement is still there for you. We have plenty of room.” You said.

“Thanks, Yuten. But, I think I’m going to stay with Mom and Dad for a while.” Ren said.

“Are you sure? You’re more than welcome to stay there if you want to.” Your mom said.

“I’m sure. After all, we have years of catching up to work on.” Ren said.

“Well, it’s always open if you’re into it.” You said.

“Of course.” Ren said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Mission Accomplished and Reuniting Families

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You returned home from your parents' house after your mother tried to stuff you both until you popped. You and Akiza lay down on your bed with a bowl of popcorn between the two of you. Akiza had put on another cheesy romance flick this time around. During a quiet part of the movie, Akiza takes the chance to talk with you.

"We did a lot of good in the past twenty four hours. I know we've already saved the world, but what we've done just feels much more... personal. We've reunited families, saved kids, it's feels a lot more satisfying than simply getting a pat on the back after saving the world, you know?" She asks.

"Yeah, I get what you mean. It's good that I can have this chance to get to know the brother I never knew I had. I just hope that the kids not at the facility we raided are holding strong." You muse.

"I'm sure they'll be fine. Mina's on the case, after all." She replies reassuringly. "Well look at what part we're at."

She was referring back to the movie, where the two lovers were leaning in for their big kiss. You look to see Akiza closing in with puckered lips as you go in to meet her. With one last kiss of passion, you wrap up the movie and click off the lights before the two of you drift off.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Job Well Done

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Morning came and you and Akiza woke up after a long night you had. You got up, took a shower, and gone back with Akiza.

“After all that happened yesterday, I still feel pretty wiped out a little.” You said.

“Me too. I think we deserved a vacation. How about we take a stroll around the city for a while? Just the two of us.” Akiza suggested.

“That sounds great.” You said before your phone ranged and you picked it up.

You talked on the phone for a few seconds before you hanged up.

“Turns out I have an interview today with Carly. Saying she wants to talk about the state of the movement and all.” You said.

“I see.” Akiza said.

“Hey. We’ll have something to do when I get back. This probably won’t take long.” You said.

“If you insist. I’ll see you later.” Akiza said.

“You too, my favorite rose.” You said as you give her a nice long gentle kiss before you left.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The next morning

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You walk into your office, where the dark-haired journalist was waiting. She seemed really jumpy about this, so you don't want to scare her off. "Hello Carly." You say, making her jump.

"Oh h-hey Yuten. L-long time no see." She stutters out while you take a seat at your desk.

"You seem nervous. Are you okay?" You ask, worried about her passing out.

"Yeah, I'm fine. It's just a little unnerving, you know? Last time I was here I was thrown out that window and turned into a dark signer. Meanwhile, the last time we spoke was when I nearly sent you to the Netherworld. I'm so embarrassed." She rants.

"Relax. Nobody's going to launch you out the window, and I've already forgiven you for that night. But enough about the past, we're here for an interview, aren't we? With everything that's going on lately, you're the only reporter that's willing to help us become known to the public, and I appreciate that." You tell her.

"Thanks. And you're right, we have an interview to do." She says as she pulls out her camera and microphone. "What is the Arcadia Movement's current stance on the missing people it was previously associated with?"...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: To your interview

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Well, just last night, we discovered about a facility that held some of these people. We raided the joint and we managed to get them all out of there safely. We even discovered about other places like that and Sector Security will have them out, hopefully, within the next two to three weeks from now.” You said.

“That’s terrific news. Will they be coming to stay here with you and the others?” Carly asked.

“That’s their decision. They can choose to stay here or go home. I won’t mind a single bit.” You said.

“Well, with that out of the way, what is the Arcadia Movement’s next step?” Carly asked next.

“We’re actually doing something about that right now, but I don’t want to spoil the surprise.” You said with a chuckle.

“Of course. So, what could you be focusing on personally as well?” Carly asked.

“As you know, the WRGP is coming up around the corner and I was actually thinking about representing the movement in the tournament.” You said.

“If you do enter, who will be dueling with you?” Carly asked you.

“I think I know two people. I just need to ask first. So, will that be all the questions?” You wondered.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Continue the interview

choices: Try to squeeze in a visit at the end of the day
Take Akiza to visit him right away
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I'm afraid so. Like you said, there's a lot going on these days, so I don't think a story like this is getting front page treatment. Better to just make use of this for now. Sorry that I can't do any more." Carly tells you.

"It's alright. You've done more than enough to help us as it is and I'm grateful for that. I'll call someone up to escort you back to the entrance." You as you press a button signaling the front desk to send someone up. "I hope things go well with your editor."

With that, one of your men came to bring her down to the entrance. Meanwhile, you sit in your desk wondering what to do now. That story will be published tomorrow, so you need to ask both of your soon-to-be teammates before then. But you already promised Akiza you would see the city together today. How would you approach this?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Interview Over

choices: mountains to see the view of the city
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You decided to wait until, probably, the end of the day because you want to enjoy it with Akiza in the city. And if you can’t make time, then there’s always a tomorrow. You got up and went back to your room where you would be meeting her there. You went in and you see Akiza already in her turbo suit that makes her so damned exotic.

“Got geared up already, I see.” You said.

“I had a feeling that the interview would be short like you claimed it to be. Looks like we were right. Speaking of the interview, how did it go?” Akiza asked.

“Not bad really. Probably won’t make the cover. But it’s better than nothing. So, ready for a ride?” You asked.

“I’ve been ready like I’ve been riding on you.” Akiza said slyly.

“Oh ho. You’re such a naughty girl. I oughta give you a spanking for that.” You said with smile.

“Let’s save that after our ride.” Akiza said.

“I’ll get dressed.” You said before you kissed her and get ready.

You and Akiza got downstairs and on to your runners before you two head out. The view of city going by was really amazing as you two riding together on the streets.

“The city is always nice to see like this, isn’t it?” You asked Akiza.

“It sure is.” Akiza said.

“You know, I’ve been thinking. You know that the WRPG is coming up and I’m thinking about entering.” You said.

“Really?” Akiza asked.

“Yeah. You know, to represent the movement and I want to know if you want to be my first teammate.” You suggested.

“I think that’s a good idea. Of course I’ll be your teammate.” Akiza answered.

“I’m glad you agreed.” You said.

“But who’s going to be our third teammate?” Akiza wondered.

“I think I have someone in mind. Let’s hope he feels like he’s up for the challenge.” You said as you and Akiza head straight for the
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Nice Stroll With Akiza

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You both pull up to a vista point along a mountain road, where you both dismount your runners and walk up to the railing to take in the sight of the city in its entirety as the sun began to set. "What a view. You can see the whole city from here, even Satellite." Akiza says as she leans on the rail.

"Yeah. It's nice to see just how much has been rebuilt and improved since the dark signers. With all our focus on rebuilding the movement and Yusei's bridge project, it's easy to forget just how much damage was done that's been repaired." You respond as you walk up next to her.

"So tell me Yuten, what's the real reason behind you wanting us to join the WRGP? I'm sure part of you is sincere about using it to better represent the new movement, but you and I both know that there's more to it than that." She says.

"It's that obvious, huh? Alright then, yes, I have more than one reason to want us to join the tournament. First, Jack and the others are going to be entering, so what better chance could there be for me to finally have my match with the Master of Faster?" You explain.

"And the other reason?" She asks.

"You looked like you were having so much fun riding your runner and I can see how much you can't wait to try turbo dueling like I am. So why not jump in head first?" You respond.

"I see. Well, we still have a lot of the city left to explore and I'm sure you want to stop at this third teammate of yours to ask him to join, so let's get going." She says as she pulls you back to the runners.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Mountain View

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza were enjoying the view of the city this far as you two were making your way to your destination. When you got there, it turns out you were at your parent’s house.

“Your parent’s place?” Akiza asked.

“Yep. Let’s hope that he’s home.” You said.

Akiza can guess who you’re referring to as you two walked up to the door and you ringed the bell. Your dad was the one that answered as he greets you.

“Yuten! So glad that you’re here, my boy!” Your dad said as he hugged you.

“Like wise, Dad.” You said as you returned the hug.

“And here’s the lucky girl. How are you today?” Your father asked nicely.

“Fantastic. So glad to see you.” Akiza said with a smile.

“Hey Dad? Is Ren here?” You asked.

“Sure. He just got back from work. He’s upstairs.” Your father said.

You two go upstairs and knocked on the door. Ren answered the door and was happy to see you.

“Hey, man.” You said to Ren.

“Bro! Come here you!” Ren said with excitement as he gives you a noogie, which Akiza giggles at.

“Come on, bro. Knock it off, man.” You said as Ren let you go. “Mind if we chat?” You asked.

“Absolutely. Come on in.” Ren said.

You three are now in his room together as you all are about to talk.

“So, what brings you here?” Ren asked.

“Well, we want to know. Have you ever turbo dueled before?” You asked him.

“I did a couple of years ago, but my runner kinda got destroyed. Don’t ask how. Why do you ask me if I did?” Ren wondered.

“As you know, the WRGP is coming and I’m wondering if you would like to join me and Akiza in the tournament as our third member.” You asked.

“Are you serious?” Ren asked as you and Akiza nodded. “Then I don’t see why not. But, do you have a spare runner for me?” Ren wondered.

“The guys that are building it are almost done with a second prototype runner. Give it a couple of days and we’ll have it ready for you.” You said.

“Then I’m in.” Ren said.

“Then it’s settled. We’re on the same team now.” Akiza said.

“That’s right and we’re going straight to the top.” You said as you three fist bumped each other. “Well, it’s getting late. We’re going home now.” You said as you and Akiza were about to leave before you realize something. “Oh yeah. One more thing. Can’t wait to see you and Misty on a date.” You teased.

“Stop that! I-I’m not sure if I can do that.” Ren said.

“Why would you say that?” Akiza wondered.

“Well, I never been on a date before and I have no clue on what to do when it comes to women.” Ren said.

“Look, all I can tell you is that, if you like this woman, then go get her when the time is right. You’ll know when.” You said.

“Okay. I’ll try. Thanks, bro.” Ren said.

“Anytime.” You said before you and Akiza left to go home.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Asking the third member

choices: Skip to when the runners are finished
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"So Yuten, in the span of a day we've gone from psychic mentors to would-be turbo duel champions? I'm so excited for my first turbo duel." Akiza says as you both climb into bed.

"Not so fast Akiza. It's still about a month or so until the tournament, and we have a lot of work to do. Before anything, you and me need to pass a test to get our turbo dueling licences. But before that, I want to wait for Yusei to finish up on our new runners." You tell her.

"New runners? What new runners? And what will happen to the ones we have?" Akiza asks while you click off the light.

"Yusei said he wanted to up our horsepower, so he offered to put together two brand-new duel runners that make ours look like pedal bicycles. The ones we have now will go towards training new members like I originally intended. Speaking of which, remind me to tell Sion that I'm increasing his budget for Ren's runner. That way he can make it more powerful and maybe add some decals." You explain.

"Noted. Well Yuten, before we go to bed, don't I still deserve that spanking?" She asks with a purr.

"Sorry Akiza. I would love to smack your cute butt till it turned red, but I have a lot of work to do tomorrow. Maybe another day, okay?" You ask, hoping she understands.

"Fine. But I don't expect you to hold back when you do." She says with a pout.

"Wouldn't dream of it." With a kiss on the forehead and a squeeze of her rear, you both nod off quick.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Talks of the Future

choices: Got to take care of something first
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
A few days has passed and you and Akiza got up and head straight for Yusei’s garage. You made it and you walked inside to see him along with Jack and Crow on the side.

“Fancy seeing you here, Yuten.” Jack said as you looked up to see him.

“I could say the same.” You said.

“So, you both ready?” Yusei asked as you and Akiza nodded.

Yusei then shows you the newest model of each of your runners along with the same color scheme like your previous ones. The model is actually amazing to see up close.

“Nice, Yusei.” You said with a smile.

“Glad you like it.” Yusei said.

“I’ll say. They look like they can go one for one thousand years and still be kicking.” Crow said.

“You can say that again, Crow.” Akiza said.

“I’m actually glad that you are in this tournament, Yuten. I think a match on the track would be the perfect setting for our battle.” Jack said to you.

“Wouldn’t want it any other way, Jack.” You said.

“And I want to face you in the tournament too, Yusei. You owe me a rematch and I’m positive that I’ll beat you this time.” Akiza said to Yusei.

“I’m looking forward to it, Akiza.” Yusei said.

“Then it’s settled. May the best team win.” You said.

“Before you go, you should meet up with Officer Trudge. He’s the one handling the turbo exams.” Crow said.

“Thanks. We’ll keep that in mind.” You said as you and Akiza got on your new runners and head off...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Riding In Style

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Well Yuten, I guess we're heading for the testing site then?" Akiza asks while she drives alongside you.

"Not yet. First I want to stop back home and get Ren. Sion told me that his runner was finished, so I invited him over to check it out. After that, we can head down to the test site." You explain to her agreement.

You pull up in front of the building where Ren was waiting in what you assumed to be his riding outfit. "Hey bro. Sweet rides. So you said my runner is ready?" He asks as he walks up.

"Yup. Follow us to the garage and you'll see." You lead him down into the garage where Sion was waiting.

"Hello sir. I see Yusei has finished new runners for you. And you must be Ren, we have your runner finished and ready for you to ride." He rambles.

"Sweet. Let's see it then." Ren responds. With the press of a button, a light shines on his latest work. It was colored quite similarly to Ren's Beelze, with the headlights even looking like the monster's eyes. "Not bad, man. Now we just need to see how she runs. Were are we heading?"

"The testing grounds to get our turbo dueling licence. I want you to come and watch us win our dueling exam." You answer.

"But what about the written and driving tests?" He asks.

"We've been studying the written stuff, and we can handle the driving course quick. So are you coming or what?" You ask.

"Sure." He says as he gets on his runner.

"Then let's ride!" You say as the three of you ride our and head for the testing area.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Team Arcadia Rides

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You three made it to the area where the exams will be held. You two went inside and take your seats to begin your written exam while Ren wait on outside. A few hours later, the written part was finished and you two met with him outside.

“So, how did it go?” Ren asked.

“They said we might did good. But overall, I’d say we got this no problem.” You said.

“I feel the same way. You know, I’m not really thinking about the WRGP at all. I’m just really focused on getting my license so that we can ride together.” Akiza said.

“Exactly. I know that we’ll do great.” You said as Ren and Akiza nodded.

The instructor has you and Akiza go straight to the field as some other guys got start off one at a time. You see them go crashing in that first hard turn and boy does that hurt.

You made your turn as you go to that hard turn.

“I think I got this.” You said as you turned.

That was when you lost control and you ended up crashing flat on your butt.

“No I don’t.” You said in pain as your eyes were swirling in circles from dizziness.

Akiza then took her turn and she got the same results as you do. You two tried again until you got it right. The instructor then told you that you two qualified for the next part of the final exam.

It was a hard two weeks, but you finally made it. Now, the final exam is to see how you duel as how you ride. You looked over to see none other than Officer Trudge himself.

“Well well, fancy meeting you here, Yuten. Haven’t seen you since the dark signer fight.” Trudge said.

“Like wise, Trudge.” You said.

“I’m glad you made it this far. But now the only thing that is standing your way of a license is me. Hope you’re ready to give it all you’ve got.” Trudge said.

“I was born ready.” You said.

“Before we get started, I just want to say thanks for saving those missing kids. You and Akiza may have solved one of New Domino City’s biggest cases.” Trudge said.

“You can thank my brother for that. Now then, shall we?” You said with confidence.

“I’ll let Speed World 2 answer that for me.” Trudge said.

The speed world 2 card was activated and you got the clear to drive.

“First one makes the turn up ahead makes the first move.” Trudge said.

“If you insist.” You said as you speed up while keeping it steady.

Who made it?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Turbo Exam Time

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Though the two of you seemed even, Trudge let his experience do the talking; taking the first turn with ease.

"Let's duel!"

Trudge: 4000

Yuten: 4000

"Alright, I draw!", Trudge said. He looked at his hand, contemplating his strategy to open this up.

'Yuten has potential, Yusei says so; I don't doubt it, those Dragons are strong. But he's still in his training wheels here, but let's see if he can surprise me. I bet he's gotten himself some good speed spells', Trudge thought as he grabbed a monster.

"Let's get started with this, I summon Stygian street Patrol; in defense mode!", a fiend riding his own motorcycle appeared.

DEF: 1200

"I'll set two cards facedown, and end my turn. Alright kid, show me what you've got!", Trudge said.

"Careful what you wish for! I draw!", You said.

Trudge: 1 speed counter

Yuten: 1 speed counter
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Securing turn 1

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Alright, Trudge, since I have no monsters on my field, I can special summon Kaiser Vorse Raider in attack mode.” You said.

KVR: 1900 ATK

“Looks like Stygian is about to be off-duty.” You said.

“He’s duties are just getting started for I play the trap, Threatening Roar. Now, you can’t attack this turn.” Trudge said.

“Damn. In that case, I’ll set one monster in defense mode and another card to end my turn.” You said.

“Without that trap, Trudge could’ve been in serious trouble. Yuten needs to be extra careful with both his dueling and driving if he wishes to win this.” Ren said.

“I agree. Come on, Yuten.” Akiza said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Riding Through Your First Turn

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You looked down at your field, your set cards were giant germ and counter gate. Counter gate was in case of a direct attack, and giant germ was to fortify you and burn trudge.

"I draw!"

Trudge: 2 SC

Yuten: 2 SC

"And I'll switch my street patrol to attack mode! Then, I summon stygian security!", a small bat-like creature with a siren appeared.

ATK: 100

"Now street patrol, attack his set monster; perimeter panic!", Trudge said. Street patrol popped a wheelie, before riding forward; letting his bike bite your monster to bits.

Trudge: 3500

"Sorry Trudge, but my giant germ won't just take a hit without a price; that price being 500 of your life points! Plus, two giant germs are summoned!", you said as two more appeared.

ATK: 1000

"Sorry Yuten, but I was expecting that", Trudge said. "What?", you asked.

"Is Trudge being serious?", Akiza asked.

"I knew about your giant germs, and when you set that monster I was sure. That's why my other trap, is urgent tuning!", Trudge said as the card appeared.

"Trudge planned this far?", Ren was shocked.

"I tune my level 4 stygian street patrol, with level 1 stygian security! Watch as these two pursuers of justice, tune together into a champion! I synchro summon, level 5; Stygian Sergeants!", Trudge said as his new monster appeared.

ATK: 2200

"Stygian Sergeants, attack his giant germ!", Trudge said as the monster was destroyed.

Yuten: 2800

Trudge: 3000

"When Stygian Sergeants first destroys a monster during the battle phase, it gains 800 ATK points until the end of the turn; then it can attack a 2nd time! Attack the other giant germ!", Trudge said.

Yuten: 800

Trudge: 2500

"Trudge is slaughtering him", Akiza said.

"I'll set 2 cards face down, and end my turn", Trudge said.

"Trudge, you're incredible; the duel has barely started, and I'm already down to 800 life points!", you said.

"I'm giving it my all runt! And I'm set up for my victory lap!", Trudge said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Trudge takes a big lead

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“We’ll see!” You said as you draw your card.

Yuten: SC: 3
Trudge: SC: 3

“First, I play the speed spell, Angel Baton. Since I have two or more speed counters on me, I can use this to draw two cards from my deck as long as I discard another one to the graveyard from my hand.” You said.

“Glad to see that you know how to use speed spells, kid.” Trudge said.

“I’ve been studying.” You said as you draw your two cards before you discard one away. “By the way, since the card I sent to the graveyard was the White Stone of Legend, it’s ability let’s me add you-know-who from my deck to my hand, which happens to be my Blue-Eyes White Dragon.” You said as you draw out your ace monster.

“I was afraid you were going to get that thing. Too bad you don’t have what you need to summon him right now.” Trudge said confidently.

“On the contrary, I actually do. See, if I happened to reveal a Blue-Eyes in my hand to you, I can summon this to the field. Meet Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon.” You said.

BEAWD: 3000 ATK

“A new Blue-Eyes? Didn’t see that coming.” Ren said.

“I know. It’s almost like Blue-Eyes got a new makeover.” Akiza said looking at your new monster.

“What do you think? Not bad huh? You can say that my trusty dragon got himself an upgrade. Now watch how he plays out. Once a turn, he can obliterate one monster on your field.” You said.

“Uh oh.” Trudge said as Stygian Sergeants got blasted off the field.

“Now I’ve got you. Kaiser Vorse Raider, hit him for a direct attack.” You commanded.

“I don’t think so. I play the trap, Dimensional Prison. Now your Kaiser Vorse Raider is instantly removed from play.” Trudge said.

“So close. Lucky for you, my new dragon can’t attack on the same turn he used his effect. So, I’ll end with this card face down.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A New Dragon Arises

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I draw!", Trudge said.

Yuten: 4SC
Trudge: 4SC

"First comes my trap, descending lost star; it summons Sergeants back with 1 less level, negated effects, and 0 defense", Trudge said.

DEF: 0

"Next, I summon level 2 Torapart!", Trudge played the card.

ATK: 600

"I tune my two monsters together, appear now; level 6, Goyo guardian!", Trudge said.

ATK: 2800

"It's not strong enough for blue eyes!", You said.

"I play a speed spell, Rapid shotwing! Goyo guardian gains 100 ATK for each speed counter I have", Trudge said.

ATK: 3200

"Attack his Dragon, Goyo Lariat!", Trudge said as the monster swung his weapon. You tried to use your trap to spare some points, but it wouldn't activate; your dragon was destroyed.

Yuten: 600

"Now for the effect of Goyo Guardian; the monster he destroyed in battle, is summoned to my field in defense mode!", true to his word, your dragon appeared on his field.

DEF: 2500

"When Torapart is used for a synchro summon, during the turn its sent to the graveyard; your opponent can't use traps until after the damage step, during the battle phase", Ren said.

"It's your move kid!", Trudge said.

"I'm losing; but I'm not upset, infact I'm thrilled. Who knew Trudge was so skilled, so strong? My fighting spirit is burning like a fire in my heart, wanting to respond with gusto!", you said as you hand grew hot.

"I hear them, my monsters; cheering for me to give it my all. I will, I'll bet it all on this last card", You put your hand on your deck, poised to draw. You felt the voices in your heart, in your hand; the passion raged.

"It's all or nothing! I'm betting everything on this draw, prepare yourself. Dragon draw!!", an orange streak followed the card you drew, as a strange roar echoed in your mind.

Yuten: 5 SC
Trudge: 5 SC
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Goyo Guardian

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“First off, I play my face down, Jar of Greed. I get a free draw. Next, I play the speed spell, Dash Pilfer. Since I have four or more speed counters, I can use this card to gain control over a monster you have on your field that’s in defense mode. I’ll take my dragon back. Thank you.” You said said as your alternative dragon comes back to you.

“Big whoop.” Trudge said.

“It’s a very big whoop. Now I play the speed spell, Speed Fusion. Since I have four or more speed counters on me, I can use this card to perform a fusion summon.” You said.

“Wait. He’s not going to...” Akiza started.

“You better believe it.” Ren said as he has the same feeling.

“I fuse the two Blue-Eyes in my hand with my Alternative White Dragon that I have on my field. Now I fusion summon my Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon.” You said as your three-headed behemoth shows himself.

BEUD: 4500 ATK

“No way! That thing is huge!” Trudge said in awe.

“You ain’t seen nothing yet. But first, I think I’ll use Speed World 2’s effect. By removing 4 speed counters, I can inflict you 800 points of damage for each speed spell in my hand, like this one.” You said as you reveal the last card in your hand, which is Power Baton.

You: SC: 1

Trudge: 1700

“Judging by the amount of damage I’m going to inflict you now, I say that I got you beat. Blue-Eyes, end this with Neutron Blast.” You commanded as your dragon destroyed Goyo Guardian, ending the duel.

Trudge: 0

“Very good, Yuten. You passed your exam. You’re now an official licensed turbo duelist.” Trudge said.

“Thanks man.” You said with a smile.

You then went up into the stands and see Akiza duel. It took a while, but she managed to win and was happy that she passed too. You said as she came back to see you and Ren.

“Well, we’re all turbo duelists now. This must be exciting for you two.” Ren said.

“It sure is.” You said.

“Me too.” Akiza said.

“Well, I’m heading back home for now. Go on and celebrate you two. You earned it.” Ren said before he got on his runner and left.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Passionate Victory

choices: Your heads are spinning and are a bit buzzed
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza return home, filled with glee at passing your exams. As you pull into the garage, you both flash Sion your new liscences and an elated grin before heading back to your room. "I can't believe we actually did it." She says as you close the door behind you.

"What's not to believe? We've both been working hard to pull this off, and here we are." You explain with a pat on her head. "We should celabrate this."

"Ooo, am I finally getting that spanking I was promised days ago?" She asks seductively.

"Maybe later. For now, I was thinking something along these lines." You say as you pull out a bottle of champagne you hid away.

"Where did you get that?" She asks, staring at the bottle.

"Bought it from the liquor store yesterday and stored it away while you weren't looking. I even got two glasses for us to use. Let's celebrate old school style." You offer.

She giggles a bit at your enthusiasm. "Sure, why not." She says as she takes her glass from your hand. You pop open the bottle and pour out two glasses.

How much do you both drink?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Few Drinks Won't Hurt, Right?

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza each have your champagne glasses and you give out a cheer.

“Here’s to a job well done on getting our licenses and many other accomplishments in the future.” You said holding your glass up.

“I’ll toast to that.” Akiza said as you two tapped your glasses together.

As you both drink your champagne, you looked outside to see the view of the city for you know what’s coming up soon.

“Well, with us getting our licenses and the WRGP coming in from around the corner, I have a feeling that this may turn out great for us.” You said with a smile as you see the sun setting.

“I feel the same way. Though, we have to be careful not to get too comfortable for there’s a lot of strong duelists in this tournament. We’re going to have to show what we’re really made of.” Akiza said.

“That’s exactly right, Akiza. But hey, win or lose, we’re going to make the movement and our families proud. But that don’t mean we’re going to hold back.” You said while still drinking.

“Agreed. We have a lot of work to do. But it’ll pay off. I know it will.” Akiza said with confidence as she drinks as well.

“And I can’t think of anyone else I would have joining me in this tournament than my awesome brother, Ren, and, of course, you, my incredibly talented hot girlfriend.” You said to smooth talk Akiza.

“And we can’t think of anyone else to have than you, my all powerful sexy boyfriend.” Akiza said as you two put your glasses down and began kissing each other.
