In Gigaplant's case, I can special summon any plant monster in my hand or graveyard once per turn. So let's welcome back the Lonefire Blossom from my graveyard in defense mode.

LF: 1400 DEF

"But I'm sure you know what happens next. Lonefire Blossom is getting released again to special summon a plant right from my deck. This time, I'll play Tytannial, Princess of Camellias in attack mode."

TPC: 2800 ATK

"Lastly, I'll end my turn with a face-down and my Black Garden field spell. Your move." She finishes.

"Talk about your strong starts." Jack says.

"Yeah. Looks like your bro has his work cut out for him." Crow chimes in.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Akiza starts

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Okay. I’m not doing good here I see. But let’s see if I can change the situation a little.” Ren said as he draws his next card. “First, I’ll play Card Destruction. This allows both of us to discard our whole hand and draw the same number of cards.” Ren said.

“If you insist.” Akiza said as they each discarded and drew their cards.

“Following that, since I have no monsters on my field while I have five dark monsters in my graveyard, I can special summon The Dark Creator in defense mode.” Ren said.

TDC: 3000 DEF

“Thank you for summoning him, because, since you did, my Black Garden can cut your monsters attack in half and I get to have a nice little Rose token.” Akiza said.

TDC: 1150 ATK

“Well, don’t feel so graceful. Now I’m going to activate his effect. By removing a dark monster from my graveyard, I can summon another dark monster to join him. And I choose my Red-Eyes Black Dragon!” Ren said as the black dragon of legend shows itself.

REBD: 2000 DEF

“Red-Eyes?! Where on Earth did he get that?!” Jack asked surprised to see the dark dragon.

“You didn’t mentioned him having a Red-Eyes in his deck.” Yusei said to you.

“And ruined the surprise? I don’t think so.” You said as you looked.

“That’s fine. Because your dragon gets weaker as I get another Rose token.” Akiza said.

REBD: 1200 ATK

“That’s okay. I’m not done yet. Now, by removing three fiend monsters from my graveyard, I can summon this. My Dark Necrofear.” Ren said.

DN: 2800 DEF

“That’s a new one. But no matter because I get one more token as he gets weaker as well.” Akiza said.

DN: 1100 ATK

“He didn’t play that in our duel. I wonder what he’s going to do with it?” You said to yourself.

“I’ll place a card down and end my turn.” Ren said.

“With the combo Akiza played, playing defense is the best way to go now.” Crow said.

“Yeah. But he can’t do that forever. He better pull through.” Yusei said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Evening Up The Playing Field A Little

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Then I'm up. Draw!" Akiza takes a look at her new card. "I have to thank you for all these rose tokens. I think I'll put one to use by releasing it to summon Fairy King Truesdale in defense mode."

FKT: 1500 DEF

"Why do that? Now he loses half his points and I get a rose token." Ren questions.

FKT: 1100 ATK

"It's about quality over quantity, and now that my king is on my field in defense position, all my plant monsters gain five hundred attack and defense points." Akiza responds.

GP: 2900 ATK
TPC: 3300 ATK
RT: 1300 ATK
FKT: 2000 DEF

"Well that's not good." He says.

"No, it really isn't. Now it's time I went on the offensive. Let's start with a little Rose Token mirror match." Her token fires a small petal storm to destroy Ren's.

Ren: 4000-3500

"Look at that, no damage to Ren." Jack states. Sure enough, no cuts or bruises were seen anywhere on Ren. The crowd murmured to each other about this.

"It's not over yet. Tytannial, attack Dark Creator." With several thorny vines, Akiza destroys one of Ren's strongest monsters. "And now Gigaplant will destroy Dark Necrofear." Gigaplant bit down on Ren's monster and destroyed it in one bite.

"Thanks for that. Now my Necrofear's ability activates. Since he was destroyed, I can equip him to one of your monsters to take control of it. I think I'll take your princess."

"Not so fast. My princess comes with a defense system. By releasing one plant monster on my field, I can negate one card effect that targets another card. So I'll tribute my Rose Token to negate Necrofear's ability." Rose Token dissappears before forming a vine wall in front of her princess.

"Too bad I have a face-down, Divine Wrath. Now by discarding one card, I can negate one monster's effect. So I think I'll shut down your princess." Ren discards a card before a bolt of lightning strikes Akiza's monster and destroys it. "Too bad for you. I might not get your princess, but at least you don't either."

"Don't be too sure. My battle phase may be over, but I still have my Gigaplant's ability. With it, I can special summon a plant monster from my graveyard, so say hello again to my princess in defense mode." Akiza reveals.

TPC: 2600 DEF

"And while Black Garden may cut her attack, my king gives her five hundred attack and defense points.

TPC: 2800-1400-1900 ATK
2600-3100 DEF

"I'll set this face-down and end my turn."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Flower Power

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Okay. Impressive. But I can still come back from this. I draw.” Ren said as he drew. “I’ll place this card face down and then I’ll play Pot of Greed. This will let me draw two extra cards.” He said as he draws again. “Nice. I now play the spell, Burial from a Different Dimension. Now up to three of my removed from play monsters returns to my graveyard. Finally, I’ll play this. The Beginning of the End.” Ren said.

“What’s that?” Akiza wondered.

“It’s a symbol of the apocalypse that my dark monsters will unleash. I can only activate this card if I have seven or more dark monsters in my graveyard. Since I do, I can remove five of them and draw three cards.” Ren said as he draws more cards and likes it. “You’re going to be in so much trouble now.” Ren said.

“Why’s that?” Akiza wondered.

“Dark Hole.” Ren said.

“But your Red-Eyes will get destroyed!” Akiza realized.

“Exactly.” Ren said as all monsters were obliterated. “Now, let me show you something very interesting. You see, I can only summon this monster if I have exactly three dark monsters in my graveyard. With that, I can summon my Dark Armed Dragon.” Ren said.

DAD: 2800 - 1400 ATK

“He’s really not holding back this time.” Yusei said.

“No he ain’t.” You said.

“Next, I’ll play his special ability. By removing a dark monster from my graveyard, I can destroy a card on the field. Say goodbye to Black Garden.” Ren said as Akiza’s Black Garden is no more. “But why stop there? I can use it’s effect as many times as I want to. So I’ll remove my remaining two dark monsters to get rid of your back row.” Ren said as Akiza’s looses her face downs too.

“Now she has her token left and it ain’t going to be much for her at all.” Crow said.

“Dark Armed Dragon! Chop down that Rose token.” Ren said.

Akiza: 3400

“Now I’ll just set this monster down and end my turn. Think that little green thumb of yours can help you come back from all that?” Ren said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Wilting The Flowers In Darkness

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"It can do more than that. I draw." She looks at her card. "I think I'll play my own Pot of Greed, so that's two cards for me. Next I'll summon Twilight Rose Knight in attack mode."

TRK: 1000 ATK

"And my knight comes with a special power. He allows me to summon any plant monster from my hand as long as it's level four or below, so I'll summon Lord Poison in defense mode."

LP: 1000 DEF

"Now I'll tune my knight with my Lord Poison to synchro summon Black Rose Dragon." She calls out as her ace dragon appears in a storm of rose petals. You had no doubt that these people remember the damage it did back during the Fortune Cup.

"Here we go. Moment of truth." You say.

"And with my dragon's ability, I can destroy all cards on the field. Go Black Rose Gale!" With a giant galestorm, all cards on the field were destroyed as advertised, but not a single scratch on the arena or audience. The murmurs continue as they see how much the pulsars are holding them back.

"But don't think I'm done yet. I activate the effect of the Spore in my graveyard. Now by sending one plant monster from my graveyard and removing it from play, I can special summon Spore to the field and increase it's level by that of the monster I removed. So by removing my Hedge Guard, I can special summon Spore to my field in defense mode."

SP: 800 DEF
LvL: 1->4

"How did those cards get in your graveyard?" Ren asks, confused.

"Remember when you made me discard two cards with Card Destruction? Well that was them. And with my spell Card of Sanctity, I can refresh my entire hand." She responds.

"So do I though." Ren comebacks as he draws.

"Maybe, but now I can activate the Seed of Deception spell card. Now I can special summon a level two or below plant monster from my hand, so come forth Dark Verger."

DV: 1000 DEF.

"Now Spore will tune with my Dark Verger to synchro summon Queen of Thorns in attack mode."

QoT: 2200 ATK

"That's really bad." Ren says.

"Like you wouldn't believe. Queen of Thorns, attack Ren directly." Akiza calls.

Ren: 3500->1200

Still no damage. Looks like this demo will be a complete success. Akiza thinks to herself. "I'll end my turn with two face-downs."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Green Thumbs Up

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Here I go then.” Ren said as he draws his next card. “I play Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy one of your face downs.” Ren said destroying one of Akiza’s cards. “That was good. But I’m still in bit of a jam. I need to by myself some time to make a comeback. This will have to do.” Ren thought.

“I set one monster down as well as two cards down to end my turn.” Ren said.

“Your bro’s not doing so good up there, man.” Crow said observing the duel.

“He’s in a tight spot. Especially, with that Queen of Thorns. With him only at twelve hundred life points, he’ll be limited to summon one monster face up.” You said remembering the time you faced it.

“Well, he can’t play defense forever.” Jack said.

“That we all agree on.” Yusei said.

“I guess my last move has you caught off guard. You can back down now if you want.” Akiza said.

“No way. I want to help my brother with this presentation no matter what. Besides, I’d never backed down before and I’m not about to start now.” Ren said.

Akiza smiled at Ren’s resolve and determination. Plus, that last line he just said reminded her of you when you two first met. It’s good to remember good times like that.

“So come on, Akiza. Hit me with everything you got.” Ren said not backing away.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Stalling For Time

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Careful what you wish for Ren. Draw! I'll summon Witch of the Black Rose in attack mode." Akiza says.

WotBR: 1700 ATK

Akiza: 2400

"If she attacks directly with either of them, he's done for." Misty says.

"I think he knows that. The question is, what is he gonna do about it?" You question.

"It's over Ren. Queen of Thorns, attack his face-down monster." Her queen fires her thorns at the hidden card, only for it to not be destroyed. Instead, it flipped up, revealing a small reaper with a scythe. "What?!"

"Sorry Akiza, but my Spirit Reaper can't be destroyed in battle. And with him in defense mode, you can't touch me." He taunts.

"Hmph. Very well then. I'll end my turn with a face-down. You're up." She ends.

"Looks like your brother lived to the next round." Jack says.

"Yeah, but can he do it again next round?" Yusei ponders
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Saved by the Reaper

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Time to step up. I draw.” Ren said as he draws his next card. “I’ve got you now. I activate the spell, Lighting Votex. By discarding a card from my hand, I can destroy all of your face up monsters.” Ren said as all of Akiza’s monsters are gone. “With that out of the way, I’ll also activate the trap card, Escape from the Dark Dimension. This will allow me to summon one of my removed from play dark monsters and I choose my Dark Grepher.” Ren said.

DG: 1700 ATK

“Not only that, I’ll also summon the tuner monster, Unknown Synchron.” Ren said.

US: 0 ATK

“A tuner monster?” Akiza said.

“If my math is right, that leads to only one thing.” You said.

“I tune my level 1 Unknown Synchron with my level 3 Spirit Reaper and my level 4 Dark Grepher. I Synchro Summon! Come on out, Beelze of the Diabolic Dragons.” Ren said as his ace is out.

BotDD: 3000 ATK

“Oh man! Now that’s some dragon he has.” Crow said with amazement.

“I’ll say.” Jack said.

“Sorry, Akiza, but with only twenty-four hundred life points left, I’d say I won this demo duel. No disrespect of course. Anyhow, Beelze, finish her off! Twin Plasma Cannon!” Ren said as his ace hits her life points.

Everyone sees Akiza on one knee signaling that the duel could be over.

“Well, that was fun. The presentation went well and I’m happy that I-.” Ren stopped as he sees something’s up as Akiza gets back up on her feet.

Akiza: 900

“Didn’t beat you?! How?! You didn’t have enough life points to survive!” Ren said in shock.

“It’s all thanks to my Ground Capture trap card. This makes sure that I take half of the damage of that attack. Not to mention that I also get to draw a card.” Akiza said.

“That was close.” Yusei said.

“I’ll say.” You said.

“Very good. Should’ve saw that coming. Oh well, good luck on your next turn, I’m done for now.” Ren said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Dark Dragon Rises Again

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I don't need luck." Akiza replies as she draws her card, smiling. "All I need is my deck. First, I think I'll play the spell Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy your last face-down." With that, Ren's card is destroyed.

"Next, I activate the Monster Record spell card. I'll use it to special summon my Black Rose Dragon back to the field." She continues.

BRD: 2400 ATK

"No offense Akiza, but your dragon can't save you. It's too weak, and since my dragon is in attack mode, her ability can't lower his attack points." Ren taunts.

"Then it's a good thing she's not the one you have to worry about. I summon Glow-up Bulb to the field in defense mode." She responds.

GUB: 100 DEF

"What's he gonna do?" Ren asks.

"Nothing yet. But with my Seed Color Breeder spell, he will. Now, I can remove from play one plant monster from my graveyard to change the attribute of one plant monster on my field. So Dark Verger is going to be removed from play to change Glow-up Bulb to a light attributed monster."

"How does that help?" Ren asks as he and the audience are confused by this play.

"Because what I'm about to do requires a light tuner monster and my dragon." Akiza says. When she says that, both yours and Misty's eyes go wide as you know what's coming next. "I tune my Glow-up Bulb to my Black Rose Dragon to synchro summon Blue-Eyes White Rose Dragon." The monster you played way back when against Misty emerged once more.

BWRD: 2800 ATK

At the mention of "Blue-Eyes" all eyes at your table turn to you, excluding those from the people that watched your duel with Misty. "Long story." You tell them, getting them to turn back to the action.

"What kind of card is that?!" Ren asks in pure shock.

"A special one. One that lives as proof of my bond with Yuten, and one that's gonna win me this duel." Akiza answers.

"And how's she gonna do that? She's still too weak to beat Beelze." Ren scoffs.

"Maybe right now. But her special ability is about to change that. I'm allowed to choose one monster on your field. Then, I can remove up to play up to three plant monsters from my graveyard, and not only does your monster lose it's special ability, but it also loses one thousand attack points for each monster I remove from play. So I'll remove from play my Gigaplant, Tytannial, and Queen of Thorns to negate Beelze's ability and drop it's attack by three thousand points." Vines from Akiza's dragon and wrap around Ren's dragon.

BotDD: 0000 ATK

"Oh no!" Ren yells.

"Oh yeah! White Rose Dragon, ATTACK!" Akiza orders. "White Light Retaliation!" Akiza's dragon fires, blasting Ren's dragon apart. Even though Ren crumpled to his knees like what usually happens, there is still no damage to him, the area, or the crowd.

Ren: 0000
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Light Shall Banish the Dark

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After the duel, everyone watches as Ren gets up and sees that he’s one hundred percent alright. No bruises, no cuts, no blood. Just looking like he wasn’t involved in the duel to begin with. That’s when you stepped up and high-fived both Ren and Akiza before going to talk to the audience.

“Ladies and gentlemen, Ren and Akiza for an amazing performance.” You said as the audience applauded. “As you can see, no damage has done to any of these duelist. We’ve already had other prototypes all set and we’re willing to show you all at the WRGP tournament. Now, are there any questions you would like to ask?” You wondered.

“Yes. Will the students be able to take these things off at any time?” A reporter asked first.

“Indeed. It’s like a bike with training wheels. Once you feel like you have your powers under control, that’s when you’ll be able to take it off.” You answered.

After so many questions, everyone was leaving and you all say goodbye.

“You did wonderful.” Your father said.

“All of you did. I think society will be looking at the psychics in a new light.” Akiza’s father said as well.

“Let’s not get ahead of ourselves. There’s still ways to go before it can be realized.” You said.

“I agree.” Akiza said.

“Well, we just need to keep that vision alive.” Ren said as you three bumped fists.

“Got that right.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Aftermath

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Everyone had gone home. Yusei and the others wished you three luck in the tournament, hoping to see you in the finals. Misty offered to take Luna and Leo home, but not before giving Ren a kiss on the cheek. Trudge and Mina congradulated the finished pulsars after so much time being put into them. Yours and Akiza's parents left, but not before your mothers gossiped and teased a bit about already planning your wedding.

Only Ren remained. He wanted to keep talking a little before he took off. "So, what happens next?" He asked.

"Well, right now we need to get these finished pulsars to as many students as we can afford. We'll probably have to prioritize the ones that still haven't fully mastered their powers. Coming up though, there's going to be a giant dinner party to welcome everyone participating in the tournament. That'll be in about a week. Then, a week from that will be the official start of the tournament." You tell him.

"I'm getting nervous the closer we get." Akiza says. "Should we practice a little more?"

"That would probably be best. But I don't see a need to overtrain. We should focus on things like tagging out and combos our decks can do." You tell them.

Finally, you arrived at your room. "Got it. Well, I need to head home. Let me know when we train next. I'll show myself out." Ren says before he leaves. You and Akiza head in, change into your sleepwear, and go to sleep with a quick kiss.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Back at your room

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You wake up and, as usual, the beautiful face of your girlfriend that is resting next to you had you smiling brightly. You then climbed on top of her and kissed her so deeply that Akiza woke up happily.

“Best moment of the day.” Akiza said smiling at you.

“You can say that again.” You said smiling back.

After eating breakfast, taking a shower, and getting dressed, you two were about to start a new day until the news came up on the tv.

“Reports coming in about strange attacks accruing in the north regents of New Domino. They said that it could be responsible by some psychic duelists. This could mean a fault could be pointing to the New Arcadia Movement, owned by CEO, Yuten. Would this also mean trouble for the peace they wanted? We’ll keep giving you all updates as much as we can.” The news man said.

“Psychic duelists are doing this?” Akiza said.

You decided to see this for yourself as you go find whoever did the attacks. First, you’re going to need back up, like Ren, Yusei, Crow, and Jack. You called them over and waited for them to show.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Mystery Force

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
It took some time, but Ren, Yusei, Jack and Crow were all at your headquarters in your room. Trudge and Mina even showed up after they saw the news and wanted to help. "So I'm sure you've all seen the news about these attacks and how psychics are being blamed for them." You start.

"It's not right that you are being blamed right away like this. There hasn't even been a proper investigation." Mina says.

"You've got that right. That's why I called all of you here. I want to catch this guy and bring him in. Hopefully that will clear the Movement's name." You tell them.

"Hold it right there!" Trudge interjects. "Whoever's behind these attacks is Security's business, not yours. You should just let the professionals handle this. Besides, you'd be better off not going after the Ghost either way." He says before clasping his hands over his mouth.

"Ghost? Trudge, what do you know?" You ask. All eyes are on the panicked officer now.

"Alright, fine. This guy, we don't have him ID'd yet, so we call him the Ghost. He's been attacking anyone on a duel runner after dark. Whatever his motive is, I don't know. What I do know is that he has this strange card that let's him steal synchro monsters." He explains.

"How do you know this?" Ren asks him.

"Because I dueled him myself. Then he stole Goyo Guardian into his monster. I ended up hospitalized pretty bad after that. Trust me, you don't want to mess with him." He finishes.

"Well I'm afraid that's not possible. This is a challenge against me and everything I stand for, and I'm not about to let that happen. Tonight, all of us are going to bring this guy down." You tell them all.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Everyone’s here for the search

choices: Someone else find the Ghost and contacted you
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Time seemed to slip by as you all get ready to find this Ghost character. You were about to head out before Akiza stopped you.

“Are you sure you want to do this, Yuten?” Akiza wondered.

“I’m sure. He’s been making us look like a threat after everything we’d been trying to make peace with everyone. There’s no way that I’ll sit back let that be trashed by some ghost duelist.” You said.

“I just don’t want you to end up like Trudge did.” Akiza said.

“I know. I promise that he’ll go down before I do.” You said to have her believe in you.

“Okay. I’ll stay here just in case the Ghost might come here.” Akiza suggested.

“Good idea. I’ll be back, baby. I promise.” You said as you kissed her before you left.

You go circling around the city for the guy and nothing so far. He’s definitely earned the title of Ghost if he’s able to hide in the shadows this good.

That’s when...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ghost Hunting

choices: In the middle of the duel, when Ghost has his ace out
The duel is over and done with for a while
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hey Yuten, why isn't Akiza out here searching with us?" Crow asks from the monitor of your runner. "She's got a deck and a runner, why not bring her along?"

"We agreed that she would stay behind at headquarters in case the Ghost showed up there looking for a fight. Somebody needs to protect the students after all." You respond.

"I can respect that, I suppose." Ren says as he pops up on the call too. "Besides it would do us well to have someone watching the news in case there's a report on the Ghost."

"It doesn't matter where he is. All that matters is that I'm gonna bring him down." Jack announces as he joins the call.

"Cut the chatter everyone. We need to keep an eye out in case the Ghost shows up. Anyone got any word from Yusei?" You ask, getting a collection of head shakes in response.

Speak of the devil, Yusei's portrait pops up on your screen. "Guys, I've found the Ghost. He's challenged me to a duel Downtown. Hurry!" He says before disconnecting.

"You heard the man people, Downtown. He shouldn't be hard to miss since he'll be on the only active combat lane this late at night." You tell the others before changing course and heading Downtown. You only hope you can make it in time.

When do you arrive?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Signals

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and everyone else made it to the duel where Yusei’s dueling with the Ghost right now. When you got there, you all see a massive white mechanical looking being that looks can’t be a good sign for your friend.

“Well, we found him and it looks like he’s got his hands full.” Crow said.

“Let’s get a closer look.” Ren said.

Everyone got into the same dueling lane and managed to get closer to the duel.

“Oh look. The welcoming committee.” The Ghost said evilly seeing you.

“You okay, Yusei?” You asked on the monitor.

“Yeah. Although, he seems to be giving more than I expected.” Yusei said.

“You got that right, Yusei. Especially, when you’re now up against my Meklord Emperor Wisel.” The Ghost said about his monster.

MEW: 2500 ATK

“Wait. That’s-.” You said before something gives you a major headache that made you clutched your head in pain.

“Yuten! What’s wrong?!” Ren asked concerned about his little brother.

That’s when the nightmare/vision about the monsters like this one appeared in your mind, doing all kinds of damage, before you opened your eyes in realization.

“That’s one of the monsters from my dream. I knew it was a vision.” You said.

“Are you sure?” Ren asked.

“Positive.” You said.

“Enough chatter. On to the duel.” The Ghost making his move.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Nightmare Coming To Reality

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
It was a close duel. Ghost's Meklord Emperor at one point even absorbed Yusei's Stardust Dragon into itself like in your dream. Yusei had just barely reclaimed his dragon and secured a win with Majestic Star Dragon. Ghost's runner had crashed, and you and the others gathered at the crash site.

"Is he okay?" You ask as you approach.

"Not exactly." Yusei responds as you reach him. "He's not even human." He points to a collection of wires and circuitry inside the man.

"What is he? Some sort of duel bot?" Ren asks with him and the others catching up.

"I dunno. But what's even weirder, I checked his deck, that monster, his Meklord Emperor, is gone." Yusei says.

"How is that possible?" You ask. "Cards don't just get up and walk away."

"I'm not sure. But I am sure that we need to tell Trudge and Mina about this." Yusei responds before walking over to his runner and calling them.

*****

They arrived within minutes at speeds you didn't think a car like that could go. "So you guys caught the Ghost? Who is he?" Trudge asks, grabbing at your collar.

"We can't say for sure." You answer. The lot of you then explain the events that happened. The duel, the strange monster that's now gone, and the identity of the Ghost.

"So that's what happened to the stolen duel bot." Trudge says, shocking you all. "It was meant to serve as a means to combat duel-runner-based crime, but it was stolen not too long ago. I certainly never heard of it acting like this, or having a monster that causes real damage."

"Either way, it's loaded into the truck now. We'll figure out what's going on once we examine it at security HQ." Mina says as she walks up. "We thank you all for your help, and we'll see to it that the Arcadia Movement is cleared from suspicion. But we should go now." She gathers Trudge and her men and heads off.

"I guess we should go too." You tell the others as you all get on your runners. "Thank you all for your help with this. I owe all of you. I would like to talk about this more another day, but for now, it's late." You tell them before you all go your separate ways.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Close Call

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You made it back home in one piece and walked up into your room where Akiza comes up and hugs you tightly.

“Thank goodness. You’re safe.” Akiza said.

“Hey, I told you I’ll be back and here I am.” You said hugging her back.

“Did you find the Ghost?” Akiza wondered letting you go.

“Sure did. Turns out he was a security robot that must’ve got its systems rearranged or something like that.” You said.

“Well, ain’t that a strange surprise.” Akiza said.

“What about the students and you? Nothing attacked here, right?” You wondered.

“Nope. We’re all safe and sound.” Akiza said.

“And the mama bird manages to protect her nest. Good work.” You said with a smirk.

“A mama...?” Akiza thought as she blushed at the thought of her being a mother.

“Anyway, we should get some rest. It’s been a crazy day.” You suggested.

“Of course.” Akiza said.

You and Akiza changed into some pajamas and you two went into bed together. You and Akiza kissed each other and you squeezed on her butt before heading to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Suspicion Is Cleared

choices: Of course, your doors are open
You feel it would be best if he stayed with mom and dad
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You are awoken to the sound of the phone going off. Groggily, you answer it. "Hello?" You ask as you rub the sleep from your eyes and try not to wake Akiza next to you.

"Hello? Mr. Yuten? I have a man here who says he wishes to join us here at the movement. I feel like you should speak with him." Michelle says on the other end.

"I'll be down as soon as I can." You tell her before hanging up. You were certainly glad that the movement has gotten so popular, but a recruit thus early in the morning? You sigh as you get out of bed.

Unfortunately, you had woken Akiza with you. "Where are you going this early?" She asks.

"New guy showed up. Now I get to play tour guide. Wanna come?" You offer jokingly.

"Sure, just let me get dressed." She replies before getting out of bed and throwing on her outfit. You didn't have the heart to tell her you were kidding as you get dressed with her.

*****

You both head down to the lobby to see a familiar face waiting for you. "Bro!" An unmistakable voice calls out.

"Ren?" You question as your brother runs up to you. "What are you doing here so early?"

"I remember that you offered to let me live here. After all that's happened with turbo duelists as the targets, I decided that it would be safer if I stayed here rather than bring that trouble to mom and dad, and they agreed, even if they didn't want to. I was hoping I could stay here, at least until after the tournament ends. If your offer is still there, that is." He asks.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: An Accepted Invitation

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Sure, man. You’re more than welcome to stay.” You said.

“Thanks bro! I promise that you won’t be disappointed!” Ren said smiling.

“You bet.” You said.

“Oh! Sorry. I forgot about you, Akiza. How are you?” Ren asked your girlfriend nicely.

“I’m great, even though you did woke us up this early.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. Sorry about that.” Ren said.

“It’s okay.” Akiza said smiling.

“By the way, I’m looking forward to a rematch when this tournament is over.” Ren said.

“Of course.” Akiza said.

“Anyhow, let me give you a tour.” You said.

You and Akiza give Ren a long tour of the building, including the duel areas for training. He seems to like it better than the last time he was here. After the tour, you showed him to your room.

“So this is where the magic happens.” Ren said as he looks around.

“Yeah. It is.” You said while you and Akiza blushed.

“Don’t worry. I won’t interfere with any pleasurable games you two play here.” Ren joked a little.

“Shut it.” You said thinking about punching his head for that comment.

“Sorry. Sorry. Seriously, I’ll respect your privacy.” Ren said.

“Thank you.” Akiza said.

“Speaking of which, where am I staying?” Ren wondered.

“I think there’s a room about five floors below us. You can check there.” You said.

“Sure. Thanks.” Ren said.

After such, breakfast was ready and you all eat.

“So how are you doing with Misty?” Akiza wondered.

“Great. As a matter of fact, she wants to know if you guys want to join us for dinner tomorrow night.” Ren wondered.

“Like a double date? That sounds fun.” You said.

“I don’t know if I’m able to call it a date.” Ren said.

“Dude, she’s totally into you. I saw her kissing you on the cheek after the presentation the other day. When will you man up and confess?” You wondered.

“I’ll confess when I’m ready.” Ren said.

“If you say so.” Akiza said.

After which, Ren...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren Gets To Stay

choices: You offer to let your parents lay low at HQ until the tournament is over
You offer to have Trudge and Mina send security to watch them
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hey Akiza, can I borrow my little brother for a bit? I need to talk to him alone." Ren asks, putting an arm around you.

"Sure. I'll get breakfast ready then. Should I set an extra plate for you, orrr...?" She questions.

"Yeah, I'd love to eat with you guys if you'll let me." He replies. With a nod of the head, Akiza heads back into the room.

"So what's up Ren? What's so big that you need talk alone?" You ask. "Are your powers acting up?"

"No, nothing like that." He responds quickly. "I'm scared, Yuten. There's a lot of tension surrounding this tournament. Haywire duel bots making people crash, rich people hiring kidnappers to force duelists to join their teams. What if someone tries to use mom and dad, or God forbid Misty as leverage to make me join them. How could I live with myself if something happened to them because of me?" He rants.

"That's why you left home to live here?" You ask. He nods in response.

"I figure Misty has a security team to keep her safe, but the longer I stayed with mom and dad, the more I put them at risk by possibly leading those creeps to them. But you guys, I'm sure you can stay safe. This tower is nothing short of a fortress." He comments.

"I see..." You start. "Maybe I can try and ease your nerves."

"How?" He asks.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Brotherly Talk

choices: Just hang out with Akiza for now
Skip to your family arriving here
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I can have Mom and Dad stay here until the tournament is over. That way, they’ll be well protected.” You offered.

“Really? Oh thanks, man.” Ren said with a smile.

“No problem. After breakfast, I’m going to call them from my office.” You said.

Akiza comes back and breakfast was ready for you guy. You told Akiza that your parents will be staying here too because of the tension that has been happening during the days before the tournament and they’ll only stay until it is over with. Akiza understands and you all ate.

After breakfast, you made it to your office and called your parents. When your mom picked up the phone, you told them everything that was happening and offered her and dad to stay here for protection. She agrees and you went back to Ren to give him the news.

“Okay. I just finished talking to mom and she agrees to stay here. They should be here in a while.” You said.

“Great. I’m gonna go back and help pack along with my stuff too.” Ren said.

“Okay. I’ll get your rooms setup before you come back. When you do, have Michelle call me.” You said.

“The lady up front? Sure.” Ren said before he left.

You had both Ren and your parents rooms all ready for them and you waited until they arrive.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Temporary Protection

choices: Time to train, Michelle can handle getting his stuff in
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
It only took an hour or so for Ren to return with your parents. As you lead them to their rooms, you took the time to talk. "I know you guys are worried about being ousted here for not having powers, but don't worry. Here we seek tolerance, and as such, will not discriminate against non-psycics" You tell them.

"We know son. I just hate that we have to leave our home because of this tournament and the craziness around it." Your dad says. "I just hope the stuff we left behind will be secure."

"Don't worry hun. Remember, we got a new security system last week. It should protect the house while we're gone." Your mom comforts him.

"It's gonna be okay. Once this is over, you'll both be back home, safe and sound. Until then, I hope you enjoy the movement's hospitality." You tell them as you reach their room. "Here we are." You open the door and show them in.

"Thanks son. We'll go ahead and make ourselves at home." Your dad says as he gets their stuff in with your mom behind him as they shut the door.

"Thanks for this bro. It's a huge weight off my mind knowing that they are gonna be safe." Ren says once you are alone.

"No problem. They're my parents too, so I want them safe just as much as you do." You tell him.

What next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Skip to your family arriving here

choices: Akiza stopped by to see how you’re doing
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Let me show you to your room.” You said.

“Sure.” Ren said.

You go towards to where your brother will be staying and he likes what he sees. It’s almost like your room only with no balcony or something.

“Amazing. I like it.” Ren said.

“Glad you do, bro. Don’t worry, I made it so it’s comfortable for you and Misty to sleep in.” You teased.

“Thanks bro. I...” Ren stopped when he realized what you just said. “Seriously?” Ren asked while blushing and you were smiling goofy.

“You teased me before. It’s only fair.” You said.

“Well, anyhow, is that my new uniform in that closet?” Ren asked.

“Sure is.” You said.

“I’ll go get changed. I’ll be back.” Ren said to go get changed.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren Gets Settled In

choices: We're down a teacher and need you to sub
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hey you two. I was wondering how everyone was settling in." You hear Akiza's voice say as she walks in the front door.

"It's going great. Mom and dad are already getting unpacked down the hall and I have someone on standby to give them a tour of the place in my absence." You tell her as she walks beside you. "And Ren just got a look at his new room and is currently getting changed into his Arcadia Movement uniform."

"Hey Akiza!" Ren calls from behind the closet door.

"Hey Ren. I hope you enjoy your stay here." She responds.

"So do I." He says as he walks out of the closet, now sporting the traditional robes of the movement, now sporting your new logo from when you took over. "How do I look?" He asks.

"I dunno, Misty might think you're overdressed for what she has in mind for you." You tease, making him blush again. You would chuckle, but you were cut off by Akiza's elbow in your side. "Ow!"

"Oh stop. Ren, you look just fine in that uniform." She reaffirms.

"Thanks Akiza. Gotta admit, as much as I hated Sayer's guts, it still feels natural to wear this again." He says.

"Glad to hear you think that," you start, "because..."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Akiza stopped by to see how you’re doing

Another vision came into your mind
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“It’s time to train. With the tournament rolling in fast, we all really need to be on top of our game.” You said.

“I agree. I’ll go change.” Akiza said.

“Me too. See you on the track.” Ren said before getting his gear ready.

You walked with Akiza to your room before you were stopped by your parents.

“Mom! Dad! How’s the place working for you two?” You asked.

“It’s amazing. The people here are really friendly.” Your mom said.

“It’s great. We can’t thank you enough for your hospitality, my boy.” Your dad said.

“Not a problem. Anyway, we’re going to go train for the tournament now.” You said.

“Of course. You be careful.” Your mom said.

“We will.” You said before hugging both of your parents before you two left.

You two got into your runner attire before going downstairs to meet with Ren.

“I gotta admit, bro. You really are one lucky bastard.” Ren complimented seeing how Akiza looks in her turbo attire.

“Got that right, man.” You said.

“Say, because you had that thing with her and Misty, do you think...”

“Not happening.” Akiza cut Ren off.

“I tried.” Ren said.

“Anyhow, lets do this.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: It's Training Time....Again

choices: Move on to practicing speedy hand-offs
Skip to the end of training
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Alright, so how exactly are we gonna combo our cards? It's not like we're all dueling at once and can just use each other's cards." Ren asks as you prep your runners.

"Maybe not, but, if one of us loses, our field passes on to the next duelist. So any of our cards could be on any of our fields, so it would be best if we knew how to work off each other." You explain.

With a green light from Sion, the three of you head into the streets of Domino. "Yuten's right. If we're to do this, we should at least consider ways to combine our decks." Akiza chimes in on the monitor.

"Easy for you to say. You and Yuten already have that White Rose Dragon thing. I don't have any sort of fancy combo with him or you." He reminds you both.

"Maybe not, but we could think of something. For instance, my Decoy Dragon can be used to special summon your stronger dragons if they go to the graveyard. Imagine having Red Eyes or Beelze out on the field any time your opponent tries to attack." You suggest.

"You say that as if Beelze would ever hit the graveyard to begin with. Don't you remember? He's indestructible." Ren scoffs. "But I get what you mean. And I guess with Akiza's focus on cutting attack points, and my Beelze's focus on negating damage, we can find a good combo somewhere."

"There ya go." You reassure him. More and more ideas were going through your head on how you three could work together. You just needed to try them in execution.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Train to see what combos you could use

choices: Akiza with angry tears in her eyes
Ren looking like he’s going to rip Sayer’s head off
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After a long time of training, you and the others gained some teamwork advantage and skills going into the WRGP soon. Hopefully, this will give you guys confidence when you go against powerful opponents.

“Well, I think that was really impressive today. I think we all deserved a pat on the back.” You said getting off your runner.

“You can say that again.” Ren said getting up off his runner.

“I have a feeling those other teams won’t know what hit them.” Akiza said with confidence.

“Hell yeah. Oh yes. We need a team name.” You just realized.

“That’s right.” Ren said.

“How about Team Arcadia? You know, to represent?” You suggested.

“Fair enough.” Akiza said while Ren nodded as you all went inside.

“Mr. Yuten. Phone for you.” Michelle said coming to you with a phone and you answered.

“Hello?.... Mina? What is it?.... Say what now?!.... You’re kidding me!..... Alright. Thank you. Bye.” You said before hanging up.

“Yuten? What’s wrong?” Ren wondered.

“That was Mina. They found Sayer.” You said.

“Wha-What?” Akiza wondered in shock.

“Yeah. They took him into custody and now he’s going to the facility prison.” You said.

“Good. It’s what he gets for trying to build a fucking army.” Ren said not caring about Sayer going to jail.

“I’m going.” You said.

“Come again?!” Ren asked in shock.

“I’ve got to face him. There’s a lot of things I need to get off my chest with him. I need to.” You said and was about to leave before Akiza stopped you.

“I’m going too. There’s a lot I want to speak my mind to him as well.” Akiza said.

“That goes double for me too.” Ren said stepping in.

“Thanks guys. Let’s go.” You said before getting changed to leave.

You all arrived at the prison and sees Trudge standing by waiting for you when you told them that you were coming. He then lead you all to the meeting room where he’s waiting inside.

“Wait right here. I’ll call you.” You said before going inside with Trudge.

What you see next is Sayer sitting at a table while being handcuffed to it. You have a lot of pent up frustration that you need to let out as you sit down opposite of him.

“Fancy seeing you again, Yuten.” Sayer said with a smirk.

“Can’t say the same for you, Sayer.” You said looking at him dead in the eyes.

“Well, that just hurts my feelings.” Sayer teased.

“Like you know what those are, considering you want to destroy the lives of non-psychics in cold blood.” You said.

“You know that they deserved it.” Sayer said to piss you off more.

“Fuck you, Sayer.” You cussed at him.

“Woah! Someone has a foul mouth today.” Sayer said.

“With good reason. I trusted you in the beginning and you tried to use me, Akiza, and everyone in the movement as your toy soldiers. In fact, you tried to use my brother, Ren, as a fucking W.M.D!” You said.

“Ren’s your brother?! That’s a surprise there.” Sayer said.

“Don’t act so shocked, Sayer. But hey, now that I’m in charge, things are looking up for the better, better than you could ever think of.” You said to Sayer’s face.

“I heard. But seriously, do you really think your methods will actually bring everyone together? Be honest with yourself.” Sayer wondered.

“At least my methods are better than yours are, Mr. I’m Going To Destroy Many Lives!” You said.

“I was doing what’s best for us psychics.” Sayer said.

“By declaring fucking war on the world?! You could’ve turned New Domino into an ocean of blood. Would you really sleep on that?” You wondered.

“Well, like I asked, would your methods bring peace? Seriously, can you handle the hate should your ideals failed you? Hmm?” Sayer wondered as well.

“You’ll just wait and see.” You said.

You don’t even want to entertain him with this conversation any longer as you get up and was about to leave before you remembered something.

“Before I go, there’s someone else that wants to say hello to you.” You said.

“I must be popular today.” Sayer said.

“You wish.” You said before signaling Trudge to open the door.

When the door opened, the one that entered was...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Tensed Reunion

choices: Skip to returning to the movement
Before you can exit the room, Ren comes in, looking pissed
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You can see tears welling in Akiza's eyes as she steps into the room. "Ah, Akiza. How nice to see you agai... *smack!" He started before Akiza struck him across the face. Neither you nor Trudge even moved to try and restrain her.

"How dare you talk to me so casually after all you did? You lied to me, used me. You abused my trust and tried to turn me into a weapon in your war. I thought that I had finally found someone I can consider a father and a place I could call home after what happened with my parents. Instead I find out that the man that brought me in only saw me as a scared little girl to use as he saw fit, and my home to be a place of torture and secrets." She rants.

"Tell me Akiza, what would you rather have had me done? Be like Yuten and convince myself that even half of what I said was possible? That our kind could ever be seen as normal within Domino? Only children and fools could think like that without laughing at themselves." He replies. "Or what, maybe I could keep the world away from us and we would all live isolated from the rest of the world? Tell me, why should I live in hiding when I have the power and they don't? Not to mention that they would never have just left us alone anyway. The people of the city won't be satisfied until we are all wiped out, no matter how they may act at Yuten's little speeches."

"That's not true. Yuten's gotten us so far this past year. Farther then you've gotten ever since I've known you. Thanks to him, I've reunited with my parents and Yuten with his. How dare you criticize him when he's been more of a leader than you've ever been?" She asks with tears starting to flow.

"And there it is. That scared, naive little girl I met in that alleyway all those years ago. Your parents are still afraid of you, and they always will be. Because they fear that which is different from them. Just watch, the second your powers act up again, they'll run for the hills just like they did after they tossed you away." He spits out.

Part of Akiza considered believing him, but she remembered plenty that evidenced the opposite. "Not a chance. My father weathered my powers at their worst after the old movement was destroyed just to get close to me. They offered me and Yuten a home while we rebuilt the movement. They wouldn't turn their backs on me now. Especially after I've learned to control my powers." She gloats with Sayer looking surprised. "That's right. No hairband, no pulsars, I can control my power all on my own. Ren's done it too. And both of us have Yuten to thank for it."

Sayer begins to slowly clap. "Not bad Yuten. If that's true, then I'll at least conceed to you getting one victory. I was never able to get them to control their powers without outside tools. Not that it'll change anything, of course." He says.

"You know what? I'll prove to you that peace is possible. And I'll show you. Trudge!" You yell, getting his attention. "When the tournament comes, I want the live feed prodcasted to his cell so he can see the progress that can be made with actual effort." You tell him.

"Uhhh, okay." He responds. "I'll see what I can do."

"Come on Akiza, let's go. I think we've both said what we need to." With a nod from her, you both begin to leave the interrogation room.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Akiza with angry tears in her eyes

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Just as you and Akiza was about to leave the room, you see Ren coming in and he looks, extremely, pissed off right now.

“I told you that I need this as much as you two do. Let me.” Ren said.

“Wait outside.” You said to Akiza and she nodded before going outside.

“Ren? How’s it been? You look well.” Sayer said seeing your brother.

“Cut the shit, Sayer. I came here because I thought you were going to build something amazing and grand for us. Instead, you bought us all in so we can fight in your nightmare of a war. You were also going to use me an ultimate weapon. But the worst part, is what you tried to do to my little brother, you asshole!” Ren yelled with anger.

“It’s not my fault he’s got tremendous potential as a psychic. In fact, I think he may have topped you, if anything.” Sayer said.

“Is this a fucking joke to you?” Ren asked not pleased.

“By the looks of it, yes.” Sayer said still smirking.

“Okay. You’re a comedian now. Congratu-fucking-lations, asshole. But, what about the students you tried to recruit? They could’ve died if this war would’ve happened. Would you really rest knowing that their blood was spilled on the ground thanks to you?” Ren asked him.

“Some little sacrifices has to be made.” Sayer said.

“I’m sorry. Little sacrifices? Are you kidding me right now?” Ren said getting pissed off more.

“That’s life sometimes. But what about you? Akiza said you have control over your powers too. But you don’t seemed to have control over your temper as well. A pity.” Sayer said to taunt Ren.

“Don’t you push me with that.” Ren said.

“Hey, at least I wasn’t the one who betrayed the movement by running away.” Sayer said.

“Because I found out the whole truth behind your bullshit. You know what, Sayer? You’re just smoke and mirrors.” Ren said.

“Oh?” Sayer said.

“Yeah. You just create illusions that are false promises from you and the reality is that you care about your own sick ambition. What do you have to say about that, bitch?” Ren said with no regrets.

“Nothing at all. By the way, I heard on the news saying you were with that Misty model. How is she doing?” Sayer said.

“Don’t you bring her into this.” Ren said as he grabbed Sayer by the collar.

“Ren! Ren! Relax.” You said to calm your brother down.

“By your reaction, you must have grown feelings for the former dark signer. How wonderful.” Sayer said.

“Dark Signer? Misty? Yuten. What does he mean?” Ren asked.

“Well, remember the dark signer thing I was going to tell you? Well, I was kinda hoping not to bring her into it.” You said.

“She became part of a group that tried to destroy the world. So that makes her just as evil as I would think myself.” Sayer said.

“Don’t talk about her like that!!” Ren said as his eyes grew purple.

“You and Misty. A perfect couple, if I say so myself, considering that you and her are just a couple of destructive beasts.” Sayer said.

“YOU SHUT UP!!!!!” Ren screamed as he was going to kill Sayer right there before you stepped in.

“REN!! Enough! He ain’t worth it! Let’s just get out of here. He’s not worth our time now.” You said.

Ren calmed down and nodded before leaving outside.

“Not bad that you have people with more potential than I give you credit for. Still, if you think this will bring peace, than you’re more foolish than ever.” Sayer said.

“Just wait until the tournament and you’ll see.” You said before you left the room.

You three then got on your runners and left for home.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Sayer Pushes Ren Too Far

choices: He forgives you both, but he still needs to talk with Misty tomorrow
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Ren was completely silent the whole ride back to headquarters. You were worried about if Sayer bringing up Misty as a Dark Signer might've made him pissed at the both of you for not telling him sooner. At the very least, you can take solace in knowing that his rage powers must really be supressed if they didn't trigger during that whole outburst. You made it back and Ren went right for his room, with you and Akiza right behind him.

"Ren? You alright bro?" You ask as you enter his room behind him, Akiza closing the door for privacy.

"How long?" Is all he says as he sits on his bed.

"How long what?" You ask, already suspecting his next question.

"How long into my relationship with Misty were you gonna wait to drop that bit about her, huh? Tomorrow night? After the tournament? Our wedding day? Or maybe you would just take it to your graves." He rants as he stares murder at you both.

"Ren, it isn't like that. We didn't keep it from you to hurt you. We just never had an appropriate time to bring it up." Akiza says as she dares to get closer and put a hand on his shoulder.

At her touch, he seemed to mellow a tad. "Well then I guess there's no time like now to air it out, huh? Tell me everything, and don't skimp on details. Misty, the Dark Signers, everything. Then I'll pass my judgment." He says.

"Well, it all started when Misty's brother tried to join the movement years ago..." You start.

"That Toby kid we saved from that old Arcadia Movement blacksite, right?" He interrupts.

"That's him. He tried to join, only to fail Sayer's little 'entrance test' and disappeared." You continue, your blood boiling a bit at the reminder of what he did.

"Before he disappeared though, he told Misty about the movement and how fascinated he was watching one of my duels." Akiza picks up. "Then, after he vanished, Sayer used his influence in Security to make a cover-up about how he was a casualty in a duel where my powers went wild."

"The combination of his fanboying over Akiza and the alleged circumstances of his death, made Misty point the blame of her brother going missing squarely at Akiza." You start again. "Not knowing that Sayer was the one truly responsible."

"Then, one day, Misty got into a horrible car accident. She almost died, but as she was being rolled into the hospital on death's door, the shadows approached her." Akiza adds, remembering seeing these events unfold during her duel with Misty in Satellite.

"The shadows pick their Dark Signers by finding people with some sort of beef against one of the current Signers, so with Misty's rage towards Akiza, she was chosen." You state.

"'Signer'? You're gonna have to fill me in on that real quick." Ren says with a hint of confusion.

"Long story short, they are five people chosen to help summon the Crimson Dragon, an ancient force of good used to battle the Army of Darkness every five thousand years. They are defined by having a mark on their arm and one of the five legendary dragons." You sum up with Akiza rolling down her glove to show her mark and pulling out her Black Rose Dragon.

"Got it. Continue."

"Misty had no stake in wanting to destroy the world. All she wanted was a second chance at life to learn the truth about what happened to her brother. Unfortunately, she couldn't cherry-pick. She bacame one of them and tried to destroy the world come judgment day." You begin to wrap up.

"We dueled her in Satellite. During which, she found out the truth from Sayer's own lips." Akiza continues. "That was when she came to her senses. Unfortunately, she was too far into the hands of darkness. We defeated her with that dragon I used against you the other day. Then, with the defeat of the Dark Signers, all those under their influence returned to normal, Misty included."

"That's the whole truth Ren. It's all out in the open now. What do you have to say?" You ask.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Long Talk
