“Hey, you all get back here!” Syd said before Ren attacked him with his dragon.

It hit him and Syd was out cold. That took care of him, but he’s not powering down.

“Ren, you can stop now! It’s done!” You cried out to him.

Ren wasn’t listening as he goes to attack you next. You quickly got Negate Attack out save yourself as your enraged brother continues the attack.

“What’s wrong with him?! We’re on his side!” Jack wondered.

“He can’t control himself in this state. We need to calm him down now!” You said.

“He’s not making it easy!” Yusei said.

You then summoned your three Blue-Eyes to attack Beelze like last time, only they didn’t have much luck as the demonic dragon blew your dragons away with ease.

“His energy must be stronger than it was last time. Great.” You said to yourself.

“Let me try.” Jack said.

“Wait. You’re not a psychic!” You said.

“Who needs psychic abilities when you have the Crimson Dragon on your side? Go, Red Dragon Archfiend!” Jack said as he summoned his ace.

His dragon went after Ren’s and clawed on it, but Beelze was left unscathed.

“Not even a scratch!” Jack said.

Beelze then blasted Red Dragon Archfiend away along with Jack as Ren seems to be getting angrier and stronger.

“This is not going well. We’re just going to tick him off with each attack.” Yusei said.

“We’ve got to do something or else we’re going to be blasted to Kingdom Come.” You said as you bring out your spiritual energy to help fight.

Meanwhile, Akiza was in awe to see Ren with so much power. It’s just unheard of in a single psychic duelist as she hears Misty groaning while Carly comes to help.

“Akiza? Carly?” Misty said.

“Oh good. You’re alright.” Carly said as she and Akiza helped Misty up.

“How do you feel?” Akiza asked.

“Dizzy. What happened?” Misty wondered before turning to see you and the other boys.

What shocked her is that she’s seeing Ren going on a complete rampage, even attacking you and the others.

“Is that....Ren?” Misty wondered in shock.

Akiza explained the whole thing and Misty feels her heart breaking seeing the love of her life destroying everything in a blind fit of monstrous rage.

You and the guys are not doing so well as Ren was pushing you back like it’s nothing. There must be a way to calm him down.

That’s when....
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Rescue And Rage Unleashed

choices: Misty was corrupted by Ren's dark energy
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see Misty fight her way through Beelze's attacks to get to Ren. "Misty?! Are you crazy?! Get back!!" You shout.

"No! I need to do this!" She shouts back as she continues forward.

"Damn that girl is as stubborn as he is." You say, dodging another blast. "Yusei! Stardust! Now!!"

"Right." He says, getting your meaning. He tosses you his ace dragon. You hold it in your hand and pull out Azure-Eyes.

"Azure-Eyes, Stardust, give her some cover!" You say as you set both their cards on your duel disk. Both dragons appear before you, Stardust getting right between Misty and Beelze with Azure-Eyes putting up a protective barrier.

Even with these defenses, you can still see plenty of blasts doing big hits on the two. You hope she can reach him soon, as they won't last much longer. To your relief, she finally makes it, putting her hands on Ren's face.

"Ren! Please, stop this! I'm safe, you don't need to do this!" She shouts in his face. His face...

Misty was known for reading fortunes through one's face. She'd seen Ren's face before, but now... There was a whole different aura in it. She saw the dark energy that was flowing now, but she saw something at it's core. A light, and a strong one at that. She remembered Ren saying something about you helping supress this power the last time. Does that mean that that light is...? She remembered when this similar situation happened back in Satellite when you and Akiza dueled her. Perhaps with your power in there...

She quickly pulled Ren face-first into a passionate kiss. As she did, they both reacted to it. Misty had lights appear on her face, almost exactly where her Dark Signer tatoos were. Meanwhile, you saw Ren's eyes begin to glow blue rather than purple, only to then turn red. The storm began to calm a bit within the ship.

What happened?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: When Shadows Are Devoured By Even Darker Shadows

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see Ren’s face getting relaxed as his power was dying down. He then got back to normal as he passes out in Misty’s arms.

“It’s okay, Ren. I’ve got you.” Misty said as she holds Ren closer to her while he eases his breathing.

All of the dragons disappeared and you all got out of the boat and back on land safe and sound. The crooks were arrested and you guys returned home. Ren woke up and he sees you, Akiza and Misty together.

“What happened?” Ren asked.

“I’m so glad you’re okay!” Misty said hugging him.

“Misty.” Ren said.

“You were triggered as hell after seeing Syd smacked her in the face. But she was able to get you back.” You said.

“Really? But, what about...?” Ren asked.

“Yuten told everyone and the crooks are off to jail. They said they understand and no harm was done. Well, critically that is.” Akiza said.

“Oh man. I’m so sorry.” Ren said.

“Don’t apologized. I was the one that got hurt. We don’t blame you.” Misty said before kissing him.

You all agreed for Misty to stay one more night with Ren as you and Akiza go to your room.

“That was intense.” Akiza said.

“I’ll say. What happened back there was nuts. I’m just glad that everyone’s alright.” You said as you two go to bed.

“Me too. Too bad we didn’t finish the bet. Oh well, all that matters is that we’re all okay.” Akiza said.

“Exactly.” You said before going to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren was calmed

choices: Your parents come by after hearing what happened
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Morning came. You and Akiza didn't even bother with any flirty talk or even breakfast as you both threw on your clothes and rushed down to Ren's room. Very gently, you open the door to see if they were awake. You see them both up, with Misty holding his head in her arms as he lay against her.

"Hey you two, how's our patient doing?" You ask as you get their attention.

"Much better bro. I feel a lot more calm from last night." Ren replies before his expression turned dour . "I guess I have some explaining to do about my time with Syd, don't I?"

"Not at all. I think we got the general jist of it from what we heard last night. You needed to survive on the streets, and Syd gave you the chance to. You probably did bad things and hurt good people, but in time your conscience overpowered you and had you turn in some of his gang. That about sum it up?" You ask.

"Y-yeah. But how can you be so cool with it? Like you said, I hurt a lot of innocent people. You can really just forgive that?" He asks.

"Ren, did you already forget that they forgave me after I was a Dark Signer, a group that threatened to destroy the world and everyone on it?" Misty reminds him.

"Yeah, and my past isn't too different with how I was used by Sayer and hurt people with my powers." Akiza adds in. "But Yuten, Yusei and the others forgave me."

Ren grows a smile back on his face. "I guess you're both right. Thanks." He says before getting out of bed and beginning to get dressed.

"Where are you going bro?" You ask.

"I've got to watch the twins again. At least, I would, if they weren't going straight from school to this new rich kid's house today. So I'm stuck watching their house until they get back." He replies.

"Really Ren? You're complaining about having to watch over a penthouse suite, complete with an Olympic-size pool, a jacuzzi, and a t.v. bigger than your room, all without any responsibility?" You question.

"Fair enough." He admits. "I suppose I could watch Toby again."

"Nope. Toby is going off to visit mom and dad for the week, so no worries about him." Misty says.

"Well then, I guess I'm free." He jokes before heading for the door. "Seeya, I'm off to go housesit." With that, he shuts the door behind him.

"I should go too. My manager is probably popping vessels in her forehead trying to get a hold of me after I ran out of my shoot last night to look for Ren." Misty says as she stands up. "Thank you both again for helping find him."

"Thank Jack, he did most of the detective work, we just followed him." You remind her. "And after that, you had the tough job of snapping him out of his anger."

"I'll be sure to thank Jack later. As for saving him, you were the one that protected me as I ran for him." She says in a matter-of-fact voice. She heads for the door. "Thank you both." Is the last thing she says before leaving.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Checking up on Ren

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza then saw your parents coming in and they looked very concerned.

“Is Ren okay? We heard what happened!” Your mom asked.

“Of course, mom. He’s fine.” You said.

“Can you explain what went down?” Your dad asked.

You go to explain the whole story about Syd, Ren’s kidnapping, rampage, and what he’s been doing in his time. That whole story had your parents feel terrible.

“We’re just so lucky to have Misty saving him from himself.” Your mom said.

“Got that right.” Akiza said.

“Well, as long as he’s fine, that’s all that matters. Still, these situations are getting out of control.” Your dad said.

“I hear you.” You said.

“Well, we’ll be on our way now. See you later.” Your mom said before your parents left.

You took the time to sit down and think about everything that’s happening.

“What’s wrong, Yuten?” Akiza asked.

“My dad is right about one thing. This road to the tournament is just getting bumpier and bumpier to the point where it’s getting out of hand.” You said.

“I know what you mean. This is just getting more and more nuts by the day.” Akiza said.

“In any case, I better get to the spirit world to see if Kisara found anything about my visions. Think you can watch over my body while I’m gone?” You asked her.

“Sure. No problem.” Akiza said.

You laid down on the bed before you meditate and got to the spirit world. You go into the home of Kisara and sees that there’s books all over the place.

“Oh! Hello, Yuten.” Kisara said.

“Hi. Uhh, were you studying or did a tornado hit here?” You asked looking around.

“Forgive me. I was looking around to find anything about your visions.” Kisara said.

“Well, did you find anything?” You wondered.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Family Chat And Getting Answers

choices: He's learned something, but still not much
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I'm sorry. I tore this whole place apart trying to find something about the creatures you described, but I found nothing. I'm starting to believe that they aren't even proper duel spirits." She explains.

"What the heck does that mean, "not proper duel spirits"? Don't all cards have a duel spirit, and by extension all spirits live here?" You ask.

"That's normally the case. Even the Earthbound Immortals were linked to this world while they were unsealed. So it's confusing me why there's nothing about these things." She answers. "Not even a name."

"Perhaps I can help with that?" You hear a male voice say. You both turn to see an old man with silver hair and a goatee in the doorway to the room.

"F-father?! What are you doing in here?" Kisara asks in a bit of a panic.

"It's my house, isn't it? I should be free to come and go from my own library as I please, shouldn't I?" He replies with a bit of a smirk. "Besides, after hearing the place be practically ransacked, I then hear my baby girl talking to someone, so my curiosity was peaked."

"Uh, Kisara, I thought you said this was your house?" You ask as you begin to question your safety here.

"I said this was my home, yes. I did flee here during the Army of Shadows' attack, and returned after their defeat. But legally this is my parents' house." She admits.

Meanwhile, the old man walks up to you and looks you in the eye. "So I guess you are the ones the dragons chose as their new master? You must be very powerful indeed. I am Otes, head of the Blue-Eyed clan and overseer of the dragons while they waited for their new guardian." He says before reaching out a hand.

"Yuten." Is all you can say as you meet his grip. You internally sigh in relief as it seems he's not going to brutalize you for entering his home without permission to talk with his daughter. "Wait, if you are the master, and the one in charge of the dragons, why was Kisara the one that had to contact me?"

He sighs at your question. "I'm afraid that by then, it was already too late for me. Myself, as well as my wife and sons were captured by the minus curse placed on this land by Zeman the Ape King. Only Kisara got away, so it fell to her to get into contact with you." He explains. "Come, let me introduce you to my family. Then we can discuss your visions."

He begins to walk out of the room, motioning for you both to follow. He leads you into the back yard, where you see another silver-haired man, this one considerably younger than Otes with muscles almost rivaling Greiger and in plated armor, practicing with a sword bigger than you. "Meet my oldest son, Tema." Otes says while gesturing for him to come over. "Tema, meet Yuten, the new champion of the dragons."

To your surprise, this man who looks a least a decade your senior, got on his knee and bowed to you. "It is an honor to meet the new champion. Know that should you ever need my blade, It is yours to use." He says.

"Don't be nervous. He's always been a formal one." Otes explains. "Tema, where are your mother and brother?"

"Practicing their magic in the mausoleum." He says, pointing to a structure behind him.

"Thank you, my son. Now come with us, I wish you to be present for this as well." Otes tells him. Tema arose and followed his father with you and Kisara behind them.

You entered the building to see that it's almost one for one like your Mausoleum of White card. sitting near the end of it, before the statue of a Blue-Eyes, you see two people kneeling in front of each other. The first was yet another silver-haired male, this one even younger than Tema and even looked close to your age. The other was a rather... endowed blue-haired woman in a flowing silk dress.

"Yuten, meet my youngest son Hamod, and my wife Nama." Otes says, snapping them out of their assumed meditation as they rose to meet you.

"Oh my, who is this my husband?" Nama asked.

"This is Yuten, the new champion of the dragons and the one that helped save us from the Army of Shadows." He answers again.

"A pleasure to meet you both." You say with a bow, hoping not to get on anyone's bad side.

"The pleasure is ours. We must thank your part in saving both our worlds." Nama says with a smile.

"Yes, thank you." Hamod says with a short bow. "I trust that my little sister has been giving you strong guidance while we were otherwise occupied? Then again, we most likely wouldn't be talking if she was."

As Kisara blushed and looked like she was about to go off on him, you stopped her with a hand. "Kisara's been doing a great job so far. But right now there's some problem that no book in your library can answer. Your father thought he could help, but that in no way undercuts what she's done so far." You defend, making her smile at your actions.

"Indeed." Otes cuts in. "Yuten here has been having visions that I might be able to help make sense of. Nama, get the stone for me, would you?"

With a bow from his wife, Otes leads you and his children up in front of the statue where they were just meditating. Nama quickly returns with a stone that looks similar to your own White Stone of Legend, but not quite. She sets it between you and Otes before she and her children kneeled down behind you, while Otes does the same in front of you, turning to face you and the stone. Taking the hint, you kneel down with them.

"Now then Yuten, tell us about this vision of yours, and perhaps our combined power will give you clarity." He says. You explain your dream to him down to the smallest detail. You even include what you learned from Yusei's duel with Ghost, even the name of Meklord Emperor Wisel. After you finish your story, Otes begins to stare into the stone, before saying...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Meeting Kisara's Family

choices: Can you tell me about this blank card I have?
Can you tell me about me and my brother’s spiritual energies?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Hmm. I think I heard of this Meklord Emperor that you speak of.” Otes said.

“Do you?” You asked.

“Yes. They appeared to be machine like beings with the power of negative energy flowing within them.” Otes said.

“Is it true, father?” Tema wondered.

“Yes.” Otes said.

“They only place I can think of where the negative energy comes from is the old Ener-D reactor that was built by my friend, Yusei’s, father.” You figured.

“But they never appeared when the Army of Shadows were unleashed.” Kisara said.

“She is right.” Nama said.

“They also have been absorbing the power of Synchro monsters for their own use. But why and who’s doing all of this?” You wondered.

“I’m afraid that’s all the information I know.” Otes said before you all stand back up.

“Forgive us if it isn’t what you seek.” Hamod apologized to you.

“It’s not your fault. It beats better than nothing. Thank you.” You bowed to them.

“You’re very welcome. Please, feel free to ask anything else that’s in your mind.” Otes said.

“Actually, there is....”
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: You Got Something

choices: They have some gifts for you before you leave
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Well, I would like to know about this strange... spirit energy I feel sometimes. My eyes glow, and my powers are boosted tenfold. What is that about?" You ask him.

"Well, as you already know, your very being is linked to the not just the dragons, but the entire Blue-Eyed clan. Our power comes to you when you need to protect another, as has been the way of our clan ever since the days of your pharoahs. Ever since the dragons bound themselves to the signer prophecy, however, so too was their champion linked to the five signers. You feel what they feel as if you were one of them." Otes explains.

"Wow, so it's not just the power of the dragons, but you five as well?" You ask.

"Seven." Hamod corrected. "You forget about the White Stone of Legend, as well as the one we hold here, the White Stone of the Ancients." He says, pointing at the stone in the center of you all. "While the Stone of Legend was born of the dragons uniting their powers, the Stone of Ancients has existed as long as our clan has."

"I see." You reply. "I must also know, what about my brother, Ren? He also has strange powers. Beyond his psychic abilities. What happened to him?."

"Ah, the champion of dual souls." Otes replied.

"What? What does that mean?" You question.

"Like you, Ren was also chosen by a dragon. His soul was to be bound with that of the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, much like yours is with your Blue-Eyes. However, something happened." He begins.

"What do you mean father?" Tema asks. "I thought that once a monster's soul is bound to a human's, the link is permanent."

"This is true. Ren's soul was indeed linked to Red-Eyes. However, another force came to link itself to him. A much darker, more destructive force. One that is chaos incarnate, and seeks only power. Another dragon bound itself to his soul." Otes responds.

"Beelze." You say under your breath. It was making sense now, every time he went rage, that dragon was always front and center.

"Indeed. It corrupted him, and split his soul between itself and Red-Eyes. In the end, the Diabolic Dragon finds itself overwhelming it's foe more often than not. While your power helped Red-Eyes supress it temporarily, it did not take long to return, and stronger than ever. I'm sure you have seen this struggle between them?" He asks.

"Yeah." You say as you remember Ren's eyes going from purple to red while on the ship before he passed out. "Then we need to get Beelze away from him before it happens again!"

"I'm afraid that's not possible. That dragon is now as much a part of him as he is. To try and separate the two would be like removing his soul." He says with a sigh.

You share his sentiment. "So he's doomed to forever be at Beelze's mercy?" You ask.

"Not exactly. Right now, that rage comes from the conflict between the two halves of his soul." Otes explains. "Should he find a way to bring harmony between the two dragons, so too should the chaos in his powers come to an end."

"How should he do that father?" Kisara asks.

"Only Ren can find that answer. But I do know this. As I peered into the stone, I foresaw parts of the inevitable battle with these Meklords. Ren must find a way to bring balance between the two to aid in your destiny." He answers.

Well, that sounded like the best answer you were gonna get. "Thank you, all of you. I hope to see you all again someday. Hopefully under more cheerful circumstances." You tell them as you prepare to return.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Light and Dark

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Wait. Before you leave, we want to give you gifts of our gratitude and support that will continue on to the future.” Otes said with a smile.

“Come on. You don’t need to do that.” You said.

“Yes. We do. First, here.” Otes said as he gives you some cards.

You looked and see that they’re the cards that have the entire family on it, including the stone of ancients. You see them each of them with the Eyes of Blue on them with different titles. Otes as the Master, Hamod as the Sage, Tema was the Protector, and Nama as the Priestess. They all even appeared to be tuner monsters as well.

“Should you need our strength, we shall be there.” Otes said.

“Thank you.” You said as Tema comes next.

“For you, a weapon worthy of your stature.” Tema said as he bowed and presented his gift to you.

“A sword?” You said as you picked it up.

“Put it on your arm.” Tema said.

You put the sword down on your arm and it immediately turns into a duel disk. It was shining with bright sky blue with then head of the Blue-Eyes by where the life point counter is.

“A new duel disk? Awesome! Thanks, Tema.” You said with joy.

“You are most welcome.” Tema said as he back up to allow Hamod to come next.

“These are scrolls with with ancient history of our world that should help you if you need them.” Hamod said as he gives you two scrolls.

“Thanks. They can really come in handy.” You said as you take the scrolls before Nama would come next.

“This here is a symbol of our clan.” Nama said as she presents a necklace with the symbol of the Blue-Eyes in the center. “Take this as a token to show that you will always be a part of our people as our champion.” Nama said as she puts the necklace around your neck.

“I will indeed treasure this always.” You said as you hugged her in respect before Kisara came in with one last gift.

“I actually have two gifts for you. One, is this.” Kisara said she shows you another card, only this one is a Synchro monster.

“Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon?” You wondered looking at the card.

“It’s been the very spirit of not only to this clan, but the incarnated soul of the dragons. I believe he may find you worthy.” Kisara said.

“I will accept it. What’s the second gift?” You wondered.

“Oh yes! That would be this.” Kisara showing you a rose, only it’s blue.

“A blue rose?” You wondered as you take the rose.

“Yes. You can only find this in the Mausoleum Garden. It shows the love and passion that we share to all beings alike. Give it to Akiza. She’ll love it.” Kisara said.

“I have a feeling she will. Thank you a lot everyone. I really appreciate this. I’ll be on my way home now. I’ll see you soon.” You said to the family.

“Until we meet again.” Otes said before you teleported back home.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Farewell Presents

choices: It's Ren, the twins were attacked
It's Michelle, someone's here to see you
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You awake back on Ren's bed where you conked out. You stretch and yawn as you arise to see Akiza sitting next to you. "Oh? Finally up, I see." She teases. "So, did you find anything about your visions?"

"Not much. All they found out was that these Meklord Emperors seem to be born of negative energy like the zero reverse incident, but not from that exact event." You tell her.

"How is that possible?" She questions. "Wait, they? I thought you were just going to see Kisara."

"I did. I ended up meeting her whole family though. They offered to help me get insight on my visions, but I didn't get much." You answer.

"How were they? As people, that is."

"Good folk, if not a bit highstrung. They even gave me their duel cards as a gift, see?" You say, showing you the cards you got from them.

"Cool." She exclaims as she looks them over. "I was going to ask what was happening in there once you started to get jewelry and a fancy new duel disk on your arm."

"Yeah. Those were also gifts for me." You say while pulling out Hamod's scrolls as well. "Oh, by the way..." You start before pulling out the blue rose. "This is for you."

She looked amazed at the beauty of the flower. "Oh Yuten, I love it." She says before taking it from your hand and putting it in her hair. "How do I look?"

"Even more stunning than before, and I didn't think that was possible." You say, making her blush.

"There is one other thing they told me, though. It's about Ren." You start, sombering the mood a bit.

"What's wrong?"

"Apparently the reason behind Ren's rage is that Beelze of his. It's fighting with his Red-Eyes for dominance of his soul, and winning. And the only way to stop it is for him to somehow find a way to get them to stop fighting and get along." You explain.

"That sounds tough." She says.

"It probably will be. The worst part is that we can't even help him. Ren has to figure out how to calm them himself."

"Hmmm... well, I guess we'll just have to figure that out in time. Come on, let's head back to our room. You can tell me more about Kisara's family as we walk." She says while pulling you out of bed.

"Sure. What time is it, anyway?" You ask as you leave the room.

"About lunch time. Why, you hungry?" She asks.

"Yes please. Don't forget, we skipped breakfast to go check on Ren. I could eat an Earthbound Immortal, I'm so hungry." You joke.

*****

You both returned to your room and sat down for a nice, big brunch. Afterwards, you watched some t.v. while you digested your meal for a couple hours. You the hear the phone ring. "I'll get it." You tell her as you get up to answer.

Who is it?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Sharing the knowledge

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Hello?” You answered.

“Bro! Thank goodness. Listen, I just got a call from Yusei. Leo and Luna were attacked earlier today.” The voice of Ren said.

“What?! Are you kidding me?! Are they okay?!” You asked in panic.

“They’re fine. They’re at the Satellite. I’m on my way to them now.” Ren said.

“Meet you there.” You said before you hang up. “Trouble again. This time it’s Leo and Luna. Can there be a day without anyone getting themselves hurt?” You said with frustration as you get ready to head out.

“Wait for me!” Akiza said following you.

You and Akiza met up with Ren at Satellite before going to see Yusei, Jack, and Crow with the kids.

“Are you okay? What happened?” You asked the twins.

“Yuten. It was bad. We were turbo dueling against one of our classmates named Lester.” Leo said.

“Turbo dueling? You guys are too young for that.” Ren said to them.

“Turns out that this Lester guy can turbo duel with a skateboard like we use our runners.” Yusei said.

“So why is it bad?” Akiza wondered.

“Because the damage we took in that duel was real. Not to mention his monster was like super powerful!” Leo finished.

“How powerful?” You asked.

“Like this. Here.” Luna said as she draws something.

You looked at the drawing of what looks like a mechanical blue bird. What surprised you is the symbol on its chest. That made you clutched your head in pain.

“Yuten!” Akiza gasped.

“You okay pal?” Crow said as everyone looks at you.

You then had the vision of that bird along with the other machines that destroyed the world. You gasped as you felt the pain gone away.

“That’s....one of the Meklord Emperors. I can tell by the symbol on its chest.” You said.

“We got beaten pretty bad because of that thing. It was nuts.” Leo said.

This was troubling. Now Luna and Leo got a taste of these mechanical monstrosities. This is getting out of hand in a hurry as you go see the view outside. The thought of what the family in the spirit told you has you got into deep thought. What’s going to happen now and who is the one behind all of this?

“You okay?”

You looked over to see
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: It's Ren, the twins were attacked

choices: He understands and promises to find a way
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"You alright bro? You ran out of there pretty quick." Ren says as he walks out of the garage.

"Yeah, I'm good. I'm just... thinking" You tell him. "It's just that a lot's been going on lately, is all."

"Yeah, I get you. This past week or so has been a real kick in the balls for us. What with the kidnappings, duel runner thieves, and these Meklord guys. It's no wonder dad's getting worried about us." He says as he leans on a wall.

"Speaking of these Meklord things, you said you saw them in your vision right? Where they destroy New Domino?" He asks.

"Right. I recognized the one Yusei dueled right away from my vision. And while crude, Luna's drawing looks similar to another one of them." You explain. "That's part of what's got me worried. There were three of them in my dream, but we've only seen two so far. So when's this third one gonna make a move?"

"Jeez, I never thought of that. You're right, that is a big problem." He begins to ponder. "And with no idea who's even pulling the strings, we're shooting blind here. But as long as I got my deck, Beelze and I will chew right through these creeps."

You cringe as he mentions his dragon. You recall the spirit family's warning. "Listen Ren, about that. I feel it only fair to warn you. It's about your rage power." You start.

He pops up at your words. "Really?! You have something?! Don't just bite your tongue bro, tell me. If you have a way to keep me from hurting you or Misty or anyone else, then I need to know."

"Alright. Just keep in mind that I'm giving you the abridged version of what I was told." You tell him, with him nodding in response. "Okay. So apparently your soul is currently linked to both your Red-Eyes and your Beelze. Only Beelze wasn't meant to be linked to you at all. Now the both of them are fighting for dominance of your soul. Your rage form comes whenever Beelze manages to take control for a while. And before you think about destroying Beelze, know that the soul link will make it like destroying part of yourself. Somehow you have to get them both to stop fighting and get along. Otherwise you'll always be at risk of turning. And apparently only you can find the answer, so no help from anyone else." You explain.

How does he take it?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Coming Clean

choices: Talk to the guys about this
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“So that’s how it’ll go?” Ren wondered.

“I’m afraid so.” You said.

“Okay. I understand. I mean, I was shocked when you said Beelze was the one responsible for my anger management problem. But, he’s still my ace and Red-Eyes is just like him. I mean, they could think differently, but they’re both strong and they’re a part of my deck. So, I’ll find the answer eventually and hopefully they’ll stop going at each other’s throats before the tournament.” Ren said with determination.

“I’m happy to hear you say that.” You said smiling while patting on his shoulder.

“You know it. Oh yeah. There’s another thing I want to ask you.” Ren said.

“What’s up?” You wondered.

“What do you make of this?” Ren asked as he pulls out a card.

You were surprised because it’s the exact same blank card you and Akiza have in your possession.

“Where did you get this?” You asked.

“I found it on the couch while I was watching over the kid’s place. I thought I would ask you about this before this whole incident happened.” Ren explained.

“Hold that thought real quick. Akiza! Come over here!” You called out to your girlfriend.

Akiza came and you all have the three blank cards out in front of you.

“Now we each have one.” You said.

“What does it all mean?” Akiza wondered.

“That’s what I want to know.” Ren said.

“All I do know is that we’re meant to have these cards. We just don’t know what will happen or what to do with them.” You said.

“What should we do then?” Akiza wondered.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: New Mysteries

choices: They are completely clueless on the subject
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"We should tell the others about this. Once is weird, twice is freaky, but three times? That can't be a coincidence." You tell them.

"Agreed. Even if they can't help us, they at least have the right to be kept in the loop." Ren adds.

"Alright, let's do this but first, Ren? Would you mind telling us what happened before you found your card?" Akiza asks.

"Uh... sure. I was hanging around their place, minding my own business while I waited for them to get back. I was still kinda tired after what happened last night, so I decided to take a quick nap while nothing was happening, you know?" He starts.

"Let me guess, then you had a strange dream?" You ask.

"Yup, and even stranger in hindsight now that I know about all the stuff that I learned here." He answers. "It started off with Beelze fighting that one Meklord guy that Yusei dueled the other night." He continues.

"Was he losing?" Akiza cuts in.

"No. Actually, he was tearing it up. That is, until a monster jumped in to help. I didn't recognize it then, but now I see that it was the thing that Leo and Luna fought. This new monster shot some weird light beams out of it's chest that grabbed Beelze. It then began to pull my dragon into it like what happened to Stardust. Then, at the last second, a ball of fire hit the other one square in the chest, freeing Beelze. Then Red-Eyes came on the scene and started to help Beelze." He explains.

"Red-Eyes? But I thought they hated each other?" You ask.

"I dunno. My brain didn't know that yet, that's why it's even stranger now that I do know. Anyway, the two squared off to fight them, only..." He leads off.

"A stone tablet that looked like a blank card showed up, just before you awoke?" You fill in.

"Exactly. You guys too?" He asks with you and Akiza nodding in response. "Freaky. Anyway, I woke up and the card was right between the couch cushions."

"Got it. Okay then, let's go tell the others." You say as you lead them back in. "Hey guys." You start to get their attention. "We need to talk."

The three of you then go into detail about your blank cards, and the dreams that proceeded them. You told them how your dream predicted these guys to begin with, then how Ren and Akiza's dreams described battling them. You concluded by showing them each of your blank cards before putting them back in your decks.

How do they take it?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Talk to the guys about this

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Sorry, guys. We’ve got nothing on this.” Crow said.

“Same here.” Jack said.

“That’s fine. We just want to give you this information considering with all of this madness going on.” You said.

“We understand. But, I think I might have a hunch on something.” Yusei said.

“What is it?” Ren asked.

“It all started a few nights ago when I battled this one duelist with a synchro summoning method I never seen before. He called it Accel Synchro.” Yusei said.

“Accel Synchro?” You wondered in confusion.

“Yeah. It’s where you take a synchro monster and a tuner monster that’s also a synchro and create a monster unlike anything else.” Yusei explained.

“That’s insane.” Akiza said in awe of this info.

“That’s why we’re going to do the same. Mastering Accel Synchro Summoning could gives us a fighting chance if we face these Meklord guys again.” Yusei said.

“Maybe that’s what these cards are for. Guys, I think we need to think outside the box, or the synchro box in this case.” You said.

“You think so bro?” Ren asked.

“Yes.” You said.

“Well, before you go, there’s something else you want to know.” Yusei said.

“What is it, Yusei?” You wondered.

“Remember the robot with that Meklord Emperor? I have a feeling who was using it.” Yusei said.

“You do? Who?” Akiza asked.

“Iliaster.” Yusei said.

“Iliaster? What’s that?” Ren said.

“Ain’t it that secret organization that Rex Goodwin was in charge of?” Akiza wondered.

“The very same.” Yusei said.

“I thought it was no more when Goodwin vanished from the face of the earth.” You said.

“Apparently not. During my battle with Roman, he mentioned meeting someone from Iliaster at the Nasca Lines. That meeting what made him betrayed my father.” Yusei said.

“So wait, you mean to tell us that this group used Roman and Goodwin for their own benefits?” You figured out.

“That’s right for they’re the reason that the Zero Reverse incident happened.” Yusei said.

That shocked you all. So it was this organization’s fault that the Dark Signer battle happened. If this group was using the Goodwin brothers as their pawns, then they must be stronger than you thought.

“Thanks for telling us, Yusei. We really appreciate it.” You said patting on his shoulder.

“Sure.” Yusei said with a smile.

“Well, we better get home. Come on, guys.” You said.

“You two go on ahead. I’ll take the kids back home. I’ll even buy food and we’ll get it right this time.” Ren said.

“Alright! Best babysitter ever!” Leo said with joy.

“You two earned it after what you’ve been through.” Ren said.

As you three were walking to your runners, you see Ren in deep thought.

“You okay bro?” You asked.

“Yeah. After hearing Yusei’s story, I’m starting to believe that this group could be responsible for Misty becoming a Dark Signer as well if they made Roman and Goodwin unleash this negative energy.” Ren said.

“You’re not mad about it, are you?” Akiza asked.

“I am. But only a little. It’s Misty I’m worried about.” Ren said.

“Talk to her about it when you get the chance.” You said.

“Sure thing. See ya.” Ren said before you and Akiza left for home while Ren goes with the twins.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: They are completely clueless on the subject

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza rode home in silence. It wasn't that you were mad at each other or anything, you were just using the time to ponder what's happened so far. You clenched your teeth a bit at the thought of these Iliaster guys not only having some sort of global deathwish, but that they'd target kids for whatever plan they have now. But, there was little you could do about it now.

All you could do at the moment was try and figure out these cards you three recieved. Judging by the visions they came with, you could only assume that these would prove the key to taking those Meklord Emperors down. The question now though was how?

*****

You both returned home around dinner time. You both walked back to your room for Akiza to cook something up for you both. "So Yuten, what's the plan for tomorrow?" Akiza asks, finally breaking the silence.

"Well, in a couple days is the big dinner to welcome the teams participating in the tournament. I was hoping we could spend tomorrow preparing as a team so we don't make fools of ourselves at a formal party." You tell her.

"Oh come on, we did just fine at the presentation dinner for the pulsars, and the double date with Misty, we should be just fine here." She argues. "Besides, do you really think I'm the embarrassing type?"

"You? No. Ren? Maybe." You answer. "Besides, we hardly had to mingle at either of those. We all mostly stayed as a group. Here, we'll be showing our best foot to the other teams."

What's the final call?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Back home

choices: Look at the scrolls Hamod left you
Your dad came by to have a father-son chat with you
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I....guess you do have a point. After all, I’m more worried about these Meklord Emperor guys if they showed up at the tournament.” Akiza said.

“Exactly. That’s why we need to be in the best shape we can be.” You said.

“I understand. It’s just that...”

“Me too.” You said as you know what Akiza’s going to say. “Under normal circumstances, I would want to just take an easy with our training and just go around together for fun. But, now that we’re facing a threat that could be more powerful than the dark signers, I want us to have at least the chance to protect you, our families and friends, and the entire world. If anything happens to you, I can never forgive myself.” You said in a serious tone.

“I know you do, Yuten. That’s one of the reasons I love you so much.” Akiza said pulling you into a hug to show her support.

After that, you took the time to get your runners into the garage to have Sion install some new upgrades to them. You even told Ren to do that when he gets back as you’re now outside looking at the horizon. It’s been one hell of a ride going into this tournament. All you can think now is look on and think about any sort of possibility you can have against this threat. You just hope you can find the answer before time runs out.

What do you do next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: You could use the practice

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Son? You up here?" You hear your dad's voice say, making you turn to see him up on the roof with you. "Your mechanic said you would be up here, but I wasn't sure if you would still be."

"Hey dad, what's up?" You question as you let him walk up next to you.

"Listen, I've been wanting to say something to you, and I only want to say it more after all this mess that's been happening lately." He starts.

"You aren't going to tell me to ditch the tournament, are you?" You ask, unsure of where this was going.

"No, God no. No matter how dangerous this gets, I know that this is something you just have to do for your ideals, and I respect that. Your mother might not agree, but we agreed to disagree and step back and hope for the best with this. Just promise me you won't get you and your brother killed, alright? She doesn't need that heartbreak twice in her life." He tells you.

"I have no plans on dying. We're gonna make it all the way to the finals and win it all." You say with pride.

"Atta boy. That's what I want to hear you say." He says with a pat to your shoulder.

"So is that it, just don't die?" You question.

"No. I came to find you to talk about something else. It's about that girl of yours, Akiza." He starts.

"What, you want me to break up with her?" You ask, much to his growing annoyance.

"No! Cut me off again and you'll be sorry. Don't think you're too big for me to pull you over my knee." He shouts.

"Sorry." You say, backing off.

"Anyway, no, I don't want you to break up with her. She's a sweet young lady and I can see the love in both your eyes as true." You were about to say something, but one look from him shut you up. "But with how dangerous this will be, I don't want there to be any regrets should you... you know. Listen, before this tournament goes down proper, I want you to do one little thing." He says.

"What's that?" You ask.

"Go get her a ring." He answers, with you quickly getting his meaning. "I don't care if you ask her right away or if you want to hold on to it until the finals to motivate you, but just get the ring. Can you do that for me?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Father-Son Talk

choices: Skip to training and upgrade testing
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Of course, Dad. I can do that. Although, I’m not sure if I’m what they would call the marrying type.” You said to your dad.

“Yes you are. I can tell by how you’ve treated her with all the love in your heart. Believe me when I say that you two look completely amazing together and I know you two want to spend your lives with each other.” He said.

“Well, if you believe in it, then sure. However, I would like to hold it off until sometime after the tournament. I just don’t want any distractions coming into the big event.” You said.

“Do what you want. Just don’t take too long. Okay?” He said before you nodded and you two hugged before he left.

After thinking, you go on back to your room and see Akiza resting on the bed before she sees you coming in.

“Feeling better, Yuten?” Akiza asked you as you come in.

“Yes. Just had a talk with my dad.” You said as you get undressed.

“How did it go?” She wondered.

“Good. Told me not to get killed coming into the tournament.” You said getting on the bed.

“Good advice.” Akiza said.

“Listen, I think this Meklord stuff has finally getting into my head. I just don’t understand why us, our friends, and New Domino is always a target.” You wondered.

“I don’t understand about this either.” Akiza said.

“Also, I know I’m pushing this team so we can motivate each other, but I feel uneasy with the thought of having to face this threat, but I think I’m overdoing it a little because of this crisis.” You said.

“Me too.” Akiza said.

“Tell you what. After practice, how about you and I spend the day together. You know, to relax our minds.” You suggested.

“That’s sounds like a great idea. I’ll do it.” Akiza said before you two went to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Protect A Planned Future

choices: Her runner spins out and crashes
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
The next morning came and you pulled Akiza right on down to your runners, barely giving her enough time to get her riding suit on before you left. Ren came in late last night after he was one hundred percent sure that Lester wasn't gonna come after them again, so he was still groggy by the time you showed up at his door, ready to go.

You gave him time to get dressed and Akiza to rub the sleep out of her eyes before heading down. "Hey Sion, we all set?" You ask as you walk in.

"Yes sir. Your speed output should be at least double what it once was." He says with pride.

"That's great, but I don't just want more speed. I want control. How's our handling look?" You respond.

"Well, if my projections are correct, you should be able to make 88 degree turns without any drift or speed decrease." He answers.

"What's the deal with handling, bro? Shouldn't we be focusing on being the fastest on the track?" Ren asks.

"Anyone can go super fast, Ren. But this is equal parts speed and driving, so if we can go just as fast on a turn as we do on a straight, then that consistency will get us the win. Besides, Yusei and his crew are trying to be the fastest for that accel synchro stuff, so we need to find our own style." You answer.

"Good thinking." Akiza adds. "Plus, it would help if we had an easier time avoiding attacks like the Meklord Emperors'."

"Fair points." Ren conceeds. "Okay then, let's ride."

*****

You ride out of the garage and find an unused track to practice on. "Okay, so who's first?" You ask.

"I'll take the first drive." Akiza volunteers as she revs her engine. "Wish me luck." She says as she tears off at speeds you never saw with your old runners. She nears a sharp turn without slowing down. You cross your fingers and hope Sion's projections were correct.

Did she make it?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: New Speeds

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You see Akiza turning around with all that she has and she made the turn okay, much to your joy.

“Yes! It worked!” You cheered.

“Woohoo! Did you see that? That was great! Thanks, Sion!” Akiza cheered.

“No problem, Akiza.” Sion said with a smile.

You watched as Akiza was driving around on the track as you remembered your conversation with your father last night. Even though you made it clear about your future plans after the tournament, you still get this uneasy feeling about what’s to come with this Meklord threat that you can’t seemed to push back.

“You okay, bro?” Ren said noticing your expression.

“Yeah. It’s just I had a talk with Dad last night.” You said.

“And how did it go?” Ren wondered.

“It went okay. He helped me think about what to do once this tournament is done with. But I can’t get rid of this feeling inside me about this threat we’re going to be dealing with.” You said shaking a little.

“Bro, you’re worrying too much about that crap. We’re going to beat these Meklord losers and we’re going to win this tournament no matter what. But we can’t do it if we have doubts.” Ren said.

This feels like the time Akiza slapped you across the face to knock you back into your senses after feeling afraid about battling the dark signers. You just needed a good wake up call for your bro is right. Having doubts won’t help you with this situation or help win the tournament. You need to keep your head on straight as you sighed in relaxation.

“Thanks bro. You’re right.” You said.

“Got that right.” Ren said.

“Okay, Ren. I think it’s your turn now.” Akiza said pulling over.

“That it is. Here goes nothing.” Ren said as he got on and begins boosting up his runner before driving as well.

You see that he had the same results and you smiled at him for helping you out of a mental funk as Akiza approached you.

“Did I miss anything exciting?” Akiza wondered.

“Nope. Not at all.” You answered.

You then took your turn and you managed to get the same thing. Now we move on to the next part of today’s training. Sharping up teamwork skills.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Brotherly Support

choices: "Uh... yeah. Just wait here and give me a second real quick."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
The three of you practiced your team combos and hand-offs for several hours, it neared lunch time before you finally called it. "Alright you two. I think we've got enough practice in today. Let's say we call it quits for the day?"

"Sure." Akiza agrees.

"I can live with that." Ren says before preparing to head out.

"Where you going bro? Hot date with Misty?" You ask.

"No, not today. Now that I know the truth, every minute I don't spend training with you guys or watching the twins, I'm trying to find a way to get these dragons under control. The sooner I do that, the less I have to worry about my powers going nuts when the tournament comes around." He answers.

"Got it. Good luck to you then. And remember, the ball welcoming the WRGP teams is tomorrow night, so be prepared." You call out over his revving engine.

"I'll be sure to practice my curtsy." He jokes with a thumbs-up.

"Smartass." You say under your breath. "Sion, me and Akiza are spending the day together, so you can head back."

"Understood sir. Have fun." He says before taking off in his car.

"So miss Akiza, we have the rest of the day to ourselves. How do you want to spend it?" You ask.

"Well, I was thinking of checking out that new mall downtown. Grab a bite to eat and see where the day takes us, you know?" She answers.

"Fair enough, let's go then." You tell her as you both ride off.

*****

You arrived at the mall in question just around lunch. You were amazed at just how big this place was. They probably had at least one of every type of store here. "Well, let's look around a little." Akiza says before walking off a bit.

As you observe the surroundings, you notice a small jewelers in the corner of your eye. You remember your promise to dad about getting the ring before the tournament started, but did you really want to leave her, for no matter how short, just to grab it now? Akiza noticed your hesitation and came back to check on you. "You coming?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Starting Your Day Together

choices: See the rest of the mall
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Of course. Let’s go.” You told Akiza.

You figured that you would want to get her the ring when she least expect it to happen. You don’t want to spoil the surprise as you go with Akiza around the mall. As you were, you think back at what Ren said. If Iliaster is truly behind this Meklord thing, then you need to keep your head in the game and don’t let doubt get in your way. That’s got to be your purpose when the tournament comes.

You and Akiza walk around and see a bunch of different stores until you spotted a crane machine with a bunch of stuffed animals inside. One in particular is a bear with a heart that said “I love you” on it. While Akiza’s wasn’t looking, you go to the machine, put a coin in it, and managed to get it on your first try before returning to her.

“Where did you go?” Akiza wondered.

“To get something like this for you.” You said showing you the bear that you were hiding behind you.

“Aww. It’s cute.” Akiza said while she hugs the bear.

You two then go over to a photo machine where you got your pictures doing different faces. Today was going great before you go to get lunch together.

“So, Yuten, about the tournament, you’re not nervous about our competition, are you?” Akiza wondered while eating.

“No. Not in the slightest. You?” You asked.

“Nope. In fact, I feel pretty confident about facing whoever we face.” Akiza said.

“I like the sound of that. However, it’ll take more than confidence alone to win this thing. As long as we play our cards right, we’ll come out on top.” You said with pride.

“That’s the spirit. And Yuten?” Akiza said before she holds on to your hand. “Remember that, no matter what happens during the tournament, just know that I’m really happy to be dueling beside you to the end.” Akiza said.

“You know I will.” You said with a smile.

You two throw away your trash and you walked with her. You told your dad that you don’t appeared to be the marrying type. Perhaps, you were wrong on that statement after all.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Play It Cool For Now

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As you continue around the mall, Akiza possesively wrapped around your arm, you begin to notice a lot of eyes on you both. No doubt they recognize you from all the press you've recieved lately after your announcement of entering the tournament. But, despite currently being something akin to celebrities, stares were all you got. No press nuts rushing you for interviews, no fans or hecklers getting in your faces, they just... watched from a distance. You couldn't tell if it was out of respect for the obvious date scenario or if they still feared your powers, but you were unsettled nonetheless.

You were snapped out of your daydreams by Akiza pulling on your arm. "Hey, relax. If they were really afraid of us, they'd be hurling insults and other things as we passed. Besides, the looks in their eyes show no signs of anger or fear, so you have nothing to worry about." She says with confidence.

"I guess so..." You trail off, still a bit uneased. Akiza, wanting to prove a point, scanned the crowd and spotted two women eying you and giggling to each other. Seeing this, she tightened her grip around you and gave a stern look to them, telling them to back off. A message that was quickly recieved.

"See, that's a look of fear." She jokes. "If they were looking at us like that, then we can be worried."

You laugh a bit at her actions. "I guess so. Come on then, I'll let you pick the next store we go in." You tell her.

"Okay then. I piiiick... that one." She says, pointing to...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: See the rest of the mall

choices: See what else this mall has

“A.....A lingerie store?” You stuttered while beating red in the face.

“Yep. Why? Too much for you to see me in some lingerie?” Akiza wondered in a seductive way.

“No! Not at all. Here. I’m probably not allowed in. So take some of this to help you buy whatever you want to get.” You said as you give her some money.

“Thank you. Wait right here. I’ll be back.” Akiza said before entering the store.

You took the time to think about what could be your move once this tournament begins. With all of the competition, there’s no doubt that this will be one of the biggest challenges of your life. Still, that doesn’t mean you’ll be taking a backseat to these guys, including Team 5ds. You can feel your blood going as fast as your runner with all of this excitement burning inside you. You then see Akiza coming back out with a bag.

“Well, I got them. I can’t wait to try them on.” Akiza said.

“Me too. I bet you’ll look so hot in them, I’ll be turned into a melted puddle.” You said.

“I bet.” Akiza giggled as you two...
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A lingerie store

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Hey Akiza, check this out." You say as you point at a map of the mall. "This place has it's own cinema. Wanna go see something new?"

"Sure. We've never really been to a movie theater together. Usually we just watch them at home from my collection. I've always wanted to see one on the big screen." She answers.

"Great, let's go then." You take her hand and lead her down to where the map says the theater was. You take a little time to see the current listings before coming back to her. "Alright, so unless we want to wait three hours for "Dark Magician Girl, the Musical..."

"Pass." Is all she had to say.

"...then I see two options for us. First is the Jack Atlas movie that finally got released last month after everything that's happened." You suggest.

"Isn't it a bit weird for us to be watching a documentary about one of our own friends while he's still alive? Especially one that was made while his past was full of Goodwin's cover-ups?" She asks.

"True, but I figured that we can go in and laugh at all the lies he fed that the people just ate up. Plus, the movie's been an absolute bomb since it came out, only selling a hundred tickets worldwide. I get the feeling the theater will be empty enough for us to have our own "fun" during the screening." You suggest.

"Oh my." She says with a blush. "What's the other choice?"

"The final movie to that sappy love story you love so much. You know, the one where the woman falls in love with a dragon, but species separate them and yadda yadda yadda..." You lead on, getting you a jab in the arm.

"Hey, I recall you liking the other two movies." She says with a pout.

"I enjoyed a few scenes, but I was always much more a fan of its real-life comparison." You hint as you pull her closer, making her blush a bit harder. "Anyway, that one's about to start and the theater is almost full, so if you want to see it, we have to go now. Your call. Or you can take your own look and see if there's something else you like.

What does she decide?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Nothing Like the Big Screen

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I think it’s best to see if they have anything new out.” Akiza suggests.

“By all means.” You said.

“Let’s see here. How about this one? “Dragon’s Light”. It said it’s about a man with the power of a dragon within him who must save a princess from a dark wizard.” Akiza reads on.

“That sounds interesting. Let’s go.” You said as you and Akiza went into the theater.

You got your tickets and got your popcorn and drinks before taking your seats. The movie began and you see a young man going around a village looking like an outcast for he has the spirit of a powerful dragon being deep within his soul. You can relate to him because of your psychic powers. In the next few scenes, the man found himself in love with a princess, except he’s bound to be married to a prince who is shallow and arrogant. You can tell that the princess doesn’t want it by the look in her eyes as the prince was being a jerk to her.

The man and the princess finally met. It got off on the wrong foot at first, but they start to like each other and they would see each other whenever they can. However, a dark wizard who is obsessed with revenge wants the dragon spirit the resides within the man and has hired the prince to do it for him.

The king would soon find about the princess’s relationship with the man and the prince manipulate him to have the man thrown out, only to stop and see if he’s even worthy period. The trials was a success and the prince was not happy. He then captured the princess and was taken to the wizard before the man went after them. The man defeated the prince and it was only him and the dark wizard. He was in trouble and he can see the princess scared for your life before he yelled into the air and gets the dragon spirit’s power to come out. He was able to defeat the wizard and the princess was saved before the man’s sacrifice.

That made Akiza cry and you a little tearing up. The movie was done with and you two made it out of the theater.

“That was actually not bad.” You said.

“Yeah. I really cried in the end when the main character died.” Akiza said.

“It was sad. Still, it was fun. What do you want to do now?” You wondered.

“I actually want to head back home now.” Akiza said.

“Then let’s head back.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Picking A New Movie

choices: You pull ahead for the win
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
By the time you two exited the mall, it was almost dark out. "Come on, we should get home quick before it gets any darker." You tell her as you approach your runners. Akiza puts the bear and her bag of lingerie in the compartment under her seat.

"What's the matter? Big bad dragon champion afraid of the dark?" She teases before giggling to herself.

"Ha ha." You laugh sarcastically. "Between the duel gangs, rogue duel bots, and these Meklord guys, I feel like nighttime riding has given us nothing but grief."

"Fair enough. Let's get moving then. Race ya'." She says before tearing out of the garage.

"Hey!" You call out as you start up your runner to follow after her. You manage to call her up on your display monitor. "That was a cheap trick." You tell her.

She sticks her tongue out at you playfully before speaking. "How about a little motivation to get that runner in gear then? Like I said, we'll race, but let's add some stakes to it, shall we?"

"Like what, another day of servitude?" You ask.

"Tempting, but no. I was thinking more of a wager considering my little 'purchase' earlier. You know, the one that will melt you into a puddle?" She asks.

"What about it?" You question, wondering what lingerie has to do with this.

"It's simple. If you make it back to the headquarters parking garage before me, then I'll give you my own little fashion show where I show you everything I purchased when we get back to the room." "Everything"? How much did she buy while your back was turned?

"Okay. And what, pre tell, should happen if little miss head start gets there before me?" You ask, a bit peeved at her putting stakes in a competition where she gave herself an advantage.

"Then when we get back, you get to try this stuff on and show off for my amusement. Then you won't be seeing me wear it until after we win the tournament." She answers.

As much as you would enjoy letting her smile at something like that, you just couldn't imagine yourself performing such a demeaning display if you lost, and with her head start, you losing was quite likely. "I dunno if I wanna..." You start before she cuts you off.

"Of course, if we don't race, then I don't know when, or even if I'll ever wear these. Think wisely about that call, Yuten." She sing-songs.

Well, that pretty much made your choice for you. If you didn't race, then you would be both taking away her happiness and your shot of ever seeing what she bought. At the very least, if you lost it would only be Akiza laughing at you. For her. You tell yourself. "Okay Akiza, you're on."

Who wins?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Race Home

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
It was cutting it close as you’re almost home. Akiza thought she had this won because of the head start, but you pushed your runner with everything this baby has. Soon enough, you’re neck and neck to her as she gives it her all too.

Suddenly, you felt something rising inside of you as you were boosting up. It could be your spirit energy, or it could be not. You don’t know. Either way, you felt going faster then you normally would be and actually managed to get to the garage first before you then Akiza pulled over.

“Wow. You actually made it back here first. I’m impressed.” Akiza said before noticing your surprise look on your face. “Are you alright?”

“Oh. Yeah. I’m fine.” You said.

“What just happened? For a second, I feel as if my soul was going beyond the limit.” You wondered in your mind.

“Well, congratulations. You won fair and square. Looks like you’ll be getting your show after all.” Akiza said as she gets off the runner with the stuff in her possession.

“Seems like it.” You said.

You followed her up to the room until Akiza stopped you.

“Wait here. I’ll call you when I’m ready.” Akiza said before going in.

You took this opportunity to think about what just happened during that race. You felt as if something deep inside you was rising up wanting to come out. In fact, you felt somewhat stronger when it occurred. However, it was only for a short time and you wondered what it could be.

“Okay, Yuten. I’m ready.” Akiza said from the other side of the door.

That’ll have to wait because you’ve got a show to bear witness.

You walk in to see Akiza laying sprawled out on your bed in a set of black cat keyhole underwear, complete with a set of cat ears and a tail. "Welcome home master. Is this to your liking, nyah?" She says while making her right hand to look like a cat paw.

Having already seen her in every possible angle, position, and role possible these past couple weeks, you would've assumed you'd have an immunity to having her sexiness burn out your brain. This little display, however, proved that theory dead wrong. "I-I-I... y-yes. Yes I like it very much so." You finally manage to stutter out.

She takes note of the power she now holds over you as she crawls off the bed and begins to rub herself on your legs like an actual cat. "I'm so happy to hear that master. I'm so glad that you're glad." She purrs while you try and make your way to the bed with her hovering around your feet.

You finally take a seat with her climbing back on top of the bed and taking a seat on your lap, giving you a good view of no only her top cleavage, but also the little keyhole in the front of her bra, giving you a sight most of her underwear don't give you. She continues to rub herself against you, making you shudder at the soft feel of her body against yours. You also notice that she's able to somehow move that tail as if it were a part of her. After a couple of her circlings, you can't help yourself as you reach out and begin to pet her.

"Nyah! Oh master, you know how much I love to be petted, but we need to continue the show." She says before hopping back off the bed, striking a couple of poses that give you some more sexy angles, then heading into the bathroom with her bag.

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: History Lesson

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As you were drying off while planning your day, the phone rang. You question who could be calling you at this time as you walk over to pick up the phone. "Hello?" You say.

"Good morning sir. It's Michelle down at the front desk." You hear through the phone.

"Ah, I see. What's going on right now? Why the call?" You ask.

"Well sir, Misty Tredwell is here and is requesting an audience with you." She answers.

"Misty? Are you sure she's asking for me and not Ren? Because I'm pretty sure he already left today." You tell her.

"No sir. She's asking for you by name. Are you unavailable?" She asks.

What could Misty possibly want with you but not Ren? Well, there was only one way to find out. "No, I'll be right down." You tell her.

You finish drying up and throw on your robes to head down. Sure enough, Misty was sitting right there in your lobby, waiting. "Ah, Yuten. I was wondering when you would come down."

"Hey Misty. What do I owe this surprise visit?" You ask.

"Well, I have someone that wants to speak with you." She pulls out a holophone and turns it on, revealing her brother Toby on the other end.

"Hello? Mr. Yuten?" He says through the line.

"Just Yuten is fine. What's up kid? You doing well after what happened?" You ask him.

"Yup. I've been able to eat full meals and enjoy the outside world again ever since you freed me. Thanks again for that." He says with a wide smile.

"No problem. So why's Misty here saying you want to talk to me?" You question.

"Well, she told me that you offered me a place in the new Arcadia Movement. After some thought, I've decided to give the movement a second chance. That is, if the offer's still out there?" He asks.

"Of course. You're free to move in anytime you want." You answer with a smile.

"Great. I would've asked in person, but I'm currently visiting my folks. I'll be sure to move in once I get back. Thank you sir." He says.

"No problem kid. I look forward forward to you coming back here after your visit." With that, he hangs up the phone, leaving you and Misty in the lobby.

"Thank you Yuten. You have no idea what this means to him." She says.

"No problem. If he's willing to trust this place after what it did to him, then I'd have to be a world-class asshole to turn him down." You reply, making her laugh a bit.

"Indeed. Well, see you at the party tonight." She says before turning to leave.

"Wait, you're coming too?" You ask before she leaves.

"Of course. Ren invited me of course. See you then." With that, she heads out the door, leaving you alone apart from Michelle at the desk.

What now?
