"Maybe try chatting up your Black Rose Dragon." You joke. "Talking to dragons seems to be the key for me and Ren."

"You know what, maybe I'll try that next time I'm alone." She says in a more serious tone than you were expecting.

What happens next?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Nice Meal Out

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
As you two were eating, you were then interrupted as you got poked on the shoulder. You turned to see a young man that has nice-looking brown hair, blue eyes, and is wearing the movement uniform.

“Hi. Sorry to bother you, but I just want to say thank for giving us a place to call home and good luck in the tournament.” The boy said.

“No problem and thank you. What’s your name?” You wondered.

“Tetsuo sir.” The boy named Tetsuo said.

“Well, Tetsuo, I hope you’ve been practicing very well.” You said.

“I have been and the teachings have been very useful. Can I say you two look amazing together.” Tetsuo complimented.

“Aww. That’s sweet of you.” Akiza said smiling.

“Also, here.” Tetsuo said as he gives you three stars with the Arcadia Movement symbol in the center.

“What are these stars for?” You wondered.

“We all made these for you two and your brother. We want to give these to you as us giving you motivation when the tournament comes.” Tetsuo said.

“Thanks, Tetsuo. These will help just fine.” You said as you give Akiza one star.

“You’re welcome. Now, I’m going to ask a girl I like out. Bye.” Tetsuo said before leaving.

“That was so thoughtful of him.” Akiza said looking at the star.

You looked on at yours and you know that you can’t let these people down no matter what.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Wishing For The Best

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"So, should we give Ren his star?" Akiza asks as you both exit the mess hall.

"Probably not. I'm gonna take a guess and say the princess and her dark knight are going to be busy for quite a while." You comment. "We'll give him his when we ride down to check the prelims tomorrow."

"Fair enough then." She says with a half smile.

"What's up?" You ask with concern in your voice. "You seem like you've got something on your mind."

"Well..." She starts. "I'm even more nervous about this tournament now than I ever was before."

"How can that be? We're gonna win this and that's the end of it. So what's to worry about?" You ask.

"You say that like it's so simple, but one wrong card, one lucky draw, and we could lose and let all of them down." She says as her smile fades and tears begin to form. "It wasn't like that during the Fortune Cup. Back then, all I was doing was trying to win and represent a movement, not people. I never had kids run up and say they were believing in me to win, how they were inspired by me and counting on me to win. But now I have to keep focused despite knowing that all those kids are resting their hopes on me."

You waste no further time to embrace her in a hug. "Hey, don't worry. Remember, put aside all the rally cries and speeches and this is still just any other duel. It's not like they're going to lose hope in us for not winning one duel, or have the people of Domino City burn this place to the ground if we don't get first. Life will go on." You assure her.

"But what about you and Ren? You're both counting on me as a teammate to cross the finish line with you, but I might just slow you both down in the process. Then you'll lose your dream." She adds.

"Ren isn't gonna mind. He wants to win, yes, but it isn't like he's going to hate you if we don't. As for my dream, win or lose, we show the people that our powers can be controlled. All a win does is give us a more favorable outlook, okay? My dream will live on." You comfort.

"R-right." She sniffles as the tears fade and her smile returns, and with it, her confidence. She then looks you in the eye. "Not like it matters anyway. Because we're going to smoke the competition, right?"

"Right." You assure as you release her and resume walking.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: After the meal

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You and Akiza made it back to your room and was going to lay down. That is until you turned and could’ve sworn you saw your deck and the blue rose glowing right before it stopped.

“Strange.” You said with a cocked eyebrow.

“Something wrong, Yuten?” Akiza asked.

“Was my deck and your flower glowing just a moment ago or am I going crazy?” You wondered just to make sure.

“I think you’re probably crazy.” Akiza said.

“Maybe.” You said before stripping into your boxers and laying down. “I’m getting so pumped up just wondering how this tournament will come into play.”

“You’re not the only one here.” Akiza said as she started stripping out of her clothes into her bra and panties, which you looked on with a smirk on your face.

“Can’t wait to get on the track, huh?” You said.

“You know it. It’s going to be exhilarating when we face any opponent in front of the crowd.” Akiza said before getting closer to you and sat down on your chest. “So tell me, did Misty tell you about this princess outfit she got for Ren?” Akiza wondered.

“Not really. Why?” You wondered.

“I was thinking about trying that myself with you. After all, she has her dark knight and I have my warrior with eyes of blue. It would make sense.” Akiza said with a sexy look on her face.

“I guess it would. But, I bet you want to try cosplay the princess in the movie, don’t you?” You guessed.

“I have my fantasies.” Akiza admitted.

“Am I in them?” You wondered.

“Yes.”

“Then I’m in.”

Akiza giggled as she lays next to you and you two kissed before falling asleep with your face in her breasts.

When you drifted into sleep, the spirit of Blue-Eyes appears in your room and was looking at you like it’s staring deep inside you. The dragon seems to have high hopes for you before it disappeared into the night.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Back at the room

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
With a buzz of the alarm, you quickly jump out of bed and begin to get dressed. Meanwhile, Akiza slowly rises as she rubs the sleep out of her eye. "Excited for today?" She asks, already knowing the answer.

"You bet. Our first duel might not be today, but this is technically the very first day of the competition. It all starts today." You say full of glee.

"Yes, well, keep in mind that the postings aren't going to be in another hour or so, so we have time to eat." She says as she gets up and throws on some clothes. "I'll get something cooked up. Then we can head down."

Then, a knock is heard at your door. "What, is he already set to go?" You ask as you go to answer it. Sure enough, Ren stood in your doorway with Misty at his arm.

"Hey bro. We thought you'd be up by now, so Misty figured we could spend breakfast with you. That cool?" Ren asks.

"Sure. Come on in you two." You say as you lead them in. "Akiza, two more plates worth."

"I heard." She calls back as you and Misty took your seats. "If I had some help, this would go faster." At that, Ren went into the kitchen.

"Hang on. I know a thing or two about cooking." He says. Soon, the two emerge with a small buffet's worth of food. Once everything was set and everyone seated, you all began to dig in.

"So, today's the day we finally learn who we're up against in our first duel. Who else is as excited as me?" Ren asks while cutting into his eggs.

"Ask Mr. Springboard here. The second he woke up he leapt out of bed like the room was on fire." Akiza joked.

"What can I say? This competition is going to be big for all of us. Is it so wrong that I'm pumped up for it?" You ask to the laughter of your peers. "By the way bro, we have something for you."

"Oh?" He asks while you get up to go grab Tetsuo's star and pass it to him. "What's this?"

"The kids worked together to make one for each of us three." You explain. "They're to motivate us during the tournament."

"Dang. Those little kids really do have faith in us, huh? Guess that just means we have even more reason to win, don't we?" He says with even more confidence in his voice.

"Right." You say before turning to Misty. "You said you have tailors on standby ready to make any outfits we desire and our relay armbands?"

"That's right. They are all just a phone call away." She answers. "Why, do you want a new outfit?"

"No. Tell your designers that this is what I want as the logo on our armbands." You say, holding up your own star. "Star and all."

"Got it." She replies. Soon, all the food is eaten and you, Ren and Misty are cleaning the dishes while Akiza changes into her riding outfit.

"Okay, let's go." You say as you lead your group downstairs to the garage. There, Sion is waiting for you all with your runners prepped.

"Ah, good, you're all here." He says. "Your runners are all at peak performance, sir. I hope to see you all return after discovering who you duel first."

"Excuse me?" You ask like he said something offensive.

"Sir?" He questions, worried about what he might've said wrong.

"You said you hope to see 'you all' return. Implying that we were ever going to be going down there without our mechanic to see the competition with us." You say in a lighter tone.

"Oh?! Really?! I'm honored, sir, truly I am. Just let me go warm up my car and..." He starts before Misty stops him.

"No need. You'll be riding with me in my car." She tells him.

"Th-thank you ma'am. I'm honored by your generosity." He replies as he follows Misty into her limo while the three of you board your runners.

"Okay everyone, Let's ride!" You say as you all leave the garage.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Day of the Announcement

choices: Enjoy the rest of the announcement
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You had all made it to the arena where the preliminary matches will be taking place in three short days. You parked by the garage and you all stepped into the arena where you see everyone here, including Team 5ds.

“Hey, everyone!” You said to your friends.

“Hey! Glad that you’re all here.” Crow said smiling.

“Yep. This is it. Everything is coming into play.” You said.

“You got that right. All of the teams are here and the competition seems to be getting better.” Yusei said.

“Well, if you ask me, I think we’re going to put on a great performance.” Ren said.

“You can say that again.” Crow said.

You then spotted Jack and he seems to have the fire in his eyes. You can see why considering that he sees you as a very worthy adversary. Jack has been one of the world’s best duelists out there in his career. But when he fights you and Blue-Eyes with his Red Dragon Archfiend, it would be unlike anything else he had experienced before and neither would it be for you.

“I see you still has that fighting spirit inside you, huh, Jack?” You said cocky.

“And I see you still have your wit, Yuten.” Jack said back.

“Bet you can’t wait to get this tournament underway as much as I do.” You said.

“Yes. Just do me a favor and don’t lose until you made it in the finals with us.” Jack said.

“I can say the same for you.” You said.

Now the time has come to for the bracket announcement as the announcer came.

“Greetings all of our amazing turbo dueling teams! It is with great pride that I welcome you to the announcement for the brackets of the World Racing Grand Prix! We have some wonderful talent her with us and we’ll see you all in action in just three days! But first, let’s see how this will play out!” The announcer said.

The bracket shows up on the screen and you see a bunch of teams here. 5ds is on the opposite side. So you’ll only face them if you guys make it to the finals. You then see who you’re facing first.

“Team Cameo?” Akiza wondered.

“Who are those guys?” Ren wondered.

“Beats me.” You said.

You then caught something else on screen and that’s a team called New World.

“Team New World? Why does that sound anonymous?” You thought in your head.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: At the announcement

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
The announcement went on for a little while, explaining to the uninformed about things like how Speed World has now become Speed World 2 and all the effects that came with it. Thankfully you already learned about that back in basic. He also explained that each duelist was given four thousand life points each, totaling twelve thousand for a full team of three. Lastly, any exchange will need to be fast. If a duelist completes a lap while the other team is in the pit, the team in the pit loses a speed counter, and loses the duel entirely if this happens when the pit team has no counters left.

"So the name of the game is going to be repairs and switches." Sion says as you all return to your vehicles. "I guess that means I'll need to be at my A-game then, huh?"

"What confuses me is why not just draw up a singular bracket for the whole thing?" Misty asks. "It's not like there's an eneven number of teams or anything."

"Well, I have two theories on that." You say. "Either the new directors want to extend the tournament for the excitement of it, or they want to make sure a great team isn't automatically booted just because of one bad hand. This way, you can still lose one match and still make it into the bracket as long as you're the top of your block."

"I think I understand now." She answers. "So what about our opponents? This... Team Cameo?"

"Never heard of them." You admit.

"Well sir, I did some digging on them when we saw that they were our first match." Sion speaks up. "Apparently two of them are best friends from an out-of-the-way place called Crash Town, now Satisfaction Town after a recent change in management. However, the third duelist is a complete mystery. It's like she just... showed up and joined these two."

"You better believe it." You heard from behind you. You all spin around to see two people approach you. The first was a man with what looks to be an attempt at a blonde pompadour in a red and white jacket, and the other was a girl with blue hair swirled at the top in a white coat and yellow undershirt.

"And you are?" You ask as they stop in front of you.

"Oh! Sorry, where are my manners?" The blonde says with a forgetful look on his face. "The name's Toru, and me and my team are gonna ride this tournament to the finals."

"I'm Misaki." The bluette says with a stern look on her face. "I'm here to keep Toru out of trouble." Her words make Toru trip over himself a bit.

"Aw come on Misaki. Don't embarrass me in front of our first opponents." He whines.

"Wait, opponents? Does that mean you guys are Team Cameo?" Akiza asks.

"Yeah, we'r..... wait what?" Toru starts to ask before stopping to pull out his schedule. "Aw man. I thought we were going with one of the cool names I spent all night thinking up?"

"You were outvoted. This was what we went with." Misaki responds.

"Fine." Toru says before turning back to you. "So yeah, we're Team Cameo, but we're still gonna win this." He says with renewed confidence.

"Nice to meet you. I'm Yuten, that's my girlfriend, Akiza. My brother, Ren. His girlfriend, Misty, and our mechanic Sion." You name off. "We're team Arcadia. We look forward to our first match together.

"Say..." Ren chimes in. "Where's your third? He not good enough to come mingle with the common folk?"

"Nah. He's probably back at our garage right now. We figured we'd come get a look while he checks out our bikes, you know?" Toru says. "But don't worry, you'll meet him come our match, and then you'll wish you hadn't."

"We should go." Misaki says as she walks away.

"Hey, don't be rude Misaki." Toru says before begining to follow her. "Sorry about her. She's not the conversation type. See you guys, can't wait to race. Misaki wait up!" He says as he runs after her.

"What a strange bunch." Ren says to unanimous agreement from your crew.

"But I'm sure they've got the skill to back it up, so we need to be at our A game." You say.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Meeting The Competition

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After that was finished, you all rode back home before Misty told you that she’s going to her photo shoot and should be back by dinner later tonight. Now it’s just you, Akiza, Ren, and Sion.

“So, what now?” Ren wondered.

“Let’s head back to the track for more training. There’s some more tactics we would like to try out.” You suggested.

And so, you all made it out to the track and train more than ever. While you guys are planning new strategies, you were in a lot of thought as it relates to this New World team you saw on the screen before. There’s something strange about it. You just can’t put your finger on it.

“Something wrong, bro?” Ren asked while behind you on the track.

“No! Nothing’s wrong.” You said.

“Anyhow, that Cameo team has a lot of confidence going into the first match.” Akiza said.

“You bet. That’s why we’re going to give it our all when we face them.” You said.

“Aren’t you worried about the audience? Won’t you be concerned about what their reaction will be?” Ren wondered.

“That’s up to them. Plus, we’re going to show them that our powers can be controlled with enough hard work. It’ll be the first step towards peace between psychics and non-psychics. You’ll see.” You said staying on track.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Training Once More

choices: They volunteer you to go first
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After another long day of training, the four of you soon returned to headquarters so Sion can work on any repairs. Meanwhile the three of you got to talking. "Okay, so I think we've got our game down pat. Whatever those guys throw at us, we'll be ready for it." Ren says.

"Right." Akiza says. "By the way, when's Misty getting back? I don't want us to have dinner without her, but I'm getting hungry."

"She messaged me earlier saying that she just finished up the shoot. I told her to meet us at headquarters and she said it'll take her about an hour to get here. That was about half an hour ago, so we've still got time." Ren answers.

"Well I have to cook food for five people. Even with Ren's help, that's still gonna take some time." She says with a huff. Sion's ears perked up at that number.

"Excuse me, ma'am. Did you just say five people?" He asks. You take the initiative.

"Sion, how many times am I gonna have to explain this to you? You're an important part of the team. Tonight we celebrate as a team, and we aren't leaving you out of it." You explain to him.

"Th-thank you sir." He says with tears of joy in his eyes before returning to his work.

"Meanwhile, I think now might be a good time to figure out the order we ride in when the day of the match comes." You tell your teammates. "So, who's gonna take Team Arcadia's first lap in the World Racing Grand Prix?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Deciding the Lineup

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I will do it. I think with the play I can do with my graveyard, I can give you some good suggestions if I ever get eliminated.” Ren offered.

“Make sense. Ren gets first dibs. Now, I think Akiza should go second just to give our opponents a little more of a push back. That leaves me as the final entry.” You said.

“I think that would be a wonderful idea. Let’s hope that we don’t get pushed back into a corner ourselves.” Akiza said.

“I hear ya.” You said.

Dinner was here and Misty came back just as she promised. As you all, including Sion, eat, you can see that this tournament will be something that will live for a long time should you win it.

“Well, here’s to building a great team and praise that we’ll go all the way.” You toasted.

“Cheers!”

“So, Ren, I have another shoot to do tomorrow.” Misty said.

“That’s good.” Ren simply said.

“Actually, I would like you to be in it with me.” Misty said.

“M-M-Me?!” Ren stuttered shockingly.

“Yes. It’s for a couples magazine and I would like it if you join me.” Misty said.

“Here that? You’re going to be in a magazine! That sounds cool.” You said.

“Well, if you want me there, then you got it.” Ren said.

“Good. It’ll only last for about an hour. We’ll be back in no time.” Misty said.

Ren nodded and Sion was looking on with a blush on his face, which you noticed.

“You okay, Sion?” You asked.

“Yes sir. I was just thinking about, uhhh, seeing that with me and Michelle.” Sion admitted.

“You have a crush on Michelle?” Akiza wondered.

“Yes. I just wished I can get the courage to ask her out.” Sion said with shame.

“Look, I normally play this card when I say that, if you love her, go for her. Trust me.” You said to give Sion confidence.

“Of course. Thank you, sir.” Sion said.

“And remember, you’re our best mechanic. You’re just an importance to this team than you realize.” You said.

“Yes, sir.” Sion said after you two said before you finished eating.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Order In Place

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
With everyone's bellies stuffed to the brim. You all decide to call it a night. "We need to turn in soon Ren. The shoot might not take long, but we need to be up early for it." Misty says as she pulls Ren away to head upstairs.

"Night guys." Ren calls before they are out of sight.

"I should get some shut-eye too. If you two decide to train, then I need to be alert for any problems." Sion says as he begins to stand up.

"Okay then. Just remember what I said about Michelle." You call after him before Akiza stops him from leaving.

"Actually, with Ren gone there's not much point in the two of us training alone. So why don't you take the day off and go talk to her?" She suggests. "Enjoy yourself." She says with a pat on his shoulder before he begins to leave once more.

"Th-thank you." He says before leaving.

"I hope he does well with her." You say as the both of you return to your room in silence, only for you to break it while you were changing for bed. "So, we know who we're up against. Now we just need to beat them."

"Yup. But that's not here or there right now. For now, let's just relax a little. We still have to figure these cards out, after all. So one break from training could do us well." She says as you both crawl into bed and snuggle close before clicking off the light and going to sleep.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: After dinner

choices: Talk with Akiza’s parents more before you leave
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
When morning came, you wake up and see that Akiza’s still sleeping. Guessed you woken up early this time. As gently as you could, you get up and got out of bed before getting yourself ready. While you were doing that, you thought of something. You haven’t seen Akiza’s parents in quite a while. Maybe, you can talk to them about your idea for your marriage to Akiza.

When you got dressed, you left a note saying that you’ll be gone for a little while and you’ll bring some food back when you’re done. It won’t be too long.

You got on your runner and you made your way out to their place. Once there, you got up to the door and knocked on it before Akiza’s father, Hideo, answered.

“Yuten! How are you doing?” Hideo greeted you.

“I’m fine, Mr. Izinski.” You said nicely.

“Please, Yuten. You can call me Hideo. Come on in.” Hideo said before you entered.

“Is that Yuten? How are you, my boy?” Akiza’s mother, Setsuko, asked nicely too.

“I’m fine, Mrs. Izin... Uh! I mean, Setsuko.” You corrected.

“Where’s Akiza? She would normally be with you.” Setsuko wondered.

“I woke up early and left to come see you two alone.” You answered.

“How come?” Hideo wondered.

“Because I have something to share with you. But you have to promise not to tell Akiza.” You said.

Her parents where skeptical as you all sit in the living room.

“Okay. The thing is.....” You breathe easy before you let it out. “I’m planning on asking for your daughter to marry me.”

The parents were surprised before Setsuko made her way to you and hugged you.

“You really are? That is so wonderful! Our rose is going to be a wife soon!” Setsuko said with happiness.

“That is wonderful news. When you’ll propose?” Hideo wondered.

“Right after we win the tournament. I want it to make it something special.” You said.

“Well, just remember that you have our blessing and I know you’ll love each other forever.” Hideo said with a smile.

“And then soon, we’ll be standing here as grandparents.” Setsuko said.

“One step at a time. But, I thank you for your blessing.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Seeing Akiza’s Parents

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"It's no trouble at all." Hideo says with a pat on the back. "You make my daughter happy and treat her right. That's all I could ever want out of her husband."

"Agreed. All I ask is that you keep my little rose safe, Yuten." Setsuko requests. "Please, we don't want to lose her again.

"Of course ma'am. I'd sooner die before I'd let any harm come to her." You say with confidence.

"Don't get too hasty now. I'm sure your parents wouldn't like to hear talk like that, now would they?" Hideo scolds. "Plus, I doubt saving Akiza would do all that much if you died and she got heartbroken into a coma again. We don't want you to die for her, we just want her and you safe, is all."

"O-of course, sir. I'm sorry I got a bit out of hand there." You apologize before checking your watch. "Oh, gotta go. Akiza might be getting up soon." You say as you get up to leave.

"I'll be sure to call your mother about planning the wedding." Setsuko calls out as you rush for your runner.

"Come back soon." Hideo says as the two wave you off.

"See ya." You say to them before driving off. You also remembered that you needed to grab some food like you said in the letter.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Talking With Your Soon-to-be In-laws

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You got the food like you promised to get Akiza. It was going to smoothly until something just ran passed you.

“Hey! What the hell is your problem, moron!?” You yelled at the reckless driver.

You looked and see that this guys is riding on a runner similar to yours. If that wasn’t strange enough, this guy looks exactly like you in that attire. You decided to take a closer look.

“What’s the big idea, pal?” You asked seriously.

“The big idea is that you’re in for a trip to hell, my weak friend.” The guy said in a voice similar to yours in a sinister way.

“Just who are you?” You wondered.

“Who am I? Why I’m Yuten.” The guy explained that shocked you.

“No you’re not! I am, you fake!” You shouted.

“You’re wrong. I am the true you.” Fake you said.

“The true me? What does that even mean?” You wondered.

“It means I am everything you kept inside. Your inner hatred.” Fake you said.

“My..... inner hatred?” You wondered in confusion.

“That’s right. In other words, I am your darkness manifested.” Fake you said.

“You lie!” You denied.

“Deny it if you want, but you know that I represent every shred of hate you buried inside. I am what you should’ve been for years. All the people ridiculing you in your childhood has created me from inside you. Now, I have finally reached the surface.” Fake you said evilly.

“For what purpose?” You asked.

“For what you never had the guts to gain. Revenge.” Your self proclaimed dark half said.

“No! That’s not me! You’re just trying to play head games with me. Guess what, faker? It’s not going to work!” You said back him.

“Still not convinced, huh? Well then, how about, instead of our words, we’ll use our cards?” Fake you suggested.

“If you’re saying you want a duel, then you got it. That way, we’ll find out who the real Yuten is.” You said.

“Agreed.” Fake you said.

“Activate Speed World 2 field spell!”

The street began to change as you and your so called dark half entered the dueling track to get this turbo duel started.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000; SC: 0
Fake You: 4000; SC: 0
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: You Got Stopped By..... Yourself?!

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I'll go first, you fake." You spit as you draw your card.

You: SC 0
Fake You: SC 0

"I'm not about to let you ride around and ruin my good name." You tell him. "And this guy is gonna help me, Kaibaman."

KM: 200 ATK

"And his special ability is gonna let me tribute him to special summon one Blue-Eyes White Dragon from my hand." You say as your monster releases itself to summon a new one.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Then I'll throw down two face-downs and end my turn." You finish.

"That's it? Just one dragon and two puny face-downs and you call it there? Are you sure you aren't the faker here? The real Yuten Anjiou would have a lot more to speak of coming into the first turn." Your clone taunts. "Then again, what can I expect from a coward like you that honestly believes that peace between psychics and non-psychics is possible with a few toys and some speeches. Now let me show you the true power you should be using to free yourself and your kind."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Show This Faker His Place

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Now I draw.” Your fake said.

You: SC 1
Fake You: SC 1

“The first thing I’m going to do is summon Kaibaman, just like you did.” Fake you said.

KM: 200 ATK

“What!? You have him too!?” You said in shock.

“That’s right. Now then, allow me to show you something very interesting. But, first things first, I sacrifice my Kaibaman so that I can activate his special ability.” Fake you said.

“No! That- That’s impossible!” You said even more shocked as to what’s going to happen next.

“Oh! It’s very possible. Behold, my Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” Fake You announced.

To your horror, your mighty Blue-Eyes did appeared on your imposter’s side of the field. Only thing is, it’s scales seemed to be darker than its original and looks at you very angry.

“You no good fake bastard! What have you done to it!?” You yelled.

“I simply introduced him to the power of your hatred. Now feel our wrath!” Fake you said as his Blue-Eyes goes to destroy yours, but only destroy itself too.

“That’s your big move? You just got both of our dragons demolished!” You said.

“Not quite. You see, since a Blue-Eyes monster got destroyed. I can summon this monster from my hand. I summon Deep-Eyes White Dragon!” Fake You said.

DEWD: 0 ATK

“I never seen that dragon before.” You said.

“That’s why I’m the better you. I have cards you can only dream of. Speaking of which, Deep-Eyes now inflicts you with six hundred points of damage for every dragon with different names in my graveyard. I only have one, but that’s fine by me.” Fake You said as Deep-Eyes cut you down.

You: 3400

“He then gains the attack points of one of dragons in my graveyard. You can obviously guessed who that is.”

DEWD: 3000 ATK

“Not good!” You said.

“For you, weak me. Deep-Eyes, direct attack!” Fake You said.

“I don’t think so! I play negate attack! This stops the attack and ends the battle phase.” You said.

“Whatever. I place two cards face down and end my turn. Just admit it, Yuten. I am your real emotions that you want to let out after all these years of torment. This peaceful dream of yours is nothing more than a big joke. Sayer was right, society should pay for what they have done to us and our kind. Not letting that deep hatred go proves that you’re nothing but a weakling of a psychic that just let others trample on you.” Fake You taunted you with an evil smile.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Copy Play

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I'm up then. I draw."

You: SC 2
Fake You SC 2

"First, I think I'll play the Speed Spell, Angel Baton. Now that I have two speed counters, I can draw two cards as long as I discard one." You draw your cards and discard one. "Next I'll summon Maiden with Eyes of Blue to the field."

MWEB: 0000 ATK

"And then, I'll activate the effect of the Master with Eyes of Blue that's now in my graveyard. Now I can shuffle him into my deck to target one effect monster on my field, and by sending it to the graveyard, I can revive one Blue-Eyes monster in my graveyard. So I'll release my Maiden to special summon back the Blue-Eyes White Dragon you destroyed. But first, since my Maiden was targeted by an effect, I'm allowed to special summon a Blue-Eyes from my hand, deck, or graveyard. And I've got one in my deck that wants to say hello." Kisara disappears, and in her place, two Blue-Eyes appear.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Impressive." Your copy comments.

"Now, Blue-Eyes number one, attack Deep-Eyes." You order regretfully as your beasts destroy each other. "Now my second dragon can attack you directly." You monster begins to charge a shot.

"Not so fast. I have a Negate Attack as well. So your beast isn't going to land his attack, either." Fake you laughs.

"I end my turn then." You say.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: You'll Make Him Eat Those Words

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“It’s time I finish you.”

You: SC 3
Fake You: SP 3

“Now then, I think I’ll activate my own Angel Baton. I draw two cards but then must discard one.” Fake You explains.

“You know, it wouldn’t kill to try something original.” You said in annoyance.

“You know what? You’re right. That’s why I have this. First, since I sent the White Stone of Legend to my graveyard, I get to add one Blue-Eyes from my deck to my hand. Now, for the card that’ll be your demise. I play the speed spell, Speed Ritual.” Fake You said.

“What’s that!?” You shouted in confusion.

“I’m glad you asked. You see, since I have three or more speed counters, this speed spell let’s me ritual summon one monster as long as I send monsters from my hand and/or field to my graveyard equal to the level of the monster I’m going to summon. So, I’ll send my Blue-Eyes from my hand to the graveyard. Witness this unstoppable dragon descending from pure light to brutal darkness. I Ritual Summon! Behold, Blue-Eyes Chaos MAX Dragon!” Fake You chanted.

BECMD: 4000 ATK

“I-I don’t believe it! A dark Blue-Eyes!?” You looked on in disbelief.

“And get a load of what it can do! Chaos MAX, attack that dragon with Chaos Stream of Destruction!” Fake You said.

“Oh yeah? Not if my Mirror Force has anything to say about that!” You said as you played your trap, only for Chaos MAX Dragon to break through. “What!?”

“Sorry to disappoint you, but Blue-Eyes Chaos MAX Dragon can’t be targeted or destroyed by any of your card effects. Which means, he’s done.” Fake You said.

You: 2400

“Next, I play the trap, Call of the Haunted to bring my Blue-Eyes back.” Fake You said.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“Now, end him. White Lightning!” Fake You declared.

There wasn’t anything you can do to stop this attack as you got defeated by your own beast.

You: 0

After the attack, your runner was spiraling out of control until you’ve crashed off track. As you were falling, you looked up to see the fake you on the track just smiling down on you evilly.

“You see? All of your peaceful dreams and ideals are nothing but childish beliefs. The only true reality of your life is the darkness and hate you have within you. That’s why I’m here.” Fake you said as he shows you that his eyes are somewhat demonic.

You just looked at them in fear as you disappeared in the water, not knowing that you left your star and the copy of Blue-Eyes and Kisara behind on the shore.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Meet The Blue-Eyes Of Darkness

choices: Split them up for one on ones
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
You awake in some sort of dark void filled with these strange blobs. You try to move, but your limbs are bound by some sort of vines or tentacles leading to several masses. "Where am I?" You ask to seemingly no one.

"That's a good question. One that I'd like the answer to as well." You hear an all-too-familiar cockney voice say.

"Jack? Is that you? What's going on?" You ask as some of the blobs scatter to reveal Jack suspended in a similar state to you.

"Well I don't know why you're here. But for me, there was this guy that's impersonating me. He got me arrested last night for crimes he committed in my name. I got free and challenged him, but I lost. I spiraled off the highway and into the sea. Next thing I knew, I was here." He explains.

"Same here. My clone might not have been committing crimes as me, at least not yet anyway, but he challenged me. It was like looking into a mirror. He had my runner, my cards, even his own Blue-Eyes. Then, like you, I came crashing into the sea once I lost." You tell him.

He nods in agreement. "My guy somehow had Red Dragon Archfiend in his deck. My guess is that both our clones are linked somehow."

Before he could say anything else, a tear opened in the void, showing a second Jack. But this one... his eyes looked not unlike your clones when you fell into the water. "It's you!" Jack yells. "Let me go! Who are you? What do you think you're doing pretending to be me?" He shouts at the copy.

"You don't get it, do you old chap? I am you. A better you." The fake spits back before laughing.

"NOOOOO!!" Jack yells out.

After that, you were both forced to watch as Jack's copy flees from Sector Security, only for a dragon's claw to crash down in front of Security. A claw you only wish you didn't recognize. Your copy soon comes up from behind the officers, giving that same smug grin he gave you and his Blue-Eyes behind him.

"Well if it isn't my old pal Jack Atlas. Seems you are having a bit of trouble with the law. Mind if I help out?" Your copy asks his.

"Oh please. The champ doesn't need help. But... you're more than welcome to if makes you feel better." Jack's clone answers.

"Okay then, I will. Blue-Eyes, get these pests out of my way!" Your clone says as his dragon fires a shot that wipes out all but one officer before pulling in front of him. You are then forced to watch in horror as your doubles continue to smear your good names in front of the survivor.

Things only got worse, though, as you see four new runners come up from behind them, and you unfortunately recognize each one. Yusei, Crow, Ren and... Akiza. Of all the people to see this without context, why her? To your surprise, though, all four of them came already convinced that those two were fakes. "I don't know who these two are, but that is not Jack Atlas." Crow says.

"And that certainly isn't Yuten." Akiza adds.

"What are you talking about, my little rose? Of course its me. I've just dumped that foolish ideal of peace for a brand new approach." Your clone lies through his teeth.

"And that's exactly why you're not him. The real Yuten would never abandon his dream. He would sooner die than act like...like... like Sayer!" She retorts. "And I don't know what you did with the real Yuten, but I plan to smear you across the highway until you talk."

"Just try it." You clone says as he and Fake Jack back up, with Jack pulling in front of Crow and you with Ren. Then, with a flare of their engines, they blind the two, causing them to spin out and crash.

"Crow NO!" Jack yells.

"Ren!" Is all you can say. They seemed alright, if not a bit banged up. They then go and pull the same trick with Yusei and Akiza. "No, not her..."

"NOBODY HURTS HER AND GETS AWAY WITH IT!!!!" With pure rage, both you and Jack shatter your restraints, only to find yourselves now strapped to some weird computer chairs in a cave. "Jack, look." You say, pointing to a nearby wall. "Our runners."

You both suit up and ride. Jack lead the charge as his runner breaks through a set of metal doors at the entrance to the cave as you both rush to your friends' aid. "So Yuten." Jack speaks up on the ride. "Two of them, two of us. How do you want to play this?"
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Double the Doubles

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“They seemed to be a dangerous pair as a team from what we’ve seen. So splitting them up could be our best chance. Besides, I got a world of hurt I would love to bring out on him.” You said.

“My thoughts exactly. Let’s go!” Jack said before you two drove off to the track.

You two drove off and managed to see the carnage on the road ahead. You choose to make a dramatic entrance as Jack made a jump on the ramp ahead.

“Make way for the real Jack Atlas, you second rate wannabe!” Jack said as he smashes into his copy’s runner.

“It’s Jack!” Yusei said.

“You, huh? Well, guess I’ll have to change that.” Fake You said as he goes to fire with his Blue-Eyes, only for you to smash into his runner as well.

“Not while I’m here, you’re not!” You said with fury.

“Yuten!” Akiza said with so much happiness to see you.

“You again!? I thought I gotten rid of you!” Fake you said.

“If you are my dark half, you should know that I’m not one to vanish that easily. And one more thing, you can go around pretending to be me and ruin everything I worked for all you want to, but when you try to lay a scratch on my Akiza’s beautiful face, you crossed the line. Now it’s payback time.” You said as a way to say that you want a rematch.

“If you’re going to do that, then here.” Akiza said as she tossed you the two cards while she keeps your star with her.

“Thanks, babe.” You smile as you shuffle the two cards into your deck.

“So what? You wished to handle this two on two?” Fake Jack asked.

“Not really. I want to take you down one on one for what you’re trying to do to me!” Jack said to him.

“An excellent idea. That way, we can get rid of you two quicker.” Fake you said.

“We’ll see about that.” You said.

When Speed World 2 was activated, both duels went separate ways as Akiza went with you.

Meanwhile, Crow and Ren got back up and they see the duel on their runner’s screen.

“Hey. Jack’s okay.” Crow said.

“And Yuten too! Come on! Let’s catch up to them.” Ren said as he puts the petal to the metal.

“Wait for me!” Crow said as he follows him.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000; SC 0
Fake You: 4000; SC 0
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Mirror Rematch

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"I hope you're ready, because this time I'm not going easy on you like last time." You tell your clone as you draw your card. "And to prove it, I'm activating the effect of my Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon that's in my hand. Now by revealing one Blue-Eyes White Dragon in my hand, I can special summon him right to the field."

BEAWD: 3000 ATK

"Next, I'll summon Sage with Eyes of Blue to my field in defense mode."

SEB: 1500 DEF

"And when he's normal summoned to my field, I'm allowed to add one level one light tuner monster to my hand,and I choose my Maiden with Eyes of Blue." You say while adding your card. "Now my Sage is gonna give Alternative White Dragon a tune-up. I synchro summon Blue Eyes Spirit Dragon in defense mode."

BESD: 3000 DEF

"So what? He won't last long with what I have in mind." Your clone scoffs.

"We'll see about that, you fake. I'll place two cards face-down and end my turn. You're up." You tell him.

"Ooooh. I'm shaking at how much stronger you are. Now you managed to get a synchro monster on your field this time as opposed to a regular Blue-Eyes, big change there." He mocks.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: I Found You Faker

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Let me show you how it’s done!” Your clone said as he draws.

You: SC 1
Fake You: SC 1

“First, I summon Kaibaman to the field!” Fake You said.

KM: 200 ATK

“Now, I’ll sacrifice him so that I can summon my Blue-Eyes White Dragon straight to the field.” His darker version of Blue-Eyes shows himself.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“Wait. So far, you’re using the same starting move you used on me last time.” You realized.

“I see that your memory is better than your dueling tactics. But, in any case, I think I’ll place two cards and end my turn.” Fake You said.

“What’s that? I thought you were going to show me how it’s done?” You mocked a little.

“All in good time, all in good time. Now make your move so that I get to destroying you already.” Fake You said impatiently.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Your Clone Goes For The Same Play

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"With Pleasure." You say as you draw your card.

You: SC 2
Fake You: SC 2

He's playing the same combo as before. That means he's probably going for that Chaos Max Dragon like last time. But how do I stop it? It's stronger than any dragon in my deck and it can't be targeted or destroyed by effects. So what can I do? You think to yourself. Best I can do for now is hope for a good hand with this.

"I play the Speed Spell Angel Baton. Now I can draw two cards and discard one." You say while drawing your cards. Then you see it. That card. It might not stop his beast, but with Kisara's help, it might keep you in this long enough to find something that does. You discard the other, which also helps you. "The card I discarded was White Stone of Legends, so now I can add a Blue-Eyes White Dragon to my hand. Then, I'll summon Maiden with Eyes of Blue in attack mode."

MEB: 0000 ATK

"Then I'll end my turn with a face-down." You announce as you throw down your ace in the hole.

"Pathetic. Look at you staying all closed up and defensive. Well let me show you the strength it will take to give psychics what they really deserve, control." He says as he prepares for his turn.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Planning Ahead

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“My turn.” Fake You draws.

You: SC 3
Fake You: SC 3

“I now play the trap, Tyrant Wing. By equipping this to my Blue-Eyes, he gains four hundred attack points.” Fake You said.

BEWD: 3000-3400 ATK

“Now, my Blue-Eyes will take aim at your spirit dragon. White Lightning!”

His Blue-Eyes almost it’s your spirit dragon, only for you synchro monster to vanished.

“I missed!?” He yells out.

“That’s right. That’s because I used my Spirit Dragon’s effect to sacrifice him so you attack would missed its mark. Not only that, but I also get to summon a light dragon synchro monster from my extra deck, like my Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon, in defense mode.” You said.

AESD: 3000 DEF

“That’s good. Although, not good enough. You see, when a dragon is equipped with Tyrant Wing, he also gains the ability to attack two monsters in one battle. Hit his Azure-Eyes, will you.” Fake You said.

“Think again. My Negate Attack trap card will stop that attack cold.” You said as you saved your dragon.

“Fine. I place one card face down and end my turn, meaning Tyrant Wing wears off after he finished attacking twice and my dragon goes back to his original attack points.” Fake You explains.

BEWD: 3400-3000 ATK

“Tell me something, why are you even so eager to create such a nonsense of a dream? All these people have done nothing but hurt us day in and day out and you expect them to just play nicely with us because you believe in silly hope? Ridiculous. Why wouldn’t you just give in to your hate and give these people what they had coming?” Fake You wondered.

“It’s because I believe in the good of mankind no matter what they’ve done to me. If I fight back out of hate, it’ll only prove them right about what they say about us. Two wrongs never make a right and I’m going to do everything I can to make it into a reality. And that’s the difference between you and me. You fight through vengeance and hatred while I fight to create hope for us all. That’s why I’ll win.” You said with pride.

“Yuten.” Akiza thought in her mind.

“Nice bravado. I bet you won’t talk so confident when I trashed you like last time.” Fake You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Power of Hate vs Power of Hope

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"That's not gonna happen again. I draw."

You: SC 4
Fake You: SC 4

"I'll start with the Summon Speeder spell card. Now since I have four or more speed counters, I can special summon one level four or below monster from my hand. So say hello to Kaiser Sea Horse." You announce.

KSH: 1700 ATK

"And then I'll release my Kaiser Sea Horse to summon the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from my hand."

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Now, Blue-Eyes, show that faker what the original can really do. Attack!" Your dragons both fire blasts, destroying both beasts and dealing no damage to either of you. "I'll end my turn with that."

"That's it? All this build-up for one measly attack that did nothing? You really are a disappointment. Then again, what should I expect from someone that's forgotten what it means to duel with purpose? You used to hate those that shunned you. This city, your opponents, even your dear old mom and dad. You wanted to see them suffer while you sat on top. But somewhere along the way, you got soft and naive. You deluded yourself into believing that you could honestly achieve peace by just talking it out. Pathetic. I've had just about enough of all this childish nonsense, so I think I'll end this charade now." He rants
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Going On Offense

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“I draw.” Fake you said.

You: SC 5
Fake You: SC 5

“Now I play my own Angel Baton speed spell. I draw two cards and discard one. Since that was my White Stone of Legend, I get to add one Blue-Eyes from my deck to my hand.” He said as he gets his Blue-Eyes. “Now, prepare to meet your fate.”

The turn was halted when everyone looked back to see Jack, Yusei, Crow, and Ren joining in to see you guys.

“Yuten!” Ren said out loud.

“Guys!” Akiza said.

“Glad you all made it. And Jack, guess you got yourself under control, if you catch my drift?” You said to Jack.

“That faker won’t be bothering us anymore.” Jack said with a thumbs up.

“Now it’s just this faker left.” Yusei said.

“Go show him who the real man is, Yuten!” Crow cheered.

“You bet.” You said before turning to face your copy.

“How cute. Your little friends are here to witness your demise.” Your fake said.

“Actually, they’re here to make sure you get the ass-whipping of a life time. You believe that people deserved what they had coming because they hurt us psychics. Well, it’s true. Back then, I did kinda hate everyone because they hated me. Each and every day hurts more than the last and I was really want to give it to them. But, I realized that it won’t make much of a difference if I did that. That’s why I wanted my dream to be realized. It’s for a chance to stop the discrimination between our kinds.” You said.

“Touching words. It’s a shame that they’re mostly empty words.” Fake You said.

“To you, maybe. But those words mean more than you can think of.” Akiza said to your counterpart.

“That’s right. If you give people a chance and believe that there’s good in them, things would turn out better than you can imagined.” Yusei said.

“Yeah. You would know if you weren’t so into hatred.” Ren said.

“I can say the same thing, punk.” Jack said.

“Me too on that.” Crow said.

“I have enough of this nonsense. Let’s end this. Now, I play the trap card, Zero Gravity. It changes the battle positions of all of the monsters on the field.” Fake You explains.

AESD: 3000 DEF
MWEB: 0 DEF

“Following that, I’m going to activate the other trap card, Fiendish Chain. Now your precious Madien loses her effects and it can’t attack no more.” Fake You said as Kisara was chained up again.

“Not again.” You said.

“Yes again. Now to summon the monster that beaten you last time. I play the Speed Ritual speed spell. Since I have three or more speed counters, I can send the Blue-Eyes from my hand to my graveyard to summon forth my ultimate beast. I Ritual Summon! Come to me, Blue-Eyes Chaos MAX Dragon!” The dragon that defeated you last time rises to the field.

BECMD: 4000 ATK

“A Blue-Eyes ritual monster!?” Jack said as he and everyone else eye on the ritual summoned dragon.

“It’s the thing that beat me up real good in our last duel.” You said.

“And he’ll do it again! Chaos MAX Dragon, attack that Maiden with Eyes of Blue with Chaos Stream of Destruction.” Fake You commanded as his ace goes to blast away at Kisara. “Oh yes. I forgot to tell you that, if he attacks a monster in defense mode, he inflicts piercing damage. In fact, the piercing is so mighty and powerful, he can double the damage.”

“Double!?!?” You said in shock.

“Oh no! That means if this attack hits, Yuten will take eight thousand points of damage!” Yusei said in horror.

“He can’t survive that much impact!” Crow said.

“Bro, do something!” Ren said.

The attack was successful and Kisara was destroyed.

“Yuten! NOOO!!” Akiza yelled to you.

“I told you that your hate was stronger than your childish dreams. Perhaps, you’ll learn now.” Fake You said as he goes to laugh evilly at his victory.

However, turns out it wasn’t a victory at all as you drive out of the smoke and you looked like nothing happened. That’s when something else happened.

You: 4000-12000

“WHAT?!?!” Fake You screamed in shock as everyone was surprised to see your life points increased so dramatically. “But-But that’s impossible! How could you increased your life points so high when they should’ve gone to zero?”

“Simple, it was all thanks to the trap card that my brother gave me. Rainbow Life!” You said.

“That’s my bro.” Ren said with a smile.

“With this trap card, all I have to do is discard one card from my hand to my graveyard. That way, any damage I would’ve taken for the rest of the turn, I gained it instead.” You said.

“Why you! Fine! I end my turn.” Fake You said with anger.

“It’s not over yet. Since the monster I send away was the White Stone of Ancients, I get to summon a Blue-Eyes from my deck. And thanks to his ability that he can be treated as a Blue-Eyes, I can summon my Dragon Spirit of White. So come on out.” You said.

DSoW: 2500 ATK

“Not bad. But so what? In their current state, they’re just weak little lizards who lost what means to be an unstoppable force, just like you.” Fake You said.

“You still don’t get it, do you? You only see Blue-Eyes a an instrument for revenge while I see it as a part of me. While my friends, my family, and the love of my life represents my heart, he represents my very soul. When I was young and alone, it was this very dragon that protected me. He helped through some hardships and I wouldn’t trade him with anything in the world. Together, we’ll take you down!” You said with pride.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Light of a Dragon’s Soul

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"And this is how." You say with a draw.

You: SC 6
Fake You: SC 6

"First, my Azure-Eyes' special ability kicks in, allowing me to special summon one normal monster in my graveyard. So let's welcome back the Blue-Eyes White Dragon." You tell him as your monster reappears.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"So what? He's still not strong enough to beat my MAX Dragon." You clone reminds.

"Maybe not alone, but he's not alone. I activate the second effect of m White Stone of Ancients in my graveyard. By removing him from play, I'm allowed to add one Blue-Eyes from my graveyard to my hand, so say hello once again to Alternative White Dragon. And his special ability will let me special summon him to the field if I have a Blue-Eyes in my hand. And thanks to my White Stone of Legends, you better believe I do. So come out Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon."

BEAWD: 3000 ATK

"Too bad my MAX Dragon is immune to being destroyed by card effects. Too little too late." He scoffs.

"Not quite. Because I have one spell in my hand that will turn this whole duel around, the Speed Fusion speed spell. Now I can merge together a few monsters to form a fusion monster. So let's see, Two Blue-Eyes on the field plus one in the hand equals...?"

"Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon?!?!" He says in disbelief.

"That's right. Come on out pal. It's your time to shine."

BEUD: 4500 ATK

"Hmph. No matter. Even if he's stronger than my MAX Dragon, I can still survive this turn." He assures.

"Not quite. I still have one face-down left. Go Dragon's Bursting Spirit! Now, by removing from play one dragon-type monster in my graveyard, I can increase the attack of a dragon on my field by four hundred points times the level of the banished monster, as long as the powered-up dragon is banished during the end phase. But there isn't going to be an end phase. I remove my Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon to increase my Ultimate Dragon's attack by thirty-six hundred points." You announce.

"Oh No!!"

BEUD: 4500-8100 ATK

"Oh yes. Now, Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, attack with Neutron Burst!" Your monster charges an attack with all three mouths firing all three at once at his Chaos MAX Dragon.

Fake You: 0000

You watch as your clone spirals out of control and wrecks. In the last seconds before the crash, though, you see more parts than flesh. "Another duel bot?" You question as you see his cards begin to dissipate into energy. What was going on here?
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: The Power Of White

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
After the duel was over, you all went up to the spot where the bot was no more and you turned to see everyone else. You see Ren and Akiza coming towards you and was glad that you were okay.

“You really scared us, bro. I thought we never see you again.” Ren said while smiling at you.

“Hey, like I told that bot, it’ll take a lot to get rid of me.” You said as Akiza holds you so tightly.

“I’m so glad you’re alright. You didn’t came home and was scared to death!” Akiza cried while hugging so much.

“It was never my intention to do that. Ain’t no way I’m going to let some copycat bucket of bolts drive me away.” You said as Akiza was attacking you with kisses.

“What was that robot and why was it going around looking like you?” Yusei asked.

“He said he represent everything I hold inside. All of the hatred that was building up, which he was right on.” You said, much to everyone’s confusion.

“You guys know that growing up was tough. The solitude and discrimination by the public build up all of those negative thoughts and emotions. It’s actually scary when I leaned about myself.” You said as Akiza comes to you.

“Well, that’s behind you now. Besides, I like the loving and golden-hearted you. That’s the Yuten I fell in love with.” Akiza said.

“Thanks for that and coming to try and stop those creeps, even though you got crashed for it.” You said as everyone nodded. “Let’s go home.” You said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Realizing Yourself

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
It was late that night, so you all agreed it would be best to investigate this tomorrow when it was light out. You broke off from team 5Ds as you let them return home while you rode back with your own team. But a problem came, if it was night, then you've missed an entire day, meaning tomorrow was your last day before your first match.

"Hey guys." You say, getting their attention. "So what exactly did I miss today?"

"Well, when I woke up, I saw your note and figured you would be fine." Akiza starts. "Then as it got into the late afternoon and you didn't come back or even check in, I got worried."

"She called me and we got looking." Ren takes over. "We thought we were at a dead end until these hippies said they got a picture of two Blue-Eyes White Dragons facing off. We went to where they said the saw it and found a destroyed barrier."

"On the rocks below... we found... we found..." Akiza chokes up at the memory.

"We found the two cards Akiza tossed you and your star patch. That's when we knew something was wrong." Ren continues. "We got in touch with Yusei, who told us that something similar was going on with Jack. He believed the two were connected and that you were both being impersonated. That's when we heard about Jack on the highway earlier. You know the rest from there."

"I see. I'm sorry for putting you both through that." You confess. "Who else knows?"

"Nobody. We kept the circle as tight as possible. Not even mom and dad know, so you don't have to worry about mom smothering you when we get back." Ren tells you. You all pull in to headquarters, where Sion was quick to greet you.

"Welcome back sir." He says, as if clueless to today's events.

"Thanks. We'll be turning in now Sion, long day and all." You tell him as you head up to your rooms, where Ren breaks off, leaving you and Akiza alone. "Akiza..."

"I'm okay, really. I just need to calm down a little now that I have you back. Don't worry, I'm not gonna keep you held up in here like before tomorrow." She says as her smile returns.

"Good." You say, climbing into bed. "Because tomorrow, the three of us and Yusei's team are going to look into that cave me and Jack were held in."

"Right." She says, climbing in with you. She grabbed you and held you tight. "Don't let that happen again, got it?"

"I promise." You tell her as you sleep with her head in your chest for once.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Day Missed

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
Morning came and you and Akiza got dressed and ate breakfast before meeting up with Ren on your runners. You three drove off and you reached over to the exact spot where Team 5ds is waiting at the sight of the cave. You all went to look around only to find nothing.

“Are you guys sure you two were held here?” Crow asked.

“It sure is. There was a cave right here. But now it’s gone.” You said rubbing on the rock.

“Even our runner tracks are gone too.” Jack said looking down.

“Whoever took you in must be really good at covering their tracks.” Ren figured.

“Agreed. And I think I know who it could be. Iliaster.” Yusei said.

“Do you think they’re connected to that robot cop that went rouge?” You asked.

“I’m certain of it. The connections are clear now.” Yusei said.

“And there was another thing. My faker was somehow making the damage real when we dueled.” Jack explains.

“Now that you said that, I did felt a little sting when I dueled mine.” You said as well.

“But why do that?” Akiza wondered.

“I don’t know. However, I think I do know this. Someone wants us dead.” You said in a very serious tone.

After that proclamation, you let your mind go back to the words your faker said to you.

“Your dream and ideals is nothing but childish beliefs. Your true reality is the darkness and hatred inside you.”

That made you clutch your fist and shake it violently. Akiza was the only one that noticed that and wondered if your duel last night have some effects on your mind.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Investigation

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
With no trail left to follow, there was no point in any of you sticking around there any more. You say your goodbyes to Team 5Ds as you three ride off into the city. "So, since we're already out, why don't we go get lunch together? I know this great burger place." Ren says.

"You mean the burger place where Syd's gang jumped you while you were feeding the kids?" You question.

"Hey, it's not like they're gonna be waiting to jump me there anymore now that they're all in prison. Come on, I'm telling you, this place is great." He insists.

"Alright, sure. But you're paying." You joke as you follow Ren's lead. You park your runners and take a seat at an outside table overlooking your bikes. With your orders placed, you had time to finally talk. "So Ren, how goes getting those dragons on a leash?"

"Heh, no leash needed bro. In fact, that was the biggest thing keeping me from understanding them. I tried to restrict them and hold them back, push them deep down like a repressed memory. Then our duel taught me something. When I embraced Red-Eyes and his power as a part of me, I gained more access to his power. So, the same went for Beelze. He was a lot more vicious about it, but with some help from Red-Eyes I was able to embrace him as well. Now I think those two are on an agree to disagree basis with each other right now." He explains.

"That's good to hear Ren." Akiza says before turning to you. "What about you Yuten? Any troubles you want to talk about?" She asks, still concerned about your behavior earlier.

"Nope. I'm good." You half-lie. "I feel like I'm getting close to unlocking my Blue-Eyes' power."

"Just in time bro." Ren says with a pat on your shoulder. "Tomorrow's the big day. Our very first match in this tournament. I can't wait to make that very first lap for us."

"And you Akiza?" You ask. "What about Misty's fortune?"

"Still nothing. I wish I knew what she was talking about." She sighs, both at your dodging the question and her lack of an answer on her destiny. No sooner had she said that did your food finally arrive and you all dug in.

"Damn. You were right Ren, these are great." You say in between bites.

"Told ya so bro." He replies. "OW!"

"Keep your fingers off my fries if you wanna keep them Ren." Akiza snaps as she takes another bite.

"Jeez. Sorry." Ren says before returning to his food.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: After the investigation

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“So, what do we do now?” Ren asked now that you all finished eating.
