“Looks like Ren has made a strong start so far. But I have a feeling Toru may have some strong tricks up his sleeve as well. Let’s see what they are.” The announcer said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren goes first

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Just you wait and see." Toru says as he draws his card.

Ren: SC 1
Toru: SC 1

"First I'll start by summoning Scrap Goblin in defense mode."

SG: 500 DEF

"Then, since I have a Scrap Monster on my field, I'm also allowed to special summon Scrap Orthros from my hand in defense mode."

SO: 1100 DEF

"Not so fast pal. I activate my face-down, Black Horn of Heaven, negating your Orthos' special summon and destroying him." Ren announces as the horn blows, destroying Toru's beast.

"Dang. guess I should've seen that coming." He says with a slight grin. "Nice move. I guess I'll end my turn with two face-downs and end my turn." Toru retorts.

"Uh-oh. Looks like Toru's big combo got blown out of the water by that horn. Now all that stands between Ren and Toru's life points is a tiny tuner monster. Can we see the first duel already done in turn two?" The announcer commentates.

"I don't think it's gonna be that easy." You say.

"How so?" Akiza asks, confused.

"Just watch."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Recycling Turn

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Here we go.” Ren draws.

Ren: SC 2
Toru: SC 2

“First, I’m going to summon my tuner monster, Plaguespreader Zombie.” Ren said.

PZ: 400 ATK

“A tuner monster?” Toru asked.

“That’s what I said. Now I tune my zombie with my Great Majiu Garzet. I synchro summon my Blood Mefist!”

BM: 2800 ATK

“Now send that Goblin back to the scrapyard!” Ren declared.

“He’s not going anywhere. I play the trap, Scrap Iron Scarecrow!” Toru said.

“That’s one of Yusei’s cards.” Akiza said.

“Now your attack is haulted and I can set my scarecrow back down to use it again later.” Toru said.

“Okay. Not bad. I place two cards face down and end my turn. Care to show me what else you have planned?” Ren dared.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Small Setback

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Sure. But be careful what you wish for." Toru draws.

Ren: SC 3
Toru: SC 3

“That can be arraigned. You see, during each of your standby phases, Blood Mefist deals you three hundred points of damage for each card on your field.” Ren said as Toru was damaged.

Toru: 3100

“And just like that, Ren has drawn first blood in this duel. Now how will Toru respond?” The announcer said.

"Just watch. First, I'll play the speed spell Angel Baton. Now with two or more speed counters, I can draw two cards and discard one. I'll draw my cards and send Scrap Beast to the graveyard. Next I'll be removing him from play to activate my face-down, the continuous trap Portable Scrap Factory. I can only activate this card by removing from play a 'Scrap' monster in my graveyard. Now, as long as this card is face-up on my field, once per turn, if a 'Scrap' monster is destroyed by a 'Scrap' card's effect, I can special summon one 'Scrap' monster straight from my deck at the cost of five hundred life points. Next I'll summon Scrap Chimera to the field." Toru rants.

SC: 1700 ATK

"And when he's summoned, I'm allowed to special summon one 'Scrap' tuner monster from my graveyard. So say hello again to Scrap Orthros."

SO: 1700 ATK

"That's not good." You say.

"Now, Scrap Orthros will give my Chimera a tune-up in order to synchro summon Scrap Dragon in attack mode."

SD: 2800 ATK

"At least they're on an even playing field. His attack is equal to Blood Mefist's." Akiza points out.

"Too bad points aren't everything." You remind.

"And now for Scrap Dragon's Special ability. I can destroy one card on each of our fields. So I'll destroy Scrap Goblin and your Blood Mefist" Toru reveals.

"Not exactly. I play my face-down, Dark Illusion. Now since you targeted a DARK monster with a card effect, I can negate the effect and destroy the card," Ren replies. Now Toru's dragon was destroyed as well.

"Then I guess I'll use Scrap Dragon's other ability. If he's destroyed by one of your cards, I'm allowed to special summon one 'Scrap' monster from my graveyard, So say hello to the return of Scrap Chimera."

SC: 1700 ATK

"And now my Chimera will be getting a tune-up from my Scrap Goblin, allowing me to synchro summon Scrap Archfiend in attack mode."

SA: 2700 ATK

"I'll end my turn with a face-down."

“That’s fine. Because with Blood Mefist’s other effect, you take three hundred points of damage every time you set a card.” Ren said.

Toru: 2800
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Trashed Dragon

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“With that done, I’m up now.” Ren draws.

Ren: SC 4
Toru: SC 4

“I won’t be able to do much since he’ll just play that scarecrow again. Best to play it safe for now.” Ren thought.

“I’ll just end my turn by summoning a monster face down in defense mode.” Ren said.

“Guess Ren doesn’t have much choice, does he?” Misty asked.

“Nope. Not as long Toru has that scarecrow of his. Though, I think that’s the least of our problems.” You guessed.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Reving Up

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Then I'm up, I draw." Toru says.

Ren: SC 5
Toru: SC 5

"Don't forget, since it's your standby phase, Blood Mefist's special ability activates again, hitting you with three hundred points of damage for every card on your field." Ren reminds.

Toru: 1600

"That may be, but I still have a plan. I release Scrap Archfiend to summon Scrap Golem in attack mode." Toru continues.

SG: 2300 ATK

"Why sacrifice a stronger monster for one with less attack points?" Michelle asks.

"Because, points aren't all that matter." You bring up.

"Now I'll use his special ability to special summon one 'Scrap' monster from my graveyard, and I choose to bring back Scrap Orthros in attack mode." He continues.

SO: 1700 ATK

"Not that tuner again." Akiza yells.

"Now he'll tune my Golem, in order to synchro summon Scrap Twin Dragon in attack mode." Toru says.

STD: 3000 ATK

"And with his special ability, I can destroy one card on my field to send to cards on your field back to your hand. So by destroying my face-down, I'll send your Blood Mefist and your face-down back to your hand." He says as Ren's face-down does indeed go back to his hand, but Blood Mefist instead goes to his extra deck.

"Now Scrap Twn Dragon will attack that face-down monster. Go Dual Scrap Flame!" He says as his monster fires two flamethrowers at Ren's.

"Sorry pal, but the monster you just destroyed was Mystic Tomato. Now I can special summon one Dark monster from my deck with 1500 or less attack. And I choose Dark Hex-Sealed Fusion." Ren says.

DHSF: 1600 DEF.

"Then I'll end my turn with that." Toru says.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Twice The Scrap

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Here we go then.” Ren draws.

Ren: SC 6
Toru: SC 6

“First up, I’m playing the speed spell, Speed Fusion. Since I have two or more speed counters, this will let me fusion summon. So I’ll fuse my Red-Eyes Black Dragon that’s in my hand with my Dark Hexed Sealed Fusion. With my Sealed Fusion’s effect, it counts as a fusion material monster of my choice. That means I get to summon my Archfiend Black Skull Dragon!” Ren said.

ABSD: 3200 ATK

“Now that’s a mega monster! Can’t wait to see what that big Goliath is going to do now!” The announcer said.

“That’s easy. It’s going to burn his life points away. Now, my beast, attack his Scrap Twin Dragon!” Ren said as his dragon goes on the attack.

“Did you forget about my Scrap Iron Scarecrow?” Toru asked as he activated his trap only it fails. “What the?!”

“Seems that I didn’t forget. When my dragon attacks, you can’t play any cards or effects until the end of the damage step.” Ren explains.

“Oh man!” Toru gasped as his Scrap Twin Dragon got scraped big time.

Toru: 1400

“Now that the battle phase is over, my dragon’s effect activates. I can take my Red-Eyes from my graveyard and shuffled him back into my deck. But before I do put him back, Archfiend Black Skull Dragon deals you damage equal to his original attack points.” Ren said.

“Oh no!” Toru gasped.

“Yep. That means you’re done!” Ren said as he beats Toru like that.

Toru: 0

“And there you have it, folks! Our first elimination of the round thanks to Ren Anjiou! Now, who will be next to avenge their comrade’s defeat?” The announcer wondered.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Ren Gets The First Win

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"Sorry guys. Looks like I blew it in the very first duel. Not even a single point of damage." Toru says as he pulls into his team's pit.

"It's alright Toru. You did well." Sanada comforts his friend.

"Yeah. Besides, we had a feeling this would happen." Misaki says coldly as Toru hands her his cards.

"Jeez Misaki, leave me some self-confidence, will ya?" Toru jokes as his friend drives off.

"Looks like the enigmatic Misaki is taking the next leg of the race. Can she avenge her partner's loss, or is Ren going to knock out two members by himself?" The announcer questions.

Misaki: 4000

"We'll see about that. I draw." Misaki says as she begins the duel.

Misaki: SC 7
Ren: SC 7

"I'll start with the effect of the Thunder Sea Horse in my hand. Now by discarding it, I can add two Thunder type monsters from my deck to my hand, as long as their attack is less than 1500 and they have the same name. So I'll add two Watthoppers to my hand. Then I'll play the Speed Spell Angel Baton. Now I can draw two cards as long as I discard one. Then I'll summon a Watthopper in defense mode." She announces.

WH: 0000 DEF

"Then I'll end my turn with two face-downs."
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Watt's Up

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Then let’s kick it up a notch.” Ren draws.

Ren: 8 SC
Misaki: 8 SC

“Hold it! During your standby phase, I play the Powerful Rebirth trap card. This allows me to summon one level four or lower monster from my graveyard and give it an extra level and one hundred attack and defense points. Come on back, my second Watthopper!” Misaki said.

WH: 0 - 100 ATK & DEF

“So what? My dragon will turn that hopper into bug chow.” Ren said.

“That would be the case had it not been for my hopper’s effect, which makes sure you can’t target any of my watt monsters with effects or attacks.” Misaki explains.

“Wait. Since there’s two of them...” Ren started.

“He can’t attack because Misaki just played an electric wall.” You finished.

“Guess I have no choice but to play a face down to end my turn.” Ren said.

“Looks like this little hoppers just save Misaki’s neck. But will they give her enough time?” The announcer said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Wall of Watts

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"My move then." Misaki says as she draws.

Misaki: 9 SC
Ren: 9 SC

"And first I'll activate my face-down, Wattcannon. Now, once per turn, when a Thunder type monster is summoned to my field, this card allows me to deal 600 points of damage. Then I'll play the speed spell Slowdown Machine. Now, for the rest of this turn, you lose one speed counter for every 300 points of damage you take. Next I'll summon Wattcobra in attack mode." She says.

WC: 1000 ATK

"And since my Cobra is a thunder monster, my cannon fires at you for 600 damage."

Ren: 3400

"And don't forget my slowdown machine. Now you get speed counters zapped away for every 300 points of damage you just took."

Ren: 7 SC

"Now its time for my Wattcobra to attack." She says.

"You must've fried your head. My archfiend has way more attack points than your Wattcobra." Ren taunts.

"Then it's a good thing my Cobra has the power to attack directly." Misaki retorts.

"What?!" Ren shouts as Misaki's monster zaps away at him. "Damn, nice shot."

Ren: 2400
4 SC

"Also, since Wattcobra successfully attacked you directly, I can add a 'Watt' monster from my deck to my hand. I choose Wattpheasant." She reveals.

Ren begins to drag behind after such a drastic speed drop. "Wow! In just one move, Misaki has just given herself a huge lead in both life points and speed." The announcer calls out. "Can Ren possibly make a comeback?"

"It'll be tough. With those Watthoppers, Ren can't attack or target any of Misaki's monsters with card effects. And Wattcobra can suck away a quarter of Ren's life points every turn, along with that cannon firing with each summon. Ren has his work cut out for him." You say.

"I'll place one card face down and end my turn." Misaki ends off.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: A Shocking Offensive

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
“Time to take charge.” Ren draws.

Ren: 5
Misaki: 10

“I play the effect of Dark Nephthys. By removing two dark monsters from my graveyard, I can send him to the graveyard so he can be special summoned to the field on my next standby phase. After that, I place one card face down and end my turn.” Ren said.

“Looks like Ren’s is on the short end of the stick. Things are not looking bright for the dark knight now.” The announcer said.
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Getting Desperate

1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.content:
"My deck is too bright for your shadows." Misaki quips as she draws her card.

Misaki: 11 SC
Ren: 6 SC

"First, I'll use the effect of Speed World 2. Now since I have the Summon Speeder speed spell in my hand, I can remove ten speed counters to destroy one card on the field. Now say goodbye to your Archfiend." She continues as Ren's only monster is swallowed up in a bright light.

Misaki: 1 SC

"Looks like Misaki made use of that huge speed lead. Now Ren is without his Skull Archfiend, which means battle effects are back in play." The announcer reminds the crowd.

"Next I'll summon Wattpheasent in attack mode." Misaki continues.

WP: 1000 ATK

"And since its a thunder monster, Wattcannon fires again."

Ren: 1800

"This is it folks. If both those monsters land their hits, then Ren is out of the running. Can nothing stop this electric combo?" The ref continues.

"Wattpheasent, attack Ren directly."

"Not so fast. I have my face-down, Defense Draw. Now all battle damage from this attack becomes zero and I get to draw a card."

"Well I still have Wattcobra. Attack him directly."

Ren: 800

"And since Wattcobra inflicted direct damage to you, I can add another 'Watt' monster to my hand, and this time it'll be Wattberyx. That's it for my turn."

"Ren barely held on this time. The question is, can he do it again?" The announcer questions.

(Since this storyline reaches its limit, go see the other interactive that is put up to continue on with the story)
1311111111112111112111131111221321121212.title: Bring Down the Beast

15.content: Which one of the last two?
15.title: Arc-V or VRAINS

1512.content:
Your name is Shawn and you’re about to leave Duel Academy and then the entire Fusion dimension. You found out the truth about the professor, Leo’s, plan and the war against the Xyz dimension. It’s just not right and you need to stop this. You halted when you saw Serena, the love of your life.

“What are you doing here, Shawn?” Serena asked.

“I’m leaving. That’s what.” You said.

“What? But, you can’t leave!” Serena begged.

“I have to in order to get the entire dimension back to where it once was. It’s for it’s own good.” You said.

“In that case, then I’m coming too.” Serena said.

“No. I can’t put you in that sort of danger, Serena. I’m sorry.” You said.

“If that’s how it’s going to be, then duel me and when I win, I’m going with you.” Serena challenges you.

“Alright. Deal.” You said.

Duel!

Shawn: 4000
Serena: 4000

Who should start
1512.title: Leaving Duel Academy

15122.content:
"Ladies first! I summon Lunalight Kaleido Chick! Using her effect, I send panther dancer to the grave! Next I activate polymerization, fusing chick, cat, and fox! Three souls of the moonlit wilderness, form the guardian! Fusion summon! Level 10! Lunalight Leo Dancer!", Serena summoned her ace.

Lunalight Leo Dancer: 3500 ATK

"Then a set card! Your up Shawn!", Serena taunted. "Ok", you drew a card and looked at your hand. "To start things off this turn, I activate..."
15122.title: Serena

151221.content:
"What?!", Serena was confused. "I can add a 'Toon' card from my deck to my hand. I'll add toon kingdom. I can activate this field spell by banishing three cards from the top of my deck", you say as the giant pop-up book appeared. "What the?", now Serena was confused in a different way. "I summon toon alligator!", the axe-wielding toon appeared. "Though, toon alligator isn't a toon-type monster. Its just in his name", you explain.

Toon Alligator: 800 ATK

"I sacrifice him, to summon Toon dark magician girl!", you say as the cutesy monster appeared.

TDMG: 2000 ATK

"Since my opponent doesn't control a toon monster; this little lady can attack directly!", you declare.

Serena: 2000

"I set a reverse card. Turn end", you say.

"No. NO! I can't lose! I won't lose! I love you Shawn, I don't want to be alone. Before you came here, I was so lonely; if you leave, who do I have? I have no-one, just you!", she cried. "Sorry Serena, I don't want you hurt. Besides, I can banish the top card of my deck face-down; to prevent my toon monsters from being destroyed", you said. "Then I'll just go to a whole new level of ass-whoopin' then! Draw! I activate spellbook of the pot! We both draw three cards. If I draw the right cards, I'll win!", Serena said. She drew her cards, and smiled. She drew Lunalight blue cat, lunalight perfume, and fusion recovery.
151221.title: "Toon Table of Contents!"

1512212.content:
“I play Fusion Recovery! This let’s me add back my fox and Polymerzation to my hand. Next, I’ll use my Polymerzation again to fuse my fox and cat into Lunalight Cat Dancer!” Serena said.

Lunalight Cat Dancer: 2400 ATK

“And there’s more! Since my Crimson Fox got sent to the graveyard by a card effect, your Toon Dark Magician Girl loses all of her attack points.” Serena said.

“Too bad that my Toon Kingdom protects her from your card effects.” You said.

“That won’t matter. Because, I also Normal Summon my Lunalight White Rabbit.” Serena said.

Lunalight White Rabbit: 800 ATK

“Now when she’s normal summoned, I can special summon a Lunalight monster from my graveyard in defense mode. I choose my Blue Cat. And whenever she’s special summoned, one of Lunalight monsters have their attack points doubled. I choose my Leo Dancer.” Serena said.

Lunalight Leo Dancer: 7000 ATK

“Now for my White Rabbit’s other ability. I send any number of spells and traps to your hand up to the amount of Lunalight monsters I control.” Serena said as your cards return to your hand.

“No! Without my kingdom, Toon Dark Magician Girl will be destroyed.” You said.

“Shawn. I love you so much that I can’t let you go alone. Out of everyone here, you’re the only guy that ever treated me nicely, even though I pushed you away at times. You never gave up on me and I’ll stand beside you to the end.” Serena said.

“Serena.” You said feeling touched.

“Now attack him directly, Leo Dancer!” Serena said.

Shawn: 0

WINNER: Serena

“Well, you won. So, you’re with me on this?” You said.

“Always.” Serena said.

“Good. So, we need to go to the Standard Dimension. There’s a guy who wants to end the war as well over there.” You said.

“You mean Reiji Akaba?” Serena suggested.

“You heard of him?” You asked.

“More like met him. It’s a long story.” Serena said.

“Well, thanks for telling me.” You said.

“Well, sorry.” Serena said a little annoyed.

“It’s fine. Let’s just get moving.” You said before heading off into the Standard Dimension.

You two then began your search for Reiji until you see
1512212.title: Fusion recovery

15122121.content: You and Serena were looking for clues, when you saw something you didn't like. You stopped Serena with your hand, unaware that you were touching her chest. "S-shawn", she stuttered. "Hush! Look", you point to a kid leaving a candy shop. "That uniform", said as she inspected his attire. "His name is Sora, he's an academia elite", you say. "Do you think we should do something?, Serena asked. "I think we should at least try asking him what he knows", you said as you look at her, realizing you had your hand on her chest.
15122121.title: Sora from academia

151221211.content:
“Sorry.” You muttered moving your hand away from Serena’s chest.

“It’s okay. Let’s go talk to him.” Serena said.

“Wait here. Hey, Sora!” You said.

“Huh? Shawn? What are you doing here?” Sora asked.

“I was going to ask you the same thing.” You said a little angry.

“Well, incase you didn’t know, I’m here for the Arc League Championship tournament.” Sora said.

“Somehow, I doubt that’s the only thing why you’re here.” You said.

“Come on, Shawn. Don’t be like that. I’m just here to show our dimension’s dominance in the tournament. That’s all.” Sora said.

“That’s an unlikely story.” Serena said coming out of the shadows.

“What are you doing? I told you to wait.” You said.

“Serena? You’re here too?” Sora wondered.

“That’s right.” Serena said.

“The professor said that you went rouge on us and he sent some guys to come collect you. I think I’ll be doing that myself.” Sora said.

“Over my dead body.” You said standing up for Serena.

“Shawn?” Serena gasped.

“Wait. Don’t tell me you went traitor on us too.” Sora said.

“I did and for good reason. This idea of Leo’s is completely heinous. Trapping people into cards is something, in my mind, that’s worse than death. I will not let this madness continue and if you want her, you’re going have to go through me!” You said with anger as you activated your duel disk.

“Shawn.” Serena said.

“Well then, I hope you won’t mind having your girlfriend to watch you squirm like a bug.” Sora teased as he activated his.

“THAT’S IT!!” You yelled as your eyes turned red with slits in the middle.

“Shawn?!” Serena gasped to see your change.

DUEL!

Sora: 4000

Shawn: 4000

"Your going down Sora! I activate
151221211.title: Trigger

choices: Yuya and co. Show up first
1512212112.content:
"My turn first, Sora! I'm using the spell dark fusion!", you say. "Dark fusion?", Sora asked in confusion. "I thought it was only a myth", Serena said.

Suddenly, Burstinatrix and Clayman appeared; before being swallowed by darkness. "As the dreams of noble justice are forgotten, let rage and hatred poison these pure hearts! Join this queen of fire, and this titan of the earth. May the darkness grant you real power! Dark fusion summon! Level 6: Evil Hero Infernal Sniper!", you summon this creature.

Infernal Sniper: 2500 DEF

"I activate snipers effect; once per turn, he deals 1000 effect damage", you say. Sniper aims a blaster at Sora, launching his laser and hitting his target.

Sora: 3000

Suddenly, Sora coughed up blood; causing him to realize he had a gaping hole, where sniper hit him.

"That thing inflicted real damage, without an ARC system? How is that even possible?", Sora asked as he coughed up more blood. "Shawn", Serena said; she was concerned for both of you. You showed no concern, and simply set a card to end your turn.
1512212112.title: Dark Fusion!"

15122121122.content:
"What's going on here?", asked a skinny guy in a tracksuit. "A duel", Serena said. "Is that sora?", asked a larger teen. "Looks like it nobaru", said a tomato-haired boy. "Is Sora bleeding?", asked a pink-haired girl. "What?!", said a trio of small kids. "Its odd, somehow Shawns monster did real damage to Sora with his damage effect", Serena said. "Why does Shawn not look concerned?", Nobaru asked. "Because Shawn is angry at Sora, Sora threatened us; and tried to act like he was better then us. Just like back home", Serena said. "No way, Sora would never do that; he's our friend!", Yuya said. "Shawn has known Sora longer than any of you have, trust me. Whatever Sora told you about himself, most likely isn't true. Now just watch the duel", Serena said as she turned to them. "She looks like me!", Yuzu gasped.
"Its my turn, draw! I activate toy vendor, I discard a card to reveal a card; fluffal bear. Next I activate fusion, merging bear and scissors. I fusion summon, frightfur bear!", Sora said.

Frightfur bear: 2200 ATK

"Next, I activate spellbook of the pot. We both draw 3 cards. I play monster reborn, reviving Leo. And fusion recovery, getting scissors and fusion. I fuse saw and leo; king of the jungle, demon of blades, combine now. Fusion summon, my Frightfur Leo", Sora said.

Leo: 2400 ATK

"Next, I play a second fusion spell. My sheep and chain will combine; appear, Frightfur sheep", Sora said.

Sheep: 2000 ATK

"Three fusions in one turn!? Soras not messing around!", Yuya said.

"Next I play card of sanctity. We both til we hold six cards. Now I activate Frightfur sanctuary, sending 1 card in my hand and 2 from the extra deck to the graveyard; to treat all monsters I control as frightfurs. I use Frightfur fusion, banishing edge imp chain and fluffal bear. Fusion summon: Frightfur krakken!", Sora said.

Frightfur krakken: 2200

"Another fusion!?", Yuya asked. "He's not done", Serena said. "Seriously!?", Nobaru asked in shock.

"Now I activate magical stone excavation! Discarding 2 cards, to recover Frightfur fusion! Using it, I banish frightfuloid, tiger, and wolf from my grave; demonic toys, meld your twisted souls. Fusion summon! Frightfur Chimera!", Sora said.

Frightfur Chimera: 2800 ATK

"Amazing, Sora fusion summoned 5 times on his first turn!!!", Yuya said.

"I activate dimension matter transporter; banishing my sniper til the end phase!", you say as your monster dissapeared.

"Is he insane!? He's wide open!!", Yuzu said. "No, just wait", Serena said.

"Attack that fool! Go my sheep!", Sora had his monster attack. "From my hand, I activate the effect of swift scarecrow. By discarding it, the battle phase is done", you say as Soras monster stopped. "Dang it! I end", Sora said. "During the end phase, Sniper returns", you say as your monster comes back.

"I draw, once again; I use snipers effect", you say.

Sora: 2000

Once again, Sora coughed up blood as another hole was made in his torso for him to bleed from. "How is this damage real? Its like Shawn isn't even human", Sora muttered.

"I sacrifice my sniper, to summon malicious edge with its effect. Now, by discarding a card; I can activate, Super Polymerization! This lets me fusion summon using any monsters on the field!", you say. "No way!", Sora said. "Seriously!?", yuya asked. "Shawn, what have you become?", Serena asked.

"I fuse my edge, with your Leo. Behold, as my evil creature evolves through my foe's power. Super Fusion Summon! Evil Hero malicious fiend!", you chant.

EHMF: 3500 ATK

"Attack his sheep!", you say. As Soras monster is destroyed, the fragments of chain pelt his body, and claw marks appear on his chest; leaving him with welts, bleeding scars, and two gaping holes in his body.

Sora: 500

"Next, I discard another card; to activate my lightning vortex! This destroys all face up monsters on your field", you say. As the spell destroys his remaing cards, some of the lightning hits Sora; adding severe burns to his list of injuries.

"I set one reverse card, turn end", you say.

Sora struggles to get up, his injuries for all to see; his face full of anger. "I'll crush you, you inhuman freak! Draw!", Sora said. "Trap card open: drop off. This forces you to discard the card you just drew", you said shocking everyone. Sora looked at the card he drew: snatch steal, and sent it to the grave.

"Draw, I activate fusion weapon", you said.

Malicious Fiend: 5000 ATK

15122121122.title: Yuya and co. Show up first

“It’s time for you to pay for your sins, Sora!” You yelled.

Sora now looks scared. He’s completely cornered and he’s got nothing on him to get him out of this mess. Yuya, Yuzu and the kids feel the same way. But, it’s Serena that feels that way the most. Seeing you, the boy she loves, in a huge fit of rage and hurting Sora like this is too much for her heart.

“We’ve got to do something! He’s going to kill Sora!” Yuya said.

“Like what?!” Yuzu asked.

“I don’t know!” Yuya said back.

“I’m going to enjoy this. Evil Hero Malicious Fiend! Attack his life points with-!” You stopped when you heard something.

“Ser.....ena?” You said softly.

“What does she think she’s doing?” Yuya asked.

“Maybe she’s calming him down.” Nobaru said and they all agreed.

“Shawn! Enough’s enough. This isn’t you! Please. Come back to me! Don’t do this!” Serena said with tears in her eyes.

You see the look on her face and you start to calm down. The power in you vanished and your eyes returned to normal before you passed out, unable to finish the duel.

“Sora! Are you okay?!” Yuya said and Sora was in too much pain to say anything. “Let’s get them both to a doctor now!” Yuya said before getting you and Sora some help.

A couple of hours later, you slowly wake up to see that you’re in a room. You then see
151221211222.title: Serena stops you

1512212112221.content: "Where am I?", your eyes register blurry shape. You see bright lights, and smell chemicals. 'Joy, I'm stuck in a hospital', you think to yourself. Then you realize there are voices, at least three; they were arguing, about you from the sound of it. You struggle to get up, drawing the voices into silence. Suddenly, a familiar pair of hands helps you sit up. "Serena", you say. "Its ok Shawn, I'm here now; don't worry", she said. As the world came in to focus, you see something glistening on Serena's face. "Serena, are you crying?", you ask her. "Shawn, I'm glad that you're ok. What do you remember?", she asked. "Lets see, I was dueling Sora; he summoned 5 fusions on his first turn. I managed to survive that turn. But that's all I remember", you said. "But we had other questions to ask", came another voice. "Shut up Yuya; or you get the fan", threatens another voice. "Serena, what's going on?", you ask. "These are Yuya and Yuzu, they're victims of Soras deceptive ways. We managed to explain things after Reiji showed up. Turns out he has tech to scan for high summoning energies, and recognized me on the monitor. They know about the war, and Sora is in a critical care , high security hospital", she explained. "Good, you found Reiji", you said. Serena then talked about the Maiami city championships junior youths division, and its purpose to gather lancers; and how both you and her were asked to participate. Then she told you about the details you don't remember of your duel, shocking you. "I didn't know I still had that deck. I must have left it in my gym bag full of decks, without realizing it", you said as a white-haired teen stepped in.
1512212112221.title: Serena (with yuya and Yuzu)

15122121122211.content:
“Are you Reiji Akaba?” You asked the teen.

“Indeed I am. And you must be Shawn. How are you feeling?” Reiji asked.

“Like I have the world’s biggest headache. Other than that, great.” You said rubbing your head.

“Good to hear. I’m sure Serena here told you the whole story.” Reiji said.

“Yeah. I just can’t believe that I tried to kill Sora. I mean, he can be a jerk. Yes. But, even he doesn’t deserve that. I don’t know what came over me.” You said feeling bad.

“Well, the good news is that, even though he’s in critical condition, Sora will pull through.” Reiji said.

“Thank goodness.” You sighed in relief.

“I’ve come here to let you know about the tournament that’ll be taking place soon.” Reiji said.

“Don’t worry. I already told him.” Serena said.

“Thank you. But, I’d advise you to keep your anger in check. If you go on another rampage, it’ll jeopardize our operation.” Reiji said.

“You don’t have to tell me twice.” You said.

“Good. Now, the nurse said you can leave today. So, we’ll be seeing you at the tournament.” Reiji said before leaving.

You and Serena go to place held by LDS for shelter and you looked out at the night sky through the window. You thought back at your duel with Sora. If what the others are telling you, then who knows what could happen if that happens again. You grabbed your jacket and you go straight to the door.

“Shawn? Where are you going?” Serena asked.

“I’m just going for a walk. I need some air.” You said.

“Do you want me to come with you?” Serena wondered.
15122121122211.title: Continue 1

151221211222111.content:
You and Serena walked through town, enjoying the sights. "Isn't this nice? Just the two of us, worries gone for a time", Serena asked. "Yeah, for now we have nothing to fear, not academia, not LDS's plans for the tournament. Just a nice little walk; the two of us together", you said. "Oi, you two. What did you just say about LDS?", a voice interrupted you. You both decide to just ignore this person, but you turn back slightly and see more then one. "Run, meet back at our accommodations", you tell Serena. The two of you split up and run, prompting the group to split up to give chase.

You and Serena ran around alley ways and streets, not sure where you were. Just trying to avoid your pursuers, and dodge any obstacles in your way. Unfortunately, you both ran into each other on a deserted street; literally. "Ow! Wait, Shawn!", she said. "Serena!", you said back. "Nowhere to run now. You're surrounded", said a voice. "Just who are you guys", you asked.

"Our names are.."

“Can we help you?” You asked nicely.

“We heard you guys talking about LDS before and their tournament. What? You guys are entering to become show offs?” Masumi asked.

“What? No! That’s not it at all!” Serena objected.

“That’s not how we see it!” Yaiba said.

“Look! We have nothing against LDS. We just want to enter the tournament that’s all.” You tried to reason with these guys.

“Like were going to believe that, punk?” Kobuto said not listening to you at all.

“Would you at least tell us what you guys want from us?” Serena asked.

“We’re from LDS ourselves and we want to show that we’re the best they have to offer. And if you guys have something against that, perhaps we can show what we can do the hard way.” Masumi challenged.

“Serena. You got the girl. I’ll take on these two chumps.” You said.

Serena nodded and goes to duel Masumi. That leaves you with Kobuto and Yaiba.

“You really think you can beat us both all by yourself?” Yaiba teased.

“I don’t think. I know.” You said while activating your duel disk.

“Your funeral then.” Kobuto said before he and Yaiba activated their own duel disk.

The same goes for Serena and Masumi.

“Duel!”

"Oh, aren't you the boy from the hospital? It's, Shawn; right?", Yuzu asked. "Yeah, that's me", you said. "What's the matter?", Yuzu asked. "I'm not sure what's going on, how my monsters became real; or why I turned all crazy. I never want to kill, I don't wanna be like them", you said.

You nod and say you have an idea, and explain said idea. "Its risky, but I know they'll take it; we can't let these guys force innocent people into prostitution", Yuzu said.

“Not really. But, I think someone in that school could give us a clue.” You said looking at You Show School.

The two of you went inside the school and you guys see that the people of this school duel with smiles on their faces. You really wished that it was like that back at Duel Academy. But, once this war is over, it can still be like that. You stopped to see something that caught your eye.

“Shawn? What’s wrong?” Serena asked.

“Look at that.” You said.

You two see a duelist with red and green hair and goggles on his head. He wears a orange shirt, green pants and a jacket he wears like a cape. What caught your attention is the way he’s dueling. Summoning monsters all at the same time like that. That’s something new.

“Woah! What did he just do?” Serena gasped.

“I don’t know, but let’s check it out.” You suggested.

You two go over to meet the boy and he turns to see you two with a friendly face.

“Hi there! Are guys new students here?” The boy asked with a smile on his face.

“Not really. Though, we were impressed by how you dueled just now. Not bad.” You said.

“Thanks. Oh! I’m Yuya Sakaki, by the way.” Yuya introduced himself.

“I’m Serena.” Serena said.

“And I’m Shawn. Nice to meet you, Yuya. Say, do you know a person named Reiji Akaba and of you do, do you know where we can find him?” You wondered.

“I do. He runs another school called LDS. You can search for him there.” Yuya said.

“Thanks, Yuya. Come on, Shawn.” Serena said before leaving.

“Hold on. You two are going to duel him or something?” Yuya asked.

“It’s business, actually. But, it’s somewhere along those lines.” You said.

“Well, there’s this tournament called the Arc Leauge Championship coming up and rumors said that Reiji might be entering it. So, if you enter, you could get a chance to face him.” Yuya suggested.

“That does sound like an idea, Shawn.” Serena said.

“But, if you two are going to be entering, how about a little practice?” Yuya challenged.

“You wanna duel, Yuya? Okay. That’s fine.” You said.

“Shawn. What are you doing? We don’t have time for this. We’ve got the info. So, let’s go.” Serena whispered.

“Hold on a minute, Serena. This guy is using a new kind of summoning method of some sort and he looks pretty strong. Who knows? We could use the extra help.” You whispered back.

“*sigh*. Alright. Maybe one duel could give us a warm up.” Serena said.

“Good.” You said before turning to Yuya. “Alright, Yuya. We’ll duel you.” You said.

“Sweet. So, which one of you am I facing?” Yuya wondered.

“I’m not sure. I was watching the duel when I sense something was wrong with your darling. So, I looked into it. What I saw completey scared me. Whatever was in his mind was like not of this world.” The girl said.

“Shawn.” Serena thought with concern.

You then felt a pain in your head again. This time, you see visions of some sort before you. One was about someone you dislike the most. Leo Akaba. The other was a woman who was appeared to be crying out your name. You gasped as your eyes returned to normal.

“That-that was The Professor. But, who was that woman?” You thought as you see Isao giving you a dark glare before leaving.

This left you with questions. Like what happened? What were those visions? What the hell is going on here?! You left the field with a look of confusion. You wondered around back thinking about what just happened until you bumped into

Make sure you done miss it; okay?", she said. "Wouldn't miss it", you said. "Good", Serena said. As she walked away, she swayed her hips and you couldn't look away.

"You must like that girl", came a voice. You turned around, and saw a hooded figure. "Who are you?", you asked. "Just someone who has answers about your vision", the figure said. "What do you know?", you asked. "Its not that easy, you have to beat me first", the figure said. "Easy enough", you said.

"Not likely, you have never faced a duel spirit", the figure said. "What?", you asked. To your horror, the figure turned into a distorted shapeless blob. "Who are you?", you asked. "I am.."
1512221121111111111123111111.title: Answers?

15122211211111111111231111111.content:
You see the bright blob forming into a human being. He has long bright redish hair and a mask of a dragon. Seeing him in front of you left you speechless.

“Kaibaman?” You asked the self-proclaimed Duel spirit.

“Indeed, Shawn. That’s my name.” Kaibaman said.

“Wait. How do you know my name?” You asked.

“I’ve been watching you for quite some time. I’m glad to finally meet you.” Kaibaman said.

“I would say the same. But, you claimed to know about these visions I’m having. What can you tell me?” You wondered eagerly.

“As I said, it’s not that easy. Only by defeating me in a duel will you get the answers you seek.” Kaibaman said.

“I get that! It’s just I’m seeing things I don’t recall. Hell, I don’t even know my own past period. Why am I seeing all of this now? I must know. Who or what am I?” You begged.

“Well, I will tell you this. The past is returning to you.” Kaibaman said.

“The past returning? What do you mean?” You asked.

“That was free. The rest you have to earn. That is, if you’re willing to accept my challenge.” Kaibaman said while activating his duel disk.

“Okay. I’ll duel and I will get the answers I want.” You said while activating your duel disk.

“Duel field set! Action cards dispersed!”

“Duel!”

Shawn: 4000
Kaibaman: 4000

“Allow me to start our battle. I summon Kaibaman!” Kaibaman said after summoning a copy of himself.

Kaibaman : 200 ATK

“Did you really just summoned yourself or am I going nuts?” You asked while being bewildered.

“I can assure you that my copy is as real as it looks. Now, I activate my ability! By sacrificing myself, I can summon the most powerful beast in my deck from my hand! Now, behold! The invincible might of my Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” Kaibaman said out loud.

“What?!” You yelled in shock before you see the legendary white dragon itself.

Blue-Eyes White Dragon: 3000 ATK

“Great! Now what?!” You thought as you see Blue-Eyes just staring a hole in you.

“I hope you’re prepared for what’s ahead. I end with this.” Kaibaman said while setting a card.

“I’m not off to a good start here and this starting hand doesn’t look very promising. Come on, deck. Don’t let me down.” You thought as you draw your first card and you find it to be a game changer.

“Alright, Kaibaman! I activate...”

May the seafoam fall, and show the world this form. Ritual summon! Level 10, Gishki Zeilgigas!", you chant.

You heard of Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon. But, this one is completely different as it shows the glowing marks on it’s body. It’s like it came out of the future or something.

Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon: 4500 ATK

“Neo Blue-Eyes? That’s new.” You admitted.

“Indeed. And you can now see it’s power in action. Attack Zeilgigas now!” Kaibaman commanded.

You looked for an action card and you found it. You then managed to grab it in time.

“I play the action spell, Evasion! This will have Zeilgigas to dodge your attack!” You said as you and your monster are safe.

“Very good. Unfortunately for you, Shawn. I get another shot to finish this duel. You see, when Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon is the only monster on my field during my battle phase, I can send a blue-eyes fusion monster from my extra deck to the graveyard to have him attack again!” Kaibaman explained.

“Oh no!” You gasped.

“I send Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon from my extra deck to the graveyard to have him attack you again!” Kaibaman said.

You search for another action spell and you managed to get it again.

“I play the action spell, Miracle. My monster is safe and I only take half of the damage!” You said.

Shawn: 150

“I’m surprised you managed to save yourself for this long. But now, it’s all going to end. Because I can use Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon’s effect twice!” Kaibaman said.

“Are you serious?!” You asked in horror.

“As serious as I’ll ever be! I send the original Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon from my extra deck to the graveyard to have Neo Blue-Eyes launch one last attack! Hyper Neutron Blast!” Kaibaman commanded his dragon.

You’re in desperate need for an action card and you see one above you. You jumped up to grab it for any hope you have left.

“I can’t lose. I need to find out the truth. Who I am. What I am. I need to know for my sake and the sake of those around me. That’s why I won’t lose this duel.” You thought definitely as you think about yourself, your friends and Serena.

Did you managed to get the action card?

151222112111111111112311111111211.title: Won the right

1512221121111111111123111111112111.content:
"First, tell me what you remember of your parents", Kaibaman said. "Honestly, I remember nothing of them. Its like they were erased", you said. "They were, Leo altered your memories after he kidnapped you", Kaibaman said. "Kidnapped!?", you asked.

"Lets start from the beginning, but first; come out", Kaibaman said. From around the corner came a woman with bluish-white hair, wearing a brown ceremonial dress. "This is maiden with eyes of blue, but she goes by kisara. But you know her as mom", Kaibaman said. "What? My mom is a duel spirit? What about my dad", you asked. "Right here", Kaibaman said pointing to himself. "What!?", you asked.

"We said we'd start from the beginning, and we will", Kisara said. "That voice, its from my vision", you said. "That was a memory, when you were 6; Leo Akaba found his way into the duel spirit world, and kidnapped you", your dad said. "He altered your memories, so you would forget us. The gods foresaw this, and didn't tell us; they simply gave you the gift to seem human in this world", your mom said. "Now your old enough for us to return your powers to you. You may need them for what's to come", your dad said.

"What powers?", you asked. "The ability to see, communicate with, and sense duel spirits. You will also be able to change into a ghost-like state of transparency, where you will be invisible to those you don't want seeing you. Flight is also there, but not in your solid state. We will also give you knowledge on how to xyz and synchro summon. We will restore your memories too", your mother explained. "How?", you asked. "Simple, you can regain them by hugging me", your mom said. You hugged her as instructed, and images flooded through your mind; and power through your body.

"I'm glad we were able to see you again", your mother said through tears. "Now then, there are powers your mother didn't mention. First off, you can open a portal to the spirit world. Hold off on that however, until either the war is over; or its an emergency. Also, you will be able to sense proles soul rooms, quite handy when you're not sure of motives. Also, you can sense auras to scan peoples emotions. And finally, you can make shadowgames happen; but only use this if necessary", your dad said. "I know you will be responsible with these abilities, so don't use them to spy on Serena; ok?", your mother said in a teasing voice. "Before we go; here", your dad gave you a deck.

"This is my deck; your birthright. It has fusion, xyz, and synchro capabilities. I used it, and you beat it; so its yours. Treasure it well, your mother and I are in here after all. So add it to your collection of decks. And good luck", your dad said as they dissapeared.

"Mom....dad", you said as you looked at a clock. "Oh crap! Serena's duel is gonna start any minute!", you ran off.
1512221121111111111123111111112111.title: A truth beyond

But, I heard that she can be as deadly as a lion with a razor sharp attitude! She is Serena!” Nico said as the crowd cheers for her too.

“Go get him, Serena! Show him who’s boss!” You cheered before you see a hooded-man nearby.

You sense that there’s something strange about him. Yet, it feels familiar somehow. You choose to watch the duel for now.

“Relax. You’re in LDS. I’m Shawn and this here is Serena.” You introduced yourselves.

“Well, I don’t care what your names are! I got to go find Rin!” The biker said.

“Rin? Is she a friend of yours?” Serena wondered to him.

“So, that’s his name. Now, tell us who you are.” You said nicely.

“If you must know. I’m Yugo. Now, care to tell me why I’m here?” The one named Yugo asked.

You and Serena go on explaining about the war and the stuff that’s been happening, besides your relationship with her, and Yugo seems to be shocked. The shock turned to panic for in fear of his friend’s life.

“I’ve got to find her! Now!” Yugo said getting up.

“I’m sorry. But, our boss wants you to remain here until further notice.” You said.

“I can’t just sit here! Rin needs me!” Yugo said.

“Well, maybe we can help you. We can really use an ally in our group. So, if you help us with this war, we’ll help you find your friend.” You suggested.

“Okay. Fine. I’m in.” Yugo said.

“Hold on. Not so fast. You’ll need to prove yourself first. Perhaps, in a duel.” Serena suggested.

“Okay. I’ll take one of you on one-on-one.” Yugo said with confidence.

“I’ll take you on. That is, if you have a problem with that.” You said.

“Not a problem at all.” Yugo said.

You lead him to the dueling arena to begin your duel.

“Duel!”

You and Serena just fell asleep together. Meanwhile, a man in a purple coat and a red scarf was looking for Reiji and he found him.

“Hey, Reiji? Where is that Yugo at now.” The man asked.

“He should be in his room resting for the night. Why do you ask?” Reiji wondered suspiciously.

“I just want to talk to him. That’s all.” Shun said before leaving to find Yugo.

Reiji has a weird feeling about this. So, he gets up to follow him. You and Serena were sleeping peacefully when you hear banging and screaming that woke you up.

“What the hell is that noise?” You wondered.

“I don’t know. But, it sounds like it’s coming from Yugo’s room.” Serena said.

You and Serena got dressed and go upstairs to Yugo’s room. When you get there, you see Reiji and were shocked to see Shun beating the hell out of Yugo. You ran in and hold back Shun’s fist from hurting Yugo anymore.

“What the hell do you think you’re doing?” You asked Shun in an angry way.

“That face! You must be Shawn. Why did you stop me?” Shun asked equally as mad.

“To stop you from beating Yugo up. He’s on our side. And why didn’t you stop him, Reiji?” You asked him.

“Perhaps, Shun here would explain things to you.” Reiji said.

“This creep over here kidnapped my sister, Ruri, from the Xyz Dimension. I’m beating him up just to get some answers on where she is.” Shun said.

“I keep telling you. I don’t know about this Ruri person. It’s you and your buddy that took away my friend, Rin.” Yugo said.

“You’re the kidnapper here, punk!” Shun yelled.

“Is it true?” Serena asked you.

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“Look, I don’t know what’s the deal between you two, but this fighting isn’t gonna solve anything. How about you tell us both of your sides of the story and then we’ll see who’s right?” You suggested. “Shun. You first.” You said.

“Okay. Back home, I was told that Ruri was taken by the enemy. Me and my friends went looking for her. That’s when I saw Yuto challenging this guy here. And then he just bailed on out of there back to his little colleagues.” Shun said.

“Okay. Why were you there to begin with and why did you attacked Yuto?” You asked Yugo next.

“I saw someone taking Rin away too. I searched all over the place in that little dimension of yours and found your buddy. I would’ve beaten him if you hadn’t shown up.” Yugo said.

“You thought Yuto has Rin?” Serena guessed.

“Yeah. That guy had the exact same face as the one who kidnapped Rin.” Yugo finished.

“No way! Yuto isn’t like that! He would never kidnap anyone.” Shun countered.

“Listen. Perhaps, this whole thing is a misunderstanding. Maybe he was just at the wrong place at the wrong time and mistook Yuto for someone else.” You said.

“He could be right, Shun.” Reiji said.

“Oh yeah? Well, how should I know that you don't have something to do with Ruri’s kidnapping too?” Shun said to your face.

“Don’t push me, pal.” You warned him.

“Or else what, Pawn of Fusion?” Shun dared.

You over go to kick Shun’s ass, but Reiji stopped you in time.

“Enough! You both know that there’s only one way to settle this.” Reiji said.

“A duel? I’m in.” Yugo said.

“No! You’re hurt right now. How about we let you duel instead, Shawn?” Reiji suggested.

“Alright. That sounds fair.” You said.

You and Shun left to the duel area while Serena talks to Reiji.

“Do you think we should bring Yuya and Yuzu too? They’re witnesses to the duel between Yugo and Yuto. Maybe, they might help.” Serena said.

“I’m way ahead of you. They should be here momentarily.” Reiji said.

With that being said, you and Shun set your duel disks on and begin to battle.

“Duel!”

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
After the duel, you walked up to Shun to see him on the ground. He struggled to get to his feet and he looks up to see you extending his hand to help him up.

“Come on.” You said.

Shun hesitated. But, he grabbed your hand and you pulled him up. He looked rather surprised that you, from the fusion dimension, would help him up like that.

“Look, I know that you’re way upset that your sister got kidnapped. But, you must know that acts of revenge isn’t going to help you find her. We need to stand united if we ever have a chance to put an end to this madness once and for all. And, I’m sorry for what my dimension has done to yours. If I had known about this, I would’ve tried to stop it. But, no better time than the present, right? So, you have to see that you can’t do this alone. When it comes to those punks, we’re all in this together.” You said.

Shun digested what you were saying and and brings out his fist towards you. Everyone thought that he’s going to hit you. Instead, they see him bumping his fist into you chest. You looked surprised to see that happening before looking back at his face.

“Don’t you dare lose to those fusion losers on me. Got it?” Shun said.

You smiled at his words and you returned the fist bump back at him.

“You bet.” You said.

After that, Shun listened to everything about Yugo and it turns out he was wrong about him. So, if he didn’t kidnapped this Ruri girl, then who did? Possibly, a top guy from the fusion dimension and you can narrow the list down on who it could be.

“What? Can’t take the truth? Well, both love and the truth hurts a lot. Soon, she’ll question herself on why she’s going out with a nobody when she can date a somebody.” Sawatari said trying to woo Serena again.

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
"We should go too", Tatsuya told Futoshi and Ayu. "Should we wait for Yuzu?", Futoshi asked. "We can't, I have to get home", Ayu said.

"Josi, the children are leaving alone. Shall I begin my assignment?", asked one of the hooded men. "Go Michael, I shall stall Shawn. Call me when you're done, and I'll bring him so we may administer the final test", The other hooded man said on a cell-phone. "Of course", Michael said.

"I'm telling you Tatsuya, we're lost", Ayu said. "Ok fine, we are", Tatsuya said. They tried to read the map functions on their disk, but couldn't get a signal. "Why can't we get a signal?", Ayu complained. Suddenly, anklets with chains came from the ground and restrained.

"What's going on!?", Ayu cried in panic.

"My apologies children, but you are bait. For now, we duel; 4000 a person", Michael said as he appeared.

"You'll have 4000?", Futoshi asked.

"Yes, and it will come back to me after all 3 of you go. These terms put me at a disadvantage, so I will start. Are you ready children?", Michael asked.

The 3 children nodded, and readied their disks.

"DUEL!"

Michael: 4000
Tatsuya: 4000
Futoshi: 4000
Ayu: 4000

*-*-*

"Shawn, wait", Serena called as yuya followed.

"Just leave me alone!", you cried as you ran into someone.

"Hello Shawn. Are you ready to begin?", Josi asked you.

"Who are you?", you asked.

"Josi, I am here to duel you. Serena and yuya can join if they want", Josi said.

"Why should I duel you?", you asked.

"Me and my friend have the little ones. I'll tell you where they are if you win", Josi said.

"Let us help Shawn, the kid's are in danger. Time is a factor", Serena said as Yuya walked up.

"Fine, lets go!", you said.

"I go first then", Josi said.

"DUEL!"

Josi: 4000
Shawn: 4000
Yuya: 4000
Serena: 4000

Who do we watch first?
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Two strangers: a test rises

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“I’ll begin by summoning Gagaga Magician.” Josi said.

Gagaga Magician: 1500 ATK

“And since I summoned a level 4 monster, I can also summon Kagetokage.” Josi said.

Kagetokage: 1100 ATK

“Now, watch as I use my level 4 Kagetokage and Gagaga Magician in order to build the Overlay Network!” Josi said.

“No way!” Serena gasped.

“He’s an Xyz duelist?” Yuya said

“Didn’t see that coming.” You said.

“I now Xyz Summon Number 39: Utopia!” Josi said.

Number 39: Utopia: 2500 ATK

“And I’ll end with two cards face down. You’re up.” Josi said.

“Alright then. I’ll start the team off. I draw! I use Trade-In. I discard a level 8 monster to my hand in order to draw two cards. I now activate Return of the Dragon Lords. I can now summon a dragon from my graveyard as long as it’s level is 7 or 8. So, return to the field Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” You said as the symbol of your heritage emerges.

Blue-Eyes White Dragon: 3000 ATK

“Oh yeah! That’s the spirit!” Serena said happily.

“Nice work, Shawn.” Yuya complimented.

“Ahh. The legendary Blue-Eyes White Dragon. A very special monster you have there.” Josi said looking at your monster.

“And it’s gonna blow you and your number away. Blue-Eyes! Attack Utopia with White Lightning!” You commanded.

“Not so fast! By using an overlay unit, Utopia blocks your attack! Light Wing Shield.” Josi said.

“Damn! I end my turn.” You said.

“I just hoped that those kids are alright.” You thought while sweating bullets

"I activate Fortissimo the Mobile Fortress! Next, I use its effect to special summon Meklord army of Skiel!", Michael said.

Army of Skiel: 1200 ATK

"Next, I activate pot of greed to draw two cards! Next, I activate double summon; and normal summon two more army monsters! Mekord Armies of Wisel and Granel!", Michael said.

Army of Wisel: 1800 ATK

Army of Granel: 1600 ATK

"Now I play card of sanctity! We both draw until we have six cards! I use darkworld dealings, we all draw 1 card and discard 1! I discard Wisel core. I use graceful charity, draw three and discard sky core and grand core. I discard for trap booster, to use Meklord emperor creation! To summon Meklord Emperor Mekanikle!", Michael said.

Mekanikle: 4000 ATK

"Now, I special summon Meklord Astro Dragon Asterisk since I control 3 or more Meklord monsters! His ATK is the total of all other machine monsters I have; and you can't attack any other machine monster I have but him!", Michael said.

Asterisk: 8600 ATK

"Next, I activate Lock-on laser. If my opponent sets a spell or trap; they take 200 points of damage! I activate boon of the Meklord Emperor! Now I draw 5 cards, since I have 5 Meklord monsters! I use emergency provisions, to send my equipped Meklord Emperor creation to the grave. I set two cards, and end my turn. Since I control a machine monster during my end phase, I don't take 100 points of damage", Michael said.

"I'm scared guys", Ayu said; her two friends nodded in agreement. But they were stuck, bound in chains.

Michael: 5000
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Meklord Mayhem!

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“My turn! I draw! I summon Lunalight Kaleido Chick!” Serena said.

Lunalight Kaleido Chick: 1400 ATK

“I’ll use Chick’s ability to send Panther Dancer from my extra deck to the graveyard to make my Chick become Panther Dancer. Now, I’ll use Polymerzation to fuse her along with Black Sheep and Blue Cat together to create Lunalight Leo Dancer!” Serena said.

Lunalight Leo Dancer: 3500 ATK

“Now attack his Utopia!” Serena said.

“Perhaps. But, my Leo can now automatically destroy him.” Serena said.

“Damn it. Oh well. Make this good, Yuya.” Serena said.

“You got it. I draw! I’ll use Timegazer Magician and Stargazer Magician to set the pendulum scale. I’m taking control of this duel starting now! Now, I get to summon monsters from levels 2 to 7 all at the same time. Swing forth Pendulum! Carve the Arc of Victory! My monsters are ready to swing into action! Turn up the heat, Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon!” Yuya chanted.

Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon: 2500 ATK

This is a very good sight to behold. All three of you and your friend’s best monsters are out on the field. If this isn’t a dream team, nobody will know what it is.

“So, these three are your best monsters, huh? Not bad. But, it’s gonna take more than those to beat me.” Josi said.

“We’re just getting started. You’ll see what we can do soon enough. For now, I end my turn.” Yuya said.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Dream Team

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
"I draw, and activate my mausoleum of the emperor!", Futoshi said. The stone structure rose from the ground, as a second field spell appeared.

"I pay 2000 life points with is effect, to summon doodle beast- tyranny!", Futoshi said.

Futoshi: 2000

DB-Tyranno: 2400 ATK

"I activate level cannon! Now, any time a player summons a monster; they damage equal to its level x 200. Starting now", Michael said as blasters shot Futoshi.

Futoshi: 400

"Futoshi, you have 400 left. If you set, its 200; and 100 during your end phase with no machine-monsters", Michael said.

"I, I set a card and end", Futoshi said as the effects triggered.

Tatsuya: 0

To Futoshi and Ayu's horror, Tatsuya turned to stone before their eyes. "As you can see, victory isn't the only thing on the line", Michael said as Tatsuya's cards dissapeared.

Ayu just set a monster, and 3 takedowns.

Ayu: 3300

Michael attacked with Asterisk, and ended.

Futoshi: 0

After he turned all the way, Michael turned his gaze to Ayu.

In response, Ayu fell to her knees as tears spilled from her eyes.

"WAAAHH!!!!!! I want my mommy!", she cried loudly as the tears continued.

"Do not fear child, its a part of the process", Michael thought.

"I can't leave; so you help them. We fixed your runner", Reiji said.

"Would've preferred to fix it myself", Yugo said as he ran.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Life points: dropping like flies

“It’s time to put you fools down. I draw! I activate my face down, Rank up magic quick chaos force. This will allow my Utopia to evolve into a monster that’s a rank higher than him. Rank up Xyz Change! Rank 5! Chaos Number 39: Utopia Ray V!” Josi said.

Number C39: Utopia Ray V: 2600 ATK

“Next, I play Card of Demise. I draw five cards and I discard my whole hand in five turns. Now, I activate Utopia Ray V’s ability! I use one overlay unit to have him destroy one of your monsters and I choose your Blue-Eyes White Dragon. Oh! And when he’s destroyed, you’ll take damage equal to his attack points. That means that you’re going to take 3000 points of damage.” Josi said.

“I don’t think so. I banish Return of the Dragon Lords from my graveyard to protect Blue-Eyes.” You said as your dragon is safe and sound.

“Very well. I activate Blustering Winds! This will increase my monster’s attack points by 1000 until my next Standby Phase.” Josi said.

Number C39: Utopia Ray V: 3600 ATK

“Now attack Shawn’s Blue-Eyes!” Josi said.

Shawn: 3400

“Shawn! Are you okay?” Serena asked.

“Say something, pal.” Yuya said.

“I’m fine.” You said.

“You won’t be for long. For now, I play two cards down and end.” Josi said.

“Okay. Here goes. I draw!” You said as you draw your card.

What you see next was your mother in her hand. This would be the perfect time for her help.

“I play Pot of Greed to draw two cards. Now, let me show you something interesting. I summon The Maiden with Eyes of Blue!” You said.

Maiden with Eyes of Blue: 0 ATK

“Maiden with Eyes of Blue?” Serena thought.

“That’s new.” Yuya thought as well.

“What the? Is this a joke?” Josi teased.

“Watch and see. I play Rush Recklessly to give her 700 attack points. Also, when she’s targeted for an effect, she can bring out an old friend. Blue-Eyes White Dragon, come on back! Now, I’ll use Burst Stream of Destruction! Now Blue-Eyes can destroy Utopia Ray V at the cost of not attacking this turn.” You said.

“No difference there. Because when Utopia Ray V gets destroyed, I can place Utopia back into my extra deck. Plus, your Maiden doesn’t scare me even with a direct attack.” Josi said.

“Alone, yes. But, with some help, she’ll beat you. For you see, my Maiden also happens to be a tuner monster.” You said with a smirk.

“A tuner?!” Josi, Serena, and Yuya gasped at the same time.

“Yes. Now, I tune level 1 Maiden with Eyes of Blue with level 8 Blue-Eyes White Dragon!” You said.

1 + 8 = 9

“Open up the gates of Heaven and descend upon us with your spiritual presence! Synchro summon! Level 9! Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon!” You chanted.

Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon: 2500 ATK

“No way! He knows how to Synchro summon?!” Yuya said in disbelief.

“Shawn! Where did you learn to do that?” Serena asked.

“A special friend helped me. Anyway, attack him directly with Spiritual Lightning!” You commanded.

“I play Damage Diet to take half of the damage.” Josi said.

Josi: 2750

“No matter. I place a card down and end.” You said.

"What's going on?", came another voice.

The rules are simple; me, one of you, me again, the other one, then back to me. Nobody attacks until everyone has a turn. If you want your own life points; then mine are doubled", Michael said.

“I draw! First, with Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon’s ability, I can bring out a normal monster from my graveyard during my Standby Phase. So, come on out Blue-Eyes White Dragon! Now, I play Ancient Rules to bring out my second Blue-Eyes!” You said.

Your dragon hits Utopia, only to see that he’s alive and well.

"You're the maiden with eyes of blue!", Serena said. "More than that, I'm a duel spirit; and Shawns mother", she said. "What?", Serena asked. "Yes, and his father is Kaibaman. We gave him this deck after he beat his father in a duel", she said. "Why are you here?", Serena asked.

"Josi and his partner Michael, they are not human. They are spirit's, but not duel spirits; but they aren't dead. My point is, I'm here to help; take my hand", she said.

One of Serenas eyes turned blue, as she looked at her hand.

"I play my set card, monster reborn! Return, blue cat! Now I summon a second! I overlay my monsters, to xyz summon! Those who seek hope, turn back now. Behold, the harbinger of despair! Number 98: Antitopian!", Serena said.

Beyond was absorbed by 98, and Josi didn't react much; but he did react.

You looked back at your friends and girlfriend that are still in stone. Seeing Serena and the others like this is too heartbreaking to see. You need a miracle soon and you have the cards that can by you time.

“Eh. You’re just stalling. My move. I play Graceful Charity. I draw three and discard two. One of those cards wass Grapha, Dragon Lord of Dark World. When discarded, I can destroy your swords. Next, I summon Zure, Knight of Dark World.” Josi said.

As this occurred, the ground started shaking; and the clouds formed a glowing swirl pattern. Lightning appears everywhere, as beams of light flew into the card.

"What's happening?", you thought.

*-*-*-*

"Sir, we are detecting unusually high xyz energy; and it seems to be the cause of the unusual weather phenomena", an analyst told Reiji.

Amon: 5000 ATK

****

"Analysis?", Reiji asked.

"Analysis of Shawns odd duel is not complete sir! It won't be until morning", Nakajima said.

****

"I play card of sanctity! Now I equip rainbow veil to Amon, and another space typhoon on your set card! Destroy his reaper! Two cards face down turn end", Michael said.

Following that, I play Soul Release to banish five monsters from my graveyard. Then, I’ll play Dimension Fusion to special summon all of my banished monsters at the cost of 2000 life points.” You said.

Jurrac Titano: 4000 ATK
