1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Pulling Off A Miracle

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
"Shawn! Wake up! Shawn! Get up you worthless-"SLAP! "Ow! Who hit me?", you asked. Suddenly, two arms wrapped tightly around you. "Mom?", you asked. Your mother was right here, with your father right behind.

"Want some tea?", came a voice. You turned and saw Michael, holding tea and cookies; a smile on his face.

"Why is he here!?", you demanded.

"Sweetheart, this is Michael; he's a friend of ours", your mom said. "What?", you asked. "Yes, your father asked us to test your strength", Josi said as he walked in.

"Lets go see your friends", your dad said. A few moments later, you were in a massive dining hall; and Serena ran up to you.

"Let us eat!", Josi said.

As everyone started eating, something crossed your mind.

"Um, Michael, Josi; where are we?", you asked. "In the spirit world", Michael said. "Somewhat. It’s a pocket dimension, that exists between the duel spirit world, the human world, and the world of the dead. It was created just like us, in a massive high energy explosion; it resulted from duel spirit research. It was in the original dimension, before it became four", Josi said.

"How did the dimensions split", you asked.

"A story for another time", Michael said.

"We are sorry for scaring all of you during our mission to test Shawn", Josi said.

Everyone accepted the apology, as Kaibaman began speaking. He talked about Kisara possessing Serena, and summoning that xyz monster; and how he taught you to xyz and synchro.

"Tomorrow, the fusion dimension will attack standard; we will help defend it. We wish to aid in this war, where your parents can't; given we are half-human spirits", Josi said.

"And a warning, Reiji wants to talk to you", Michael said.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Learning the mysteries

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
After the meal, you just sit out in the open and enjoy the sunset over the spirit world. It was so strange that your life changed so dramatically in just about a week, both good and bad. That’s when you felt the hand of your girlfriend, Serena, on your shoulder and you looked over to see her beautiful face.

“I just can’t believe it. All this time, you’re like part-duel spirit.” Serena said.

“Yeah. I couldn’t believe it either right after my duel with Dad.” You said.

“How come you don’t remember any of it?” Serena wondered as she sits on your lap.

“Leo Akaba. He took me when I was six and altered my memories. How he got here? I’m not sure. What for? Probably, to become his ultimate weapon or something. He just gave me a much bigger reason to hate his guts.” You said with anger as Serena calms you down.

“We understand. You were precious to your parents and to us when you were born. When Akaba took you away, it was so heartbreaking.” Micheal said as he and Josi comes in to see you.

“We’re sorry that we didn’t protect you when you were a child. We tried to hold them off for as long as we could. But, his forces were too great for us and your father.” Josi said.

“That’s okay. What matters is that I remember them now. I have you guys, the others, and I have the girl of my dreams next to me.” You said.

“That’s very thoughtful of you.” Kisara said from behind.

“Oh. Hi Mom.” You said.

“I know you can win this war. Because, you have all of us by your side. Besides, who else is my future daughter-in-law gonna keep company without you?” Kisara wondered in a teasing manner.

“Really, Mom?! Really?!” You said in embarrassment as you and Serena blushed while Josi and Micheal chuckled.

“Oh! One more thing. Here. I figured that you might need this deck, Serena.” Kisara said as she gives Serena a deck.

“Thank you.” Serena said politely.

“You’re welcome. Now, the bedroom is right down the left. Second door.” Kisara said as you and Serena go to the bedroom for you will go back to Standard first thing in the morning.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Continue 1

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
It was morning and the sun was rising up from the horizon. Just then, Micheal came out with an apron that says “kiss the cook” along with a pan and a wooden spoon.

“Come on, everyone! Rise and shine!” Micheal yelled as he starts banging on the pan with the spoon that causes everyone to wake up.

“Sheesh! Why not wake up the whole spirit world while you’re at it!” Gong said as he, Yuya, and everyone got out of their respective rooms.

“It’s my way to wake up. Anyway, breakfast will be ready in a little bit. So, get yourselves ready.” Micheal said as everyone left before noticing that you and Serena are the only ones that didn’t come out. “Hey! You two! Let’s get our butts off of that mattress!” Micheal said before barging into the room.

What he sees next left him shocked as he sees you and Serena were getting into some morning action. It left him speechless to see you banging her and you two were blushing in embarrassment.

“GET OUT!!” You and Serena yelled at Micheal before throwing a shoe at him, which he dodges.

“Sorry! I’ll leave you to your thing!” Micheal said before closing the door. “Shawn. My hat’s off to you. You’ve finally become a man.” Micheal thought before leaving.

“That was embarrassing.” Serena said as you and her get out of bed.

“No kidding. Well, let’s go shower.” You said before you and Serena go into the shower.

You washed her good as you kissed her lips a lot. That’s when you found a brown furry thing and you thought it was a luffa. You used it to scrub on Serena’s back, front, and then between her buttcheeks. That’s when she felt something strange about it.

“Weird. It feels alive.” Serena said.

“Huh?” You asked before you see a pair of purple eyes and three claws on it’s hands and feet. “Kuriboh?! What are you doing in here?!” You yelled in shock and Kuriboh just cooed at you two.

“Aww. We’re sorry. We thought you were a luffa. Can you forgive us?” Serena said as Kuriboh just snuggled on her face that proves that he does forgive you two.

“Well, once we’re done, will clean you up.” You said.

Just then, you and Serena got cleaned, you washed up Kuriboh too, got dressed, and you, Serena, and Kuriboh go down to the dining room for breakfast.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Crazy Morning

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
You all make it to the dining hall and sat down to enjoy your breakfast. Pancakes! They tasted really good in your mouth. Who knew Micheal was a good cook? After you finished eating, you decided to talk to your parents.

“Mom? Dad? Can I ask you two something?” You asked.

“Of course. What is it, sweetie?” Kisara asked you back.

“Well, during my second round match against this big bully, he said words directly into my heart and I got angry. After that, when I came to, he was laying on the ground unconscious. What was that all about?” You wondered.

“I’m afraid you unleashed the dark half of your powers. When you unleashed your anger, the darkness within a duel spirit is released. In your case, you would bring out the magic of the shadow games.” Kaibaman explained.

“Shadow games?” Yuya asked.

“It’s a terrifying way of dueling that once existed 5000 years ago. When you lose a shadow game, your soul is sent to the dimension of eternal darkness. The Shadow Realm.” Kisara finished explaining.

That scared everyone here, minus your parents, Micheal, and Josi. You just looked at yourself and you never thought you would bring out something so evil.

“Excuse me.” You said as you got up to go outside.

“I’ll go talk to him.” Kaibaman said.

“No, sir. I’ll go talk to him. Uh. With your permission.” Serena said.

“Very well.” Kaibaman agreed.

Serena got up to find you outside and she did. You feel sad and she goes up to you.

“Shawn? Are you okay?” Serena asked you.

“Serena. I-I don’t think you want to see me anymore.” You said sadly.

“What?! What are you talking about?!” Serena asked in shock of your words.

“You heard what my parents just told us. I can create dark magic that can make turning people into cards seemed merciful. One snap of rage and their souls could be gone.” You said as tears starting coming down your face.

“That wasn’t you, Shawn! Don’t go blaming yourself!” Serena said to reason with you.

“But, it’s true! You saw what I did back at the tournament! I’m worse than those punks from Fusion! Maybe, worse than The Professer! It’s best that-!” You stopped when.

*SLAP!*

You were stunned when Serena slapped you across your face. You see the tears coming down on her face too for she can’t bear to see you suffer like this.

“Listen to me here, mister! Don’t you ever, and I mean ever, think that you’re worse than The Professor or anyone from Fusion who thinks like him! You were angry because that bully pushed you too far! I would feel the same way too! Yeah! It was scary to watch! I’ll admit! But, that wasn’t you at all! So, there’s no way I’m just gonna leave you like that! You were the one who opened my eyes to the truth and I couldn’t be anymore happy to be here with you! So, good or evil, I’ll be by your side one hundred percent. I promise. I love you so much.” Serena said as she hugged you.

After hearing those words, you felt happy again and you hugged her back. You told her thank you and you kissed her on her lips. That’s when you see your friends out there with smiles on their faces as well.

“Guys?” You said.

“Serena’s right. We all know that it wasn’t your fault. So, don’t go beating yourself over all of this.” Gong said and the kids agreed.

“I agree. Trust us when we say that your heart is as pure as anything.” Josi said as Micheal nodded with agreement.

“You see, Shawn. You’re no monster or anything like that. You’re one of the greatest friends we can ever know. If anything, that makes you one of us.” Yuya said.

You were touched by the words and you see your parents smiling at you as well. You smiled too and you felt like you’re at home with these people here.

“Thanks, guys.” You said.

“You bet, Shawn.” Yuya said as he patted you on the back.

“Well, with that done, it’s time to deport.” Micheal said.

The portal to Standard opened and you all are about to leave before Kisara and Kaibaman came over to say goodbye to you all.

“Just remember that you have our cards. So, we’re always by your side.” Kaibaman said as he hugged you.

“I know, Dad. I know.” You said as you hugged him back.

“Serena. You have made our son very happy. We’re very proud to have you in the family.” Kisara said.

“Thank you. I’ll make sure that he’s all good.” Serena said.

“And I know he’ll do the same with you. Also, don’t start having a baby without telling us first.” Kisara teased.

“MOM!” You said in embarrassment while the others laughed.

You make your way through the portal after waving goodbye to your parents. Now that you’re back, what’s next?
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Never Leaving You

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“Guys. I’m going to see Reiji at the tower. I’ll see you all later.” You said.

“Wait. I’m coming with you.” Serena said not wanting to leave her boyfriend’s side.

“Us too. Reiji would want an explanation.” Micheal said and Josi nodded.

And so, you four go to the LEO tower to see Reiji. You arrived at the front desk and told the receptionist that you want to see him.

“Sir. Shawn and Serena are here with some guests. They said that they wanted to see you.” The receptionist said on the phone.

“Let them in.” Reiji said.

You and the others make your way to Reiji’s office and you knocked on the door before entering. Reiji turned to see you and Serena. But, he’s quite unfamiliar with Micheal and Josi.

“I see that you two are in one piece. May I ask who are these two because they looked like the ones who attacked you.” Reiji wondered.

“They are. Don’t worry. Turns out they’re on our side. This is Micheal and Josi. They were sent here by my father to test my abilities.” You explained.

“Your father?” Reiji asked.

You all sit down and told Reiji that you’re, actually, half duel spirit that comes from the world of duel monster spirits. You told him that your parents are Kaibaman and the Maiden with Eyes of Blue, Kisara. You also explained to him that his father, Leo Akaba, went into the spirit world to kidnap you for his own purposes. After hearing that, Reiji felt enraged to hear that his father went lower than ever. But, cooled down once you told them that Micheal and Josi has info about Academia.

“We’ve got word that they’ll be invading here today. So, while Shawn and Serena compete in the Battle Royal, we’ll help you prepare for their attack.” Micheal said.

“Very well. Shawn. Serena. Good luck and keep your eyes open.” Reiji said.

“You got it.” You said before you and Serena left for the battle royal.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Go to the LEO tower

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“Shawn? Are you done in there yet?” Serena asked while you’re using the bathroom.

“Just about done! Let me just wash my hands.” You said.

You finished using the bathroom and you come back out.

“Took you long enough.” Serena said.

“Sorry. Those pancakes had my stomach going.” You said.

“Well, let’s get going. The battle royal is about to start.” Serena said and is about to go before you stopped her.

“Before we go, I still want to say thank you for that pep talk back at the spirit world. You really helped me out back there.” You complimented.

“Hey. You’re my boyfriend and I love you to death. Nothing and no one will change that.” Serena said as she kissed you on the lips.

“I can say the same about you. Though, if it’s true that Fusion is on their way here, they’ll likely come after you consider Leo still needs you.” You said.

“Yeah. Do you think he still needs you too?” Serena wondered.

“Possibly. However, that won’t happen as long we keep our game on and our friends have our back.” You said.

“No doubt about that.” Serena nodded in agreement.

“Let’s do this.” You said as you, once again, give Serena’s ass a soft smack.

“I swear, it’s like you’re obsessed with my butt or something.” Serena commented as she rubbed her ass.

“I won’t lie on that.” You said while walking away with Serena, with a smile on her face, follows you while shaking her head.

The tournament is about to start and Nico Smiley explains the rules to everyone.

(A/N; I’ve been quite lazy lately. So, if you want to know the rules, go to the Yugipedia website to learn what they are.).

It begins and you race down the forest area to hunt for those pendulum cards. You then found some and you put them away before you see a duelist with orange hair with a tint of red on the front and freckles on his face.

“Hi. I’m guessing you’re here for the Pendulum cards I’ve got here.” You said.

“You know it. I’m Michio Mokota and I'm gonna fix myself a nice meal of victory today. Hope you’re hungry for some action.” Michio said.

“Believe me. I’m always hungry.” You said.

“Then you’re gonna dine on what I’ve got for you.” Michio said.

“If it’s my victory, then it’s to go.” You said as both duel disks are set.

“DUEL!”

Shawn: 4000
Michio: 4000
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: It’s Battle Royal Time!

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
“I’ll be starting off first. I activate Graceful Charity. I draw three cards and discard two. Next, I activate the spell card, Food Fraud. I get to add two royal cookpal monsters from my deck to my hand. However, I can’t summon them this turn. I choose Royal Cookpal Prince Curry and Princess Pudding. Then, I’ll play the spell, Regal Recipes. It’ll come to in effect later. For now, I’ll set this monster and one other card face down to end my turn.” Michio said.

“I don’t know what plan you’re cooking up, but I’m gonna spoil that idea. I draw!” You said.
1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.title: Michio goes first

1512221121111111111123111111112111121111.content:
"I'm starting this turn off with Unknown Synchron! I can special summon this monster when I have no monsters out, and you do!", you said.

Unknown Synchron: 0 ATK

"Next I activate my own graceful charity, drawing 3 cards and discarding 2. I discard dandylion, to summon quickdraw Synchron; dandelions effect summons two fluff tokens. Next I summon tuningware!", you said.

"Remarkable, Shawn is gathering his own ingredients folks; he's got 5 monsters", smiley said.

“Duel!”

Serena & Yuzu: 4000
Halil & Olga: 4000

BotFF - S: 2000 ATK
BotFF - B: 1800 ATK

“Rise from the firey ashes and show them the might of a great predator! Xyz summon! Rank 4! Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Tiger King!” Serena chanted.

Meanwhile, Reiji was looking on and was surprised when saw Serena Xyz summon on the monitor. He decided to watch to see if she can master this new style well.

“When Tiger King is Xyz summoned, I can set any Fire Formation spell or trap card from my deck. I choose Fire Formation - Tensen. And I’ll end with a face down. You’re up.” Serena said.

Who goes first for the opposing team?

If the level is too high, or it's not a monster; I can'tput any monsters out this turn!", Olga said.

You looked over to see a young man in a suit and has orange hair. According to the records of the tournament, this guy is named Dennis Macfield, who said he’s a dueltainer like Yuya and his father, Yusho.

“Hey there.” You said to call out to him.

“Do my eyes deceive me or I’m actually seeing Shawn standing in front me?” Dennis said looking at you.

“Nope. Your eyes are not wrong. I guess you’ve been watching some of my matches or something.” You wondered.

“Indeed. You’ve put on quite the show in the tournament so far. But now, you’re facing a real performer in the form of Dennis Macfield. So let’s give out the best show we can make possible.” Dennis said before he noticed that you’re looking at him skeptically. “Is something wrong?”

“I’m sorry, but you just look kinda familiar to me. Have we met before?” You asked him.

“Not that I can remember.” Dennis answered.

“Oh. Okay then. Well, let’s just get this show on the road.” You said ready to duel.

“You took the words right out of my mouth.” Dennis said activating his duel disk.

“Duel!”

"I assume your going after the man in the scarf and his companion?", Reiji asked. "Yep", you said. "Then follow me", he said.

15 minutes later...

"Shun, lets try in here", yuto said. "Alright", shun said. The room they entered, was full of people; you and Serena included. Reiji greeted them, then went into a long speech about his goal to end the war; and this and that. Reiji then offered the two a chance to join him, to stop the war. "What's the catch?", shun asked.

Reiji then explained the tournament, and its purpose to gather lancers. "You simply have to prove in the tournament that you have what it takes. And I'll event give you a test right now for instant entry", Reiji said. "That is?", yuto asked.

"These are Serena and Shawn. They are from fusion, but left to stop the war", Reiji said. "She looks like Ruri as well", yuto said. "So you two betrayed academia? My type of people", shun said.

"It will be a tag duel. If I like what I see, you boys are in", Reiji said.

“I’m good. Thanks.” You said while getting up.

“I end my turn. I know you can step up, Shawn. So, don’t give in now!” Yuya said.

“You got it. Here goes! First, I’ll play Pot of Greed to draw two cards! Next, since you control a monster and I don’t, I can special summon Cyber Dragon to the field.” You said.

Cyber Dragon: 2100 ATK

“Next, I’ll normal summon Cyber Dragon Zwei to the field as well.” You said.

Cyber Dragon Zwei: 1500 ATK

“And by revealing a spell card from my hand, I can treat him as just Cyber Dragon. And the one I will show is Cybernetic Fusion Support, which I will play now by paying half of my life points. This card helps me, when I activate this; another polymerization. Now, by banishing my monsters from anywhere other than my deck, I can create a Machine-type fusion monster. So, I’ll banish and fuse Cyber Dragon Zwei and two Cyber Dragons together.” You said.

Shawn: 900

“Another fusion summon?” Yuya asked.

“By combining these three mechanical creatures together, they’ll create a three-headed weapon of mass destruction! Fusion summon! Level 10! Cyber End Dragon!” You chanted

Cyber End Dragon: 4000 ATK

“What? 4000 attack points?” Yuya gasped.

“Looks like you’re in for a world of hurt, Yuya.” Serena said.

“Now, let’s get started. Attack his Drummerilla now!” You said.

Yuya: 1600

“That was a big hit.” Serena said.

“Now, I’ll play Pot of Acquisitiveness! I shuffle my three banished monsters back into my deck and draw a new card. That’ll do it for now.” You said.

“Okay. Time to make a comeback!” Yuya said as he draws.
15122211221.title: Yuya turn

15122212.content:
You and Serena managed to land in the Standard Dimension and you see the LDS Tower. You two go inside and you looked at the place. You see duelists not only learning to fusion summon, but also synchro and xyz. You stopped as you guys see a man with white hair and glasses on him.

“Excuse us? Are you Reiji Akaba?” You asked.

“Indeed I am. Ah! It’s good to see you, Serena.” Reiji said.

“Wait. You know him, Serena?” You asked.

“It’s a long and complicated story.” Serena said.

“Well, thanks for sharing!” You said a little mad.

“Hey! Sorry! Okay?” Serena argued.

“If you two are finished arguing, would you like to tell me why you two are here?” Reiji asked.

You start off by giving Reiji your name before giving him the entire story. Reiji seems intrigued about you wanting to help stop his father’s evil plans.

“If you wished to join the cause, then you must enter the Arc League Championship tournament to prove your worth.” Reiji said.

“We’ll do it. Also, there’s is something else.” You said.

“Oh?” Reiji wondered.

“I’ve noticed that you teach these duelists the other summoning methods. I want to learn them because I don’t think that my fusion will be enough.” You said.

“In that case, very well. Which summoning method do you wish to know?” Reiji asked before you choose
15122212.title: Learning new methods

151222121.content:
“I would like to know the Synchro summoning, Reiji.” You suggested.

“Alright. We have a few decks that may help you. So, choose wisely.” Reiji said.

“Okay.” You said before going to get your deck.

“Reiji? There is something that I want to talk to you about.” Serena said.

“Huh?” Reiji said.

You walked into a training room after you chosen you kind of synchro deck. You just hoped that this is a good idea. You then see a robot with a duel disk on it. These must be duel bots for trainees. Sounds good to you as you activate your duel disk.

Duel!

Shawn: 4000
Duel Bot: 4000

“Commencing first turn. Activating Hand Destruction for both players to discard two cards and draw two cards. Normal summon tuner monster, Junk Synchron! Using ability to summon Sonic Chick from graveyard. Using Quillbolt Hedgehog’s ability to summon it to field while I control a tuner monster. Now, tune Junk Synchron with Sonic Chick and Quillbolt Hedgehog to Synchro summon Stardust Assault Warrior!” The duel bot said.

3 + 2 + 1 = 6

Stardust Assault Warrior: 2100 ATK

“So, this is a Synchro summon? Quaint.” You thought.

“Using Stardust Assault Warrior’s ability to summon Junk Synchron in defense mode. Place two cards down before ending turn.” The duel bot ended.

“Okay. Time to see what I can do. I draw! First things first, I’m activating the spell card,”
151222121.title: Synchro

1512221212.content:
"I can now discard Dragunity Phalanx, to draw 2 cards! Next, the field spell: Dragon Ravine! But its effect can wait, I summon Dragunity Dux!", you said.

Dux: 1500 ATK

"Next, I use his effect; equipping Phalanx. Next, Phalanx effect summons himself"

Phalanx: 500 ATK

"Next I tune Phalanx and Sux together!"

2+4=6

"As these beast gather the light, I beckon their new form. A warrior who shall bring justice! Synchro summon! Level 6: Dragunity Knight- Vajrayana!", you chant.

Vajrayana: 1900 ATK

"Next, Vajrayana can equip Phalanx from the grave!", you said.

"Reverse card open, mystical space typhoon", the robot destroyed Phalanx.

"Two reverse cards, turn end", you said.
1512221212.title: Dragunity start

15122212121.content:
“Draw! Summoning Speed Warrior to field.” The robot said.

Speed Warrior: 900 ATK

“Tune Junk Synchron with Speed Warrior to synchro summon Junk Warrior.” The robot said.

3+2=5

Junk Warrior: 2300 ATK

“Junk Warrior huh? This should be interesting.” You said.

“Next, play Call of the Haunted to bring Junk Warrior from graveyard to field.” The robot said.

“Ahh. I know where this is going.” You said.

“Tune Junk Synchron with Junk Warrior to synchro summon Junk Destroyer.” The robot said.

3+5=8

Junk Destroyer: 2600 ATK

“Use Junk Destroyer’s ability to destroy cards equal to the amount of non-tuner monsters used to summon him. Destroy Vajrayana.” The robot commanded.

“Not unless I use Fiendish Chain to negate his ability.” You said.

“Stardust Assault Warrior will attack Vajrayana.” The robot said.

Shawn: 3800

“Turn end.” The robot ended.

“My turn now! Draw!”
15122212121.title: Bot turn

151222121211.content:
"I activate magic planter, sacrificing my chain; this lets me draw two cards! Now I play my set card, soul exchange. And another one, from my hand! Now I sacrifice both of your monsters, to summon Dragunity Arma Leyvaten!", you said.

Arma Leyvaten: 2600

"I could've summoned him with his effect, but getting rid of your monsters was fun. Since I can't attack, I'll set 2 reverse cards. Then I'll play card of sanctity, we draw til we have six. I'll set another reverse card and end", you say.

"Draw card", said the bot. "Activate card.."
151222121211.title: Your turn 1

1512221212112.content:
“Monster Reborn to summon Junk Destroyer from graveyard. Activating De-Synchro to send Junk Destroyer to the extra deck and summon Junk Warrior and Junk Synchron from graveyard.” The robot said.

“A De-Fusion spell card for synchros? Makes perfect sense.” You complimented.

“Activating Pot of Greed to draw two cards. Activating Heavy Storm to destroy all spells and traps on field.” The robot said as the cards on your field is destroyed.

“Well, that ruined my strategy.” You thought.

“Activating spell card, Star Changer, to decrease Junk Warrior’s level by one.” The robot said.

Junk Warrior: Lvl: 4

“What? Why would you want to do that?” You wondered.

“Now, tune Junk Synchron and Warrior to synchro summon Junk Berserker.” The robot said.

3+4=7

Junk Berserker: 2700 ATK

“That may be a problem.” You thought in your head.

“Using Junk Berserker’s ability to banish Junk Warrior and decrease your monster’s attack points by it’s attack points.” The robot said.

Arma Leyvaten: 300 ATK

“This doesn’t look good at all.” You said.

“Junk Berserker will now attack Dragunity Arma Leyvaten.” The robot said.

“Oh yeah? Well, remember when you destroyed all my spell and trap cards? Well, one of them was Damage Diet. I was able to activate it right before it was destroyed. So now, the damage I’m going to be taking is halved.” You said.

Shawn: 2600

“Placing two cards down and ending turn.” The robot said.

“Okay. Time for a comeback. Draw!” You draw and liked what you got. “Okay. I’m activating...”
1512221212112.title: Monster Reborn

15122212121122.content:
“I activate Pot of Greed and draw two more cards. Now, I’ll play Momster Reborn to get Vajrayana back to the field. Now, I’ll play Magical Stone Excavation! I discard two cards and get a spell card from my graveyard. And guess what? It’s Card of Santity. We each draw cards until we’re holding six.” You draw and you like what you got. “Now, I’ll summon my Dragunity Primus Pilus by sacrificing Vajrayana.” You said.

Dragunity Primus Pilus: 2200 ATK

“With his effect, I’ll equip Pilum to him. Then, I’ll use Double Summon to bring out Darkspear. Now, I tune Darkspear with Primus Pilus. Meet the top dragonic warrior that fights with no fear! Synchro Summon! Level 8 Dragunity Knight - Barcha!” You chanted.

Dragunity Knight - Barcha: 2000 ATK

“Now, when his synchro summoned, I can equip any number of Dragunity monsters from my graveyard to him. And I’m going to use 4 of them. And he gains 300 points for each Dragunity card equipped to him.” You said.

Dragunity Knight - Barcha: 3200 ATK

“Remember Dragon Mastery? It’s back and it’ll give Barcha and extra 500 attack ponts for each Dragunity monster equipped to him.” You said.

Dragunity Knight - Barcha: 5200 ATK

“Now, that he’s equipped with Brandistock, he gains the ability to attack twice. And he can attack you directly with him being equipped with Pilum. Only that if he does, you only take half the damage. Not that it matters. Attack him directly!” You said.

“Activating trap card. Scrap Iron Scarecrow, to negate your attack.” You said.

“Bad move, robo. Because I now play this. Double or Nothing! This will double my monster’s attack points and Barcha can attack again!” You said.

Dragunity Knight - Barcha: 10400 ATK

“Now, finish this!” You said.

Duel Bot: 0

WINNER: Shawn

“And that’s how it’s done.” You said before clutching your head in pain. “Aaahh! My head!” You screamed mentally.

You then start having images about huge fires and burning buildings. What shocked you is that you can see yourself standing there. But, a little different and there was a big golden-like dragon floating above you.

“What? What in the world was that?! I don’t remember any of that.” You thought before relaxing your mind.

“That was a very good display of synchro summoning, Shawn. You could be a natural.” Reiji complimented.

“Yeah. You did great.” Serena said before noticing you looking down. “Hey. What’s wrong?” Serena asked.

“Nothing. Just a little headache. I’ll be fine.” You said.

You then decided to
15122212121122.title: Finishing Blow

1513.content:
Ayu the little fan girl

Or the gem knight chick masumi
1513.title: Next girls

15131.content: What dimension are you from before you meet this chibi-sweetie?
15131.title: Ayu: your dimension?

151311.content: Standard or fusion, pick your poison.
151311.title: Which one do you want

1513112.content:
Leo Akaba walked down the hall, towards the Academia research lab. "Doctor, progress report on the cybernetic initiative; now", he said. The goal of this project, was to create half-machine duelists to aid in the war. The subjects would be given cybernetics in the arms and legs, and have cybernetics placed in their torso and head. "Unfortunately sir, only RX-11 survived the cybernetic surgery", the doctor said. He pointed towards the one living subject, who was currently dueling a teacher.

The subject had cybernetics on his lower arms and legs, and his torso had cybernetics as well. He had a robotic red left-eye, where a metal casing was around it. His blue eye was emotionless. He had cybernetics in his brain as well, giving him knowledge on all known summoning methods; as well as martial arts skills. His cybernetic limbs made him superhuman. For the current test, He had tubes and wires sticking out of his robotic limbs; and a helmet on his head, also with wires and a visor. He knew of this, but had to focus on honing his duel skills. The subject had his human mind locked away with a special program, as to keep his skills sharp as possible. The teacher drew his card, and used it to summon Chaos ancient gear golem.

(Your pov)

Error, no countermeasures available for opposing card at this time!

Target attacking, probability of defeat; 100%.

RX-11: 0

"You're a failure, time for punishment", the teacher said. He pressed a button, that sent electricity through your body.

Pain! Pain! Pain! Pain! Pain!

After it was over, you put your deck back into the duffel bag of decks given to you by the Academia.

As the doctor came in with the professor, all the hoses and wires went limp; simply dangling off you now. You lifted the bag, when a strange desire for freedom entered your robotic mind. You threw off the test disk and ran, hearing as security was called to catch you.you reached a storage room, and grabbed a disk with the dimension function; as well as a couple extra decks.

(Standard)

Ayu was walking home, when suddenly a light blinded her; before she saw a boy her age, who looked like he was from a science-fiction movie.

"Who are you?", she asked. "RX-11, a duel-cyborg", you answered. "Duel-cyborg?", she asked. "Allow to to demonstrate", you tell her as you pull out your disk and a deck from the bag.

(Elsewhere)

"Sir, that's him! He's the source of the dimensional energy! We have men in the area, orders sir?", Nakajima asked. "Once the duel ends, capture him however you can", Reiji Akaba said.

(Back to you)

"I'll begin", you said. "With the field spell.."
1513112.title: Bio-cybernetic Duel Soldier: RX-11

15131122.content:
"I activate the field spell, Slugger Arms Arena: Duel Diamond. When this field spell is played, I may add a Slugger Arms card to my hand from my deck. I select, Slugger Smash. In addition, this field spell Grant's all Slugger Arms monster an additional 800 attack points, and I may draw two cards instead of one during my draw phase; provided I first reveal a Slugger Arms monster", You explain.

"That's a powerful field spell", Ayu said nervously.
***
"Sir, I am not familiar with this deck", Nakajima told Reiji. "I am, it's a baseball deck; and a very powerful one. Those cards are rare, and that kid is planning a home run assault", Reiji said.
***
"I activate Slugger Smash! I reveal the top 5 cards of my deck, and if there are at least three monster cards; you take 1500 points of effect damage! Then after that, the 5 cards go to the grave; and if you take damage, you draw two cards", you picked up the five cards.

"4 monster cards, you lose life points!", you said as you sent the 5 cards to the grave.

Ayu: 2500

Ayu drew her 2 cards, but you weren't done.

"I summon Slugger Arms Flash Pitcher!", you said as a slim man in a red and orange uniform appeared.

SAFP: 1700 ATK - 2500 ATK

"When he's normal summoned, you take 500 points of damage; go, fast ball flash!", Flash Pitcher threw a baseball of light.

Ayu: 2000

Ayu was stunned, she lost half her life points; and she hadn't gotten a turn.

"I activate his other effect, I can draw a card; but he loses 1000 ATK points until my next standby phase", you said as you drew.

SAFP: 2500 ATK-1500 ATK

"I play two face down cards, ending my turn", you said.
***
"Have our men close in, but don't interfere", Reiji said.
15131122.title: Enter: Slugger Arms!

151311221.content:
"I draw, and I activate aquaactress spotlight! I can special summon a level 3 or lower aquaactress monster from my deck, I choose aquaactress guppy!", Ayu said.

AG: 600 ATK

"Spotlight also let's me add a copy of the monster to my hand. Next I play pot of greed, to draw an additional 2 cards. Next, I special summon another guppy using the effect of the first; then the second summons a third. The third now summons aquaactress Tetra, then I normal summon another Tetra!", Ayu said.

AG ×3: 600 ATK
AT ×2: 300 ATK

"I activate 3 continuous spells; aquarium stage, set, and lighting!", Ayu said.

AG ×3: 600-900 ATK
AT ×2: 300-600 ATK

"I don't think so, I play a trap; Strike out seal! All spell and trap cards on your field are now set, and are stuck that way until the end of my next turn!", you said.

AG ×3: 900-600 ATK
AT ×2: 600-300 ATK

"I activate card of sanctity, we draw until we hold six cards; I set 2 reverse cards and end my turn", Ayu said.
151311221.title: Ayu takes her turn.

1513112211.content:
“It’s my turn now. That means my Flash Pitcher gets his attack points back due to the fact that my Standby Phase came.” You said.

SAFP: 2500 ATK

“Now, I play the spell Strike Fusion!” You said.

“A fusion card?!” Aye wondered.

“Yep and it lets me fuse monsters from my hand or deck to summon a Slugger Arms fusion monster. I select Slugger Arms Catcher Enforcer and Shortstop Guardian from my deck. It’s time to get this game all fired up! I Fusion Summon! Level 7! Slugger Arms Bat Master!” You said as you summoned what looks like a big man like monster that is holding a ginormous bat.

SABM: 2400 - 3200 ATK

“Nice. I didn’t know you can fusion summon.” Ayu complimented.

“I have been studying it for a while and it’s about to pay off.” You said.

*******

“Fusion huh? This should be intriguing to look into.” Reiji said eyeing the duel.

*******

“Now, Bat Master, attack her Tetra!” You commanded.

“I play a trap!” Ayu said.

“I don’t think so. When he attacks while I have another Slugger Arms monster on my field, you can’t play any traps against him.” You explained.

“Then I better play Defense Draw. The damage you take is reduced to zero and I get to draw a card.” Ayu said.

“Fine. Lucky for you, Bat Master is the only monster I can attack on the same turn he was fusion summoned. So that’ll do for now.” You said
1513112211.title: Fusion Time!

15133.content: You have a second chance with Serena, since you didn't get to choose your dimension of origin before. But here, you can't choose to be from fusion, since that story line already exist.
15133.title: Serena 2

151331.content: Fair enough. Okay. What dimension are you from?
151331.title: Choose your dimension

1513311.content:
"Initiate training program, max level", said a teen. He was 5'7" and had long black hair. He wore a tuxedo, and a lab coat over it. He had bifocals and fingerless gloves.

"Of course young master, any deck you prefer for opposition?", asked a real butler in his thirties. "Surprise me", you said. "Of course sir", he said.

"Duel mode engaged, action field on: Science Sanctuary. Action cards dispersed", said a floating drone. "Taking first turn, summon Armageddon Knight; effect sends dark monster from deck to grave", said the drone.

ATK: 1400

"Activating Veil of darkness, then discarding legendary fiend; to summon dark grepher. Set card, turn end", the drone said.

ATK: 1700

"My turn, draw; I activate Shrodinger's Cat. I discard 1 card, to activate trap booster; to activate paradox draw. Next I play pot of greed, to draw two cards. These won't do, so I'll use Shrodinger's cat; I shuffle these cards, and draw two. I'll set a card, and set a monster. Turn end", you said.
1513311.title: Training: Dominic Riggs vs. Duel-drone

15133111.content:
“Thanks to paradox draw, I get to draw instead of you.” You said.

“Activating trap card Call of the Haunted to summon Legendary Fiend from grave.” The drone said.

ATK: 1500

“Normal summoning Dark Tinker to field.” The drone said.

ATK: 1000

“Dark Tinker is a tuner monster. Tuning Dark Tinker with Legendary Fiend to Synchro Summon Thought Ruler Archfiend.” The drone said.

ATK: 2700

“Dark Tinker’s ability activates. When sent to graveyard, I can look at the top card of my deck and choose to place it on top or bottom of deck.” The drone said as he looks at the card. “On bottom. Thought Ruler Archfiend attacks set card.” The drone said as your monster is destroyed. “When Thought Ruler Archfiend destroys a monster by battle, I gain life points equal to it’s attack points.” The drone said.

Drone: 5000

“Well, you’re about to lose those points because you destroyed Laplace the Fiend Mathematician. When he leaves the field, you take 300 points of damage for every card on the field.” You said.

Drone: 2900

“Dark Grepher attacks directly.” The drone said.

“Not quite. I’ll activate my Defense Draw trap card. This will not only negate the battle damage from your attack, but I get to draw a card.” You said.

“Armageddon Knight attacks directly.” The drone said.

You: 2600

“Turn end.” The drone said.
15133111.title: Continue 1

151332.content:

151332.title: Other

1513321.content:
Regardless of how you call her, you've got two choices here! Or Story paths. A story idea I've prepared, and one for you to make your own date on.
----------------------------------
Story A: Your Story Here
Option A is for another writers story, K?
-----------------
Story B: Surprising! Heartland's Valentine Tag Duel Tournament!
You're in the same class as Yuto and Ruri are in Heartland Duel School, Class 5-C. Ruri has always been your secret crush since you first entered the class, and you know all of your classmates pretty well, but you don't feel like you have the courage to ask Ruri out on a date...but you just might get your chance...
Heartland has a special event planned for all of Heartland City this Valentine's- A Tag Team Tournament! Those who enter will be sorted by gender into two different groups at different ends of the city. The boy group will get a random number from 1 to 25, and so will the girl group. Then, both groups will be released into the city to split up and find the opposite gender with their matching number. Once they all do so, they will have to duel in pairs against other entrants, until one pair remains to stand, and clam the title Excited, all of Class 5-C enters, and when you get your number, you eventually find that Ruri has the matching number! Now, you both have to battle it out as a pair, and (hopefully) let your feelings for her known....and maybe find out she likes you, too!
1513321.title: Ruri, Lulu, they both mean the same person!

info.brief_description: Go on a romantic road with your favorite female Yu-Gi-Oh! characters
info.description:
You get the chance to be with your favorite dueling girl as your date. Make it as adventurous, romantic and exciting as you can.

Sex is okay. Just don’t over do it. (By that, I mean anything that’s too disgusting. Just so we’re clear)

No one scented chapters.

Have fun

Update; 3/21/18: You can create your own cards if you wished to. Just don’t make them too O.P.

Update; 11/17/18: You can choose to use anime or real life effects. Whatever makes you comfortable

Update; 4/26/19: The stories doesn’t have to involve around the storyline of the actual shows of you don’t want to

***********

5/8/19: Over 500 chapters! Thank you so much for making this possible.

Shout out to Brevination and Jackfuego226. You two are awesome!

Anyone else want to do some chapters, you’re more than welcomed to join
